column1: Bunny Rabbit. A friend of mine had a bbq. We put up hay bales. A bunch of bunnies got in the hay bales. We were excited to see what would happen. They ran off.

Good Terms. Jim went to the grocery store to get some food. The cashier started talking about some goods with Jim. Jim asked for more information about the goods. The cashier tried to be helpful by giving him the information. Jim thanked the cashier and left the store.
What And Itch. My mom's dog has an oral allergy. She scratched her head yesterday. I went to check on her. She had an ear infection. I washed her ear and now she isn't scratching.

Empty Club. Jake had been trying to join a club at his school. The club had no members. He tried to find another club to join. A lot of people were saying they would join. Jake was happy when he found one.

Wrestling. Lacy loved wrestling and wanted to be a professional wrestler. Her dream was to compete in a championship match at a show. She would practice every day and eventually signed up for lessons. After a few weeks of training, she was able to enter a wrestling show. Lacy won her first match and got to have a dream day.

Magical Fruit. John had always had a crush on a classmate named Kim. John and Kim were always getting together at recess. One day Kim decided to skip recess so she could see John. When John saw Kim in his arms he smiled and waved. The next day John asked Kim out on a date!

Schedule. Bella was very stressed out this week. She could barely get out of bed. Her mom took her to the doctor's office. She had to schedule an appointment for Friday. Her mom got her to school on time and she felt much better.

Candy in the dirt. We were walking through the woods in the fall. My dog was running towards the tree line with a bag of treats. I put him at the tree and let him jump as high as he can. When the bag was thrown, he popped up on the top branch with all his treats. I decided to just pick the best treats from the ground.

Robins cruel exit. Roxy was a bully. She never let anyone get near her. One day, her friend stole her lunch. She couldn't have her lunch, and was very hungry. Roxy threw a fit, and decided she would never let others bully her again.

Good Fences. Tim bought some new fences. He decided to install them in his back yard. When the weather started to get bad Tim went to a hardware store. Tim bought more fencing. He continued to build the fence.

Carnival Games. Jenny always loved the carnival games. She went to the carnival with her friends. Jenny was scared to play the games. Her friends encouraged her to go on the rides. Jenny had a great time at the carnival games.

New Neighbors. Jill's family moved to a new neighborhood. Her neighbors were noisy and loud. They had a huge party every weekend. Jill had enough of the loud party. She moved out and made new friends.
The Face Wash. Joe had a very red face. His friends always made fun of his red face. He always put his face in water. He decided to wash it in the toilet. Joe's face didn't look so bad after all.
Bill started a company. Bill started a business. The business failed. Bill began working on a different business idea. Bill got his new business started. Bill's new business is doing great!
Pool. Kate wanted to take her dog for a swim. She went to the park. Then she found a pool with a small shallow end. Kate filled her dog's bowl with water. She brought her dog for a swim.
Megan sees a ghost. Megan is at home. Her mom is coming home. Megan gets scared. She goes to the kitchen. She sees a ghost.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine has been wanting to get her ears pierced for months. She asks her friends for help. Her friend tells her she'll help her. They get the piercer to work on her. Francine is very happy with her ears pierced.
Penn. We had some people over to play in our yard. It was a hot summer day. They let us go out in the back yard. We played in the summer yard all day. We felt so relaxed when we were out in the yard.
Flower Shop. The man went to the flower shop. He bought a dozen roses. He brought them home. His girlfriend complimented him. She thought he was a real flower person.
Shoes. I decided to buy a new pair of shoes. I went to the mall. I visited a local shoe store. I looked for a pair of shoes I liked. I went home and bought the shoes.

Spare Change. Mandy was going to leave to go to the store. She realized she forgot her spare change when she got home. She took her car keys and wallet out of her car. She walked down the street and found a quarter on the ground. She made her way to the store and paid for the quarter with the money.

Balloon Fight. Timmy was playing in the backyard with his friend Mike. They were tossing a ball into the air. Suddenly, they heard a thud. A balloon had popped on Timmy's head. They were both terrified and cried, but Timmy laughed it off.
Stripley. Stripley the dog was a male dog. The owners were not sure she'd survive. They brought her to the vet. He was very malnourished. Stripley is now a very healthy dog!

Milkshake. Sam got a milkshake for her boyfriend. She loved the milkshake. However she realized the milkshake wasn't very healthy. She took the milkshake to the shop. They gave her a diet shake instead.
Vintage toy. Tina was looking through her garage. She found a vintage doll. It was really old and had fallen apart. She had to glue it back together. Thankfully it worked.

New Underwear. Jack has had a job for several months. He has noticed a change in his work routine. He decides to purchase new underwear. Jack loves wearing underwear in his new job. Jack is happy to be working outside.
The Psychology of Grades. My daughter got her test back. It said she got a B. She was a little upset. She called her teacher. She was glad when she got her grade back.
New Dog. Sandra got a new dog. She was so excited about the new dog. One day, Sandra left her dog unattended. The dog was left in a neighbor's yard. A dog ran into the neighbor's yard.
Music Band. Josh and Alex were great friends. They started a band together. They got signed up to play at a club. They got great gigs there. They got more gigs than they could have dreamed of.

The Concert. Lola was a very popular girl in school. She went to a concert with her friends. The concert was really loud. Some girls got really annoyed. Lola and her friends stayed in the backstage area.

Dinosaurs. Eli wanted to learn more about dinosaurs. His local museum had an exhibit about dinosaurs. Eli walked by the exhibits everyday. Eli also researched dinosaur fossils online. Eli now has a solid knowledge of dinosaurs.

Pickles. I tried to eat pickle juice for the first time in Years. I didn't know how good the pickles would taste. My mom said they were delicious. I ate three, but was still hungry. I decided to eat some every week.

Raking Leaves. Tim loved to rake leaves. He had several large piles ready to go. He was going to use them as the foundation for a shed. The first one got raked up pretty badly. He decided to start small and then build up.

Dangerous Campfire. Sue was invited to a campfire for Halloween. She got there early to try to make the best of it. Sue thought she made a great fire. Her friend, however, came running into the campfire with a hose. He drenched the fire in gasoline and the camp was in flames.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca notices that her hair is turning gray. She decides to try dying her hair. She starts by dying her hair gray. Finally she is happy to see her gray hair. Bianca is glad that she no longer has gray hair.

Dancing. It was Kara's first day of dancing school. She put on her ballet clothes and ran to the center. The instructor gave Kara her first move. She twirled around in circles. Kara was happy that she'd been learning so much.

Buying a New TV. Sam was shopping at the store for a new TV. His budget was really tight, so he didn't have much money. Sam made some good offers at the store. The tv store would have to decide before he got home. Sam was glad to see the offer he made.
Deaf Kid. Tim was taking a test. He was talking to a friend online. The friend didn't hear what Tim was saying. Tim's hearing got worse after a while. Tim could barely hear his teacher in class.

Race. Sally took her friend to the track to run some laps. They raced each other for a few minutes. Sally was faster, and won the race. The girl was disappointed, but accepted the fact that she was faster. Sally felt bad, but she was glad that she won.

The Puppet Show. Cara had just put on her first performance. She was so excited about performing in front of her whole class! She practiced and practiced for the performance. On the day of the performance, she performed very well. She got a standing ovation when she finished her performance!

New Hobby. Karen was going through retirement. Her job was in the health care field. Karen was looking to start her own business. Karen looked for some business partners. She was able to start her own business.
No Jumping. Linda was out of a shoe. She decided to take a nap. She awoke. She wanted to jump on the chair. But, Linda was too tired.

Comparison. Tom was a football player. Tom had the top speed of all players. One day, Tom was running with a fast team. All of a sudden, Tom lost control of the football. He flew through the air and landed on his head.
seafood. Sara wanted to go to the seafood restaurant. Sara asked her friend if she could go. Her friend said okay. Sara and her friend drove to the restaurant. Sara ordered a fish taco.
Burritos. Kelly wanted some burritos. She did not have any money to buy them. She ended up making them. They were delicious. She made them again to make more.

Spinach. I never knew why people like spinach. One day my cousin told me that it was good for the soul. After hearing that I started eating spinach. Now every time I eat spinach I feel better. Now I don't like spinach because it's so unhealthy.
Exercising. Jane wanted to get in better shape. Jane bought a treadmill. She got on it. She started to run. Jane got in much better shape.

New Year's Resolution. I had a resolution to eat healthier in the year 2015. I made a list of healthy foods and ate a little of each. The next day my willpower was weaker than usual. So I ate a little less of the healthy food. I lost 20 pounds in the year 2015.

John Buys An Umbrella. John was getting ready to go to a baseball game. The weather was cold and rainy. John took an umbrella out of his garage. He put it on and felt better. John was happy to have an umbrella.

Embarrassing Mistake. I went out to eat with a group of people on Friday. They ordered some food off the menu. I got a hamburger, french fries, a drink, and some chips. However, my burger came out hot and raw. The waitress had to throw away my burger and fries.
Greenery. Lucy wanted a tree. So she got her friends together. They got to work planting a tree in her yard. The tree grew big and strong. Lucy was proud to have grown a tree in her yard.

The Weight Loss Expert. John's doctor told him to start losing weight. He decided to make a plan to lose 100 pounds. Every day, he went out for a run. He also started eating healthy food. Within a few weeks, he had lost 100 pounds.
Library Book. Tim needed to look up information on a book. He checked the internet. Tim found a good guide on the internet. Tim looked up the information. He used the guide to check his information.

Low Blood Sugar. I was feeling really thirsty. I ran to my kitchen. I began to look through my cabinet for some food. I decided to make a granola bar. Alas, I did not have enough food to finish the bar.
Broken Nose. I woke up in the morning. I was sneezing and coughing. I ran my hand down my nose. I looked into my eyes. I had a broken nose.

Eternal love. I wanted to make my boyfriend very happy. One day, I sat him down and gave him my undivided attention. I asked him to tell me his name. He asked me if he'd like to call me by that name. I called him Edward and we're still married.
Lost Phone. The woman had a new cell phone. She couldn't find her phone anywhere. She looked in her car. She even looked through her purse. Eventually she gave up.

Eviction. One day, I found out my roommate was evicted. I filed an eviction notice on my door. I also called the landlord. He said I could stay in another room, but he wouldn't change the locks. I was relieved.
Thunder. Bob woke up to a loud noise. He looked outside to see what was wrong. He saw a tree branch swaying in the wind. He called his neighbor for help. They came and helped him fix the branch.
Lost poncho. Meredith went for a long walk. She was so tired when she got home. She couldn't find her poncho. She looked everywhere. Finally she found it in the couch cushions.

Swim. Anna was a great swimmer. But one day, her instructor told her she needed to practice more. So she signed up for swim lessons. She got in the pool and got ready. But the swim instructor told Anna that she needed to stay out longer!
Sticky. I went to the local grocery store. I wanted to buy a bag of chips. I bought some chips. The bag came back with a lot of stuck in it. I was very upset about the bag.
Mother. Briana was having a bad day. She woke up, and her mom gave her some juice. Briana drank the juice, and felt better. She called her mom later that day. She told her mom she had had a bad day.

ID. My sister in law's daughter is 53. She used to go by her middle name, Sara. I heard her sister in law say she was using her middle name Sara. She went by her middle name Sara for a while. I think she is going back to her original name, Miranda.

The Inheritance. Tim was trying to sell his family farm. He tried to get a lot of people to buy from him. Nothing really happened with anybody buying. Tim took out a loan to cover his losses. He was able to stay afloat but couldn't afford his house.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike has been feeling very down lately. One night Mike decides to have a nice white wine. Mike feels better after he drinks the white wine. Now Mike feels better. He decides to drink more white wine.

Broken Bike. Dan wanted to go for a bike ride. He went to the store to buy a new one. The cashier told Dan that he could not get a new bike. Dan decided that it would be cheaper to just buy a new bike from the store. Dan left the store with a new bike and vowed to never shop there again.

The Blind Date. Jason thought he'd become friends with an online dating website. He signed up for an online blind date. He met his date and they had a great time together. Jason was flattered he had met someone. Jason felt he was finally meeting someone!
The Stormy Day. The wind was picking up. The skies were looking dark and gloomy. There was a bad thunderstorm. Everyone was soaked and miserable. Everyone was happy when it stopped.

White Cast Christmas. Sally's dad worked all the time. This year he decided to get her a Christmas gift. He bought her a pretty white cat with big white whiskers. She loved the gift. She even liked how white it was and never gave him any trouble.
The volleyball accident. Kelly was playing volleyball with her friend. Suddenly she felt a sharp pain. She hit her leg really hard. Luckily, Kelly's leg was okay. Luckily, it only hurt for a second.

Turtle Fears. Tom had never eaten a live turtle. His friend had one, but he refused to touch it. His friend threatened to kill it if he didn't do everything right. Tom tried to act tough but he felt too weak. He reluctantly decided to give it a shot.

Shoelaces. I had to wear high heels every day. I didn't know if I should tie my shoelaces or tie them to the floor. I decided to tie my shoelaces to the floor. I tied them down and walked to school. When I got to school I tied my shoelaces and looked cute in high heels.

Easy mac disappointment. I had ordered a sandwich from the restaurant yesterday. When I got to the restaurant it was the worst sandwich I ever had. The sandwich was cold, not hot at all. I tried asking the manager but he wouldn't budge. I was really upset but I still eat it.

Puppy Litter. Tom bought a puppy. He thought he would take good care of it. Unfortunately there were no toys left to play with. He didn't realize how much litter would destroy their toys. Tom had to take the puppy to a litter room for it's own good.
Old Friend. Tom was at a new school. He met some new kids. They introduced themselves. Tom became friends with them. They stayed for a long time.

The Easter Parade. Little Suzy's favorite Easter event is the Easter parade. This year she's brought her candy from home. Her mother took her and her family to see a parade of floats. She met with her neighbors and took some candy from them too. At the end of the day she took home over a hundred pieces of candy.
No Littering. Tom had a dog. Tom's dog was too active. Tom did not allow his dog to run around the house. Tom's dog tore up some of his walls. Tom bought a litter box for his dog.

Ham Sandwich. Joe had an unhealthy habit. Every time he ate he would have a ham sandwich. Joe went to go eat a sandwich. He ended up eating a lot of sandwiches. Joe now has an unhealthy habit of eating sandwiches.

Confession. Lydia was getting married in a few months. She wanted a surprise for the wedding. She hid the ring in her pocket at work. When she got to the party, her husband asked her about it. She said she was embarrassed, so he never found out.

Janet. Janet was always getting bullied. The teacher decided to take her to the principal. The principal asked her if she would like to be in his class. Janet agreed and was happy to be in his class. Janet felt great that her bully finally got bullied!

The fishing trip. Caitlin wanted to go fishing. She planned a trip with her friend. When they got there they realized it was raining. Caitlin and her friend decided to turn around. They went home instead.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex realizes that he has been drinking way too much coffee. He decides to switch to tea instead of coffee. Rex is surprised to see his health improve. He is glad that he switched his drinking habits. Rex is very proud of the health improvements he has made.

Scared Teddy. Teddy was a little boy. He had a lot of imaginary friends. Teddy started to hear a lot of voices. One day, he asked for his imaginary friends. His mom took him to the doctor and they found out Teddy had autism.
Power Outage. My dad was working late today. The power was out for over an hour. I got up and went to the kitchen. When I came back, the power was back on. My dad was happy.

A new hobby. Lisa loved to be active and adventurous. But she didn't like sports or anything like that. She always wanted to join a band and play music. Her parents were very supportive of her plans. But she was always too scared to play music!

Photo. I just finished reading the Hunger Games book. This photo was taken by the security guard. I am on the third book, and I am excited to see what happens. The photo was taken by the security guard while I am shopping. I am glad the photo was taken for the book.

The Deadline. Dan and his wife were having a problem with their landlord. The deadline was coming up and they had to make a choice. Dan and his wife couldn't agree on a solution. Finally, Dan and his wife came to an agreement and Dan did it. After the deadline passed, they both found new tenants.
Wine tasting. Lily and her family went to Napa on vacation. She brought wine with her. Her family loved it. They all ordered more. They all enjoyed their wine.

The bed. Samantha was getting tired of carrying all of her belongings in one bed. She thought about taking the bed to a room where she could use it. But when she asked her dad, he said they couldn't afford that. The next day, her mom found her sleeping on the floor. She explained that she was just getting too old to get up.
The saxophone. Alicia got a saxophone for her birthday. She practiced everyday. But, she couldn't play a single note. Alicia was so sad. She gave up and bought a piano instead.
The Farm. My dad took me to the farm one morning. He gave me a cow to milk. He told me that he knew how to make eggs from scratch. He taught me how to make cheese and butter. Now, I work the farm.

Outside the Window. Jane had a bad boyfriend. Jane stayed with him a long time. Eventually her boyfriend was very bored. Jane decided to move out of the house. Jane moved out of the city for a safer life.

Making it gluten free. Lucy wanted to eat gluten free. She went to the grocery store to buy some bread. When she was ready to buy it, she could not find it. She looked in the back. Luckily, she found some bread in the bakery.
The plane trip. The group went on a plane. They got on the plane and were given a bottle of beer. The flight took forever. Finally it was time to land. Everyone was very tired.

Jen's Game. Jen played with her friends on the park one afternoon. They set up a huge tent and started to play. They each put in a piece of cardboard and hid it. The other kids called for them to tell them what they had found. Jen was embarrassed when she found out they had hidden her doll!

More Alone. Cara didn't have a boyfriend, and was sad. She didn't have a place to go and felt isolated. Then a new friend introduced her to a nice guy named Dan. Dan invited her to dinner one night. Cara realized she was no longer alone, after all!

Theme park excitement. There is always a theme park that has the biggest crowds. The main attraction is usually the ferris wheel. They get to ride a lot of rides. The main attraction for this day was the roller coaster. They spent a lot of time looking at all the details.

Futsal. My friend Frank played football in the 80s. He was one of the best players in his team. He was a wide receiver and had the speed to catch the ball. On the first play of the 2016 Futsal playoffs, he was one yard away from the goal. He had the ball and fumbled and lost the game.

Bluebirds. I was standing in the trees watching the bluebirds. One of them landed on my head. It didn't fly far, so I waited and watched. He flew away very fast. I found him the next day, and saw that he had fallen from a tree!
The Trip. The family went on vacation. They stayed at a beach resort. The hotel had a lot of nice touches. They got some fresh lobster. It was a nice little vacation.

Carnival Ride. Dan had never been on a carnival ride. One day his family went to the local fair. His older brother took him to the midway. Dan was amazed at the speed and excitement on the roller coasters. Dan was so excited that he almost cried.

Lost Throughout the Process. The family arrived at the campground after several hours. After arriving, they found their camp had been razed to the ground. The kids gathered around the fire pit, looking for things. They quickly found a metal detector, and began to dig. Soon, they found the metal object, and began searching again.
The Murderer. Jack was a good kid. He always acted the innocent kid. One day, Jack's teacher asked him a hard question. She asked him if he had killed anyone before. Jack froze and refused to answer.

Home Run. My baseball team was down by 3 runs. We were up by only 3 runs and the bases were loaded. My friend and I stood behind home plate ready to hit a homerun. We lined up and swung as hard as we could. After a full count, I connected and hit a homerun.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg always wanted to see the animals at the zoo. Finally he decides to visit the zoo. At the zoo, Greg sees many unique animals. Finally, Greg visits the zoo again. Greg is happy he finally visited the zoo.
New Shoes. Jane went shopping. She loved shoes. She found a pair of shoes she liked. She went home and ordered them. They came a week later.
Cole. Cory loved to collect comic books. His favorite book was Captain America. He asked his parents for a copy of the book. His parents gave him a special book. His first book was Captain America.
Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley Temple is a toy from my childhood. She was a big doll. Her face was very pretty. She was very adorable. She was put into a doll house in my childhood.

Patty's Sleepover. Patty couldn't wait until her friends had a sleepover. She and her best friend Beth decided to go to the mall. Once there, Patty saw a lot of cute things. However, when they arrived, they both noticed something else. They were both wearing the same costumes.

New Shears. Sara was trying to sharpen her pencils. Her favorite tool was a pair of sharpening stones. She got her supplies and sharpened up some paper. As she was putting them to use, she stepped on a thorn. The sharpened stone snapped and Sara started bleeding.

As I Sit Here. The teacher sat us down on the grass. My name is Amy and I am starting middle school this year. Amy asked me how I was doing. I told her I was just working on my Spanish and not getting good. Amy told me that she liked my smile and gave me a hug.

Going to School. Sue had to go to school the next day. She put on her clothes and shoes and drove to school. Once there, Sue got in line and waited. She went to sit in a seat and read her paper. Sue sat and read for 2 hours before the bell rang.
Hit. Bob was an aggressive child. One day he hit a boy. The boy tried to run away. Bob chased after him and hit him. The boy's mother was very mad at Bob.

The dog. Jenny had an adorable dog named Fluffy. Jenny would feed her dog everyday. Fluffy got really sick and looked like she was in pain. Jenny was worried so she took Fluffy to the vet. The vet told Jenny Fluffy was fine.
Fears. Samantha is afraid of flying. She decides to find a hobby to keep herself safe. She takes up photography. She loves it. Samantha is happy that she found something to keep herself safe.

Driver. I was driving home on a foggy night. The street light turned on and I got scared. I stopped at a stop sign, but nobody was there. The cops came by and told me to go home. It was an accident and I learned not to drive so late.
Man's best friend. Joe loved animals. His dog Rex was the best. He got to visit Rex once every month. One day Rex ran away. Joe never saw Rex again.

The First Birthday. I couldn't wait to get my first birthday present. I was going to be an adult now, and wouldn't let my parents down. When I opened the box, I was pleased to find the present was a videogame. The game was set up for me at my house by my parents. I was so excited for the game, I was glad I got it.
The fair. John wanted to go to the fair. He called his friend to see if he could go with him. They set out in the car. After that, they went to the fair. John had a fun time.
The Bison. Mary took her kids to the zoo. They loved seeing the animals at the zoo. At the zoo, they saw a large bison. The bison ate grass on their farm. The children were very sad when they left.

A Good Samaritan. Kate was riding in her car on a road trip. She was texting with her friend, Laura. Laura's phone ran out of battery and she couldn't call Kate. She stopped her car to wait for Kate to pick up. Kate was pleased that a stranger stopped to help her.

Pictures. My husband took me to a beach. I forgot my sunglasses at home. The waves and waves crashed against the shore. I went back to my car and got my glasses. Now I go to the beach and take pictures with my husband.

Appendicitis. Sally was in labor one day. It was very early in the morning and her contractions were strong. She began to feel cramping and decided to take some medicine. She took a small dose and felt her contractions decrease. Luckily, the medicine worked and the baby was born healthy.

Money. I needed some extra cash. I decided to steal a few hundred dollars from a bank. I went to the bank and got away with the money. I spent the money at a local ice cream shop. I went home with the money and was happy!

Genre Disagreement. Charles hated his boss, and he made sure to show it. At work, Charles yelled and yelled at people. Charles also screamed at colleagues and showed their boss. The boss had to bring in a conference to discuss this. The boss let Charles off with a warning, and Charles learned a lesson.
For a Five. I decided to buy a lottery ticket. I had no clue how to play it. I decided to use my friend's number on it. My friend told me how to play it. It turns out my friend won the jackpot!
Sardines. Tom was hungry. He had some leftover sardines. He couldn't decide what to eat. He decided to eat the sardines. He had a good time eating the leftover sardines.

Too Curious. The teacher called the kids in to the front of the class. He explained that there's no homework today. He also instructed them to clean their rooms. The kids went to their rooms and collected their belongings. They left the class early in order to clean.

The School Fight. A teacher was angry with a student. She threw her desk at the student. The student fell to the ground. The teacher was sent to the office for her behavior. The student's mother got the principal.

Video Game. John hated playing video games. But he wanted to learn how to play them. So he started to study the rules of the video games. And he ended up beating all of his friends. John had learned a lot.

Milkshakes. I love to drink milkshakes at the bar. Sometimes I make them at home. I decided to try making some at home. It took a long time but it finally turned out great. Now I am in the kitchen making milkshakes.
Bad Haircut. Tom got a new haircut. It was short and sloppy. The next day Tom asked a friend to borrow his mohawk. The friend cut his hair too short. Tom told him it was fine.

The New Airplane. Sue's grandparents had just bought an old airplane. They had flown it a few times but it was getting old. Sue loved to fly the airplane. They took it out on the lake and took a cruise. She was so excited to take her first airplane ride.

Bruised Knees. Tommy got into a fight with his older brother. Tommy had bruises on his knees. His mother put a band-aid on them. Her parents took Tommy to see a doctor. The doctor treated Tommy's knee.
Heavy Belly. My wife was pregnant. She wanted to have a girl. She did not want a boy. She went in to have her tubes tied. They came out heavy and full of fluid.

The STained Glass. Sandy was painting her room. She was using a bright pink color. Suddenly, she spilled red paint all over the room. The pink color splattered all over her white glass. Sandy scrubbed it off, but it was a mess again.

The pregnancy prank. I once had a little brother. He was a really funny little boy. I would often give him candy to make him smile. He wasn't a good little boy so I thought I was being funny. I was so mad when I saw the picture later on.

Special Treat. Mandy was in the kitchen making cookies. She was distracted as she realized her cat had escaped. She heard a loud bark from the kitchen. Mandy hurried to find her cat and bring him back home. Her mother was happy to see Mandy back in the kitchen.

A Ship Without Direction. A large storm came to the coast. The ship captain ordered a change of course. He knew this would be a risky maneuver. The captain was nervous, but he didn't dare ask for his opinion. A small storm came to the coast, but the captain was safe.
Bad decision. Jim made a bad decision. He went swimming in the ocean. There was a shark. Jim freaked out. He then decided to swim back home.

Unicorn. Caitlyn took a ride on the local rollercoaster. She screamed, how could that be? But as the ride went on, she realized that it wasn't really that scary. After the ride, she was so relieved that she didn't want to ride it again. After that, she was able to go on the rollercoaster alone.

Egypt. My niece has three children. She has been raising them as single parents. One day the eldest child, 25, was arrested for shoplifting from a store. She was found in a hotel and accused of murder. She claimed innocence but was found guilty of the crime.
Office job. Tom needed to find a new job. He looked at many job ads. He applied to many different ones. One of them was posted in an old paper. Tom was offered the job.
Wrong Number. Tom was at the gas station. He noticed someone was using his phone. Tom asked if he could get it back. The person would not stop ringing. Tom decided to keep the phone and run.

Summer. Bill had just moved from the cold Northeast into the warm warm Pacific Northwest. He thought of the winter months as the worst. His best friend invited him to visit, as did a few other friends. Bill accepted the offer, and had a great time. Bill returned often, and made sure to visit his best friend.

Ants in the Keurig. Sam was drinking a cup of coffee in the Keurig. He left the coffee on the counter. While Sam was drinking the coffee he noticed ants crawling all over. He got up and cleaned them off. He tried not to spill any on his new Keurig.

New Pet Toys. Dakota loved animals. He was very picky about his toys. He asked his mother if she could get him some new ones. His mother bought him a new teddy bear and a new puppy. Dakota was happy with his new pets.

Baby Girl. Gina had been told she was the best one at school. She was only 13 but she had proven everyone wrong. She was named baby girl and she loved all her friends. Her new baby brother didn't even know he had a sister. Gina was disappointed with her new life.

Party. Joe wanted to throw a big party for his friends. He gathered all his friends from school and set them up at the house. They drank lots of beer, ate some food, and got drunk. When the party was over they got in their cars and headed to town. They had a lot of fun at their party and vowed to throw another one.

Fear of Flight. Irene had never flown before. She was very nervous about her upcoming trip. When she boarded the plane, Irene heard a scary noise. The turbulence lasted several minutes and Irene got scared. Irene ended up not boarding the plane that day.

Expensive Chocolate. Tim decided to buy chocolate for his girlfriend. He bought it from the supermarket. Unfortunately it was way too expensive for her. Tim felt badly about it. He didn't get as much chocolate for her.

Forgetful Roll. I rolled my own birthday cake for my husband. I put a cake in a pan and put icing on top. When I was done I realized I was out of chocolate. I looked in the cupboard and there was no chocolate. I took the cake out of the pan and ate it.
A Second Job. The girl quit her full time job for more money. She did not have a car or a job. Her bills were due. She asked her mom to give her a second job. Her mom agreed and she got a second job.

kittens. My wife and I decided we wanted to buy some kittens. We looked on Craigslist for a local kitty rescue. We found a beautiful orange tabby named Dori. We adopted Dori and brought her home. We named her Raccoon and she's loving her new home.

Power Steering. We used to have the front left axle out back of the car. One day the axle needed to come out to the side. The mechanic said he would repair it with some nuts. My wife said she would be mad if it went back in there. The car is much more stable now.

Getting The Pointe. Sam got a new pair of pointe shoes for her birthday. They were beautiful! Her mom helped her put them on one afternoon. She tried to get them on the stairs, but they wouldn't stay up. She finally got the pointe down.

Hot air balloon fire. Lisa loved balloons. She spent her summers in the mountains with her dad and friends. One day Lisa decided to try to make her own. When she got to the balloon store, she bought everything. To her surprise, her balloon didn't burn up.

The Perfect Steak. Jake wanted a steak. He went to the butcher. Jake picked out a steak that he thought was delicious. He was shocked when the butcher didn't cut it any better. Jake learned to be more picky from then on.

Trouble. The girl went to the wrong room at school. The teacher told her to look inside of it. She was about to cry. The teacher decided to give her a sticker instead. She was happy to get one for her effort.

New Lipstick. Juliet was shopping for her wedding. She was looking to find a perfect shade of red. She noticed the color was on sale. She couldn't believe how expensive it was. Luckily, she was able to pick up a coupon for half off.

Grouping. I've been practicing how to group with others. I'm having trouble doing it. I've practiced with other teachers and students. I haven't found grouping as difficult as I thought it would be. I'm very happy about how good my grouping abilities are.

Hot Summer Day. The weather in the summer heat is tough. But it's a challenge to avoid getting burnt. Yesterday, I went swimming in the ocean. I left the sun on and stayed in the shade. I didn't get burnt but I feel hot now.

The Science Fair. My parents decided to send me to the science fair. I had to make a project about dinosaurs. I made a model of a velociraptor with teeth. At the fair, people watched my model. I won second place!
Etsy Business. My niece just got a new house. The yard needs landscaping. She bought some supplies. She decided to sell her items. She made a bit of money and has plans for the future.
New shirt. Jack needed a new shirt. He did not have any at the store. He went to the local clothes store. Jack chose a new shirt. Jack was excited to buy his new shirt.

Bad Traffic. The traffic was atrocious. It seemed like someone was trying to drive through. There were lots of cars parked on the road. The drivers were all honking their horns. The cars were trying to get through.

Help paying. The mailman dropped off the package. Afterwards, he put a note on the package. He said the package had a lot of money. The boy called the number on the package. He received the money that he paid for the package.

Charles and the Rose. Charles loves roses. One day he walked to a garden store and bought some. At home he got a rose stuck in his teeth. He bought a brand new set of scissors to cut it out. Now Charles has two new roses!
Broken ipod. Kim got a new ipod. She had a great time. Yet it started to skip. Kim was confused. Finally she realized it was a broken connector.

Gas Money. Tom was at a gas station. He needed money to pay for his car. He went to a convenience store to fill up. He asked for some money to pay for gas. The clerk was able to fill up for him at cheap prices.
Shot Put. Tom was playing on the basketball court. The ball landed in the air. It was time to shoot. Tom took his shot. He hit the rim and won the game.

Ice cream. Anna was hungry and decided to make herself some ice cream. She went to the store to buy everything needed. Then, she took it home and set it up on the counter. She waited an hour for her ice cream to cool off. Afterwards, she sat down and enjoyed a nice bowl of ice cream!
Stuck Kite. The kite flew high into the sky. The wind took it down into the sea. It was too windy to continue. It got stuck in a tree. The kite died.
Rosie. I saw her today. She looked happy. She asked me to write her a song. I wrote her a song. I showed her the new song.

Miranda fights a cold. Miranda was feeling a cold coming on. She was sick of being sick. She took some medicine and went to bed. She woke up a little later feeling a little better. She decided to make some coffee to feel better.
The Movie. The couple was watching a movie. The movie featured violent scenes. The couple left the theater. They drove home. The couple felt better after their movie.

Snowdrifts. Jack woke up in the middle of the night. He wanted to go outside and play. Unfortunately it snowed that night. Jack realized he needed to go back inside. He got into his car and went inside.

Rain. One afternoon the clouds started to look blue. We decided to go to the park in the rain. We played catch in the park. We went to the park and played again in the rain. It was fun to play in the rain.

Jack. Jack was a homeless dog. One day a family moved in next door to him. He ran all the way down the block trying to get food. Then he got so hungry he stopped and got a burger. Jack was happy to have food in his belly.

Mugry. There was a dog named Mugry. Mugry ran away from home at six years old. Her owners tried their hardest to find her but she was gone for five months. Her owners were worried and asked the people in the neighborhood. They all found her hiding place and brought her home to be safe.

Bad Hike. Tom wanted to go on a hike. He took a friend with him. Tom and his friend hiked far out into the woods. They wandered off of the trail and into a ravine. Tom's friend had to carry him out of the woods safely.
Rapper. Tim loved to rap. He decided to go to a music competition. Unfortunately he was not a good rapper. Tim did very poorly in the competition. He decided he would practice more.

Getting a Haircut. Fred's barber had been working on Fred for over an hour. He was running late, so he rushed out. Fred's barber saw his new hair and said his hair was good. When Fred arrived at his appointment, he was disappointed. Fred's hair was a very bright red, not brown.

Favorite Game. Tommy always loved playing outside. He loved playing football, hockey, and basketball. Tommy's father and brother loved to play catch. They would go out and throw the ball and catch it. They would go out and get ice cream after every game.

The free brownies. Kelly and her family went to the mall. They were excited to get something to eat. Unfortunately they could not decide what to get. They asked the cashier and she gave them free brownies. They ate them and then they decided on something else.

War Times. Sally was having trouble with her husband. He had been fighting a lot lately. She decided to have a talk. Her husband admitted that he was being too tough. He changed his ways and she was happy.
Orange Zest Water. My stomach is really upset. I decided to drink some orange zest water. I drank the whole gallon. Afterwards, my stomach felt better. I went back to my car and drank more.

Lightbulb. I was looking for a new light bulb. I went to the store to see a choice. I saw some that looked so good I picked them up. I paid the cashier and went home with the bulb. I was amazed at how good they looked.

The Decorations. Sally had her family decorate the Christmas tree. She decided to put the most beautiful decorations on the tree. She spent hours decorating the tree in the living room. She even added some Christmas ornaments. All her family looked forward to seeing her house decorated.
Socks. Jane bought a new pair of socks. Her feet were cold. She tried wearing them. She slipped and fell. Jane had to buy a new pair.
Sneak Attack. Tom was playing tennis with friends. He wanted to show off. He threw a ball too far to hit. He hit someone in the face. Everyone started laughing and tom was embarrassed.

Filling the Post. A politician was running for office. He had promised to cut wasteful government spending. His campaign was going well. The day of the election came. The politician lost by a landslide.

The Snowball Fight. Joe's family had gotten together after a big snowstorm. They were throwing snowballs at each other. One kid accidentally hit his sister in the face with one. She was okay but had a black eye and a broken nose. They spent that night getting ice cream and talking.

Clyde gets into a fight. Clyde is working in a diner. Clyde is eating some eggs. Clyde is asked to stop eating the eggs. Clyde refuses and gets into a fight. Clyde gets fired and kicked out of the diner.

The Vaccine. Ike found a vaccine at the store. He took it home to make sure it was safe. At home, he read all the information on the package. He found out that it was a diphtheria shot! Ike regretted ever purchasing the vaccine.
The Rap. Lacy and her friends were in a room. They were bored and needed something to do. They started rapping and singing. They had so much fun! They decided to do it again the next week.
Lights. The lights stayed on. We looked up at them. They were out of power. We turned off the light. We couldn't get the power on.
Boat Trip. Tom and Jane wanted to go on a boat trip. They had never been boating before. Tom and Jane got their boats ready. They decided to go out on the water. Tom and Jane had a great time.

Dan goes to jail. Dan had been caught sneaking out of the house. He was arrested and taken to jail. The warden commuted Dan's sentence to time in county lock up. Dan found it very difficult to work at the county lock up. After working at the lock up for 2 weeks Dan left the county.

Football. I am really into football. My wife loves the game, but I am terrible at it. She told me to practice hard. I tried really hard and now I am a really good player. I have a high football IQ and I think I have the potential to be great.

Sprained Ankle. Dan was walking around his neighborhood. He noticed a large tree with branches touching the sidewalk. Dan stepped off of the tree and twisted his ankle. Dan's mom took him to the doctor to get it checked out. Dan was given a tetanus shot to keep himself safe.

The USS Hornet. The Hornet was commissioned in July of 1941. It was the first ship to serve in the Navy. The ship was delivered to the Navy in June of 1943. After World War II, the ship was put on loan to the US Navy. The Hornet stayed in service until it was mothballed in 1963.

Vision Changes. Kate and her friends were having a field trip. They were going to a local farm. They saw a lot of animals. The most surprising was a barn. It was a big barn, full of beautiful animals.

Confession. Jim wanted to impress his new girlfriend. He thought of what he could do. So, he went to confession. He took out a confession and began to read it. He felt a little nervous but read it anyways.
Lice. She had lice. So she decided to not have any more. Her mom gave her some medicine. She took the medicine three times a day. But eventually her lice returned.

concert. The girls decided to attend a concert. They paid a fortune for the tickets. They were so excited to go to the concert. When they got there it started to rain. The girls missed the concert and decided to drive home.

Career Opportunities. Kate is an employee at a law firm. She was excited when she received a call about a new job. The new job is in a different state and is much closer to home. She decided that she would apply. After going to the interview, she got the new job.
Gross teeth. Sammy was eating a candy bar. She took a bite and was amazed at her teeth. They were very gross. She had to clean them. Luckily it was just her teeth.

steak throw. I went to the beach with my family. We decided to throw some steaks on the beach. My brother tried to throw the steak with his bare hands. It landed on the other side of the beach. We took it to the shop and were given a large refund.
No Fish. Joe has never caught a fish before. His friend told him about a local fish fry. Joe went to the fish fry. He ordered a fish sandwich. Joe caught his first fish that day.
Greens. The man made greens. He put them in his food. It was raw. The next day the food was delicious. He gave the greens away.

dress. Beth wanted to look her very best at prom. So she went shopping with her mom and bought the best dress. She tried it on and loved how it looked on her. But when she arrived, the zipper broke right on the dress. Beth was so embarrassed and vowed to be more careful in the future.

Marriages. Sara lived a very boring life. She went on many dates but nothing worked out. Her parents took her to the courthouse to look for a spouse. A man with grey hair and glasses stood out to Sara. He asked her out on a date and they hit it off perfectly!
Racoons for Dinner. Brett took his kids to the local raccoon farm. The kids had a blast. Brett got a raccoon to pet. The kids petted the raccoon. The raccoon let them go with him on the farm.

Rattle and shake. Aya was cleaning her house one afternoon. She heard a strange noise coming from a box near the couch. A few seconds later, the box collapsed and dropped everything. Aya picked up the pieces, and began to put them back together. To her surprise, though, her husband was a little understanding.

A Dog's Life. Joe had a dog named Bubbles. Bubbles had been with him since he was a young puppy. A few weeks after coming home from college, Bubbles had to be put down. Joe was heartbroken over the loss of his dog. After the funeral, Joe decided he was going to train him.

Octopi. Aunt May was driving to the store when she saw something out of the corner of her eye. She pulled over and looked, seeing a strange shape with eyes. Her car swerved to miss it and went right into the ditch. It wasn't until she pulled the car out of the ditch that she saw it. Her cat, Octopi, was nowhere to be found, but luckily she was ok.

The Car Mechanic. John's car wouldn't start one morning. He called a mechanic and waited for the mechanic to arrive. When the mechanic arrived, John was happy to see his car. However, John found out that the mechanic had overcharged. John was upset, but happy that his car worked.

Jake's Dog Chases A Squirrel. Jake was walking through the park when he saw a small animal run past him. Jake went after the animal to get a better look at it. Jake noticed a squirrel hopping across the park. He started chasing after the squirrel. Jake got his dog to chase after the squirrel.

The Hatching. A young couple decided to get their first baby. They hired a woman to help them hatch eggs. The woman had a lot of fun with the babies. Soon, they had two babies. The couple decided to have a second baby.
Computer Day. Bob was working on his computer. He noticed the power went out. Bob called his company. They sent someone to fix it. Bob's power came back on the next day.

Example Essay. I needed an essay topic for my English class. I couldn't choose between two or three. I thought about it for a while and then decided to write one. My teacher was impressed with my flexibility. Now, I have an example essay for my class to reference.

Balding. My friends and I are getting Bald. We didn't realize how long it would take. We had to go to a Doctor. He said we would be in pain for a week. We realized our bodies are changing and don't like being bald.
Weight Troubles. Tom had a big test coming up. He had been dieting lately. The day before he had a heart attack. He had to miss a test. He ended up failing.

Birds. Mary and Ron were fishing in the woods. Suddenly, they both felt something poking them. It was a very large black and white bird! Ron immediately pulled his pole out of the water. The bird flew away and they continued fishing.

Lunch time. I just finished my lunch and I need to eat more. I went to the kitchen to get a sandwich. I grabbed a chicken sandwich, onion, and cheese. I put the sandwich in my lunch and sat down. I felt full and happy after eating the lunch.

Moon Shine. A boy found a tiny, red, starry moon. He stood on a chair to examine it. The moon sparkled and looked like a big planet. He put his foot down and it rose to the moon. He jumped from the chair, the moon falling to the ground.

Silent Movie. Lana was watching a movie. Suddenly, she noticed her popcorn had spilled. She panicked and ran to the kitchen. She poured her popcorn into a bowl. Afterwards, she poured more into her mouth.

Designing Women. The women met at the sewing shop to discuss their business plans. A sewing machine salesman tried to talk them into doing something. The women disagreed and left. The salesman tried to get them back but they left. A woman came by and offered to do their business for them.
Neti Pot. The man braided his hair. It looked great. His friend asked if he could borrow one. The man's mom didn't want to spend money. She let him borrow the neti pot.

The Courthouse. Annie was sentenced to prison for participating in a robbery. The day of her sentence she attended a courthouse meeting. The judge was very harsh. Annie cried the entire time the court proceedings. The judge sentenced her to a year of hard labor.

Don't Pull Me. Bob didn't like to work. He never did any chores. One day a friend convinced him to go to the bank. He was asked if he'd like to do some money work. Bob said sure and spent all night doing that.
Mean girl. Julia was in school. She wasn't the prettiest girl. She made fun of other girls. She got picked on in class. Julia started to like the teacher and didn't make fun of her anymore.

Shopping Dilemma. Tina has to go grocery shopping. She goes to the store in the morning and comes home at night. Tina does not like having to leave the house to get to the grocery store. Tina's friend Mary is going to the grocery store with her. Tina tells Mary it is too bad that she has to go grocery shopping alone.

Healthy Sleep. Bob was very tired when he awoke this morning. So he took a hot bath and did some reading. Afterwards, he took a shower and started to relax. The hot water helped him fall asleep fast. Bob was glad he took the bath and read.
New Car. Tom bought a used car. It needed a lot of work. He got it repainted bright red. He was so excited about the color! Tom drove away with a new car.

Runaway dumpster. I used to throw things out at my apartment building. It was a dumpster with a lid on top. Sometimes I would take things out without telling anybody. The neighbors didn't seem to care. The dumpster finally fell into a deep hole in the ground.

Francisco's Feeling Sick. Francisco is feeling a little bit sick. He decides to take some medicine. After taking it, Francisco feels much better. Now he is able to go to the park. Francisco is glad he didn't take any medicine that day.

Too Long, Didn't Read. Molly went to the library to get a book. The librarian recommended an interesting book to her. Molly read the book and loved it. She borrowed it from her friend. The librarian gave her another book to read next time.

Baby Changes. I had a little girl when I was pregnant. When I told her she had a different name than me, she didn't know. She asked me what her real name was. When I told her it was Jane, she said she didn't like that name. I was disappointed with her.

Truck. We got a new truck to work with our new kids. We got it out of the garage and headed out. The truck was a little hard to drive around town. I was scared of how bad it would be to drive that hard. After a few weeks we were used to it and it drove great.

Foot the Bill. Gina wanted to walk home to her grandma's house. Her sister was waiting for her but she was too upset to talk. So she sat on the porch, watching the street below. She hoped her mom wouldn't see her sitting there. Gina wasn't able to reach her grandma's house without breaking her ankle.
basement. Samantha was bored one night. She decided to go down to the basement. She dug a hole in the ground. She put in all her books and her toys. After awhile she went back upstairs.

Couch and Chair. Jenny always brought her baby sister's soft couch into the room. The baby had a soft spot for her couch, which she would rub when she slept. One night, she decided to rub the baby's couch hard one night. She woke her baby and she screamed in pain. The baby cried and Jenny went to the store to buy a soft couch.

The Loft. I went to see a movie with my girlfriend. We were watching a new horror film. Suddenly, I saw a shadow behind my girlfriend. I started to scream and her back got hit by the broom. My girlfriend laughed so hard that she yelled at me to stop being so dramatic.
Electric Shock. Jim was sitting at home. All of a sudden his whole body was shaking. Jim screamed and jumped up. He was taken to the hospital. The doctor said he suffered from an electrical shock.

Lost Hat. Jack was at the park one day. He was wearing a hat that was too big for him. Jack didn't realize the hat was gone when he wore it. He searched all over the park looking for it. Eventually he found it and he was very happy about that.
Drunk Driver. Jim was driving home from work. A drunk driver hit him from behind. Jim got out to confront him. He had to call the cops. The drunk driver was arrested and ejected.

It Leaked!. One day, the school's water meter broke. Since the water meter was in the basement, there wasn't much of a leak. The district office told us that it would be okay. One day, there was a burst pipe. Fortunately, the district said it was just a minor inconvenience.

nurse. Lilly was going to her first doctor's appointment. She was afraid of needles. But her doctor showed her how to do them safely. The next day, Lilly got the flu shot. But she felt much better after.

Johnny Goes Swimming. Johnny had always wanted to go swimming. He wanted to be a good swimmer as well. His friends told him to practice with them. Finally Johnny went out and had a good time. He is happy that he was able to enjoy a fun day swimming.

The Nightmare. One night as I was working hard I had a nightmare. It was about a guy with a big penis. He told me it wasn't real. The next day he confessed and it was real. Now I go to bed with the fear of a big penis in my bed.

Sweet and Spicy. Lucy's grandma told her she could only have one hot dog. Lucy didn't care for spicy food and had to spit it out. Her grandma took it away and left the house. The smell filled the house and made Lucy jump. She didn't go back to grandma's house again.

New Phone. Tom was looking forward to getting a new iPhone. It was going to be his first one. He wanted to wait all day so he could get his hands on one. Unfortunately they were sold out before Tom got the one. Tom was upset that he didn't get the one he wanted.
Henry's Shower. Henry had a hard day at work. Henry was very thirsty. Henry made an elaborate hot water. He sat down to take a shower. Henry was glad that he did not have to drink a lot of water.
Last Minute. Kim went out to the supermarket. She needed some food. She only had a dollar to spend. She left the store and decided to buy a pound of bread. She ate the whole thing in one sitting.

Mike Olsen. Mike Olsen is a great baseball player. Mike is trying out for the team. He is nervous he will not make the team. On the day of tryouts, Mike lifts a weights over his head. He lifts them too hard he knocks his head through the weights and is happy.

Ice Skating Gone Wrong. Kyle loved going ice skating. He skated on the ice and felt himself getting cold. He fell to the ground and felt his body shaking. The ice cream cone was thrown at his head. Kyle never went ice skating again.

Familiar Face. Amy and Beth were in Beth's class at school. The girls were playing on the field near the bell tower. Beth threw the ball and hit the side of Amy's head. Amy began crying loudly to no avail. She had a headache the rest of the day.
A Mess in the Kitchen. Tom's family decided to cook dinner. He wasn't paying enough attention to the food. He didn't cook the noodles enough. The soup was burning. Tom had to take out the stove.
The dog parade. Jenny's class was having a parade. The class was playing a game. Jenny thought it was too boring. She was upset the kids wouldn't play for real. She refused to go to the parade.

Bat Mitzvah. Sharon was excited about Bat Mitzvah. She bought a bunch of gifts for the boy in her life. She also ordered some new clothing for him. On the day of the party Sharon dressed up in a suit and tie. She had a great time with the boy at the party.

Tea tasting. It was Valentine's Day. I went to the grocery store to buy some tea. I didn't have any specific tea to buy. After looking at everything I ended up just buying black tea. It was the most pleasant tea I ever had.

Baby Boom. Today, a new woman was born. She weighed 8 pounds and had a full set of siblings. There were 10 children. The new mother was only 3 months old. She and her siblings slept in a bedroom together.

A Little Elbow Grease. Sam bought some elbow grease. He was mixing it with his flour. He was stirring it into the batter. He didn't pay attention and spilled it all over the floor. He cleaned it up and made it up.

Eclipse. Lance wanted to see the eclipse that night. He got the telescope he always wanted. He watched as the moon started to get dark. When the moon reached its peak he stood back and looked at it. Lance finally saw the entire eclipse!

Birthday Pie. Joe wanted to surprise his friend on his birthday. He went to the grocery store and bought a dozen pie crusts. Joe and his friend ate the pie for dessert. Joe's friend was very surprised by the delicious pie. He even thanked Joe on his birthday.
Cat and Mouse. A mouse ran across the room. It stayed put and tried to catch a ball. It was trapped in the corner. The cat got out of the corner. She grabbed the mouse by its neck and released it.

Winter Vacation. I used to work in the winter months. It was so cold that you felt like a turtle. One day, it started snowing and we had to leave. The snow turned to ice so quickly and I lost my jacket. Now, I don't wear my jacket on the winter months.

Problems. My cat was acting strangely. It would claw at my face and try to bite me. My cat kept pawing at the door trying to get out. I finally left my cat in his yard so he could go to his next room. My cat still kept clawing at his mouth even after I left.
Bobert. Bobert was a lonely man. He decided to get a girlfriend. He met a woman and they fell in love. They lived together for two years. Bobert died because he was unable to love.
Spanish test. Miranda had a Spanish test tomorrow. She was worried about failing. She studied every single day. When she got to class, she sat down and studied. Miranda took the test and passed.

Scaffolding. Our building had a new staircase installed. It was supposed to give access to the service level. No one was supposed to use the stairs, however. One day my friend was trying to climb down. Unfortunately she lost her balance and broke her hip.
The older man. Troy was out running one night. He saw a man he recognized. Troy approached the man. The old man began to talk. The two became friends.
Bad dream. Allie went to bed. When she awoke her stomach was hurting. She went to the bathroom to clean herself up. When she got out she realized that her dream was real. She freaked out.

Prisons not all bad. Ida was visiting a small prison. She saw many young women there. Ida wanted to think of something good for them. She decided to sing to them and cheer them up. The women were grateful for the singing and the kind words.
knock. There was a knock on the door. My brother grabbed a baseball bat. He swung it hard. I heard a crunching noise. The door was open!

Christmas Vacation. In August we took our kids to Disney World for Christmas vacation. We booked a four-week trip for our kids to Disney. When we got to Disney, the kids wanted to see the Eiffel Tower. They visited for three days. The kids were so excited to go back to Disney for the fourth week!
Sandwiches. There was a new hot dog stand in town. People walked up and down the aisles. I loved the variety of hot dogs. I found a sandwich special, which looked delicious. I bought that sandwich.
Meat. The man bought some meat. He cut into it with a knife. The meat looked good. He cut some more. He ate it.

The Soda Can. Derek loved to drink soda pop. His parents tried to stop him from doing so. They bought him an actual can of soda pop. One day, Derek knocked over the can. He broke it into several pieces.
Water. Beth hated to drink water. It was too cold to drink. Her dad told her she had to drink more water. Beth drank so much water she forgot to drink the ice. Now she was dehydrated.

Night Ruined. Jake was having his first date at a new bar. He went out to meet her. Jake kept talking to her despite being drunk. Afterwards, she got up and walked away. Jake became upset since she was nowhere to be seen.

Painful Frisbee. I had a friend play baseball with me today. I tried to hit the ball into the water, but I missed. He threw the frisbee back to me. I threw it as hard as I could and it landed in the water. I was able to catch it.
Seller. The man sold something. He was dissatisfied with the price. He complained to the company. The company looked into the complaint. They resolved the problem.
Coffee Place. The man got out of his car. He went to the coffee place. The coffee place was empty. He went to another coffee place. He ordered a cappuccino.
Blues. I am an enthusiast of blues music. I listened to it as a child growing up. My favorite Blues singer is Bessie Williams. Her most famous song is "Hound Dog Blues". I still have her music on CD.

Hypocrite?. Jenna didn't like her coworkers. She got into a fight with one of them today. She went up and asked her boss for a raise. Her boss said she couldn't get a raise since she had been working hard. Jenna was embarrassed to ask for a raise, but she knew she'd get one.
Date Ditch. Tim liked Amy's girlfriend. Tim's girlfriend had a new boyfriend. Tim went out with the boyfriend. Tim's girlfriend saw Tim. Tim dumped his girlfriend's boyfriend.

Soldier. My sister in law has a 99 year old man. He was an officer in WW2. He took a tour of WW2 Germany. My sister in law's brother is going to visit him today. I think he will be visiting his grave.
Applying for a Job. Lisa really wanted a new job. She began applying to jobs everywhere. Her local newspaper wrote a story about her. She learned that she had been interviewed. She got the job.
The New Fish. Ned's family had a pond in their backyard. One day a new fish was discovered. It had three eyes and a beak. The fish was named Spot. Ned decided he would name Spot after the pond.

Service Dog. Sara had a pitbull who loved to run around. One day, Sara decided to take her dog to the pound to have him fixed. After a few hours, a man came to the pound with a small dog. The man showed Sara her dog and explained that the dog needed an owner. After a few weeks, Sara decided to adopt the dog at the pound.
Pie. Sara loved to bake pies. She decided to make a blueberry pie. She put all the ingredients in a pie shell. Then she put the pie in the oven. The pie was done when it was ready!

Bow and Arrow. Eddie went hunting one morning. He was hunting in the woods. Suddenly, he heard a rustling sound. He looked over his shoulder to see a big moose approaching. Eddie shot the moose and ran, escaping the hunter.
Delicious ice cream. Kelly got a cone of ice cream. It was the best flavor she ever had. She couldn't believe it. Kelly couldn't stop eating. It was the best ice cream ever.
Noise. Tom's neighbors were fighting. Tom wanted to help. He went over to the fight. Tom was the only one to stop it. He was praised by the neighbors.

Worthless. Anna was studying in math class. She had to solve an argument on her paper. But when she finished, she thought it was very easy! It turned out that she had misunderstood the question! Anna was really embarrassed about her lack of skills.

The melted balloon. Sean was walking through the neighborhood. He found a balloon on the ground. It looked perfect. Then he realized that it was actually too hot. He quickly picked it up and ran home.
The Renovation. Jim's house needed an upgrade. He was offered a free remodel. Jim decided to do it. It was a lot of work. But Jim decided to do it regardless.

Special Assessment. My parents told me to pay attention in class. Since I was always fidgeting and jumping around, I was told to go outside. As soon as I walked outside, I saw an old man sitting on the ground. He was crying since he found a wallet and money in the sand. We took the wallet and money and asked the police.

Matt's Keys. Matt needed to open a door. He didn't have his car keys, so he asked his neighbor for them. Matt's neighbor had some spare keys. Matt used the spare keys to open the door. Matt was very happy that he could now open his door.
Cell Phones. I have a cell phone. I used to drop it every day. Now the screen is broken. I could not find a work phone that had a screen like mine. I bought a new phone from the store.

ET. One day Anna's class was reading about aliens. Anna's teacher was very excited to read the book. She wrote Anna's name and told her about aliens. Anna was very confused and thought she had heard the wrong book. Finally she read the book and realized she had!

Bullies get served. Raul hated being bullied at school. He decided to stand up to his bully. He decided to stand up to his bully. Raul's bully saw how tough Raul was. The bully pulled a knife on Raul and he was knocked unconscious.

Grandmother's Cookies. My grandmother's cookies were the best. I bought three box and froze them. I went to the store and bought chocolate chip and sugar. I baked the cookies and froze them. They were now the best cookies ever.

Regret. Amy and Beth were at a party in Vegas. The girls wanted to meet the boys who were going to the casino. Amy wanted to talk to a boy she liked and was not sure how to do it. She tried to find the courage to ask him for his number. She failed and Beth didn't go to the party with her after all.

One dollar. I was walking in the supermarket. Suddenly, I noticed a one dollar bill. I ran up to grab it and realized that it was fake. I was horrified. I decided to leave and never shop at this store again.
Tim's Band. Tim's band had an important gig coming up. He had never played guitar before. Tim practiced everyday. The day of the gig he took the stage. Tim's band was a hit and the crowd cheered.

New Minivan. Janet decided she was going to buy a new minivan. She decided to take her old car and put it into the new one. Janet drove out and began to drive on the highway. The tires screeched to a halt and she lost control. The truck slid off the road and hit another car.

Shark. We went to the ocean one day. My husband brought a cooler of water and a fishing pole. I put the cooler down to see what would happen. As I watched the waves, I felt something grab my leg. When I looked down, I saw a shark bite me on my leg!
Germany. I loved the look of Germany. I decided to visit the country. It was so foreign! But when I arrived, I loved it! My trip to Germany was fantastic!

Armando burns the tacos. Armando is cooking tacos for his family. They want some salsa so he puts it on. Armando takes the salsa off of the stove. He puts the tacos on a plate. They take some off and eat.

The Bank Teller. A bank teller worked hard for her whole life. When she retired she didn't have anything left to sell. She worked at a hotel and opened her own bank. She was so successful that she became a very successful woman. She didn't like money and ran away when she had nothing left.
Scary Customer. Randy was working at a fast food place. A customer came into the store and screamed loudly. He yelled for a manager. The manager told the man to calm down. The man was escorted out.

The Termination. Tanya worked hard at her job for years. She loved her job and all the people in it. One day she received a message saying her job was ending. Tanya was very sad but she also excited. She got to keep her job!

sweet tooth. Kathy had always been addicted to sweets. She got some gum from the dentist, but it was bad for her. She kept chewing gum, but nothing worked. Finally, she had given up and bought some sugar free gum. Soon, she was able to stop getting candy.

Short Cut to BC. I was walking through the parking lot. I saw a student from the local high school. She was holding a briefcase. She was waving at someone across the parking lot. I waved back, and she waved back.
Window Seat. Tim wanted to take a break. He looked around the living room. He realized he didn't have a window seat. He pulled his brother from the room. Tim and his brother sat on the couch instead.

Bunny's Toes. Cindy's kids were playing in the living room. Suddenly, Cindy felt something sharp. She saw that her toddler's little toe had been cut. She took the baby to the doctor for an examination. The doctor said that the toe was broken and had to be amputated.

Showing Online. Tom wanted to look good for the school photo. He decided to upload a photo of himself and his friends. The next morning the school photo was released. Tom was embarrassed to see the picture on his school email. The following day, Tom learned it was an accident.

Hurricane. There was a hurricane warning in town. Everyone headed to the local shelter. People stayed in their homes for a couple of days. Finally, the hurricane passed. Hurricane warnings in town were a joke.

Driving. Sally loved to drive. One day she tried to drive home from the store. Sally did not know the signs and hit a pole. She was so nervous and the pole was broken. She was nervous again the next time she tried to drive home.

Way too hot. When I went to a summer camp I did not know if I would like it. I was not sure if I would like the hot weather and camp. Once there I realized that the heat was perfect. The camp was very fun and I didn't mind it. I came home to tell everyone about the great camp I went to.

Switch Plates. I was watching television. I saw a commercial for a switch plate that I wanted to try out. The plate was in black and white and had silver accents. I purchased the plate from the store. I put the plate on my kitchen table and flipped it over.

Paint Bar. We went to the paint bar on Sunday. My wife took a bucket of paint to the curb. The man at the paint bar came to help us. We bought the paint from him and went home. We painted the inside of our home.

Big Waves. I went kayaking with my family this afternoon. We went on the coast of Maui and had a great time. I spotted a giant wave. It was the most powerful one I had ever seen. I was so glad we went kayaking because of how strong the wave was.

Baseball cards. Sam always brought baseball cards with him when he played baseball. When it was time for recess he took them to his locker. He put all his cards on the floor of the locker. When he went outside his teacher told him to put them back. Sam knew that he didn't have a ball to play with.

Cat Rescue. Kate and her family had to go cat-sitting for a day. The kitties were very stressed and wanted to play. But their owner's were so tired they could barely keep them awake. Luckily her parents made them some tuna for a good nap. And the cats stayed calm the rest of the day.

Cleaner. Nellie had an apartment that was very messy. She hired a cleaning service. The cleaning service worked very quickly. When Nellie paid the cleaning service she got a lot of compliments. She was glad that she hired the cleaning service.

abusive. Joe was on the phone with his ex-girlfriend at the restaurant. They were discussing their finances and business decisions. Afterwards, Joe's ex-girlfriend left the restaurant. Since the restaurant was a few blocks away, Joe called his friend. His friend gave him advice on staying positive and not making enemies.

Cooking. Today I decided to cook dinner. The problem I had was I didn't have any food in the house. I looked up a recipe for some lasagna. I found a recipe and followed it. I made the lasagna and everyone loved it.
Roger the Dog. Roger the dog wanted to get some exercise. He decided to climb into the couch. He climbed in but couldn't get on the couch. He tried to jump on the couch. Roger got stuck and died.

Sally Likes Pie. Sally wanted to learn how to bake a pie. She bought all the ingredients to bake a chocolate pie. She followed the recipe exactly. Sally put the pie into the oven to bake. Sally baked a beautiful chocolate pie.

Second Date. Jake and Sara were going on a second date. Jake wanted to show Sara a cool party trick. He hid some food in his pocket so she wouldn't notice. He showed her a video that showed how to put a potato in her shoe. Sara said she would love to see Jake's secret trick.

umbrella. One day a boy was playing in the rain. He was playing with his basketball. He went to play in the rain without an umbrella. The boy got really wet. He then decided to play without an umbrella.
Accident. Jim was in his car with a friend. They had a fight. Jim didn't want to deal with the fight. His friend tried to apologize. Jim just laughed it off and kept driving.

Track. Anna had been a cheerleader since she was four Year's old. The track team was very important to Anna. She tried out for the team in fifth grade. She was so excited to try out for the team. She made the team the following year.

garden. I decided to grow vegetables in my garden. I got all of the necessary tools and supplies. I spent an hour working in my garden. Once it was done, I harvested all of the vegetables. I enjoyed my food and the garden.

Weekends. Gina and her friends were on their first weekend together. They were all in a hotel room. They had been invited to the bar. Gina wanted to go to the bar with her friends. She was afraid they wouldn't make any friends that night.

The forgotten cereal. Timmy was hungry but he'd forgotten his cereal. He was worried that his mother would blame him if she didn't eat it. The thought of that made him feel very guilty. He decided to just get a bowl and eat it. He was relieved when he got his bowl and his mom ate it.
The Bar. Riley loved to go to bars. She would always drink her friends drink. One day at the bar she met a new friend. They had a lot in common. They became great friends.

Triumphant Return. In July, I saw the mayor of Chicago in person for the first time. I walked into the convention center and sat down. He had a tall, handsome, white mane on his face and greeted me warmly. I told him how much I loved his city, and how much I wanted to see him. He told me that the Chicago Cubs were his favorite team, as was me.

Delivery. Dan was working in his building's bakery. He would be delivering the goods to the neighbors. Dan was nervous about it. When he got to the house the door was locked. Dan was relieved and asked for help.

Repaired Laptop. Sally dropped her laptop on the ground. Her computer was badly smashed. She couldn't fix it with the available parts. Instead she ordered a laptop online from Amazon. The parts arrived in two days, and Sally installed it happily.

Flat Tires. Sam bought a new truck. He was able to drive it very well. He tried to drive his truck to work but it felt too heavy. Sam realized his tires were old and needed replaced. He got a new set and felt much better.

Free Pizza. Bobby asked his parents for money to get pizza. His parents laughed at him and said he would have to earn it. Bobby had a lot of chores to do so his parents didn't want him to work. He decided to do his chores. He made enough money to get pizza and his parents were happy.

Easter Bunny. The Smiths went to the Easter parade. The parade had a very long line. When they finally arrived they were so excited. There was a large basket of candy for the kids. They went home that night stuffed.

Henry. Henry didn't do well in school. His parents sent him to an after-school special class. He was very embarrassed when they all made fun of his name. Henry decided to just tell himself he wasn't going to school. Henry didn't go to school in the first grade.

Going to the Mall. We went to the mall to see our favorite bands. We chose several to see one at a time. After two hours, we finally got inside and bought some clothes. We went outside and waited in line for about an hour. After that, we went home.
Roll Over. The boy rolled over on the floor. He heard a thud. The boy hit the ground. His head was scraped up. The boy's mother cleaned up the boy's head.

Ben's First Time at the Beach. Ben was excited for his first time at the beach. Ben drove into the sand with a friend. His friend splashed him in the water. Ben splashed back. Ben had a great day at the beach.
Cane Tips. I found the cane tips at the craft store. I bought ten of them. I put them in my bag and took them home. Then I went to work on a canoe. It was so fun to use my new cane tips.
