Hot Air Balloon. I took my hot air balloon out to the mountains to fly it. I strapped on the balloon and headed down towards the base. It was a little while before I had enough gas to fly it. I held the balloon and slowly pulled up to the ground. I felt great when the balloon went over the mountain.

The first guitar. John wanted to buy a new guitar. He went to an electronics store. The clerk saw him looking for a certain guitar. The clerk gave him a discount on that particular guitar. John bought the guitar and was very happy.
Bonus Round. Tim was invited to be on the bonus round of a reality tv show. He was nervous but excited. Tim did his best. He received a call soon after that. He was hired.
Dead Battery. Cathy decided to put her phone in her bag. She put her phone on her desk. However, the battery for the phone died. Cathy had to call her service provider. She was charged a small fee.

Goofing around. I saw a little girl crying in the park yesterday. I decided to go over and comfort her. I brought her a blanket, milk, and cookies. I talked to her for an hour and she felt better. Now I go over to comfort her everyday!

Jarvis Takes a Nap. Jarvis has been feeling really tired all day. He has wanted to take a short break but is afraid to. Finally he sits down and takes a hot shower. After the shower, he feels much better. Jarvis is happy that he took a short break today.

Playing in the Bathroom. Barry always hated the bathroom. He would always run around to the bathroom at the end of his house. One day his friends decided they were going to prank him. He decided to go in the bathroom to see what would happen. The bathroom is now his favorite part of the house.

Harassment. Jim went to a bar. Someone pushed Jim and another man in the back. The other man punched Jim in the face. The man got out of his car and began following Jim. Jim ran away after the man got away.
In the store. I was looking for my favorite pair of jeans. I couldn't find them anywhere. I decided to get some help. I finally found them in the backroom of the store. They fit like a glove.

Pool Party. We went to a pool party last weekend. The kids were playing and having a good time. Unfortunately they went in the water too long. It ruined their day and they had to be towed. We hope the parents do not get in trouble.

Birthday Girl. My wife is celebrating her 70th birthday. She is having a birthday party at a restaurant. She wants guests to wear her favorite birthday outfit. Some people came in wearing T-shirts to look like she had a baby. They were a few too many and she fired them.

Old Pipes. Tom was sick of hearing a lot of noise around him. His neighbors were complaining about loud pipes. They wouldn't move them until Tom complained. Tom finally moved them. He was glad when his new neighbors weren't as bothered by pipes.

Sound off. Nate was having a bad day. He was playing videogames with his friends online. He was talking with his girlfriend online. She kept talking over the game and he got annoyed. He got off the computer and stormed off to his room.

Steve's Tattoo. Steve always wanted to get a tattoo. He wanted to get one that was really unique and made him proud. He decided to get his favorite cartoon character as his. He drove to the tattoo parlor to get it done. Steve's cartoon character tattooed really well.

Ant Bites. I was at my friends house playing on their deck. Suddenly I heard some rustling. The deck began to shake and I went out to see what it was. I saw a swarm of ants all over the deck. It was disgusting and I never went back.

Blank mind. My friends and I were sitting around a campfire. We were sharing a blanket we found. As we were sleeping, a huge thunderstorm woke us. We were scared for our lives. That night we all slept on the floor.

Make Up. Ginny decided she wanted a new look. She went to a hair salon and asked for help. The stylist showed her many options. Ginny picked one and got ready to go home. She decided to apply that new look daily.

Bubbles. Anna wanted to drink a glass of water. But she had no bubble solution to drink from! She went to the corner store to get a glass. She poured a few drops of the clear glass into the water. Then she popped the cap and drank happily!

New Doll. Linda was playing with her doll. She accidentally dropped it and it broke. Her doll had to be repaired. After the repairs, Linda couldn't play with it anymore. She was sad, but glad that her mom bought her another doll.

The broken ice machine. Allie was going to be at the ice cream parlor with her friends. She brought her ice cream, but then saw that the machine was broken. She was so disappointed. Then she remembered that she had already paid for it. Finally she decided to buy a new one.

The New Car. I decided to buy a new car. I researched many different cars. I ended up making a list of which car I liked. I went to the dealership and looked around. After picking a car, I left with my new car!
Fire Drill. Sam was watching TV. Suddenly he heard a loud bang. He turned his TV off and called 911. When he came back the tv was still on fire. Luckily nobody was hurt.
Learning to Surf. John wanted to learn to surf. John researched surfing techniques. John saw several videos. John practiced surfing with his dad. John successfully learned to surf.
Museum. Alicia went to the museum. She saw a few exhibits that she was interested in. Then she got to see a dinosaur. She really enjoyed it. It was a fun day for a girl.
Spilled wine on table. Tina sat down to have dinner. She was making dinner for her friends. Her plate started to get messy. Tina spilled her wine on her table. Her friends had to clean it up.

Selena. Selena was a mean girl. She would tease everyone. One day she decided to try and be nice to people again. She went out of her way to be nice to everyone. After a few weeks everyone was happy again.
The Birds. Ruth was walking through the park. She saw a bunch of little birds. They were chirping and chirping. She walked on by and continued her walk. When she got home, she started counting them.
A Broken Mug. Karen went to the grocery store. She was carrying a mug of coffee. Suddenly, she dropped it on the floor. It broke in two pieces. Karen had to buy another one to replace it.

Gym Rats. My son was on the school basketball team. He was the best on the team, and was drafted into the NBA. He played in college and junior college and made the NBA. He eventually played in the pros, and still plays in the gym. His current team has the best record in the NBA, and they don't even need a spot.
Food fight. We live in a city. In one year, a food truck parked in our street. We got a lot of people to feed it. A lot of people were complaining. The owner was angry about it and shut it down.

Flour. It was snowing out and Kelly decided to make flour. She got all of the ingredients together. After a few minutes she began mixing it. When it was done it was delicious. She then had more flour than she could use!

Daddy. Dan was never good with kids and never listened to his parents. Dan's mom always told him to go outside. In the morning when Dan woke up, his dad never let him go out. Now Dan's mom thinks he is irresponsible, and a bad father. Now Dan always goes outside at 6 am to be alone.
Pamper trouble. Suzy needed a new purse. She could not decide on a purse. Finally she decided on one. It fit too perfectly. Suzy loved it.

Cat with no Meow. Ana's cat was not a very good cat. She would only let the cat out to play when it was sunny. At night Ana was upset because the cat never came back. She checked the window one day and it was still dark. She checked the thermostat and the cat was warm.

The New Couch. The new sofa had arrived at Joe's house. He could not wait to be able to sit on it! He unpacked it from the box and got ready to take a nap. When he woke up, he felt the couch under his feet. When he finally sat down it was too big for him!
New Car. Tom really wanted a new car. Unfortunately he had to buy a used car instead. Tom was unsure of himself about it. He decided to take a test drive. To his surprise it was actually pretty easy.

Online Rant. Dan thought he was a very funny person. He would make very silly and ill-advised political rants online. Dan made a great deal of noise on a forum about the Iraq war. Some of his rants were so inappropriate, they were removed from the site. Now Dan spends his nights worrying about what he says online.
Dirty Carpet. Jimmy's apartment was always a mess. One day, Jimmy decided to clean it up. He cleaned all the carpets. He even took the carpet out. After that, his apartment was no longer messy.
Morning Jog. I was out jogging. There was a big storm going on. I was afraid I would catch a cold. However, it didn't stop raining. The rain did make me jog faster.
The Animal Report. Derek was watching the news. He was watching the latest animal report. A lion was shown in the video. Derek was scared. Derek decided to be more prepared next time.

Loose Tooth. Sam noticed that his gums were very loose. He tried to pull them back into place. Sam's dad walked over to help him. He then gave Sam a small tug to pull the loose tooth out. Sam laughed at the experience.

Scholarship. Irene studied hard for her SATs. She worked with many tutors and took advanced SATs. Her SAT scores improved and she was granted a scholarship. Irene attended college to earn her doctorate. Irene received her doctorate and is now a well known professor.

Sofa Cover. Cayla was looking for some storage to put her clothes in. She decided to use a large vanity and found it great. She used it to put all her clothes in. After a month, the cover was torn and full of holes. Cayla didn't know what to do with her clothes other than to get a cover.

No more rules!. Rita was on a very strict diet. The rules were very strict. Her favorite food was fruit. But when she ate it, she started having stomach aches. Rita decided that fruit wasn't very healthy anymore.
Buying a new computer. My computer broke. I didn't know what to do. I went to the electronics store to get a new one. They had some I liked. I decided to buy them.

Balding Head. My son's friend Dave has a girlfriend. Last week she told him her head looked bad. I talked to her for a while and decided to help her. I shaved her head and put on some mascara. She liked the way it looked immediately.

First Job. I took a job at a local convenience store. My first customer was very rude. I apologized and the customer left. Another customer confronted me about my work ethic. I left that job after that.
Flowers. Joe took a walk. It was beautiful outside. He saw some flowers along the way. They were very pretty. Joe decided he wanted some.

Drunk. Drunk!. I got in my car and drove to the bar. The bartender told me I couldn't have any drinks until I payed. I got into the bar and noticed a strange woman standing by me. She had been drinking the day I met her. I apologized to the woman and she gave me a hug.

James needs glasses. James always saw his vision as good as an old man's. James decided to go to the optometrist. He was told he needed glasses to see better. James bought glasses. Now James is able to see great.

Government. Anna was very interested in politics. She signed up to be a volunteer for her state's primary. There, Anna got to meet politicians and hear their messages. She learned a lot of valuable lessons. Afterwards, she went on to work as a politician herself!

Speed dating. We went on a date one night. My friend and I met up at a nice restaurant. We ordered appetizers, entrees, and dessert. My friend and I ordered a bottle of red wine. We had a great time speed dating.

Going Pro. Jules had always wanted to be an Olympic swimmer. She signed up to participate in her first swim meet. She was nervous, but confident. After the first swim, she almost fainted. She won second place overall!

Being Bold. Amy needed to write an essay for school. She wrote a short story, but her teacher thought it was great. She told Amy it was so good she would be given a prize! Amy's teacher said she could choose the essay she wanted. Amy decided she didn't want a prize, but the truth was she was proud of her story.

No More Leaves!. Bert decided to cut down his tree. He had more trees to cut down so he started with a few small trees. He chopped the branches to very small pieces. He stacked the small branches against the large trees. Bert now had very few branches to chop down.

Children's books. Jane liked to read books. One day, she discovered she couldn't read books anymore. She couldn't find any children's books. She went online and found many free books. Jane read the books and enjoyed them.
Lori's Date. Lori decided to go on a blind date. She went on a blind date with a man named Tom. Tom went to pick up Lori. When they arrived at the restaurant Tom's car was gone. Lori was devastated.

Sleeping Over. My wife and I had planned on staying over one weekend. We were hoping to get some work done before bed. After work ended, she turned off the lights and fell asleep. I was up until dawn trying to wake her up. Finally she woke up and she and I went to bed.

Cooked Too Much. Tim wanted to be a cook. His girlfriend would never allow it. He would always make too much. Eventually she got fed up and found another hobby. Tim never cooked enough food for her again.

Shattered Dreams. Mavis was going to get married. But one night, her best friend's brother called her. He had a horrible dream about Mavis and the wedding. He said he wished he could stay in touch with her. Mavis stopped hanging out with him and he stopped calling.

The Glasses. Ava was looking for a new pair of glasses. She browsed every store and couldn't find any she liked. She decided to get a cheap pair of cheap sunglasses. The sunglasses were uncomfortable and Ava threw them out. She bought a pair of high quality glasses instead.

Used Item. Tim was going camping. He brought a cooler and some drinks. His parents had no clue about how to use it. They offered him some beer in exchange for his cooler. Tim took the cooler home without them knowing and kept it for himself.

Quarterback Keeper. A quarterback went into the game. He ran for several yards with the ball. After he ran, he was tackled. His team's quarterback had to step up to the signal. He threw the ball and scored a touchdown.

The Sleepover. Amy was in a sleepover. She didn't think the other girls were as cute as she was. She was too shy to ask anyone out. Luckily, the girls invited her to hang out after school. Amy ended up making lots of new friends.

Plane Tickets. I just bought plane tickets to Hawaii for my cousin. His plane will leave the next day. I will pick him up about 8:30 PM. We may get to go on the plane before he flies out. I plan to be there to see him fly in about 30 minutes.

The Flood. When I was a kid there was a bad flood. The water was coming down so fast. I was terrified because the water was going to make me drown. Luckily it didn't make me drown, but I was terrified. I never went into the water ever since.

Boat day!. Yesterday was a very good day. I decided to go fishing. I picked out a little fishing boat and headed out. I caught a huge fish and felt very proud of myself. My day ended up being one of the best.

New Puppy. Kelley's friend had just got a new puppy. Kelley decided to play with the puppy. The puppy chewed up all of Kelley's clothes. Kelley decided not to play with the puppy anymore. The puppy still chewed up Kelley's clothes.

Wedding. Tom invited a friend to his wedding. His friend wanted to ask another question. His friend was a little bit rude. Tom got very angry. He threw all of his clothes out and told the wedding official.
Avoiding the In Laws. I wanted to avoid the in laws. I went to an Irish bar. I drank too much beer and didn't notice the police cars. The police officers were just driving by. I was not arrested.

The New Kitten. Cody adopted a kitten from the animal shelter. He named the kitten Fluffy. Fluffy would run away at night when the lights weren't on. Cody couldn't sleep because of Fluffy's constant running. Cody put Fluffy down after being unable to sleep.

Saturday Night Live. Seth was watching the news on Saturday night. His favorite part was the monologue with Will. Will had a new segment called Weekend Show. It was about late night comedy specials on Saturday nights. Seth loved this segment and wished they were on the show.
Spoiling niece. Jane's niece always spoils her a lot. This time it was her birthday. Jane was waiting till her niece got home. Jane's niece didn't go inside. Jane's niece had a lot of fun.

Broken Eggs. I found some broken eggs in my refrigerator. I thought I would clean them out. I didn't take them out for a week. When I did they had a smell. They were the moldy eggs that had been in the fridge.

Basketball Practice. Larry wanted to be good at basketball. He practiced very hard in gym after gym. He was always one of the best on his team. Larry was on his high school basketball team. Larry was the best player on his high school basketball team.

Huge Debt. Dennis was in big debt. Dennis decided he would start paying his debt off. He worked hard every day. After 5 years, Dennis' debt was entirely paid off. Dennis was glad he took the risk to start paying off his debt.

Diplomat. Samantha was the best diplomat in her city. She made it her mission to lead her people to greater prosperity. She had the best relationships with the citizens. People were impressed by her good work ethic. People saw her as the best diplomat in the city.
Phone call. I had a job interview. I was extremely nervous. I went to the interview. I got the job. I have great confidence now.

Hit. My boyfriend tried to talk to me today. He said he thought I was in love with a girl from the neighborhood. He went out to the garage to look for her. He saw her outside in the backyard with my friends. He said he wanted to ask her to go out and get him.

Go. It was my turn to clean the house. I opened the door to go downstairs. I heard the dogs barking outside. I opened the door to see them running to my yard. I made it to the door and left to go to work.

Companion Physical. I just learned that my teacher assigned my physical in the afternoon. I called my mom to pick me up at seven o'clock sharp. I drove to the school with my mom. When we got there, I found out that my test was postponed. I drove home and went straight to bed, exhausted.

Lost Sandwich. Cora found a sandwich near the sink in the kitchen. She didn't know how to cook it. She looked up a few online videos on cooking. She then went to the store to buy the ingredients. She put the sandwich together and returned home with it.

A Lion King Christmas. My family went to our favorite Christmas tree farm on Christmas. My sister got a lion for my brother. He was afraid of it. It was really funny. My brother got the girl to get him another one.

Cable TV. One day I decided I wanted cable TV. My wife and I talked about the options. We decided we didn't want cable TV anymore. She decided to buy the satellite box. We have been happy with our decision.

Broken collectible. Lucy needed to pick up some candy. She put her little hand into the pocket of a shelf. But when she picked up a candy bar, the coin slipped and fell. It landed on the floor. Lucy felt disappointed that she couldn't get the candy.

Uncle Freddy. Gina was staying with her uncle Freddy. His house had a pool and grill. She loved watching his cooking. One day he made her brother an onion ring for her birthday. She was sad but happy to have a fun surprise for her brother.

Hooray for vacations. My friends went on a vacation to Jamaica. I decided to go with them. I took one look and knew I didn't like it. It was very cold and the beaches were bad. I think I will not be going on another trip.

Wallet. Anna was walking through the park. She suddenly realized she had lost her wallet. She looked all around, trying to find it. Then she spotted it in the bushes behind a house. She happily went inside and looked around.

Incognito Mode. Tim had trouble seeing in his browser. He decided to get the option to open in incognito mode. It worked pretty well for a few days. Then it started to stop working. Tim was never able to get it to work again.

Road Trip. Sam decided he wanted to take a road trip. He drove to the country and saw some beautiful scenery. He ate a big steak and drank a lot of beer. He had a blast. Sam decided he would go again.
Acting lessons. Lucy wanted to be a TV actress. She got hired for some commercials. She went through some auditioning. She went through some more. Lucy got the part in the commercials.

Roommate to the Rescue. My roommate has a cat named Rosie. Rosie came to the house yesterday. The cat ran under the couch where a child was sleeping. He snuck up and slept on the child's lap. The child was scared and cried until her mom brought her home.

Robert formed a band. Robert was a good guitar player. He decided to form a band. Robert decided to use the name Megadeth. Megadeth did very well at the shows. They ended up getting a lot of attention.
Kim the Waitress. Kim worked at a diner. One day a client ordered too many meals. The client wanted a drink. Kim made the drink for the client. The client thanked Kim afterwards.

Tree. Travis decided to climb a tree. His father tried to help him, but Travis resisted. Eventually he pushed himself up too far, and fell. He scraped his knee, and was covered in sap. Travis decided that tree was a bad idea.

Family History Banquet. Sue's family history class was holding a banquet. Sue wanted to help make the day special for everyone. She had no idea what to give her family so she had them look it up. She took their information and researched it for a bit. When it was time to give Sue her gift her family was thrilled.
Washing Hair. Carson had long hair. He took it to the salon. His hair was washed in hot water. The water made his hair feel very wet. Carson's hair looked like a wet spaghetti noodle.

The Hearing. The school's hearing officer was going to have an argument with the principal. The two officers were scheduled to meet at the school's cafeteria. At the meeting, the principal made a point of yelling at both officers. The school officials decided to call in the hearing officer. When he heard the facts, he reversed his decision and let them off.

Gap Tooth. Lucy wanted to get braces to prevent her gums from growing. The dentist told her the teeth were very sensitive. Lucy was a good girl, but she wanted to go when her parents were not around. She hid her teeth behind her pillow and snuck out of the room. Lucy's parents were very upset when they found her teeth behind her pillow.
Homework Hater. Tommy hated homework. He got into a fight with a friend about it. His friend's parents were upset. Tommy was grounded for a month. Tommy still hated homework, though.

Colorado Cold. There was a cold winter in Colorado. Tom's parents had to cancel a family trip. They sent him to stay with them at their house. Tom didn't like it but couldn't leave. He was very thankful when they all returned to warm up.

Comedy. Tia was a stand up comedian. One night she forgot her set and had to miss a show. She was nervous but decided to try and make the next show. The audience booed her off the stage. Tia was so embarrassed she was not even able to perform another show.

Exam Grade. Aya was given a B on her final exam. She was devastated, and had to study extra hard. Finally she received a D on her final exam. She was disappointed, but knew it was the best she could do. She made up an effort to study more during finals.
Cd. I purchased my son's computer. I used the coupon code. It came with a cd that I didn't need. The company said they'd give me another. He was upset and complained.
The Space Station. The kids went on a trip. They took a trip to space. They got to see all the things they would see. The trip was great. The kids loved space.

Chase. The car came from the other side. It stopped in front of an intersection. A car was coming at the same time. The car got out and started to cross the road. The driver behind them sped up and they were no longer in danger.
Molly and Devin. Molly and Devin met at an after school dance. They began to date. Molly and Devin eventually started to date other people. They broke up. Molly and Devin no longer date each other.

The New Girl. Tina went to a new school. She was nervous about making a new friend. She brought a new book with her. She was nervous to meet the other kids. When Tina met one girl she had a lot of fun.
Missed Alarm. Tom was a cook. He set the alarm for a certain time. He was late for work. He decided to run to his car instead. He was able to get back in time.

The melted colander. Emma was making spaghetti. She had a big pot and lots of meat. Then, she began washing it in the colander. Then, it began to melt and melt! She decided to put the colander in the sink and forget about it.

Interrupted. When Tim came home he found his brother in the basement. His brother told Tim that his parents died. Tim was upset but tried to reassure his brother. He promised to be there for his brother from now on. It didn't work out and Tim's brother started missing a lot.
Dirty Cat. My cat is always a mess. She jumps up and down. Yesterday we put the trash into the trash can. Unfortunately she jumped on the trash. Her litter came out all over the floor.

Too Long Ago To Remember. Sophie took the old photo out of her book. It was too long ago to remember. She tried to remember if she had seen it before. She couldn't remember the last time she had seen it. Sophie started to cry.

Skating too fast. Liz went out with some friends for skating. She was really good at it. However, she was speeding up too much. Her friends got really mad at her. They told her she needed to slow down.

Spicy Chicken. I went to a restaurant that served very spicy chicken. As soon as I tried it, I ran to the bathroom. I immediately spat it out because it was so spicy. However, the waitress kept giving me drinks as I waited. I continued to drink until I fell asleep.

Whisper. Amy's teacher asked the class to write something about themselves. Amy's idea was about her friend Beth, but no one was able to come up with it. Finally she decided she would whisper about her in class. Amy's teacher saw her doing it and was suspicious. Then, Beth asked her to come up with an idea!

Bunny Surprise. I went out to eat with my girlfriend. We got a chicken sandwich. I was so hungry I decided to get a burger. I realized it was the same type of food. She really appreciated the gesture.
Dirty Room. The room was too dirty for Lisa. She was too lazy to clean it. She made a fake spider and hid in her room. When the room was cleaned, Lisa was happy. The room looked much better.

The Song Cover. Mia was a huge fan of the band Blink 182. She especially loved the song "Angel Investor" by singer Jesse Lacey. One night, she decided to go to a concert in Chicago. She heard the band in person at a bar and decided to meet up. Mia was sad when they left and realized her dream was impossible.

A new PC Mouse. I wanted to buy a new PC mouse. I went to the store and looked at all the options. I tried a number of models. I picked one of the first that came out that day. I was thrilled with my purchase.

Squash. John decided to plant a squash in his backyard. The squash grew tall and strong. Soon, it began to die. It started to grow and grow. John put the squash out to eat to ensure that it would survive.
Skiing. The friends went skiing. They packed everything into their gear. They rented a small car. They drove to a mountain to ski. The friends all had a blast skiing.
Lost Sight. Tom took a hike in the woods. He suddenly noticed he couldn't see anything. He looked down and saw something. He had been standing in the grass. Tom tried to go back but couldn't see.

Spider Jump. I was jumping from tree to tree in my backyard. I kept landing on the branches in the middle of the yard. My father had a ladder and sawed my jumping shorts off. My dad told me that I had to go to the doctor. I went to the doctor and he said I broke my leg.
End of speech. I wrote an ending for my novel. I thought it was going to be very exciting. I wrote it for hours. It took me over two hours. I decided I would not submit my ending to a publisher.
Burger To Go. Tom loved fast food. He often ordered a large amount of food. One day he got so much food that he ate it all. Tom felt sick the next day. Tom decided to be more careful ordering food.

Sharing Bread. I needed some bread. I found some bread from my house. When I grabbed it I saw it was moldy. I realized that I had to share it with someone. I gave it to someone and now we are both happy.

Ryan Loses Weight. Ryan had been feeling very fat recently. He decided to get some exercise into his life. He started by walking for a few minutes every day. He worked up from walking a few steps at a time. Ryan began to lose weight and was very proud of himself.
wing sauce. Tanya made chicken wings. She cooked them up. She used lemon juice to color them. When she took them out she liked them better. She made another batch next time.
The Tiger. The tiger walked through the forest. It spotted a large tree. It began to climb the tree. It became stuck and unable to climb. The tiger died.

Teacher At A Party. Kate was a teacher at a local school. At a party she made a small sexual innuendos for her students. None of the students were amused. She decided to stop talking about innuendos. Everyone knew what she was talking about from then on.

Lost in the air. Nancy was riding her bike to work one day. She began to realize how far away from home she was. After several miles, she realized that she was lost. She looked everywhere, but couldn't find her way home. Fortunately, a passing driver saw Nancy and helped her get home.

Vanilla Cake. My favorite kind of cake was vanilla. One day I woke up feeling very sick. I didn't want to miss my favorite kind of cake. I decided to make my own vanilla cake. My cake tasted so good I ate half of it!

Lisa. Lisa decided to buy a new sweater for school. She went to the mall with her mom and bought the sweater. At school, Lisa's mother didn't like the new sweater. Lisa told her that she was having her first Christmas. Lisa's mom gave her a sweater that was in a different color.

bank trip. We had a bad day today. I needed to go to the bank to make money for food. The bank was not open so I went the the the gas station. I filled up my car with gas and went out for lunch. The gas was half the price so I had no problem making money.

Treat. My son's class took a trip to a nearby amusement park. We went to the big roller coaster. One of my son's friends, Sam, did not like roller coasters. He started screaming at the top of his lungs, and I had to stop the ride. I never saw him again.

Bridal shower. Ava's new husband was a rich man with a big wedding. They had both attended the same university, and Ava was nervous. But after her shower, she realized she was not nervous after all. She felt a wonderful, powerful bond with her new husband. She realized she'd been thinking about marriage for a long time.

Poor Lighting. Tanya's apartment was dark. Tanya decided to get some lighting bulbs. She drove to the store and bought some. Tanya brought the bulbs home and put them in. Tanya's apartment was much brighter after the bulbs were installed.
CCD. My daughter is three years old. Last week she told me that she is in a special relationship. I think the CCD is just a phase. She asked for my opinion. I think she will grow out of it.

The Mountain Lion. Nancy and Steve decided to hike in the mountains. They were walking along a trail when they heard a sound. The sound was a mountain lion! They stopped to listen for any noise. Luckily, no mountain lion would show up.

Drunk Story. Tom was drunk in his first grade class. They told him that they saw a ghost in a hall. Tom claimed it was just a ghost doll. The teacher laughed and made him go home. Tom promised to never drink in front of a class again.

Two Years. Two Year's ago, I started my new job. It was a new job in a new city with many new responsibilities. After two months of work, I learned how to communicate with people. Now I love my new job and all the responsibilities it holds. I am glad I took my time to start this new job.

Bad Visitor. I was at home on Sunday when I heard a noise upstairs. I looked up and saw a man looking at my windows. He was wearing only a towel. He began to follow me down the hall. I quickly called the police and they sent a man to deal with the man.

Doctor Visit. My wife visited the doctor today. The doctor told her that she has strep throat. The doctor gave her a shot. She was feeling better by the time he was done. She said it was very worth it.
New kitten. Kim loved animals. She took in two new kittens. They stayed at her house for a week. She loved them so much she named them Max and Minnie. Kim named them after herself.

Too small for playing piano. Alicia really wanted to play piano. She took lessons for a few weeks. She was finally ready to play. She tried to hit the notes. But she could not even get the fingers to move.

Fender Bender. Tom was driving home late one night. He got pulled over by a police officer. He was upset because he didn't know why he was being ticketed. He called his insurance company to complain. They told him his car had a flat tire and towed it to his house.

Bad CLothes wash. Mandy needed to get new clothes. She was too lazy to take the clothes to the laundromat. She called a friend to take her clothes to the laundromat. She took the clothes to the laundromat. There, she washed them and was happy.

Terry the Police Officer. Terry was very worried about the welfare of his little brother. He told his parents to let him have a job so he could live. His parents thought for a minute and then agreed. Terry's brother got a job at the local police station. Terry never saw his little brother again but he never stopped being worried.

The New Toy. I was playing with my doll in the living room. The doll was playing with another doll. My doll wanted to play with the other doll's toy. I accidentally broke both of the dolls' toys. Now the doll's toys are all broken.

Not Good News. I came home from work and my mom was holding a cup of orange juice. She was asking me if I had seen her. She said that she was pregnant. When I explained to her that it's not true, she became mad. She slapped me for being too honest.

Bad Exertion. Nate tried running for exercise in the afternoon. He felt like his legs were too weak for it. He tried walking around but it didn't help. After he tried running more, he found that it felt much better. Now he can run almost as well as he can walk.
The Sad Birthday. Sam was playing in the yard. He saw a sign for a talent show. He decided to try out for it. He was terrible. The next day he learned he had not made the cut.
The bad audition. Kelly wanted to audition for a show. She was excited for it. She got dressed up and left. The director called her in. She got her audition over with.

The Tyrant. The local mayor was corrupt. He would illegally take bribes from businesses and homeowners. His loyalists were corrupt too. The people wanted change. The people voted for the corrupt mayor out.

Sam The Video Game Addict. Sam was obsessed with video games since he was a kid. He spent all day at the computer playing all types of games. Eventually his parents told him he needed to stop. Sam decided to quit video games and get a job. Now Sam works to help save up for his college education.

Pizzeria. Sandra decided to open up her own pizzeria. She set up the bakery in her front yard. Soon, people began coming from all over. She was getting a lot of customers! Soon, Sandra's pizza was well known all over the town!

The tattoo removal. Sean had a tattoo on his thigh. It was extremely painful for him to remove. He decided to seek the opinion of a professional. He had his leg put under a microscope. Thankfully, the tattoo was completely gone.

Work. Gina had worked at the store for a week. Now she wanted to go home and relax. She went to her parents room to find out what to do. Her father told her to look outside and read a book. She looked outside and saw her grandfather sitting on a bench.
Dog. Tina was sad that her dog ran away. She looked for him everywhere. She finally found him in the neighbor's yard. She put up signs. Her neighbors found him very quickly.

Soccer. Jack loved soccer. Jack wanted to play in a local soccer league. He found a few players he liked to work with. He found a league and set up an account. Jack was able to join the league and play with the best players.

Rice Milk. We had rice once, in our childhood. It was a nice rice milk. I remember we put it on the side of a cereal box. When I was nine I had a craving for rice milk. I was in the bathroom with the rice milk waiting for the milk.
Party. I went to a party last week. We had beer and ate pizza all night. The DJ played the best music. My girlfriend wanted to go home, but she stayed for hours. She was happy and we had fun.
The Chicken. The man was hungry. He decided to order some chicken. The cashier brought out the chicken. The man asked for extra cheese on his chicken. The cashier refused the request.
Karma. Tim was walking around the streets. A homeless man asked him for money. Tim had no money. Tim took the man's money and ran away. The man was upset but didn't try to follow Tim.

Unwanted apps. Kelley loved downloading games. She always wanted to own the games. But she never got the courage to do so. Finally her boyfriend bought her a copy of the game. But she never touched it.
Too heavy. I was on my way to a concert. I had to cross a busy street. It started to rain. My heavy coat kept me dry. I was able to make it to the concert.

A Dog on a Boat?. The man let his dog out in the yard. He walked around the yard but didn't see any dogs. He looked around again, and started to feel nervous. The dog got closer to him and walked up to him. The man was relieved he did not see any dogs.

Smoke. One day while mowing, my neighbor saw smoke coming out of a shed. She screamed that it was her house fire. After several minutes my neighbor came out to let us in. The house was engulfed in flames. We called the fire department and they came right away.

The Bodybuilder. The bodybuilder was at the gym with his girlfriend. He wanted to impress her by getting in shape. He joined a gym and worked hard to get bigger. At the end, he weighed twenty-four pounds. She was impressed and promised him a girlfriend if he got in shape.
Malaysia. The plane landed in Malaysia. The pilot took off the plane. He saw many countries on the map. He wanted to visit all of them. He landed the plane.

Cracked. I bought a cracked screen protector for my iPad. I took it to the service center and they sent me the protector. I tried to put it on, but it was too small. They tried to put stickers on it but I didn't see any good ones. I tried the device without the protector and it cracked.
Alpaca. Tina really liked alpaca's. She begged her parents to get her one. Finally they had an idea. They got her an alpaca as a pet! She loved it so much that she continued to buy them.
A night at the city. Today I was bored. I decided to go out to the city. I went to the club and drank a few beers. I then went to a bar and had a few drinks. I went home and took a nap.

Work. Kate has never really enjoyed working on cars. She works as a professional mechanic and enjoys it. However, she knows she will never make enough money. Kate has been working on cars all summer. Now she has enough money to buy a new car.

Bad Cook. Mitch wanted to learn how to cook. He decided to go to culinary school. After school, he decided to buy some cooking books. After buying them, Mitch looked through them. He learned how to cook well.

change. John had just bought some groceries. He put his change in a plastic bag. He was excited to take it home. But he was startled to find $100 missing from his bag. John regretted his decision to not put change in the bag.

The Ticket. Beth was late to school. The school gave her a new ticket. It was much more expensive than she thought. Beth realized she needed to make a better choice. She decided to use her old ticket as a guide.

Toy shopping. The Johnson family were headed to the store for Christmas. The Johnson's wanted to buy a Christmas tree. The family decided on a tree but they were out of pinecones. The Johnson's decided on cherry or cherry and cherry. The family decided on the cherry and they had a great Christmas tree.
Wedding Day. Today was the day that I got married. We had all planned the perfect day. I made the breakfast and my mom made the flowers. Everything was perfect. I am going to be so happy.

The Christmas Miracle. It was Christmas morning. Bella was very sad that her family was not getting presents. She decided to wait till the last minute. Then, after thinking about it, she realized it wasn't so bad. Bella decided that she was okay after all.
My drone. I bought a new drone. I was very excited about it. I drove it all around my neighborhood and park. But the copter ran out of batteries. I had to return it.

Anger management. Cayla was always angry. Her mom had been diagnosed with breast cancer. She tried to control her anger, but it was uncontrollable. Her parents tried to get her to go to anger management classes. But Cayla refused to attend classes, and became even more angry.

New friends. Lucy got her ears pierced. At first she was hesitant to do it. Her mom explained that it would be cute if she did. At first it was difficult, but eventually she got the hang of it. Lucy was happy she did it, as she really liked her new earrings.

Susie's favorite Doll. Susie was excited to get a new doll. Her mother got the doll for her birthday. Susie was so excited about the doll. But when her mom opened it, Susie started to cry. She was disappointed because the doll didn't do anything.

Public Speaking. A politician gave a speech in front of the public. He told a story that touched their hearts. Everyone in the audience applauded. A politician tried to calm the crowd and keep them in line. The crowd booed the politician off the stage.
Truss. Truss and his family always drove around. One day Truss got lost and didn't know where to go. He drove to a gas station. He asked a man for directions. The man showed him the way.

Brian made the baseball team. Brian wanted to try out for a baseball team. Brian worked out every day to get stronger. When the try outs came, Brian was nervous. Brian did very well at tryouts. Brian made the baseball team!

Lost. Cora loved to travel and saw the world every year. She tried to plan out a fun vacation for her family. But she was too busy to make it happen. So she booked a plane ticket to Mexico and told her husband. But after a year, she never heard from him again.

Date Night. Alicia was feeling lonely. She felt it was impossible to have a date. Finally, she went on a blind date with a cute guy. When he called her, he said it was his first one. She was so happy and excited.

Labor. The woman was trying to get pregnant. She was at the doctor's office. The doctor called her and informed her that she was having a baby. She gave birth a few hours later. She immediately felt better afterwards.

My iphone. I had an iPhone 4. I was so excited to get it. I bought it the day it came out. When I got to the Apple Store it was already sold out. I had to walk over to the back and see they had iphones there.

Holding a Parking Spot. Jenny's car had a flat tire. It was impossible to find a spot to park. Jenny called a taxi service to go to a parking space. The taxi arrived and Jenny got her change out of the meter. Jenny parked the car and made the taxi return.

Contest. Darlene had a contest on television. She wanted to win a house by telling the most amusing story. Darlene tried her best, but nothing came out right. She finally decided to tell a joke. When she got the chance to win, it was the funniest joke ever!
Sandy Shoes. I bought a pair of sandals. I put them on at the beach. I walked around in the sandals. I felt something weird under my feet. My feet were filled with worms.

Dragon. One day, I decided to write a story about dragons. I spent three months writing the story, and I couldn't finish it. I decided to try and make the story better. I hired a friend to write my story and they turned it in together. Now my story is one of the best stories in the world!

Fist Fight. It was my turn to pick a card for my hand. I looked over the cards, but I had none. Then, my neighbor came out with a card. He was going to challenge my fist fight. After we each picked a card, we went to our seats.
Fig Tree. The kids were climbing a tall tree. They could reach the tree branch very high. They were afraid of falling off. Mom told them to stay still. The tree stopped them when they were all ready.
The Beach Ball. I had a beach ball from childhood. It was so big and cool. I played with it for a few hours. Then, it was stolen. I cried for days.

The Bed. Molly was playing with her dog. She found her dog in the middle of the living room. Molly threw the ball and knocked over the bed. She had to call her husband for help. He came to her house to help her.

Song. My brother asked me to write a song for him. I got a drum kit and wrote some lyrics. I began writing the song. I then discovered the drum kit was not needed. I wrote the song without the drum kit.

James Drinks Iced Coffee. James wants to try something new. He decides to try iced coffee. At first he finds it too bitter. He wishes he had never tried it. James decides to only drink regular coffee from now on.

Fishing. A man had fishing poles. He put them on his pole and waited. One day, he got a bite on his fishing line. He reeled in the line and felt something bite his leg. He put the fishing pole down and started walking away.
Dent. I had to go to the dentist. I had a sore tooth. He told me it would hurt. He put a small piece in. It felt like a needle.

Translating. My cousin was trying to communicate with us in Spanish. She said that we were asking too much. She asked her boyfriend to translate. He gave her a list of things that she needed to say. She said she will say them in English.

Making a New Friend. My brother recently invited me to his house for a sleepover. I met all of his friends at the house and they played games. The kids played outside for hours until it was time to go home. When we got home my brother gave me a hug and said thank you. I was so happy I hugged him back.

Exterminator. Joe has lived in the same apartment for a year now. One night he found a nest of termites in his apartment. Joe had them taken to an exterminator. His apartment did not get infested after that. Joe was very happy that his apartment did not get infested.

Procrastinator. Sally's class had a new book due soon. She was really excited to get it and read it quickly. Sally's teacher kept calling her up for the first day. She wasn't able to do it in time so she failed the class. Sally's parents weren't happy because they needed her to finish the book.

Bloody Nose. Sue was at the store with her grandma. When she came in the store her grandma was gone. She went in the back to get food. When she came back her nose was bleeding. She was able to get it out however.

Jewish. I once went to Israel to study Judaism. It was difficult there because the people were so strict. I missed many days of school because I didn't speak Hebrew. My teacher was very understanding when I came home. She made me study for a whole semester after I returned.

Volunteer. My husband is retired from the military. He decided to go back to work and volunteer for our organization. He spent most of his time in a local homeless shelter. I felt like I could truly connect with him. It made me feel good knowing he cared about me.
Sugar. Bob needed some sugar for his dessert. So he drove to the store to buy some. He looked through all the flavors. He decided on a few. Bob ate the whole box.
My dad is crazy. My dad is crazy. He thinks he is being followed. One day, he set off a fire alarm. Everyone ran outside in panic. Then, a cop found him sitting on the porch with a can of gasoline.

The Heart Attack. Marissa was playing basketball. Suddenly she felt a pain in her chest. She went to the hospital and was told she had a heart attack. She had a catheter inserted into her heart to monitor it. Thankfully it did not make any further problems.

Turn On Music. Tom had a crush on a girl at school. He wasn't sure what to do with the time off. Tom went to his buddy's house and turned on music. Tom's crush wasn't aware of the music. She had a crush on Tom but felt jealous.
Hide n Seek Game. Sam and Jessica were playing hide n seek. Sam put his hand in a hole. Jessica put her hand in a hole. Jessica was happy with how well she was hiding. Sam gave Jessica the win.

Larry Loses His Sunglasses. Larry was driving through the snow. He didn't have a spare pair of sunglasses. He began to walk back home. He lost his sunglasses in the snow. Larry was upset that he couldn't see.

Relationships. My husband and I are both retired. We had a long talk about our future. We made an appointment to meet in person. The first thing we did was talk about our children. Now we are working on getting ready for retirement together.

Becky's New Dad. Becky was adopted when she was just six months old. She was raised by her adoptive father. One day her father decided to leave her at her house by herself. Becky cried, but then she started to calm down and take things easy. Becky's mom took her to a park to play with her new dad.
Bad coffee. I decided to have a coffee yesterday. I did not make it properly. The coffee was too strong. I called my barista. She came out and fixed it.

Racing Competition. Jim loved watching the race cars race down the street. Jim's favorite team was the red team. The red team was coming to a track near his house. Jim invited his friends and family to the track. They had a great time watching the race.

Birthday. It was her sister's 25th birthday. Mia wanted to make sure her parents could enjoy it. She put candles on the cake and wrote Happy Birthday. She also made a gift basket with her favorite flowers. Her parents were overjoyed with their beautiful gifts.
Old House. Joe's mom's house was a ruin. Joe didn't want to live there anymore. So Joe's dad bought his mom a house. Joe went to live there. Now Joe's mom likes her old house.
Suspended!. Caleb had been arguing with his friends. He got into a fight with another boy. His parents found out. They took him to his room. They told him to stay in the room or get his parents.

Smoker. I wanted to quit smoking. So, I decided to be a smoker. After a few months, I finally quit smoking. But, I found out my mom was pregnant with my own son. Now, I only smoke at night with my son.

Smelly Cat. I had an old dog I didn't like anymore. I tried to give him a bath but it didn't work. The dog wouldn't stop smelling. I tried throwing the water on the dog but that didn't work. I finally found a cat shampoo and he smelled like new.

Chicken Soup. Lucy and her grandma were making soup. Lucy started to cook while grandma helped with the soup. Lucy got a little carried away and added a few ingredients. Grandma helped to bring the soup down to a bowl. Lucy ate the soup and felt much better after tasting it.

Return to sender. I tried to order my son's lunch today. I waited for him to get off from work and returned his phone. When he went to pick it up, it had a message from the store. My son was upset that he couldn't get his lunch. He returned it with his wallet and money.

Future Engineer. Tom always dreamed of being an engineer. Tom worked in the oil fields as an apprentice. After many Years Tom finally graduated. Tom worked for a very large oil company. Tom was the future engineer of the company.

Growing Plants is Hard. Sara didn't know much about growing things. Her parents had planted her a small garden when she was little. Her parents encouraged her to plant a bigger garden. Sara planted her first crop of veggies. Sara now has a huge garden with a garden planter.

No Patience at All. Sophie was at work when her son called her. He was upset because his class was moving for the year. He had to be there at 9 am for his class. She gave him the lecture and he got distracted. Sophie gave him back the lecture and a hug, he thanked her.

New Attitude. Gina was walking on the street after dark. Her and her friends were walking through the park. The were talking to each other and laughing. Gina didn't know this but she had been being very rude. She went to her friends house and apologized.

Careless Accident. My brother and I took our car to the parking lot of the casino. After our entrance, we walked towards the big screen TV. A taxi driver got out of his vehicle and began to drive us to the car rental place. While trying to get into the building, I tried to run from the taxi. My brother and I were separated when the taxi driver tried to grab my arm.

School Play. Molly was chosen for the school play. She practiced for weeks. She was sure she would get the part. It was a surprise when she got the part. She was so happy and excited to be a part of it.

Champ. Ava was trying to quit heroin. But she kept trying! Then she went to the drugstore and bought more. She started selling it to friends and to herself. Soon Ava was totally free of her addiction!

new boyfriend. Liam was feeling sad. He saw that his girlfriend had moved out. Liam asked her to stay for a few more months. They started dating that very night. Liam and his girlfriend are now dating forever.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee was a professional singer who worked from home. She made a lot of money from singing, but it paid very little in taxes. She couldn't afford to pay her taxes so she wrote a song about it. The song became a huge success and helped Sydnee make extra money. Now she is able to pay her taxes and is a lot happier.

Novel. I once wrote a novel. It was very ambitious and thought-provoking. It became very popular with fans. It was eventually turned into a movie. It grossed a lot of money and I got a lot of recognition.

Water bottle. Barry always drank water from a large bottle. Barry decided to drink more water from a smaller bottle. After drinking more water, Barry realized he had not filled his water bottle. Barry began to fill his water bottle with more water. Barry was happy to realize his water bottle was full.

Bad Joke. Joe was talking to a friend about the weather. They began to make a joke about the weather. When Joe's friend didn't like the joke, Joe felt badly. Joe tried to make up for the lost humor by telling a joke. The friend was offended and told Joe to stop talking to him.

The Speaker. It was a hot day outside and the kids were bored. They found some speakers on the side of the road and bought them. They put them in the kids room. They played music while the speakers blared. It was a great way to entertain the kids!

Visit. My wife and I decided to visit the local farm for the weekend. While we were there we got to watch the horses. The horses were so cute and beautiful. We also got to feed the horses. We are so glad we went to the farm.

Sleeping Early. It was a cold, dark night and I had my first sleepover. My mom said I had to get my room clean before I could sleep. I slept all through the night and woke up late for school. When I got to school, I had a fever and my teacher gave me detention. That night, I never slept until it was time to get home.

The Noisemaker. A noise from the crowd was getting louder and louder. As the crowd kept yelling, Sam started to get scared. He went into the crowd and stayed there until the noise stopped. A police officer pulled him out of the crowd. Sam was glad he had stayed where he was.
Banana Peel. Tim ate a banana. He then peeled it and threw it away. He decided to get a different peel. He peeled a different banana. Tim had no problem peeling the banana.

Soggy. Amy went to the kitchen and saw there were chips on the table. She took a bite out of one and immediately threw up. The flavor was so bad she started coughing. Her mother cleaned the mess up quickly. Amy went to the store and bought a new bag of chips.
Fencing. Sam was a great fencer. He was a great fencer because of his speed. He beat all the best fencers in the county. All of his opponents were able to beat him. Sam retired from the sport.

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul always wanted a cat. He did not own a cat at the time. One day he went to the store to buy one. At the store he picked out a large and orange cat. Raul took his cat home and named him Raul.

Pool trip. Jill and her friends went to the park. It was the day they were going to go to the pool. The girls laid out their towels and swimsuits. They grabbed their towels and started swimming. They swam for an hour before dinner.

New Kittens!. Amy was walking to her favorite park one day. Suddenly she saw a cat in the distance. She picked the cat up and put him in a carrier. There, the kitty stayed all day. Amy had a new kitten!

Black Friday. I was really looking forward to Black Friday. I was going to go buy my favorite game. I went to my local electronics store and waited in line. My brother then knocked on the door and we were let into the store. I was relieved because I needed that game badly.
Puppy. Sara wanted a puppy. She asked her mom. Her mom agreed. Sara went home and asked for a puppy. Her mom got her one and she was happy.
A dog. A dog has wandered in the yard. It has scared a lot of people. The owner of the dog was very mad. He chased it all the way home. He took it in, and it's a lot happier there now.

Ready Supper. I had a potluck supper last night. But I realized that I hadn't cooked anything. So I took out my phone to read some things. I found a few recipes online and found a recipe. I went to the store to buy all of the ingredients.

The Dress. It was Tina's wedding. She had made the dress from her mother's old fabric scraps. She was wearing her white gown to the wedding. All of the sudden, it gave way. Tina's gown got caught in a crack and fell.

Teased. Remy was walking home from school. He was carrying a water bottle with him. He was approached by a group of kids. They kept teasing him for no reason. The police came to intervene and Remy was bullied into crying.
Paws. We had some dogs. Our dogs were very small. The dogs would chase each other. They would try to bite each other. We had to get rid of the dogs because they were hurting people.

No makeup allowed. Sara's school was having a contest to win the school newspaper. Whoever had the most makeup would win. Sara put on a lot of makeup. To her surprise the contest was held in class. Sara was happy that she could participate.

Super Mario. When I was younger, my favorite game was Super Mario Brothers. The game was so addicting, it eventually became un-playable. I would try to play it nonstop, until I could finally beat it. After a while, the game began to become so much harder to play. Eventually, I quit playing it, and never looked back.

False Alarm. Dan came home from work late. He tried to go to sleep but his alarm did not go off. Dan was furious that his alarm was set for 10:15. Dan's wife found his cellphone number in his phone's data. Dan called his wife to cancel the night's reservations.

The Card Collection. Sam's grandmother told him to get some cards for his collection. Sam didn't have many friends, so he had no choice but to gather them. He began with his family, his friends, and family at church. He then moved on to his neighbor friends and family. Sam had amassed his entire collection by the end of the week.
Migraine again!. Today I woke up with a headache. It was terrible. I couldn't stop talking. My mom finally gave me some medicine. Luckily, it did help.

Snake in the grass. Tommy was on a hike with his family. He was on a small trail when he noticed something. He looked down and saw a snake. Tommy screamed and ran from the woods. The snake didn't bother him again.

Too Much of a Wait. Drew's flight was delayed for three hours. He was so upset he tried to yell at the flight attendants. The flight attendant heard what Drew was yelling and told him to calm down. She told him that she had more important things to do than waste time. Drew felt much better and thanked her for the good advice.

Erin and the dog. Erin went to the grocery store to buy some dog food. She drove to the store and picked up the dog food. The cashier saw her dog and he noticed she had dog food in her purse. Erin quickly drove back to the store and returned the dog food. She left the store with a lot of dog food and dog treats.

Statistics. The teacher told the students that Statistics was the most difficult class. One student, Peter, got up in front of the class and tried to explain it. The students were interested and they listened to Peter. Peter explained that Statistics is not as difficult as he had thought. The students were impressed that he could understand them so easily.

Comeback. Chet wanted to join the school basketball team. He practiced with the team for many months. But it was difficult to stay on the team as he did not get along with the team. So he got on the team after being cut from the team. Chet was happy that he made the team.

Tadpoles. There was a large pond in my city. There was a lot of water. The pond had over one hundred fish. One day the local news came through and reported tadpoles in the pond. The pond was emptied before the tadpoles could escape.

Big Test. I was studying for an important test. All of a sudden my stomach started to hurt. I had to leave the class to go to the bathroom. I ended up vomiting the entire test. I never went back to that class again.

Space Heater. The heater at Sam's house was broken. He wanted to make it warm when it rained. He took a roll of quarters and warmed up a candle. Then he put a wet cloth over the heater. Finally he went to sleep.
Perfect polish. I had an idea. I would paint my nails pink. I was really pleased with the result. I painted my nails pink. I loved the color.

Free Food. Joe was waiting in line for a school lunch program. The line moved slowly but soon was at Joe's school. At the start of his meal he paid for his food. However, the line moved so slowly Joe waited for 20 minutes. Finally a manager opened his lunch and Joe got to go.

Family Strife. Nate worked for the US government. He had a family that he never saw as often. One day, they got into a huge argument over politics. After they argued, Nate decided he wanted to leave the country. Nate decided to move to Europe.

Reader. Mary was reading a novel. But she couldn't remember the plot. So she went to the library to look up the plot online. The online plot helped her. So she was able to read the novel without any trouble.

The Bank Robber. The robber came into the bank wearing a ski mask. He grabbed the cash drawer and pulled out a gun. He held up the teller and demanded money. The robber demanded a lot of money but the teller emptied his pockets. The robber ran out of the bank with his money and never returned.

Roadtrip. Mike and his family decided to take a roadtrip. They planned on visiting many historical sites on this trip. They found a nice motel in a beautiful city. The family arrived at the motel, unpacking all their gear. They were thrilled to have a new adventure under their belt!
Stinky Feet. Tom had dirty feet. He would always wash them after playing video games. His friends noticed him stinky feet. They made fun of him. Tom had to go home and change his socks.

Awkward Shave. Kate took a shower at her boyfriend's house. It was time for a short-shave. He was wearing his favorite t-shirt and jeans. He accidentally shaved his face. Kate's boyfriend was not happy about the situation.
The Free Burgers. Jimmy was on his way to a burger place. He got in his car and drove to the place. He ordered a burger. The cashier gave him his order. Jimmy drove home and ate it.
Cookies. Today I decided to bake cookies. The cookies were delicious. However, they were too hard to eat. I ate two of them. I am addicted to sweets from now on.
Runaway Dog. My friend's dog was a terrier. He was a lot smaller than the one I had. It ran away one day. I saw him walking by my house. He was laying on the front step.

Small Box. I went to the park today with my daughter. I was playing near a large fountain. I felt a rumble from a box about 10 feet away. My daughter told me it was an old fishing box. It was a very small box but I was very curious.

Gas Station Blues. My aunt had to buy gas at a station. It was a five mile drive. Once there she found out she could pay online. She was really nervous about that. She managed to complete it without getting stranded.

Gus the Zombie. There once was a kid named Gus. He was a zombie, he lived in a small trailer. He would often play tricks on people. One day he jumped out and scared his mother. Now he's the mayor, and is not so funny.

Clean Numbers. Jules worked at a pizza place. She noticed that the pizza was dirty. Jules began to wash the pizza. After doing so, she noticed a lot of numbers on the bottom. The pizza was good, but not as good as she thought.
Cold Shower. Kia's grandma was out of town. So Kia decided to take a cold shower. The shower didn't heat up as expected. It was too cold! Kia had to get out and dry off.
Runner. Garrett loved to run. Garrett ran every day after school. One day Garrett was running and fell down. He sprained his ankle. Garrett couldn't run anymore after spraining his ankle.

Slippery Situation. A couple decided to take a short road trip. The drive was long and hard due to slippery roads. They spent hours in the car trying to move the car forward. At one point they were unable to move. The couple decided to pull over and rest until the roads were clear.
Making Dinner. My friend invited me over to help him cook dinner. I came over and helped him make dinner. It was an easy task. I went home and cooked the dinner we had. I was really proud of myself!

Trial. Tim was going through the courthouse. He was on trial for robbery. Tim tried to look calm and calm. The judge got into his face and started laughing. Tim was so embarrassed that he ran out of the courthouse.

New Crush. Lucy's crush had a new girlfriend. He asked her out a week later. Lucy was nervous since she had never gone out with him. She did not go out with him again. She thought he had lost interest.

Poetic Success. Sara had an interest in poetry. She was having trouble in class. Her teacher suggested her see a tutor. The tutor helped her understand how to write. Sara finished her first novel and received a high grade.
The big storm. A hurricane was coming. Shelby stayed in the basement. There was water all over the floor. She was scared. She ran to the basement.
Searched. Tom was at his desk. He could not find his pen. He searched all over the place for his pen. Tom looked at his desk for a long time. He finally found his pen.
The quick move. Manny just moved to the country. He wanted to start a new life. Manny got a job at a new job. He took a vacation from the job. The new job gave him a lot of money.
Pool closing. Tim went to the pool with friends. He noticed that there was a closing. Tim was disappointed. He called his friends to find out why. Everyone was excited about the closing.

A Neighbor's Passing. My neighbor passed away. It was only my mom and her friends I knew that she had a terminal illness. Her funeral was held in my house and it was very sad. I had to cry alone for the rest of the day. My mother's funeral was boring.

Game-Winner. Joe was the star quarterback in his high school football team. He and his teammates decided to have a water gun fight. They huddled in the middle of the field. They yelled the words to the song "Game-winner" loudly. Joe's teammates began throwing water on the ground, making a sound.

The movie. I went to see a new movie at the theater. I wanted to sit at a certain seat. The worker told me I didn't have enough tickets. I couldn't find any tickets anywhere! I ended up leaving and going home.

Eyesight. The man had bad eyesight. His glasses were not comfortable to wear. He asked a friend for advice. His friend told him to get glasses with magnifying glasses. The glasses helped him to see properly.

Lifting Weights. Tim was at the gym. He was trying to lift more weight than usual. He wasn't able to lift the weight as much as he had. He tried harder the next time he was at the gym. Tim was able to lift the heavy weights and get bigger.

Plaque. My sister in law works for the MBTA. She was not in the press recently. Yesterday she posted a photograph on FB. It showed her plaque with an inscription. It said thank you, Jane, for helping the transit authority.
Free Haircut. Tom was at a bar. He asked the bartender for a cut. The bartender gave Tom a haircut. Tom liked it a lot. He decided to get a job at the bar.
Cookies. The children gathered together and baked some cookies. They covered them with butter. The were very tasty. They were great with chocolate. They were happy with their cookies.
The Grand Slam. I was up to bat in a baseball game. My coach called me to the plate. The ball was thrown towards me. I swung and swung for several minutes. I finally swung and hit a home run.
Sam. Sam was very sad. His parents wanted to help him get over his problems. They decided to get him some therapy. Sam began to feel much better. Soon he had no more problems.
Rain OUt. Tim loved storms. His friends told him not to play outside. He decided to play in it anyways. He found a storm forming above him. Tim's umbrella broke and he almost lost his life.

Dessert. Kathy was having a hard time keeping a proper diet. She was going to make dessert and it was almost time. She knew that it might not be the best idea to bake it at this time. Kathy kept postponing until it was the perfect hour. Luckily, the dessert was great and she kept it a secret.
Box of Candy. We got a box of candy as a gift. We opened it and realized it was rotten. We threw it out. We decided to get another box. That was enough to last us until we could eat a lot of candy.

Spy. Amy was watching TV when she got a call from her mom. Her mom said her boyfriend Ray was calling from the basement. Amy ran upstairs to tell Ray the good news. Her mom was horrified when she heard Ray sobbing. Amy was grounded by her mom for a week.
Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine loved her engagement ring. She decided to lose it. Her wedding ring fell out her finger! It shattered all over the floor. Jasmine had to buy another ring.

Mistake. Beth got a new car for her birthday. She decided to make her friends jealous. She got a set of white high heels to wear for her birthday. Her friends thought they looked great in her shoes. Her friends felt embarrassed about what she did.

Late night Snack. Today I went out to the bar. I was really late so I was very hung over. As soon as I got there I ordered an iced mocha. After I drank it I fell asleep on the couch. I woke up very late and missed my flight.

5 Years. My mother-in-law went to visit us this weekend. She was 90 when she came last year. I took her to the local animal shelter to visit some animals. After the visit, she took us to a local farmer's market. She left the next day and stayed with me for the day.
hostage. Kelley was trying to get her purse from her friend's car. When she grabbed it from her her, the bag opened. She was in trouble. Kelley had to call the police. Thankfully, no one was hurt.
Caldwells. I've always wanted to visit a caldwell. My sister in law wanted to surprise me. She took us to a few of them. The caldwells were beautiful. We had a lot of fun.

Bad aloe gel. Karen was at the doctor for an allergic reaction. They gave her some aloe gel. At first it did not help. After a while the pain was unbearable. Finally she had to go home and take off the gel.

Zoe for President. Zoe always wanted to run for President. She decided to write a speech for the election. Zoe was shocked when she found out she would be voted into office. She was elated when she won the election. Zoe couldn't wait to see her new government.
New guitar. Fred needed a new guitar. He went to his local guitar shop. The salesman talked about guitars for a week. He decided to give it a shot. It turned out to be a good guitar.
Cheesy. Lily was eating cereal. She decided to eat it with a spoon. However, her mom told her that eating too much was bad. Instead, she just took a big bite. She felt full and happy.

Jay at the concert. Jay was an aspiring singer. Jay took some time off from singing to pursue a new career. Jay went to a local talent show to audition for a stage. Jay sang and practiced hard for months for the talent show. Jay won the talent show and was given a chance to make a living out of it.
Gun range. Jack went to the gun range. He had fun with it. He got a bunch of new guns. He practiced shooting for a month. He could now shoot a bullseye.

Stylist. Jane loved designing clothes. One day she was approached by a fashion design firm. The designers asked Jane to design dresses. Jane refused but they paid her anyway. Jane was able to design the dresses with the money she made.
The Garden. Maggie loved planting flowers. She bought some seeds from a nursery. She filled a bucket with them. Then, she planted them in her garden. The first year she planted a dozen flowers.

piano lessons. I love learning how to play the piano. I decided to take lessons. After doing a few weeks of practice I was ready to start lessons. When I got to the studio, I sat down in front of the teacher. I fell in love with the teacher immediately and signed up for her weekly lesson.

Special Ingredient. My dad said he wanted to make pancakes for breakfast. I was going to be the batter for his special pancake. I poured milk and eggs onto a plate. I then put the batter into the hot pan. He said they tasted just like real pancakes.

Too Busy. Dan was a little boy with a ball. He had played with the ball for a few minutes. The ball was too full of balls and started to move. Dan tried to move the ball to a different part of the yard. After several attempts, Dan was able to find the ball.
The bus ride. Lisa had to get on a school bus. She sat down in the seat she had bought. She watched as the bus went down the street. Then the bus stopped. Lisa got on the bus.

Best Formula. Amy was on her way to the hospital. The nurses brought her a bottle of medicine. The bottle was different than what Amy had expected. Amy was confused when she took it. It was a new formula for a bad batch.

Card Games. The kids were bored on a rainy night. They decided to play cards. They each picked a card game and threw it at the other. They had a lot of fun and learned a lot. They were glad they decided to play cards.

Questioned. Barry was arrested for a crime he didn't commit. He confessed to the crime when he saw an officer. The officer thought Barry confessed to something else. Barry was allowed to remain free. Barry went to court to get his Miranda rights and was released.
The Race. Alicia wanted to run a race. She trained for weeks. She ran everyday. Finally, she entered the race. Alicia made it to the top 10.

Dunkirk. I recently took a train to Dunkirk. The train left early in the morning. We arrived in the early afternoon. The locals were wonderful and made us feel welcome. After the train left Dunkirk, we went straight to dinner.
Pimple Face. Bill's face was puffy. He was in pain and trying to figure out what was wrong. He had a doctor who said it was acne. Bill tried a new tonic. After a while the puffy face disappeared.

A Lap of Coffee. Kate's friends were trying to make her feel better. They offered her a hot cup of coffee. Kate wasn't really a fan but accepted it. After a few minutes she felt like she was a lot happier. She thanked them for their support and moved on to her day.

Rated R. Sheila liked to go to the mall. She had gone this weekend and she didn't like the stores. On the way to the mall, her car stopped working. She couldn't wait to have it towed. Sheila finally decided to just leave the mall instead.
Pizza. We had pizza for dinner tonight. We had a nice garlic bread pizza. It was the best pizza I've ever had. It's still under my mattress. I will sleep with it tonight.

Gossip. Tom and Jen decided to watch the news. They decided to watch about a scandal. They made up a story about their boss stealing their work. They discussed the story for the next few hours. They decided it was a bit silly and to avoid it they decided to end it.

Ikea Store. Sally wanted to buy a new chair. She went to Ikea and looked at all the chairs. She found one that she liked and purchased it. At home, Sally started to use the chair to work. Afterwards, Sally got a complaint about the chair on the store floor.

Breakup. I broke up with my girlfriend because I didn't see her in six months. We both had so much stuff we didn't know where to go. We had to go to different places. We tried to find somewhere we could be happy. We both went to sleep that night.

The Blood Drive. The local hospital was having a blood drive. They were looking for donors for a transplant. They needed to find the right donors. The nurses asked everyone what kind of donation would be best. Many of the responses were very personal and meaningful.
Spree. Candy wanted a new purse. She did not have a lot of money. She found a coupon. She bought it. She was glad she could use it.

The Missing Pie. John baked an apple pie for his wife. He forgot the pie in the oven. The pie was gone when he went to clean the house. John's wife looked everywhere for the pie. When he finally found the pie in the oven he was surprised.

Deep-fried. I ordered deep-fried food. The order came to me, but the cook forgot to fry it. I left a huge tip in the tip jar. I went back to the restaurant to tip the cook. I left a $15 tip in the tip jar.
Burger. Tim wanted a burger. He asked his friends if they wanted one. None of them wanted to buy a burger. Tim decided to go to McDonald's. They gave him a burger with no toppings.

Gratitude. Jena wanted to take a long walk. She thought of the good things that had happened to her. So she decided to throw a party. Everyone enjoyed the party and gave some donations. Jena was grateful for all the good things that had happened to her.

Annie's Test. Annie needed to take a math test. She had studied all week but still felt unprepared. When she went into class she started to do poorly on her test. Then she remembered that she had her dad's notes and had studied well. When her results came back, Annie was shocked to see she did much better.

Little League, Big Dreams. Jed's family encouraged him to play baseball. Jed decided to play for his first game of the season. However, he couldn't swing the bat. At his next try, Jed got better and hit every ball. After his last game, his father was very proud of him.
Soccer. Cindy was a girl soccer player. She was captain of her team. Her team was at the championship game. The game was tied, and it was almost over. Cindy's team took the lead and won the game.
