Breakfast. Tom wanted to have some breakfast. He went to the store and bought everything. Tom made oatmeal, eggs, and bacon. Tom ate the breakfast he bought. Tom felt better.

Messy Studio. My dad bought a used studio for my birthday. I loved it but couldn't stand the mess it made. I spent days cleaning and organizing. The mess finally cleared up but only after a month. Now my dad says the studio is just as messy as my room.
Trying To Stop A Thief. Tim was walking to his classroom. A thief approached him. Tim tried to stop him. He ended up tripping him. Tim felt embarrassed.
Icy Roads. My boyfriend and I are on our way to a friend's house. We are going to get stuck in the winter. His car is stuck in a ditch. He needs a lift back home. Hopefully he gets out by then.

Pool and ice cream. The weather was getting cold today. I decided to take a quick swim in the pool. The water was cold so I jumped in. I got a sunburn but it was tolerable. When I got home I had a nice hot chocolate and ice cream.
Too Old To Trick Or Treat. Tom was only nine years old. He decided to trick or treat with his friends. They got really drunk. Tom's parents saw them. Tom had to stay home from trick or treating.

Tough Test. Maddie is a senior in her high school math class. Maddie has a math test tomorrow and she feels very prepared. Maddie decided she would pull an allnighter and study. When she woke up in the morning she still had trouble getting her mind off it. Maddie was happy she was able to finish her test despite studying so much.

Messy theater. I was in line for my ticket to see the new Star Wars movie last night. When I got to the ticket desk I had trouble opening the box. I had to climb through the window and open it. The theater was already very messy. I finally found a seat and waited in line for three hours.

Between the pages. Ana was very scared. She didn't know what to do. She asked her mother to draw her some imaginary lines. Her mother drew them very neatly, and Anna was very proud. She was so glad she had asked for her own imaginary lines!
Nick Goes to England. Nick loved to play soccer. He always dreamed of playing for England. He decided to give it a shot. Nick made it to the last game for England. Nick celebrated after the game.

Breakfast Noodle. I cooked my own breakfast noodle for the first time. I bought the large pot of rice and a large pot of brown sugar. I tried to follow the instructions, but the noodles were tough. I threw out the uncooked noodles and grabbed the uncooked rice. I cooked some rice, ate, and decided that I should make breakfast more often.

No Self-Service. Tom moved into his new house. It had no kitchen or dining room. He thought he had no need to eat in the kitchen. Tom never put in the microwave. He was never tempted to cook in the kitchen again.
Car Keys. John got up one morning. John went to the car. John opened the door. The keys were in the ignition. John drove to the dealer.

Jake Takes A Test. Jake had been studying for his upcoming exam for a week. It was almost time for the test and Jake was really nervous. Jake took the test and it was very easy for him. Jake found out his test was great and he had passed. Jake went to celebrate with his friends.

Wide Feet. Sally was about to go for a walk. But her feet were so hot that she couldn't stand. She put on her socks and sandals. Then she walked with her feet wide open. She was so happy to have cooler feet!

College. My friend was about to get his first college degree. He moved out on his own and didn't have any kids yet. His wife and kids still live with him. Last week, he decided to go to his friend's house and have a party. It was a good idea, but I doubt he'll go back again.

Summer Reading. My favorite part of the summer was summer reading. I took my time with a book, and I read it slowly. I would read for a whole week straight, without stopping. I was glad to be able to read all of the great books this summer. I am already working towards next year's reading list.

The Lottery Win. I was out shopping for groceries one day. I noticed an ad that mentioned a lottery ticket. I checked the numbers of the ticket I purchased. I scratched off the numbers one by one and won a total of ten bucks. I was so excited to do this because I'd never won before.

Ben starts a food fight. Ben is at the movies. A bunch of kids start picking on Ben and one starts a fight. Ben fights back and leaves the area. The kids start to pick on Ben more. Ben leaves to try to get the fight stopped.
Too Much Rain. It started to rain. My car was still parked. A thunderstorm came. Thunder and lightning. It was too much for the street to handle.

The Drums. John was an engineer. He owned a garage and decided to try to teach himself to play the drums. He bought a kit and took lessons at the local shop. He practiced his drums everyday. John became a great drummer and loved it!
The Basketball Team. The kids were on the basketball team. The team was down by a basket. The players tried hard. They made it within one basket. They won the game!

Salvation Army. Tom was homeless. He found a sign on the street. He walked down and got help from the Salvation Army. They fed him and brought him to his house. Tom was thankful and thanked the Salvation Army.

Rainy steph. Steph decided to take the kids to the park one day. The kids were very excited for the fun day. However, when they got there they found out it was raining. Steph was really sad she had to cancel the fun day. Steph was glad it rained when she got home.
Quitting. Tim didn't like his job. He tried many things to change it. Nothing really worked. One day he quit his job. He was happy.
Missing Cake. I was baking a cake for my sister. I thought I put it in the oven. I opened the oven door. The cake was not in the oven. My sister said that it must have been in the fridge.
Disco Dance. Tom went out with his friends. They played disco music. Tom was dancing with his friends. Someone kicked him in the chest. Tom felt really embarrassed.
The Bunny. A bunny got stuck in a tree. It was stuck there for hours. It was starving. The owner came out. He fed the bunny food.

Mango. Kim wanted to learn how to make mangoes. She purchased a large bucket of mangoes from the store. She also bought some seed packets and seeds to make a soil mixture. She began to gather the items in her house for her project. Her mangoes turned out to be delicious.

Stuck in the mud. It was raining heavily outside. Kelley was on her way to work. She was driving when she got stuck. She had to call her boyfriend to get her out of the ditch. Kelley was really upset.
Gerald. Gerald took an interest in the outdoors. He decided to take a hike in the woods. He saw a bear! He ran very fast after it. It didn't get to him, but he was safe from it.
The Puppy. Tia's parents got her a puppy. Tia played with the puppy all day. She got very attached to her. But one day, she dropped the puppy. Tia cried all day.

Entertainment. The couple ordered pizza for dinner. They sat down to watch the news. The couple listened to the news each night. They enjoyed their time with their favorite show. The couple had a good time watching the news.

Bitter exes. I have a roommate who is my roommate's sister. I was getting a little annoyed with her. She would always be mean to me. One day, she threw me out of her apartment. Now I'm living with a friend.
Pictures. John and I wanted to see a movie. John's girlfriend hates movies. I begged him to let me go see a movie with him. He told me it was a bad idea. I never let him go see a movie again.

Eye Infection. Dan had an eye infection one day. It was very painful and he had to see a doctor. The doctor gave him some medicine. He put it in his eye and told him to sleep. Dan didn't sleep because he was too tired to sleep.
Broken heel. Kelly loved her shoes. Unfortunately they were old. She tried a new pair and found that they were broken. Kelly took them to the shoe store. Thankfully they gave her a new pair.
Driver. A man had a car problem. He decided to hire a driver. He went to the shop for a drive. He had trouble and crashed into a tree. The man decided to stay home and fix his car himself.

The Spider. Maggie saw a big red spider on her desk. She decided to catch it. She wrapped the spider up in a towel and left. When she got home, her mom was mad at her. She had to get rid of the spider because it was poisonous.

Too expensive muffins. Suzy went to the bakery to get some muffins. But when she went inside they were so expensive. So she decided to get them somewhere else. She ended up going to her neighbor. They had muffins on the table for free.

Jeff and his house. Jeff needed a new house. He couldn't decide what he wanted. He found out that his current house was in disrepair. He went to a real estate agent and they offered him a good deal. Jeff loved his new house.

The Sushi Chef. Mark was the best sushi chef in town. He would invite his friends over and give them special specials. One day, Mark's friend came with a new wife. The wife ordered a special sushi bar. She loved it and Mark learned his lesson.

Long Hair. It was summer time and Kelly needed a way to stay cool. So she went shopping. She decided to dye her long, unruly brown hair blonde. She went to the hair salon and asked for a color. The hairdresser gave her a great blonde color and Kelly loved it.

The Amusement Park. Tom went to the amusement park with his family. They rode many different rides. Tom had a lot of fun. He came back with lots of pictures. They showed them to everyone else in town.

Baked apples. The couple had a nice picnic in the park. They bought apples to share. They started out in the park, picking the apples. The apples were very delicious. They ended up making apple pies and sharing.

Sand. Sandy loved to be outside. She loved the beach a lot and was never too far away. When she started to become sick of the beach she began to go to the doctor. The doctor told Sandy that her lungs were in danger. Sandy had to stay at home and not be anywhere near the water.
The teacher at the store. Linda was in line at the store. She was waiting on her mom. When she saw her mom, she was excited. Linda's mom asked if she wanted to go outside. Linda said yes.
Leaky Roof. Tim's roof was leaking. It had been leaking for weeks. The storm had damaged his roof badly. Tim couldn't afford a new roof. He had to fix it himself.

New transportation. I am in the process of purchasing a new car. I am in the process of searching for the perfect car. I have many cars but none that are exactly what I want. After an extensive search, I have found a car that is perfect. I decided to buy this car and I am happy with it.
Exam. Amy was nervous for her test. She decided to do her best on the test. However, she didn't do well. She felt embarrassed. Amy knew she should have studied more.

Dan the candy man. Dan wanted to be a candy man for Halloween. He gathered his friends and they all went to the candy store. They got candy and went home. When they got home they shared candy with each other. Everyone had a great time.

Goldfish. My wife took my goldfish to a pet store for an  entertainment The shop owner said goldfish don't eat He bought goldfish with a large appetite We got him the fish he had for dinner He ate the goldfish so much he got sick and went home

Can't Come In Today. Lucy was supposed to come in to clean the dishes. She sat at the table and began to cry. She was not able to come in. The woman at the table gave her a hug and sent her to her room. Lucy sat down to watch TV with a bottle of wine.

Disastrous Diana. Diana was on the train, ready to go home. She was excited to see her family again after months away. She was excited when they stopped at her favorite bakery. She ordered a bagel with butter and bacon and cheese. However, she began to feel ill the next day.
Fussy Cat. Alicia's cat was fussy. Alicia was afraid of losing the cat. She looked everywhere for the right cat food. She finally gave up. Luckily the cat got used to her and was better.
Boating. Jane bought a new sailboat. She took her friends out for a sailboat ride. They went to the bay and started their engines. They sailed around the lake for an hour. It was a great day!

Fashion. Eve was a fashion designer and wanted to design new clothes. But her clients were all too small and expensive. She decided to start small and sell them locally. She cut her prices so much that her business was doing well. Now her clothes are sold in major boutiques and fashion shows.

Marie. Marie loved to go to concerts. She went to her favorite band's concert. Marie didn't realize she wasn't in the right seat. She fell on the stage and broke her leg. Marie is still in a wheelchair and can't go to concerts.

Popsicle drip. When I was young I really loved playing with popsicles. I would take them everywhere and throw them as far as I could. I was on a field trip at the park when I got one. It was in the back of a plastic bag. I had to throw it out and never played with popsicles again.

Whistling Tea Kettle. It was a stormy night, so Gina's dad went outside to talk. He was in a bad mood, so he was singing in a really loud tone. Gina heard him and ran to tell her mom. She told her mom that it was just a really big storm. When her dad woke up, he decided to take a nice long shower.

Peapod. Today I ordered Peapod delivery from Amazon. The delivery came right to my house with the delivery service. They delivered the food to my door and my husband with. The delivery driver was nice and made sure my dog had food. I thanked the driver and he drove away.

Garrett's Baseball Game. Garrett decided to buy a baseball game. The game he bought was his favorite team's game. The game was sold out on the day of his game. Garrett decided he would go home and wait in line to buy the game. When Garrett got to the store, he bought the game and went home.

Star Quarterback. A star Quarterback was selected for a play at the football game. The play was for the home team. The Quarterback was very good and ran very fast. The coach put him in position to make a play. The Quarterback caught the football and made a great play for the home team.

School Dance. Sue was about to attend her first school dance. She was nervous because she didn't know anyone. She arrived at the dance center and waited to see the kids. After 5 minutes, someone asked Sue to dance. Sue was so happy that she danced all night long.

Body Transformation. Lizzie was very unhappy with her body. She knew she had to make a change. She decided to start eating better. She started dieting and working out daily. The next year she saw her body shrink by almost half.

Charging my phone. I was trying to charge my phone one day. It was at an outlet. All of the sudden, the power cut off. It's really funny how fast things can change. I never thought I would end up in this situation.
Bike Ride. Tory bought a new bike. He went for a ride. The ride went well until he got too full of gas. Tory hit some bumps. He then crashed and hurt himself.

The Nail. It was Tina's birthday. She was wearing an outfit she had gotten for school. Her feet were so hot! Her mom told her to get a new pair of shoes. Tina felt embarrassed that her feet were so hot!

The Whale Problem. Annie took her whale watching trip for the first time. She had never seen so many whales in her life before. She saw them swimming in a huge bowl behind the boat. She ran to tell her husband, but they were too far out of the water! It turned out the whales had drowned.

The Model. Samantha's teacher told her to help the girls draw a model. Samantha didn't have a lot of artistic skill, but she tried hard. She ended up with a very detailed drawing. The teacher loved it so much she gave Samantha a prize. Samantha had the model signed and put it on her wall as a trophy.

That Star. There was a boy who loved to write. He wanted to become a writer. The only problem was that he wasn't very good at writing. One day, the school held a writing contest. The winner of the contest was the best writer in school.
Fairy-tale. The kids were playing outside. They decided to see a fable they liked. They read the whole thing. They enjoyed the stories. Then, they continued to read them all day.
Sick from fajitas. Lance went out to eat. He ordered the fajitas. They were spicy. He took a few bites and immediately threw up. He had to get out of the restaurant.

Excitement. Beth's father had a big surprise for her. She sat up straighter and listened more intently. When he was done, Beth was shaking with anticipation. She was so happy she almost jumped. Beth was happy she could finally go to the museum!
Hot weather. It was a hot day outside. Jim decided to go swimming. He parked his car in the parking lot. He went into the lake. He swam for an hour.

Walden. Nancy needed to learn how to sew. So she went to the local hardware store to look around. But the store was out of fabric. Nancy's neighbor came over to help her. They made a great quilt together.

Visual Genome. Jenna was in charge of the production of VGI files for a website. She had to create a catalog of visual elements from images. Jenna made sure to pick a lot of images. When the site was done, it looked absolutely terrible. She had accidentally made a lot of bad choices.
Diet Soda. Jim did not like to drink diet soda. He drank a lot of soda every day. He realized that it was making him very fat. Jim decided to change his diet. Jim no longer drinks diet soda.

Cactus in the Window. Janet was upset when she noticed her new window was cactus-looking. Her husband thought it was funny, and put stickers on the window. They looked at it more closely. Janet thought the stickers were too bright. Janet's husband took them down for a proper shade.

All work all play. I had to go to the store to get some food. I was in a rush and decided to check out right away. When I was at the store I realized I had forgotten my wallet. I was so upset because I didn't have money for the food. My stomach hurt for weeks.

Gymnastics Flips. Kayla was not very good at gymnastics. She decided to try flipping upside down. She practiced and practiced for many weeks. Finally she was good enough to do flips. She was happy to be able to do them.
Prank calls. Bob wanted to prank call his friend. He made up a scary sounding voice. His friend picked up the phone. He asked for his name and it rang back. His friend wasn't very scary after all.
Prank. Timmy called his mom. She pretended to be sick. Timmy put her in a closet. Then he hid in the closet all night. When he woke up, his mom was in the closet with a huge bowl of candy.

Slow down. Kaya's family was going to dinner at a new place. It was their first time there. The line was already getting really long. She was hoping they'd get seated sooner. But thankfully, they were seated promptly.

The Bus Driver. The bus driver sat behind the bus at every stop. She was very nice, but she was also very old. Every time the bus stopped, she would ask if it was ready. She would smile and wave as she waved. The bus driver always made her feel better.

Duran Duran. A group of us drove to a concert last night. The band was very popular. We decided to sit and have a drink and watch them play. The show lasted about half an hour. It was an alright show but not very good.

Fresh lemonade. Jane and John wanted to have fresh lemonade for a picnic. But it was too expensive to go out and buy it. They tried to make it themselves. They put fresh lemons, sugar, and water in a pitcher. It was delicious and they enjoyed their fresh lemonade.

Marcus Makes a Sandwich. Marcus decides he wants to eat a sandwich. He begins by making a grilled cheese sandwich. He then adds lettuce, tomato, and cheddar to his sandwich. He eats his sandwich with a satisfying smile. Marcus is happy that he can make a sandwich now.

Lost love. Tom was with his girlfriend for awhile. They started to get tired of each other. He tried to find another girl but she didn't want him anymore. She didn't seem to care at all about him anymore. Tom gave up on her and moved on.
Smelly Cat. Jenna found a cat in her bathroom. She tried to bathe the cat. After a few moments, the cat started smelling bad. The smell was coming from Jenna's mom's closet. Jenna was furious.

Start your fight!. Gina had been arguing with her sister for hours. Now it was time for recess. As Gina watched, her sister and cousin began to play. They began throwing punches and yelling at one another. Gina sat and watched the two kids fight for an hour.

Toothpaste. Tommy loved his teeth. He was having dinner and a friend was giving him toothpaste. He told his friend his secret. The next day his toothpaste went missing. Tommy learned that the friend did not give him enough toothpaste.

Talent. She wanted to be a singer. She took many lessons to prepare for audition. She practiced her lines for hours. She went on stage and sang her heart out. The judges loved her voice and gave her the award.

Ingredients. Sally wanted to have a healthy and delicious meal. She went to the store to purchase all of the ingredients. Sally carefully measured all of the ingredients. She found her favorite brand of soup in the cart. Sally was able to enjoy her healthy soup.

Wild Rosebush. I grew my own wild rosebush in my backyard. The rose bush was too big for a pot. I chopped off the top leaves and used the seeds to make a tea. The leaves were so bitter, people thought they were bitter almonds. I gave the rosebush to my friend, who happily ate it.
Swimming. Kendall swam in the pool at the lake. She felt comfortable in her swimsuit. Kendall reached down for her swimsuit. The water was very cold. Kendall felt the water on her toes.

The first kiss. Susanna went to the park with her friends one day. There, she saw a boy she liked. Susanna was sure she had to kiss him. The boy walked over to Susanna and looked at her. Susanna took a step back and smiled.

Melvin's Dog. Melvin's dog ran away from home. He looked all day but he never saw his dog. Finally, he decided to check his neighbor's house. The dog was lying outside in the yard. Melvin was very relieved to find his dog had been found.

Jason's decision. Jason was walking down the street. He was trying to decide if he should buy a new car or not. He wasn't sure which car to buy so he checked reviews. He found one which had good reviews. Jason decided to buy the car.
Stunt. Tom was riding his skateboard. He felt a sudden jerk in his knee. It ended up hurting. Tom had to go to the hospital. Tom had to get a cast put on his knee.
Huge. I went to see the play. When I went in, I was amazed by the scale. The actors had massive roles. I felt like I was in the play. When the play ended, I was so happy.

Lost Car. I had a car that would not start one day. I drove to the auto shop to get it fixed. The mechanic told me that I needed a spark plug. I did a lot of reading and did not buy the spark plug. The mechanic replaced the spark plug and I was able to start my car.

Frozen Ice. Dan and his family were watching an old movie. Dan got so excited that he threw a snowball at his mom. The snowball flew through the air and landed in the street. A car ran into the snowball and was hit by it. The car slid into the street, Dan's mom being injured by the snowball.
Close call. Tom was riding his bike. He went to a stop sign. A car turned onto his street. Tom was hit by the car. He had to be hospitalized.

The Alamo. In 1993 we went to San Antonio for our honeymoon. We took a bus to the Alamo. The history museum was on our tour. We were all so happy to learn about the history of the Alamo. We left the museum the next day and rode buses back home.

How Shelly Broke Her Toe. When I was 12 my foot was injured in a car accident. I had to wear a cast for three weeks. I told my mom that I would never walk again. After three weeks, she gave me a pair of shoes. I was so proud that I wore them to school.

Jelly Shoes. I was wearing some fancy jelly shoes the other day. The music stopped and it was time to put on my clothes. I went to the dressing room and tried to get the music going again. It just kept going and it was a headache to deal with. I ended up walking in the house to find the other shoes in my room.

Astronaut. David is an astronaut. He goes to space to explore the universe. He spends his time in space studying the laws of the universe. David eventually gets sick but survives. David is named astronaut for the upcoming space station.

The Move. The Smith family lived in a city apartment. The Smiths wanted to live closer to their jobs. They decided to make a move. They packed up all their belongings and moved to Chicago. The move was a success.

A Kingdom Betrayal. Alfred, the younger of two brothers, was always mean. He would tease his older brother Ben for no reason. But then Ben started to bully Alfred. Ben got so fed up with Alfred's antics, he got rid of him. But Alfred and Ben are now fighting again, this time with knives.

Breakfast. It was a Friday night. The Smith's decided to cook breakfast. They grabbed the ingredients and went to the store. They bought everything they needed for pancakes. They made pancakes for dinner that night.

Biggest Fan. Tim always wanted to be a big fan of a certain band. He decided to get tickets to their concert. The day before the concert he couldn't find any tickets. He finally found enough for the show. He went to the concert with his friends and had a great time.
Stretching. The man stretched out a blanket. He did not use enough stretch. The blanket did not expand. He tried several stretches. The blanket remained flat.
How I sprained my ankle. My dog ran into the backyard. She jumped into the backyard pool. She got out of the pool. She went inside to lie down. Then she slipped and twisted her ankle.
Gym. Joe hated going to the gym. His parents told him it was boring. They tried to make him go once. Joe refused to go. His parents then had to go to the gym after all.

Stolen Jewelry. A man got in trouble at work. He brought some expensive jewelry to work that day. Someone else's jealous coworker saw the jewelry and told. The coworker stole it. The man's boss called the coworker to let him know.

Michael's Collection. Michael collected rocks. Michael's friends always told him that he was collecting rocks. One day he decided to start a rock collection in his car. He took it to his local car repair shop to be measured. After the measurements, Michael decided to put in a small display.

Two Fans and Their Favorite Show. Two fans were going to the same baseball game. One of the fans couldn't see the other. He kept asking the bartender for tickets. Eventually, he got enough tickets. His team won the game.

Racing Cars. Jane wanted to build a race car. She decided to go to the store to buy parts. She bought the cheapest she could find and went home. Once home she got the parts together and began to work on her car. She was very happy with her finished race car.
Fishing. Bob liked fishing. He didn't own any. Bob found a pond behind his house. Bob fished all day. Bob caught a large fish.

Paint Cover Up. Tara always had long blonde hair and went to a salon for it. One day she thought it would be nice to have a cover over it. When she got there though, the hair was covered in dark red paint. She was so disappointed, she could hardly see anything! Finally after much protest, the hair was washed off and red paint removed.

Kitten Friends. Dottie had never had a cat before. One day, she found a stray one on the street. She took him home and he grew up to be the best friend of her life. They both got married, had kids and then left the other one behind. Dottie and the stray cat were best friends for ten years.

Cross country. My friends invited me to a cross country race. I did not train for the race and did not want to train. The day of the race, I was very sick. I did not race the entire day. My friends still encouraged me to try.
Great birthday. Suzy has a birthday coming up. She just can't wait to get it over with. Her friends are all celebrating. But her mom had been procrastinating. Finally Suzy gets her birthday.

Josh. Josh was a young boy who liked to play with trucks. When Josh was little, a family friend bought him a toy truck. Josh liked the truck so much, he started driving it everywhere. Soon Josh was very good at driving the truck! He made great money and now owns a nice car.

Drive-thru. Jane loved the taste of her coffee and wanted to try a new brand. She was in the market for a drive-thru. Jane called a few shops and found the one she wanted. The next day she waited in line at the drive-thru. Jane got her coffee and her favorite flavor.

Best Trip Ever. I took my girlfriend on a trip to the city last month. We visited the old church on our block, and saw a new church being built. We took a cab to get from the old church, and the new church was great. We even got to sit inside a church building in the old building. She said it was the best trip ever.

Lovers and Flowers. Anna had a crush on a boy in class named Mark. She had bought him a pair of red and purple flowers. Mark took Anna's flowers and kissed her. Anna's face started to turn red. Anna decided not to kiss Mark after that.

Steve's Award. Steve really enjoyed his job at his office. One day, he was asked to do a paper clipping. He wrote the winning line on a card. Steve won the paper clipping award from his boss. He was very pleased with the recognition.

No Biting Please. Sasha was in the middle of a visit with her grandparents. She noticed her aunt was getting fed by a baby frog. Suddenly, a huge angry looking man walked over to her. The man told her to go away or else she would be sorry. Sasha tried to say that she wasn't, but her aunt made her.

Calling In Sick. Larry was having a lot of fun with his friends at the beach. He decided to call in sick the next day. He went to the beach on Tuesday and was disappointed with his friends. His friends went out for lunch instead. Larry missed his friends at the beach and was very sad.

The Surprise in the Creek. Tom was walking through the creek. He was soaking wet from the day's rain. He noticed a duck peeking out from under the water. He walked up to the duck. He took it in and fed it some bread.

Fell in the lake. Tim was at the lake with friends. He took out his fishing rod. Then he cast in the lake. After a few minutes Tim realized he was not far from shore. Tim jumped into the water and swam to shore.

For Victory. Tom had been playing football his whole life. He wanted to play professionally. He applied and got his number of try outs. When he got to tryouts he did very well. The coach was very happy for him.

New Horizons. Nina had been given a stray cat by her parents. She found it under the street one evening. She took the cat home with her. Her parents let her keep the cat. Now Nina and her cat are best friends.

Instant Exit. I took a few seconds to answer when the bell rang. However, the door suddenly slammed shut. My best friend was nowhere around. He left after school before I could ask him. I was upset he didn't say anything during the ride home.
Bad haircut. Lucy needed a new hairstyle. She went to the barber. He did not have a style she liked. He did a bad job. Lucy never wanted to go back.

Old Prison. The inmates at the old prison were very mean. No one liked to go there because of their cruelty. A new prison was being built nearby. They were happy to be living close to the old prison. The inmates were less cruel when it was built.

Vegetable Garden. Lucy's grandmother was a vegetarian. Her grandpa wanted her to join him in his garden. Lucy had never been to a farm and didn't know what she would eat. She started eating veggies when grandma wasn't looking. She liked the veggies and her grandpa was happy.

The Cracked Cup. Jana was drinking a hot chocolate cup. Her cup slipped off and cracked open. The coffee spilled everywhere. Jana had to clean up all of the coffee. Jana wished that she had bought a new cup.

Big Money. Tom got a raise at work. Tom really enjoyed the raise. The people at work also really liked it. Tom had no desire to go home for the holidays. He spent most of the year partying away from home.

Pet a Fish. My husband and I had to take our fish home from the pond. We loaded the fish up in the boat and drove to a nearby pond. We put the fish in the pond and took it home. We named the fish Spot and named it Spot the cat. Spot the cat and Spot the fish lived happily ever after.
Cookies. My mom baked some cookies. She forgot to put butter in them. It took longer than she expected. She was annoyed because the cookies were burnt. I said I would be mad if it happened again.

The Freezer. Manny liked eating frozen pizzas. The freezer kept him from getting fat. One day he couldn't get his freezer to work. He called the warranty support line. They told him to unplug everything.

Ooh That Smell. Bob took a shower. He smelled something burning in there. He went to investigate and found it was his roommate's sheets. He tried to wash them, but the smell was too strong. So Bob cleaned them up and let them air dry.

Hair. My boyfriend loves my hair. He calls it his 'dusting me'. I would look at my hair all day without being ashamed. Then one day he gave me some terrible hair advice. My boyfriend made it up to me by saying he would stop picking on me.
Louvre. I was a little girl when I went to school. We went to the Louvre. I really wanted to see the Mona Lisa. I wanted to see it with my dad. He took me to the museum with him.

Wedding Video. My friend told me she was going to give her friend a wedding video. She was going to post it on facebook and send it to all her friends. I offered to watch and edit the video myself. It took a while, but I was able to turn it into a decent movie. She loved it and thanked me in the end.

The Pet Trial. The lawyer was getting ready for a pet trial. He wanted to win so badly he began to cheat. The judge was very angry and told him to stop. The judge threatened him with legal consequences if he didn't stop. The lawyer stopped cheating so that he could go to the pet trial.
Marco Jumps Rope. Marco was at a pool party. He decided he would try to swim. Marco began to jump rope. He was having a lot of fun. Marco jumped rope all day and was happy.

Early Dismissal. Bill had been working at the bar for two years. He was always the best bartender there. One night a newbie came in and made a fool of Bill. It cost Bill all his money but he didn't quit. Bill eventually got a better job and was happier.

New friends. I was nervous to meet my new friends at school. They came from all over the country to play. I got to sit with them for a minute. They were my best friends that day. Now I have a new friend at school that I can't wait to meet.

Linda starts a garden. Linda had always loved vegetables. She went to the garden center. She bought all the vegetables she needed. Linda planted the vegetables. She was happy to be able to grow vegetables in her garden.

Lost Tools. Tim was working on an old boat. Tim got carried away and forgot to bring his tools. He was forced to call someone. Tim had to get in touch with someone to bring his tools. Tim made the boat and went back out to sea.

The steak. John was a poor boy from the neighborhood. He wanted to impress his friends. John saw a steak on the menu and decided to eat it. John was too poor to buy the steak at the restaurant. John stole the steak from the restaurant and ate it.

Erik's First Kiss. Erik has always been shy around girls. One day at school he meets a girl and he falls in love. He asks her out on a date and they spend the entire weekend together. At the end of the week he asks her to marry him. She is so happy for him and they marry each other.

Round Food. I was hungry and ready for a snack. So I decided to go to the food court. I went to the food court and got a delicious bagel. I ate the bagel. Afterwards, I felt full and ready to go home.
Envious. Mia was jealous that her sister got a new car. She asked her mom for the car. Her mom gave it to her. Mia was envious. She was not allowed to have anything her mom bought her.
The Scientists. The scientists gathered in the field. They gathered data on a frog. They put it in a tank. They watched it eat. They found the frog's genetic code.

Going Blind. Dan had never seen a roller coaster before. He decided to take his daughter to a park near one. When they got to the park, Dan went in the roller coaster. Dan got a good glimpse of the roller coaster, and it was terrifying. Dan told his daughter never to go in roller coasters.

dinner in the woods. Barry and Janie were on a camping trip. Barry was having trouble sleeping in the car. He decided to bring his own food for dinner. While packing, he noticed a small squirrel. Barry decided to bring some crackers for dinner instead.

Cancer. Tom's cancer had been around for Years. It had been hard to get treatment for. Tom was so depressed he couldn't enjoy anything. He had to stop eating his favorite foods. Tom lost the use of his hands.

Good Job, Little Buddy. Today I made a cake for my little cousin. He has the same birthday as me, and I wanted to make him a birthday cake. I baked him a chocolate cake, with some raspberry jam and whipped cream. I even added a sprinkling of sprinkles, to make it look special. When he tasted the cake, he told me it was a good job, little buddy.

Water Damage. I took my car into the shop. The mechanic checked the engine and said the battery needs to be replaced. He told me it will cost me a lot of money. I told him I would pay for it. It was a lot of money and he was very frustrated.

Fish Tank Maintenance. The fish tank in my fish tank has been empty for days. The water in the tank is too dirty. I called a professional plumber to come out. He came out and started working on my fish tank. He ended up fixing a number of bugs in the tank.
Joey. I was sitting on the bench today. Joey was looking up at me. I was shocked. He asked why I wasn't sitting with him. Joey had found out I had a crush on his wife!
Keys. Tim had to go buy new keys. His keys were falling apart. He decided to go with an inexpensive company. The keys didn't last very long. Tim decided to stick with cheap keys.
Cat kisses. Alicia went cat sitting with her friends. She decided to have fun by petting them. She decided to kiss a cat. She kissed it and it bit her. Alicia got scared and left the cat sitting.
Baby Bird. Our friend's daughter's son is two. She bought him a baby bird. The bird had holes in it's wing. The parents said he couldn't have it. She was very nice to him.
starfish. Ava was swimming at the beach. She saw something on the side of the water. Ava thought it was a starfish. She decided to take a closer look. But when she got closer, it was a dolphin!

Long Distance. Sam and his girlfriend were going on a long distance date. They rented a nice car and drove to a fancy restaurant. At the restaurant they met with some old friends. After dinner they met up at the back of the restaurant. They had an amazing time together.

Friends. Ava was starting a new school and was having trouble making new friends. Her mom had a few friends over for dinner one night. Then she had a friend named Jane drop in. They went on a walk around the block together. After that, they made several new friends.
The Baby. Lacy's son was in a car accident. He was left in the hospital. Lacy went to visit him. She brought a blanket home to him. Her son was happy.
Let It Go. Kate and her friends were on the subway. A woman wanted to talk on the phone. But the girls ignored her. She tried to get back to her friends. But they remained oblivious.

John's Idea. John is tired of his computer constantly shutting down. He calls up the repairman to find out how he can fix it. The repairman tells John that the battery needs to be replaced. John brings his laptop to the repairman to replace the battery. Now John can play Minecraft on his computer again.

Saving For The Future. Sandra loved looking at old pictures in her attic. She often thought about the good times she had as a child. After moving, Sandra was amazed at how beautiful her attic was. She looked at it and saw her old memories of growing up. Now that she's grown and moved away, Sandra loves to go back and look at her attic.

The game payment. I signed up for a $25 game on a site called G2C. The site promised to send me the money in 6 months. I waited for 2 months and did nothing. I sent the money and waited again. The site didn't send it.

Peanuts. One day, my mom took my brother to a flea market. He wanted to buy some candy. I wasn't allowed to touch flea markets, but he insisted on getting peanuts. He took some peanuts and ate them for dinner. The candy was terrible!

Treatment. Barry was depressed after his wife left him. Barry went to see a psychologist. The psychologist talked to Barry for several hours. Barry was thankful for the therapy. He learned that his wife was right, and that he loved her more.

A Break. Nia was tired of working long days at work. She decided to take a little vacation. She packed her bag and went on a trip to Europe. She enjoyed her trip so much, she started to miss her old job. Luckily, the vacation was short and Nia returned to work soon.

Monster Truck Show. My cousin brought me to the monster truck show. There were many different trucks in the show. I was excited to see them drive. I waited in line for about an hour to get inside. Finally I got to ride with them in the truck.

lost boy. I used to walk home from school by myself. One day, I looked outside and saw a boy crying. I went over to him and held him tight. I made him feel better and reassured him he was ok. He thanked me and walked home.

The awful truth. Brett loved to play Pokemon Go. He would spend an hour or two a day. But he never did get enough candies. So he decided to buy the same amount in bulk. He ended up with a ton of candies and was happy.

The meal. Beth and Tim are having a baby. They are really hoping to have a healthy baby. They tried all sorts of foods. The meal they were trying to find was a perfect fit. They decided to order that meal and were very happy.

Babysitter. Joe's mom was going out of town. So Joe had to babysit his younger sister and brother. Joe's little sister was mean to Joe. Joe was mean to his little brother too. Joe's little sister decided to be nicer.

Amber's Weekend. Amber was feeling really stressed this weekend. She stayed up all night working on her computer. In the morning she was exhausted and had slept all day. She decided to take a short walk to relieve her stress. She felt a little better when she got home and relaxed.

Return Policy. Bob's car broke down after work one day. Bob took it to a mechanic to have it fixed. He told the mechanic the car was totaled. Bob was very upset with the mechanic. He never paid the mechanic a penny.
Dancing. Kate was bored on a trip. She wanted to get some entertainment. Her friends suggested she go dancing with them. She agreed and then danced a few songs. Afterwards she went home.
Refusal. The man refused to answer. The man told the clerk to call his boss. The clerk called his boss. The boss told him to come inside. The man came in and talked to the boss.
The Bank Job. Lisa needed a job. She applied for a job at the bank. She worked very hard. Finally she got a job at the bank. She was very proud of herself.
Christmas Tree. The Smiths loved the Christmas tree. They bought a huge one. They got to work decorating it. Then they put it outside. It was so perfect they bought another one!

Ceramics Class. I wanted to learn to do fine art, so I enrolled in a ceramics class. I went into it with a blank stare. My teacher introduced herself and we started working together. I improved at my art work so I decided to take a ceramics certificate. Now I can sell them online for extra money.

Missed Bus. Karen drove home from work and missed the bus. She decided to walk to work instead. She got lost on the way home. She finally found the bus. Karen was relieved to make it home after walking to work.

Baseball game. Toby was playing baseball with his friends. They were playing at a baseball diamond. They were playing against the rival team. The game was tied up. Toby hit a double and won the game for his team.

Senator. Bob was running for class president. He was very passionate about his political beliefs. He spent many hours and months organizing his campaign. He didn't think anyone would vote for him. However, after election day, all of his classmates voted for him.
Always late. It was the last day of school. Allie needed to go to school early. So she went over to her friend's house. Unfortunately her friend never showed up. She was extremely late.

Death. Gina's brother had killed his friend. She was worried he was in trouble. She had a question for him. She needed to know if he was okay. But it didn't matter anymore, as he had already confessed.

Trouble Cats. Joe has always wanted to get his mother a cat. His friends say it is a bad idea. His mom says she's not crazy. Joe gets a job at the animal shelter to take care of stray cats. Joe eventually gets his mom a cat after 20 years.
Crying. My friend and I were arguing. We started cursing at each other. We went inside the house and turned off the TV. We got some ice and tried to calm down. I apologized when he offered to help.

Cautious Taxi. Dylan was late for a meeting. He had a strict schedule. When he arrived, he noticed a taxi stuck in the traffic. The driver tried to drive away, but the car wouldn't move. Dylan had to call a taxi company to get out of the traffic.

The Van. We were looking for something to do. We drove down the road. A van pulled up and it was so beautiful! We parked the van and looked at the interior. The interior was very clean and the van looked new.

Gold digger. I really liked looking for buried treasure. But it was very expensive to dig. So I decided to go to the treasure yard instead. And I found a lot of gold and silver. And I made a lot of money by selling it.
Parasailing. Doris went parasailing in California. She rented a boat with a captain and a guide. The boat was slow and dreary. She went over cliffs and crevasses. Doris returned home a hero.
Hockey Fight. Tom went to a hockey game. There was a big fight going on. Tom wasn't sure who to cheer for. Everyone was cheering for the other team. Tom joined in.
Snow Storm. Cindy got stuck in the snow. Her car began to slide. The snow began to pour on her as she tried to drive. She could not make it to the carpool. Cindy's family was stranded.
Expert Boxer. Tom was a great boxer. He challenged the top fighter in his town to a rematch. Tom won easily. The new champ felt betrayed and never spoke to Tom again. Tom was never a boxer again.
Book. Joey needed a new book. He asked his friend for a recommendation. His friend gave him a book. Joey read the book. Joey liked it.

Hound Control. Jim decided he wanted to become a dog-walker. He took his dog to the local pound. He was nervous that the dog would get out of control. The owner was very nice. Jim was able to control the dog and get him to behave.
Loud Party. Tom had a party with friends. They were dancing a bit too loud. His friends wanted to cut them off. Tom told them it was too late. They started to complain about it in private.

The First Pay. Cathy was getting a pay raise at work. The first few months she was getting paid fairly. But now she was getting paid much less than her previous rate. Cathy went to her manager and demanded her pay raise. Her manager agreed and Cathy made a lot more.

Free Samples. Sam's favorite food was pizza. But he didn't have much money. Sam decided to volunteer some pizza for kids. The kids were happy and thanked Sam profusely. They were thankful for all of the food that Sam gave them.

Fun day at the Carnival. Today is the day the town has had carnival rides since I was a kid. My husband and I wanted to go on one more so we drove to the carnival. We spent three hours going from ride to ride and had a ton of fun. When we finally got home we were exhausted. It was a fun carnival day and I will go back tomorrow.

Drinking. Beth wanted to stop drinking. She decided to start by not drinking coffee. Then she made a new daily ritual. Beth stopped going out after 9 PM. Beth started going to a coffee shop by 10 PM instead.

STAR TESTING. The rocket was to be launched from Kennedy Space Center in Florida. At the pad, the astronaut watched the countdown over the loudspeaker. Then, the countdown continued to "one" as the countdown clock struck zero. The countdown ended as the countdown clock hit "zero" in the quiet of the night. The countdown began once again as the countdown passed zero.

Friend. Tom was always afraid of snakes. One day he decided to face his fears and face his fears. Tom went to a reptile farm and was bitten by a large baby skink. Tom learned that snakes were actually not scary at all. Tom never went back to the reptile farm.

Dead end job. Tim was out in the desert working on his car. He decided to look for work. He started a fire and tried to keep it going. He started a camp and hired all the people. Now Tim is the boss and pays for everything.

Movies. Tom was a terrible movie buff. He was very passionate about it. He watched many movies that were great and made him want to see more. He watched all sorts of movies on demand. Tom wound up becoming a great movie buff after a year.

Pool Party. My friends and I had a pool party in our condo on Valentine's Day. Everyone brought a dish and a towel. We sat on a hot tub and played volleyball. Everyone else brought gifts. We made dinner and ate at a local restaurant.

Try It Now. I tried to quit smoking five Years ago. However, I didn't have many friends. I wasn't able to quit for several months. One day, I ran into a friend. She encouraged me to keep trying and asked me if I'd like to.
Misery. Jane was in a bad car accident. The car left a lot of damage. She had to learn how to fix it. She went to the store to get help. She got a loan for her troubles.

Valentine's Surprise. My friend and I went out to dinner to celebrate Valentine's Day. We each ordered a bottle of wine. Her boyfriend surprised us with a free trip to the aquarium. After dinner we played with the marine life at the aquarium. I was so excited I spilled my wine on my suit.
Lost Girl. Kate was walking home. She noticed her front window was open. She called a lost girl. They took her home. They took her phone number.

Vivian Cuts her Hair. Vivian was a big fan of fashion magazines. She particularly enjoyed photos of super-heroes. One day, she decided to cut all of her hair off. She went to the salon, and asked for a trim. Afterwards, she went out for a stylish new look.
Bar. Alicia went to a bar with her friends. The bartender was nice and funny. The bartender wanted her to come over. Alicia got nervous and turned her nose up. She left without the bartender.

Facebook Drama. Sarah was upset over a recent breakup with her boyfriend. He had been on Facebook with a lot of mean comments about her. She decided to block him from her account. She called her sister to ask if he had blocked her as well. Her sister said he had.

Steak Sandwich. I wanted to make a steak sandwich. I made one that had provolone cheese and a ham. It was very tasty! However, it was a little too tough for me. So I made one that had provolone on the inside.

Goog. Dan loved to do research. Dan would use google to find information about his project. One day, Dan's google account was suspended. Dan couldn't use google. Dan switched browsers and was able to use google again.

calming nerves. I had to go out and get my girlfriend ice cream. I put on my favorite sweater and went outside. I didn't look at the weather but it was hot. My face started to sweat. I ran back inside and took the ice cream.

Lucretia Packs A Lunch. Lucretia decides she needs to pack some lunch for the trip. She walks to her favorite local sandwich shop. When she gets there, she decides to get a sandwich with a large cheese. She also buys a large drink. Lucretia feels ready to go on her trip.

Turning Point. Bill had worked hard at his job for years. He never really enjoyed working in a factory. One day, he decided to quit. When he quit, many of his coworkers wanted to give him a hard time. Bill didn't care and moved back home.

UUA. The United States government declared a state of emergency in December. The state of emergency was to help drought stricken areas. The Department of Agriculture issued an emergency food program. The State of emergency was lifted in January. The government still has many food and water shortages.

Ants. I went camping with my son. When we arrived, we went to sleep. When we woke up, we saw ants everywhere. We sprayed ant traps and waited for them to move on. Soon, we had moved them back to where they belonged.

Reverse Psychology. Johns family always argued over chores. He was not the least of the arguments. His sister would always say she had more chores than him. John did not let this bother him. John finally confronted his sister about this and they had a fight.

You'd Think They'd Require a Commercial License. The man took the long drive to his new home. The parking lot had no curb space for the truck. He had to find a place for the truck. When he finally found it the man was dismayed. The parking space had been taken by a horse.
Tyler gets hacked. Tyler is playing a game online. He is playing the game a lot. His computer is getting slow. He gets an alert on his screen. He is having his computer hacked.

Financial Issues. John had an issue with his credit score. He decided to make a budget. John made a budget with all his expenses. After making a budget, John realized it didn't match reality. John decided he would stop using his credit score altogether.

Hide and Seek. Jane was playing hide and seek with her sister. She was hiding under a bed but couldn't find her sister. She looked everywhere for her sister. After an hour she found her sister. Jane and her sister had a great time playing hide and seek.
Fault. The house caught on fire. Tom and his family were trapped inside. Tom tried to call 911. They didn't answer. Tom felt guilty for being afraid.
Torn Jeans. Tim was out running in the snow. He stopped to warm up. He noticed his jeans had a hole in the bottom. Tim pulled them all up. He was going to get them fixed but it was too late.

Horror Movies. Tom was watching a horror movie at home. He didn't realize there were so many different kinds. He kept turning up the volume and listening. Finally he started getting scared. Tom wound up having nightmares for months after.

Stray Cat. When I was little, I had a cat. I used to bring her home with me when I went to school. I always told her to be careful of where she went. One day, we were playing in a field. My cat found an apple on the ground and bit it.

No Vacation. Lucy was too stressed to go on a vacation. Her dad said the kids would have a great time if they did. Lucy and her siblings got ready for the trip. It was their first vacation. Lucy and her siblings had a great time on their first trip!

Cherry Pie. Anna was having a pie for her family's anniversary. She had picked the best cherries she could find. She wanted them to taste like the real thing. Unfortunately, she found none at all! Luckily, her family was pleasantly surprised to receive a delicious pie!

Follower. Sam liked to dress up and party. Sam's friend encouraged him to get a costume. Sam found a cute dress at a yard sale. Sam was excited to see it in person. The dress fit perfectly and Sam got lots of compliments.

Zoe Speaks. Zoe was really nervous about attending her first speech class. She had never been very good at public speaking. She hoped she could get the teacher's attention so she could practice. She practiced her speech as much as she could. Zoe gave a wonderful speech to the class.
Baby. The man dropped his baby on the ground. The baby crawled away slowly. The man called a tow truck for help. The tow truck took the baby to a car. The man drove the baby home.
The Lake. When I was little I loved the lake. I would play in it everyday. I also went fishing every year. I had a lot of fun and I will always remember that lake. I miss it when I go fishing now.
Porch Swing. We all got ready for church. We were in the basement when I decided to play a game. I rolled a ball and the ball flew up a chute. I got to swing on the porch swing. It was a fun game.
first beer. Rory wanted to try something new. She went to the local brewery. She was a bit intimidated but she did her best. She loved the way it tasted. Rory immediately wanted to return.

The Box. The family packed their car. They were going to visit relatives for the weekend. They were hoping to pick up snacks for their trip. As they packed the car, they found an old box. Inside the box was tons of chocolate and cookies!

Losing Streak. Tom bought a new video game with new characters. He played it for many hours. When he got tired, he threw it on the ground. It broke and Tom had to buy a new one. It was only available online.

Sad On Easter. I bought a few Easter Eggs for my friends. I hid them in the Easter basket so they would not be upset. When we woke up, the Easter basket was empty. They were sad that Easter was over. I decided to hide a few more Easter Eggs.

Football Fever. Sam's favorite sport was football. Every time he was at the stadium he would watch the game. He even tried to make it onto his team. Unfortunately he wasn't very good at it. Sam ended up just watching it every day.

Flowers. Kate and her sister decided to get flowers for their mom. The two girls spent all Saturday making the arrangements. They arrived at the house at six in the morning. Their mom opened the door smiling and holding flowers. Kate and her sister were relieved that she had sent them.

Fast and too Furious. We bought tickets to a new action movie that opened on Friday. The film was rated R. We could not wait to see the action movie. We got ready to leave the theater. After leaving, the ticket taker gave us our tickets for free.

Not Tired. Kane took the elevator to the top floor. She sat down on the bench that was nearby. The other people in the elevator were tired. One person jumped from the elevator. Kane was glad that the other people were not tired.

red dress. I decided to wear red for a wedding. But I didn't have any red dress to wear. So I went to the mall to find some. I found some great looking red dresses. So I was happy when I wore my beautiful red dress to the wedding.
Stale Cereal. Jim made a hot dog for lunch. He then remembered that he forgot some mustard. Jim decided to get some mustard. He got some mustard. He then ate the hot dog.

Cookie Sale. I saw that the local bakery was having a cookie sale. I decided to buy one cookie, and bring it to the bakery. After waiting in line for thirty minutes, I finally got a cookie. The cookie was so good that I decided to buy three more. When I returned to the bakery, I realized I had bought way more than I needed.

New Show. Lars was excited about a new show he's going to be watching. He invited all of his friends and made plans to go. On the day of the show he was still unsure. He was upset until the show started and he actually liked it. Lars went on to talk about his experience with the show.
Workout. I went to the gym. I saw a girl there. She had a great body. I noticed she also had a great attitude. So I asked her out on a date.

Valentine's Brownies. Kara had a lot of brownies to make for Valentines. She was making them for her boyfriend. She had forgotten about the cookies in the fridge. When she was done, she put the brownies into the oven. They baked until the brownies were golden brown.

A Dozen Roses. Jane's dad had always been a bachelor. He always asked Jane out to dinner every time she went out. Jane finally told her father that she was in love with a man. Jane's father was mad, but he said he'd get over it. That night Jane was very surprised to see him propose!

Expected Delivery. A large delivery truck appeared in the driveway. The driver opened the driver's side door and got out. He walked to the customer and greeted him. The customer handed him his order. The driver drove away and the customer left.

Driving Lessons. Tom had to learn how to drive. He looked up places that would teach. He got a few job offers to take driving lessons. He accepted one of them. He worked very hard and got his driving license.

Pokemon. We were in the park when a young boy named Rob saw a rare pokemon. We were so happy that it was a rare pokemon! But the boy had to wait until we were home before he could catch it. As we walked home the boy said it was just a boy toy. We all laughed at the boy who was not happy with his gift.

Peanuts. My dog had a peanut allergy. I had to give him peanut butter and water. I thought it would be very funny if he ate his treats. It made him lick his lips! He ate two of the treats and started licking his lips!
Lunch. Sheila didn't have money to eat lunch today. She went to a burger place on her own. She ordered the burger with pickles. She ate the burger with pickles. Sheila felt satisfied.

Moving Day. The moving truck stopped by my house at 9 am. I got out and looked around to see if there were any moving boxes. It was all empty and there were only boxes. I asked my wife to pack a couple boxes. She did.

Cheer. Kara wanted to cheer for her team. But her cheer coach didn't allow cheerleading in the gym. Kara practiced cheer every night until the first cheer competition. On the day of the competition, Kara sang her heart out. Her team loved Kara's cheers!

Bay. Ana was in Spain. She went to an authentic seafood restaurant. She tried all the fish and meat she'd heard about. Ana hated the way she felt when she finished her meal. She decided that seafood was not for her.

The Brother. Timmy was born with a big brother. Timmy hated his brother a lot. One day, Timmy tried to hit his big brother with a ball. His big brother got a huge bruise on his head. Timmy now does not hit his big brother with anything.

Too short. Julia went to the store. She wanted to buy a scarf. When she got to the cashier she realized she was out. She walked into the back and asked for help. The clerk gave her a different scarf for her.

Sam Catches a Fish. Sam saw a huge catfish on the beach. He decided to catch it. He grabbed a stick and lifted it high into the air. Sam lifted the catfish into his bucket. Sam took it home and gave it to his mother.

street ball. John was playing in his local street ball league. John's team was losing by three points. John begged for a game winning shot. John's team refused to make a shot. John was so upset, he stormed out of the field.

Music Software. Sally was a music producer. She was having some trouble finding a suitable program. She decided to search on the internet for a program. She discovered one that was quite suitable. Sally installed the program and made great progress.

The list. John and his friend went shopping. His friend picked out a few items and John picked another. At home, he searched all the items but didn't find any. Finally, he decided to give up and go home. He decided to buy the things he had in his back pocket anyway.

Desktop Christmas Trees. The Smiths live in Colorado. They have not had a Christmas tree in years. They decided to buy a small one from a company. After picking out a large tree they put it in a window. That's how they have their Christmas tree every year.

Garrett's Basketball Journey. Garrett wants to play basketball professionally. He visits several NBA teams to try out for the team. After three tries, Garrett is not making the cut. He continues to train and work hard to get back into the team. Garrett finally makes the team!

Family dinner. When it's time to go to the family dinner my wife and I always pick the same family. One year it turned out the same family picked. I got really mad at them and wanted to yell at them. So I stayed in and ordered some pizza. They didn't even know.

River Bank. Joe wanted to run a race down the river. He gathered his friends to go for a long time. They set off in Joe's boat. As they got near the river, Joe realized he was lost. He found the river bank and everyone was ok.

Knife Safety. Samantha wanted to cut vegetables. She did not know how to use a sharp knife properly. Her mom offered to show her how to do it right. Samantha picked out some vegetables and showed her mom. Now Samantha can cut vegetables easily.

The Rally. Today was a very important day for the local political campaign. Gary had a very important rally scheduled with his friends and supporters. Gary's rally was held in a barn and many people came. Afterwards, Gary was given a standing ovation. Gary was proud of his rally.

Too Big. Mia was trying to dress her baby. He was too big for his diaper. Mia didn't have any money for more diapers. She decided to get a job at the store. After her first week, Mia saved up enough money for diapers.

The Olives. Abbey was cooking at home. She decided to make some homemade olives. She put them in a pan and cooked them for about twenty minutes. When they were finished, she took them out of the oven. The olives were delicious!

Santa. I loved Christmas. So I decided to put a Christmas Tree in my living room. But I was very indecisive about what tree to put. Finally, I decided to buy my son a Santa doll. He loved it and now we have a better relationship.

The camping trip. One of the kids wanted to take his friend camping. They packed up a tent and sleeping bags. Then they packed all their food into a small vehicle. They drove all the way to the site and set up camp. They had a great time camping and building a fire.
Bad food. Last night I ate food at an Italian restaurant. It was really good. Unfortunately I was not Italian. They forgot some of the items. I never wanted to eat there again.

Too Old To Go. Kate and her friends were walking to school. Kate wanted to go to the library, but her mother was too old. Kate suggested they go somewhere else. Kate and her friends made the mistake of going to the library. It was too late to go, and the girls had to go back home.

Fried Chicken. John made fried chicken. The chicken was a delicious success. The family was looking forward to dinner. The chicken came out of the oven very burnt. John decided to make sure his chicken was extra crispy.
Steve and His Cats. Steve adopted a cat from the pound. His cat got sick with fleas. Steve got rid of the cat. Steve decided to keep the cat. Steve still adopted a cat from the pound.
Retirement fund. Ed wanted to be wealthy. He wanted to start his own retirement fund. He began investing in his own money. He did well for himself and his family. He had no trouble meeting his goal.

Trash in the Closet. Janice went to the closet and found a box of junk. She threw the junk away in her room. When she came out the next morning, she was sad. Janice noticed her brother was crying and had a bad mood. Janice explained the reason for her behavior, and her brother felt better.

The Lollipop. Maryann bought a new lollipop for her daughter. It was pink with purple stripes. The only problem was that it fell apart after she dropped it. Maryann tried to take it out of the trash but it was too late. She had to clean it up by hand.
afloat. Rey had a really bad cold. So he slept in an out of bed. He awoke to find himself outside. It was really cold. And Rey couldn't fall back asleep.

Home Run. Joey was playing baseball. His dad hit a homerun into the bleachers. The ball hit Joey's head in the game. Joey was out cold and his mother drove him home. Joey rested in his room all night.

Bend To My Metal Will. Charles broke up with his girlfriend in May. He had not spoken to her in two years. One day, he heard his favorite song on the radio. He felt like yelling at her. But he stopped himself and turned up the radio instead.

Taco Tuesday. Sue always went out with her friends for taco Tuesday. She got the best burrito on the menu and never complained. One day she brought a burrito home and it was burned. Sue's burrito was covered in ash so the whole house smelled of burnt. Sue will be bringing a new burrito from now on.
Dishes. I got tired of the dishes in my kitchen. I needed a new set of dishes. I went to a kitchen supply store. I bought four new dishes. My kitchen looks much nicer with the new dishes in it.
Delivering the baby. John was having a baby. John was in the middle of the delivery. John was nervous. The nurse called for an ambulance. The nurse pulled the baby from John's arms.
Band. Ben's band wasn't very good. They played every weekend. Ben decided to go on tour with them. Ben's band performed at a big event. Ben's band impressed the crowd and got a good response.

The Bar. Rachael had a big date with a guy she met at the bar. She needed to make a good impression on him. She dressed up in her nicest dress. She walked into the bar and met the man she was meeting. She told him how great she was and he seemed pleased!

Hail Mary. I have been watching the playoffs the last two weeks. I am not a hockey fan so I am not sure what is going on. But I do know my cousin loves the Chicago Bears. I have been buying tickets for him since Friday night. Now I know why he loves it so much.

Beauty and The Beast. Lily was obsessed with the Beauty and The Beast book series. Her husband was not a fan of the book series. He said she was obsessed and would read it all the time. Lily would read every single day while they were on vacation. They were surprised to find out she actually enjoyed the book.

Child support. Tameka is raising her kids on her own. She doesn't get paid much but her bills are paid. When she's done with them they take care of each other. Then they both have to look for jobs. Tameka doesn't want to go back to work.

The Baseball Game. Jerry always wanted to play baseball as a kid. He practiced every day. Jerry went to a game and stood on second base. He got a hit and walked home. Jerry was so happy he was finally able to play baseball.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. It was his first apartment, and he didn't know where to go. The city had a number of streets he didn't know, and no apartment guide. In a panic, he decided to walk around in the dark. After wandering around the apartment, he found his apartment. He realized that he was supposed to be looking for his roommate's apartment.

Winter Storm. Beth was driving home when a winter storm rolled in. Beth stayed on the highway to avoid the rain. Beth saw the snow plows come up to a stop. Beth called her friend Jill to ask if they needed help. Jill replied that they did.

Into the abyss. Amy was scared and did not know what was in the tunnel. She tried to find her way out but couldn't. She started to panic and then realized she was lost. She walked over to the edge and slowly began to sink. Amy screamed and called out for help as she began to sink.

Christmas Problems. The Christmas tree lighting was coming up in three days. The lights were not out yet on the tree. Everyone had already purchased their own lights. After an hour of waiting, the lights finally came on. Now everyone could see the tree with their own lights.
Putting the Cat Down. Joe got a new cat and loved it. One day it got out of Joe's house. Joe got the cat's cage open and let it run outside. The cat ran away. Joe had to bury the cat.

The Brown Bag. Kate's grandma always gave her brown bags for her shopping trips. This week she didn't have any money. But she saw a sign for a yard sale. She decided to take advantage of it and bought a lot of things. When she got home, she was happy she had enough to get rid of.

Pig Eye. Gina's brother ran into the bathroom. He had seen a raccoon. He asked her if it was a pig. Gina smiled, realizing her brother didn't know what that meant. She told him it was just a silly name.

Baking. Barry always had trouble baking cookies. He always tried to do them without success. Barry finally decided to give up. Barry finally decided to bake cookies from scratch. Barry was amazed at how good they were and loved baking.
Tacos. Sam went out for tacos. He got tacos with salsa and sour cream. When he got home he was very full. The next day he felt sick. He never went out again.

Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine notices that her bedroom is dirty and she doesn't clean it much. She decides to go to the store to buy a new bed. She finds a nice black bed with pillows at the store. After looking online she buys the bed and brings it home. Now she cleans her bedroom and feels much better.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Timmy always wanted to learn how to dance. Timmy asked his dad for lessons, but his dad said no. Finally Timmy's dad got his mind out about it and decided to take him out. They went to the park, and Timmy asked his dad to teach him. After he learned a few moves, Timmy finally was able to dance!
Over Sleepy. I decided to have a sleepover. My parents were there. We watched movies. We had snacks and dinner. Then I fell asleep.

The Cheeseburger addict. Cindy loved cheeseburgers. She would eat one every day of the week. She went on a diet but it was hard to stick to. Finally she gave in and ordered a cheeseburger. After eating it, Cindy went on a diet.
Grapes. I wanted to make a snack. I found a bunch of grapes. I picked out some that were red and green. I put them in a bowl. I made a fruit salad.

The Work Event. I went to work this morning. After a while, someone came up to me. They asked if I wanted to volunteer at a farm event. I looked at the calendar and learned that I had to work that day. I was not happy about volunteering that day.
Food network star. Maggie was an aspiring chef. She went to culinary school and graduated. She moved to America to pursue her dream. She started her own restaurant. Maggie now has her own show.
Sleazy. Drew was working on his car. He decided to take a break. He got out and went home. His girlfriend was very disappointed in him. He then decided to stay and finish his car.
The new show. Tom loved watching reality tv. His friends loved watching it too. They decided to make a show. They got together to make one. The show turned out to be very popular.

Sue's Trip. Sue was visiting New York City on a business trip. She took a taxi cab home. On her way home, Sue crashed her car. Sue was not injured badly, but she was very embarrassed. Sue vowed to drive carefully in the future.

The Broken Toy Box. James was playing with his toy box in his house. He accidentally bumped his toy box. The toy box cracked into pieces. James took the toy box back to the store for a replacement. He was happy when the box arrived.

Pizza Place. Caitlyn was hungry, but she did not have any food. Caitlyn checked her wallet, but she did not have any money. She went to the local Pizza Place for some pizza. After ordering a pepperoni pizza, Caitlyn realized that she forgot her change! Luckily, they had extra change and Caitlyn was very thankful!
Missing. Tim was walking home from school. He heard a noise in his house. When he looked he realized that it was the fridge. The fridge had been broken into. Tim had to replace the entire fridge.

Signing up for a library card. I went to the library to renew my library card. I chose a new card and filled out all the information. I went to pay at the machine and went home. I was waiting for my card to come back. When I went to pay, the card was already gone.
Stripped down. Tommy was at a bar. He was very thirsty. He ordered a soda. Tommy was too drunk to pay. He had to go home.

The Big Win. Jim always wanted to be a professional wrestler. He worked out and trained hard everyday. At the big show, Jim was able to become the champion. After a long reign, Jim and his fans cheered. Jim and his fans had won the wrestling world.

A visit to Grandma. It was Lillian's first trip to Grandma's house. She was so excited she wanted to stay forever. Grandma was so proud of Lillian. The girls sat on the porch. The two enjoyed reminiscing about their childhood together.

Always do Your Homework. Jim was always doing the homework. One day Jim forgot to read his work. Jim's teacher found out. Jim had to work extra hard to keep his grades up. Jim's teacher made him pay more attention to the homework.
Picking a Movie. A man was watching movies at home. He wanted to watch the new action movie. He could not decide what to watch. He decided to try a different movie. He watched the new comedy.

Video Games. My brother and I went to play video games one night. We sat in our room and played for several hours. After we finished playing we sat down to eat dinner. After dinner we played some more video games. We went home and did the same thing the following day.
Lost remote. Kim got a new tv for christmas. But her remote didn't work. She went to the store and bought a new one. She brought it home and tried it out. She couldn't find the remote.

Itching. I was laying on my couch watching tv when I felt a pain. I looked down and my toe was swollen and red. I called the poison control hotline and asked for help. The poison control hotline called me back with an estimate for where to get medical help. I called them back and had an appointment the next day to see a doctor.

Bracketology. The NCAA tournament brackets were coming out. I thought they'd be pretty easy. Turns out they were really hard to follow! I was very frustrated. I decided to stop watching NCAA basketball.

The Man Across the Street. Sally and her sister were on the sidewalk. The man across the street was on a bike. He was trying to steal candy. A boy walked over to tell the man to stop. The man kept on stealing candy.

Catfishing. Karen decided to use social media to get a new cat. She put up photos of cats with other people's names. Karen's cat started posting the photos without Karen's permission. When Karen's friends saw the photos, they assumed that the cat was theirs. Karen learned to never use social media to get a new cat.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. I was in a hotel for the first time in my life. My favorite attraction was a casino. When I arrived, the casino doubled my earnings. I lost all the money I won. It was one of the most frustrating things I ever experienced.
Lion. The lion walked up to the fence. The farmer heard it. He asked his friend to check if there was a lion. His friend told him there was no lion. The farmer was disappointed but did not give up.

Homeless Heart. Tom was watching TV when he saw his favorite character die. He knew that person was homeless. He thought that meant that person was going to die soon. He prayed that that person would find a good home. The character was then declared dead and Tom felt more depressed.
Moving Up. Beth was a great athlete. She made a lot of team. She wanted to be a team captain. Beth had to move up to captain the team. Beth was a great team leader.

Comedian Carrie. Carrie wanted to be a stand up comedian. She bought all the necessary books and materials. After months of practice she began to get gigs. Carrie went to her first show and did a great job. She is now a popular comedian in her community.
