Big Day. John was the new kid on his school's basketball team. John practiced with his teammates all summer long. John felt he was ready for the big game. When the game came John scored a game winning shot. John's team won the game and they celebrated with fireworks.

Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos was a lonely man. He decided he wanted to meet someone new. He went to a local bar to meet someone. Carlos met a girl there. Carlos decided he wanted to start dating again.

Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson is always scared of octopus. Olson was invited to a party. Olson was not allowed to eat any of the food at the party. He found out there was an octopus dish at the party. Olson decided to eat the octopus.

Used Music Store. My friends and I were searching the internet for free music. We couldn't find anything that was free and interesting. We found a music store that had a free section for things we wanted to listen to. We bought the stuff we wanted and started downloading songs on the store. Now we have a lot of songs and have never been happier.
Fred. Fred wanted to get a cat. He asked his parents if he could get one. They said he could. Fred's parents went to the animal shelter. Fred adopted a beautiful cat named Bella.

The Bad Attitude. John and Bill were arguing at school. John was being mean to Bill. They were being rude and mean to each other. John's parents told him to calm down. He stopped being so mean to Bill.
Sad story. The boy was sad. His dad told him he should be happy. The boy didn't listen. His dad told him to be happy. The boy then acted happy.

Repaying the Pastor. My friend took me to church. My friend did not know a good sermon. I asked him if there was any Bible reading he wanted to read. He said he read the book about Abraham in the Bible. I told him I was thankful to know that.
Writer. Jim wanted to write a book. He sat down and wrote a story. Jim got an agent to publish the story. The book became a bestseller. Jim got paid by the agent to write more books.
The Lost Dog. Jane heard a dog in the yard. She looked up to see what it was. It was laying in the yard by itself. Jane called the number on the poster. They tracked it down and brought it home.

Birds. Ben bought some chickens for his garden. He thought he would have chickens by Easter. But in the spring he realized there were none! He spent the next few weeks waiting for them to grow. On Easter day he got ten chickens for his garden.

The Bridge. John was at the top of the bridge over the river. He watched it bend into the river. He saw people below below struggling to get across. John helped them cross the bridge. They thanked John for his help.

Sam Walks the Dog. Sam needed to get in shape. His dog loved to chase squirrels. Sam saw a video of a person walking a dog with no problem. He began to walk the dog while the dog was still calm. Sam managed to walk the dog without any problems.

Bad sale. Allie went to buy some clothes. But she really needed some jeans. She tried to browse but nothing appealed to her. She then found the perfect pair. But unfortunately the price was a hundred dollars.

theater. Ike was sitting at his desk. He had been watching a movie all day. He went to watch a new movie. He sat down at his seat and began to relax. He enjoyed watching the movie and began to feel more relaxed.

Sandy's Allergies. Sandy was making dinner for her boyfriend. She began to smell something burning. She looked up and saw her brother coughing. Sandy rushed her brother to the hospital. Her brother had accidentally set off the food alarm.
Hospital Visit. The baby was very sick. His mom took him to the hospital. The doctor performed a bunch of tests. The test results showed that the baby was cancerous. His mom had him removed.

Fear Returns. Gina had been bullied by the new boy at school. She decided she was going to do something about it. Gina went to the principal's office and reported the bully. The principal spoke with the boy. He was suspended for one day.

Drawing Class. Dan decided to take a drawing class at the local community college. Dan watched videos of other artists' projects. The first night of the class, Dan drew on his neighbor's sidewalk. Dan decided to take his project to the art studio. Dan was so proud of his work that he received a painting from the studio.

Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen wanted to learn to play softball. She had a hard time hitting the ball. She hired a baseball coach to help her. After a lot of practice, Carmen became able to hit the ball. Carmen was very happy she had learned to play softball.

Jersey. Rita wanted to buy a new hoodie. She did some research and found the perfect hoodie. She shopped around for several weeks. Rita finally found the perfect hoodie and bought it. When she got home, she realized it was too small.
The Blog. Jane wrote a blog. She got lots of views. Her blog was a success. Jane became successful. She got a million dollars.

Retiring from Teaching. I decided to retire from teaching. I looked for something to do in my free time. My friend told me that he wanted to hire me. I was very happy to hear that he wanted to hire me! I got my first paycheck from his hire!
Getting Dressed. Sara woke up for work. She was very sweaty. Sara didn't know what to wear. She went to get dressed. Sara looked great and was very happy.
Tom's Drink. Tom went to the bar for a night out. He ordered a drink. Tom drank the drink too much and got sick. The bartender gave him an X-Ray. He found that he had drunk too much alcohol.
Gertrude Slips. Gertrude is running outside. She notices something wet on her legs. She realizes she is wet. She quickly runs to the bathroom. She calls an ambulance to take her to the hospital.

Lost Job. Tom was looking for a new job. Tom had to give a lot of thought to it. Tom asked many friends what they thought he should do. One of his friends suggested applying online for jobs. Tom decided to apply for jobs online.

No Spare. Tim's car broke down on the side of the road. He didn't have enough money to get it fixed. He called up a friend to get help. A guy who answered said Tim's friend had a spare. Tim borrowed the guy's spare.

John Runs Errands. John has run out of time to do some work. He gets into his car and starts it. John drives to the store to buy some things. He picks up his things and drives home. John is tired but happy he completed his work.

Catching Burglars. Sam was always worried about getting into trouble. His friends and coworkers often made fun of him. He tried to avoid being around anyone with a bad reputation. Unfortunately that wasn't enough. Sam's car was broken into and his laptop stolen.
Arra. Arra was walking through the streets of Paris. The rainy started to pour. Arra did not have a umbrella. A strong wind blew Arra into a puddle. Arra had to wade out to the street to get home.

job interview. Today was the interview for a new job. John did his best, just like he told the company. After the interview, he drove to the company's office to give a speech. He also prepared a resume and cover letter. After the interview, the manager called John and asked for John's skills.

The chicken baby. I love to buy my family chicken nuggets. One day I found a small baby on the side of the road. It was laying in the dirt by the road. I called a neighbor to come help me. The lady took the chicken and I was so happy!

Lary's Lasagna. Lary loved to make lasagna. One day he decided to try to make his own. He found all of the ingredients online. He bought all of the ingredients and started to make lasagna. Lary's lasagna turned out to be amazing.
First day of classes. It was Sam's first day of school. He was rather nervous. He sat down in the classroom. It was a little scary. Luckily though he made a few new friends.

Bankrupt. Dan is a computer programmer. He decided to code a new application. He began to code the application. After several days of work, the application was ready. His client gave him a good review and he became a millionaire.

Home Away. Kate's parents had recently divorced. She was very nervous about going back to her old home. When her parents arrived home, they were very welcoming. They took her to the beach and made her feel welcome. Kate was glad she could go back to her old home.
Fixing the Sink. I needed to fix the toilet. I took it to the sink. It was filled with water. I had to fill a new bucket. I fixed the sink and then the toilet.

Too Close. Tommy wanted to be the class president. He had a big speech to give in front of his entire class. Tommy wasn't sure what to say. He tried to put it off as long as possible. At the end of the speech Tommy barely made any mistakes.

The Fire. Drew was camping with his friends. They were trying to light some fires. Suddenly, they heard a loud bang. A huge thunderstorm occurred and they all ran outside. Luckily, there were no more fires.

Biographies. I love to read biographies of people. I like to compare them to famous ones. I especially love to read about the lives of athletes. I learned so much about my favorite athletes through reading biographies. I am thankful for such great books as these.
The busy day. Tim was really stressed out. He wanted to relax. He went to the gym. He did some push ups. Tim was glad that he could relax.
Knife. Ike's dog pulled on his kitchen knife. He picked it up and saw it was dull. Ike cut his finger on the knife. He bought a new one. Ike no longer had to worry about his knife breaking.

Last to the party. Tim was always the last one to a party. He usually stayed home and watch a lot of movies. Last week though someone asked him to go to a party with them. Tim agreed and showed up with lots of friends. He ended up having a great time and he was happy.

Bill's Bar. Bill loved to drink whiskey. His friends all wanted to meet up to talk about whiskey. They met in a bar one night and had whiskey-fueled conversation. That night Bill met a man and they began dating. Years later, Bill and his date have a son and live happily ever after.

Dead Mouse. My mother's cat died recently. Her cage looked empty, as did the whole house. We went to the pet store and bought her a new mouse. The cat was very happy with her new mouse. The mouse will be placed in the living room.
The Fishing Pole. Jason went fishing. He brought his fishing pole. Jason took a bite out of a fish. The fish bit him. Jason threw the fish back in the water.

sick day. The other day I was really sick. I had to stay in bed all day because I was so tired. I could hardly sleep. I had to stay up all night to avoid getting sick. By the next morning I felt much better.
The Race. Tim was running a race. He wanted to make it to first place. He kept stopping to look over his shoulder. When he started the race, he kept checking his watch. He only got third place!

In The Mitt. Bill's father told him not to eat the lawn mower. He did not listen to his father. On his way home from school, he ate the lawn mower. He was told he would have to pay a fine if he did it again. He ran the lawn mower as fast as he could to get away from the fine.

Coffee. Lucy was really thirsty. She decided to buy some coffee. She walked to the coffee shop and poured a large order. It was expensive, but she was happy to save some money. She was glad that it was coffee that helped her feel better.
The bird flies. A baby bird flew high in the sky. A hunter was following the bird. The hunter caught the baby bird. He fed the baby bird. The bird flew high again.
Knee. I was running with my sister. She was in a wheelchair. We decided to go to a park to run. When we started running I twisted my knee. We had to get someone to take me home.
Sandwich. It was lunch time. Ed went to his car to eat his sandwich. The sandwich was cold. Ed went back to his car. He opened it to find the sandwich wet.
Rapper. Jake was a rap artist. He wrote an album. A record company bought his record. They released his album. His album became popular.

On set. The crew was filming the movie. They were in the editing room. They were having a conversation. Suddenly they heard someone screaming. The director ran in and yelled at them to get back to work.

Gusty Winds. It was windy that night. Ben and his family were in a tent in a wooded area. A large branch broke off and hit Ben's tent. Ben screamed and ran inside his tent. Ben was unhurt, but his tent was damaged.

Ted buys a car. Ted needed a new car. He decided to go to the dealership. He drove around looking for a red sports car. He found the one he wanted, but it was too expensive. He then drove to a local dealership and bought the car.

Kids Chair. We moved into our new house this week. We brought a new kid chair. Our kid slipped in his new chair and fell on his face. It broke his glasses. He cried and cried and said he will never get in a new chair.

The Bowling Match. Dan was looking forward to his first bowling match with his friends. They got in their car and drove to the bowling alley. Dan's friends had brought their own bowling balls. They each put their balls on a lane. The game was a close one with Dan scoring a perfect score.

The Park at Night. Tom was out on a hike with friends. They all decided to go to the park. Tom wasn't paying attention and fell down. He scraped his knee pretty badly. Luckily he was ok and they all laughed about it.

Fireworks. It was the fourth of july. Timmy got the idea to go get fireworks. He decided to head to the nearest park. He parked his car in a field and walked towards the park. He bought some fireworks and headed back home.
Magic Kingdom. Tom was on vacation with his family. His parents suggested he go to Magic Kingdom. Tom had never been to Disney World before. He was surprised at how fun it was. He wanted to go again.

Gym Rats. Mika was the star of her basketball team. All her friends told her that she was the strongest girl on the team. Mika never accepted this, believing that she should be in the Olympics. Mika went to the Olympics and tried her hardest. She ended up making the team and made everyone her friend.

McDonalds. Barry was eating a hamburger at McDonalds. He had an entire large hamburger and fries in the drive through. Barry told the cashier what was going on. She gave Barry his regular meal for free. Barry thanked her.
The Twins. The twins were in a play. They were twins. The mother was on one side and dad was on the other. One day they had to perform a juggling trick. The dads accidentally took turns juggling.
A lost day. Tim was going to the beach. All of a sudden his phone rang. It was a friend inviting him over for dinner. Tim was happy but got really worried. He decided to cancel his plans.

My phone plan. I went to my new phone provider today. I had to give them a number to call. I picked a number from my phone book. I had to wait for my name to be called. Then I had my phone number dialed.

Southie. We went to visit my sister in-law in December. We walked through the park and talked a lot. It was great to see her, as she lives alone in her condo. I gave her a big hug and told her we loved her. Her name is Southie, and she was happy to see us.

Fleas. Nancy had a lot of fleas. She tried a few different meds to get rid of them. None of them worked. One of the doctors told her she should try a flea shampoo. After a few weeks, Nancy's fleas were gone.

Good Signs. Jill was on a long trip to Las Vegas. She had a very bad case of the sniffles. She decided to buy some pills. She took some and decided they helped a bit. Jill wound up sleeping the whole time in Las Vegas.

Nick. Nick hated being called names and getting bullied at school. So when he found out there was going to be a meeting, he wanted to go. He told all his friends that they should go too. After that he decided to be more careful when he was in the class. And at the meeting, he found someone he really liked!
The Puppy. Mimi had finally brought home a puppy. She played with the dog for hours one day. Then she decided to feed it. The dog went all over the kitchen. Mimi felt better knowing the dog was safe.

Baseball. Timmy was in his third year in the minors. He had recently gotten his first baseball card. He wanted to impress a girl in his local baseball team. Timmy played on his first baseball game that day. He made a homerun to win the game for his team.
Sandals. Sara wore her favorite sandals to work. She had a pair she liked. But one day, she ripped them. Sara was sad. But she decided she would just keep wearing her old shoes.
Waffles. I went to a new restaurant. The waitress greeted me with a smile. She brought me some waffles. I liked the waffles. I returned to the restaurant later for more.
Rockstar. Tom was a high school student. Tom dreamed of being a rock star. Tom started playing the guitar. Tom got a lot of attention from other teens. Tom made lots of money playing the guitar.

Frozen in Place. Kylie had a crush on James. James had a crush on her as well. Kylie decided she didn't want to break up with James. But then she noticed that she was stuck in a frozen place. It was freezing, so she had no choice but to go to the mall.

Lost Bird. I was out on a hike by myself. While hiking I came across a bird sitting on the ground. I picked the bird up and put it in my backpack. When I returned to the trail, the bird had died. I realized it was my dog who had eaten the bird.

Facebook isn't for everyone. Tim's friends always make fun of his Facebook. He doesn't take it personally and just makes an attempt to change that. He makes his profile picture of himself with a frowny face. He tells them that he is just looking for a friend. And for the first time ever, no one takes it personally.

Let's Party!. Kelsey had been invited to a party. She hadn't been invited to it before. She went to the party and met some friends. The party was completely boring. Kelsey didn't go to the party again.

A Robbery. Darlene and John were at the movie theater. A man in a mask came up to them and demanded money. He demanded Darlene's wallet and dimes. They did not have any money. The man was later caught and charged with robbery.

Sandals. John wanted to learn to ice skate. John went to the rink at the local skating rink. John put his skates on and put on his boots. John put his skates in the ice. John skated around on the ice for a few minutes.

Chain. Tom was always tying his shoes. His feet would get stuck on the chain. He would push himself down further to free his feet. One day, he couldn't get his chain to free his feet. He had to ask his brother for help to free his feet.
Great lunch. Yesterday I had lunch with my friends. We had chicken and rice. My friends said the food was delicious. They wanted to eat it again. So I ate it as a treat.

Green Hair. Holly had green hair, but now it was falling out. She had to dye her hair to match her friends. She went to the store to get dye. Holly went home and applied the dye to her hair. It took an hour, but she dyed her hair to match her friends.

Parting Ways. I had to buy new shoes for my son. I decided to go shopping for some shoes at the mall. The shoe store was crowded and crowded was a bad thing for me. I left the mall, confused as to how to find a shoe. I had to go home without any new shoes.

Slip and Slide. Miley had always been scared of the water. One day she invited her friends over to play. She had never been water scared before but she went anyway. She was so scared she had to go to the hospital. She's afraid of water now but her friends made her go anyways.
The Tumor. Jude was a scientist. He had found some cancer. He wanted to do something about it. He began to study it. Jude was able to cure the cancer.
Tom Gets A Dog. Tom wanted a pet. He went to the pet store. Tom asked for a dog. The cashier said that he couldn't help. Tom left the store with a dog instead.

The Home. Amy's grandparents were buying a home. Amy watched the couple load the truck and drive away. Amy waited impatiently. Soon the couple arrived at the home. Amy was excited to see her family move in.
Kicked Out. I was in a fraternity. One of them said you better not drink. I was so drunk. I started throwing up. Then the bouncer kicked me out.

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. Jake went to eat at a steakhouse. The first item on the menu was the Philly cheese steak sub. He didn't know what to get. Jake had to drive back to the restaurant. It was a total loss.

Havoc. The Smiths didn't have any food. Their cat ran up and knocked over a plate. Their dog then ran and ate all of the food. The Smiths were very embarrassed. They decided to just leave the cat in peace.

The Interview. Dennis had a job interview in less than two hours. He was extremely nervous about it. He made sure to practice his interview question. He went into the office and introduced himself. He got the job.

Firework. Tommy loves the fourth of July. His favorite holiday is also called the firework show. Tommy gets to be on the stages and explode in flames. He gets to see his favorite floats and bands perform. Tommy will always remember the firework show.

The Perfect Haircut. Molly had a boyfriend named Ronny. Ronny wanted to impress her with a new haircut. Ronny decided to spend one hundred dollars on a new haircut. When Molly got home she took a look at his new haircut. Molly realized it was way too short for him and gave him back his money.

Doug cleans house. Doug decided to clean his house today. He decides to wash the bathroom first. The bathroom was his biggest chore. Once it was clean he moved on to washing his clothes. After all of that Doug was happy he was cleaning his house.

Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey had always been a very easy going person. He never had problems with anxiety. One day, he was very stressed out while working. Corey was very angry at his boss about it. Corey was fired the next day for his boss's comments.
Car Buying. Tim had just purchased a car. He wanted to make it his own. Tim began to research different cars on the market. Tim found a great car. He used it to start his own car company.

Fishing trip. Mike was fishing on the river with his dad. They were sitting around waiting for fish. All of a sudden Mike felt a tug on his fishing rod. Mike looked down and saw his dad fishing. Luckily they caught a huge fish in their hour of fishing.
Pharmacy. Sam had low self esteem. He wanted to get better at his job. He visited a pharmacy. He saw a man struggling with depression. He bought him a new bottle of pills.
Pickpocket. Jodie loved to steal from people. She would simply run up to them. One day she ran into an old man. She grabbed his wallet. She was happy to finally get her hands on some money.

The Move Out. The landlord had a deadline to move out by next Monday. She didn't have the money in her bank to move. She didn't want to move out. She was about to get evicted if she didn't move. She finally moved out, just barely.

Angela. Angela was a hard working woman. She was a doctor but felt like she should help more. She had her eye on a wealthy doctor. But Angela needed to save money and get married first. Angela married her dream doctor, to save money and get married.

Bull Ride. Tim was driving his friend home from college. They decided to drive to a nearby bull riding arena. Tim and his friend thought it would be fun. Tim and his friend did tons of fun things in the arena. Tim and his friend were happy that they went.

Declined. The doctor told the boy to eat more fruit. He told him to eat more vegetables as well. The boy refused to eat more fruit. The doctor took his blood sugar level. He told the boy that he is diabetic.

Ride Along. I was taking my friend Mary to the beach. I asked her if she wanted to ride along. Mary said she did. Mary and I rode along the shoreline and into the water. Mary said she was having a good time!
Stainless. Tim was at a department store. And he saw an expensive silver watch. He bought it right away. But he realized later that it was a fake. Tim was upset but figured he could always return it.

The Nickname. Tom had been called a lot during practice this week. They made fun of him and called him names. Tom decided to wear his old nickname out on the playground. It became so popular that the other kids were jealous. Tom had to explain to them what the nickname meant.

John's Social Life. John had friends who all had girlfriends. John was lonely and didn't have many friends. He decided to try to be friends with everyone. He tried to make new friends on the internet. John eventually made a lot of new friends and was happy.

Jailbird. I got in trouble at work for talking in class. My supervisor asked me what happened. I said that my friend said I was a jailbird. He laughed and said jailbird is a silly word. I was relieved when he said it was because I was talking about Jesus.
Swap Shop. I was at the swap shop. I wanted to buy a used car. I found a one that I really liked. But it was too expensive for me. I had to settle for a new one.

Stuck in traffic. Tim was in rush traffic. He was trying to get to work. Suddenly, he was stuck in a mile long line. He was very bored and frustrated. Eventually, he finally managed to make it to work.

Chicken and Waffles. One day I decided to cook a batch of chicken and waffles. First I had to fry some bacon. Then, I had to pour some maple syrup on the waffles. After everything was combined I topped them with a bit of cheddar. They were so delicious that I decided to make more in the future.
Pizza. Tina ordered a pizza. She picked the pizza up. When she got it home, it was not good. Tina gave the pizza back to the restaurant. They gave her a refund.

The lake storm. Jenna and her friends went to the lake. They all had a blast splashing in the water. When it got dark, they packed up. Jenna went home to change into their bathing suits. They were stuck in the rain all night.
99. The 99 year old man approached the table. He said he had been diagnosed with cancer. He asked for some help. The kids made him a cup of soup. The 99 year old appreciated the gesture.

Caught stealing. I was at the store. I went to the back to look for something. I looked through my bag and found some change. I walked back to the front and tried to leave the store. Someone behind me yelled at me for no reason.

The Phone Call. I received a phone call from my girlfriend. She was telling me about her latest vacation. She wanted to tell me about all the fun times we've had in the past few weeks. I listened to her story and was inspired to go on a trip with her. I bought her a ticket and we're planning to go to Niagara Falls.

Interview. Lucy was interviewing for a new job. She had a lot of questions about herself. She did her best to answer them. When she was finished she handed in her resume. The company called her the next day.

Retirement. Jill was turning seventy Year's old. Her friends and family encouraged her to keep working. She had always wanted to stay in business. Her friend gave her a business card. Jill felt great about the card and continued working.

Across the Alley. Amy was sitting at the diner. She was listening to the radio while waiting. A man came by asking for directions. Amy had not realized he knew her routine. Amy got out her notebook and quickly wrote him a note.

Dishonest. Tina decided she wanted to be a better person. So she decided to not eat at all. She went to the store and bought some dish detergent. And went home to wash the dishes. But she felt so guilty she immediately stopped.
The Shoes. The shoes were great. They were pink and black. One day, he wore them to a party. There was no one there. He decided he'd just wear them for the rest of the night.

Dehydrated. Tim had been running for several hours. He didn't realize he had not drank enough water. He was so dehydrated that he had to stop. Tim tried to drink more water the next day. After a few days he began to drink more water.

Building the shed. Fred was a very nice kid. He always had clean rooms. One day he decided to build a shed. He bought all of the materials for it. When he was finished, his room was the nicest in the neighborhood.

Handing out candy. Today I decided to give out candy to kids at school. I bought a bag of candy for everyone. I filled it up with candy and brought it to the kids. They all took their candy and walked home. The kids were very happy with the candy.

The Pasta Dinner. The family loved cooking. This time they were going to make a pasta dinner. They found some good marinara sauce. They put the sauce on their pasta and cooked it. The family loved the pasta dinner they made.

Music. Nita was a singer. She had to find a new audience. She found a small club in town that played mostly electronic music. Nita was a big fan of those music types. She felt a lot of pressure not to give it up, but she stuck it out.

Tutoring Help. A teacher told my son to read a book in Spanish class. He did as he was told but did not feel comfortable. The teacher sent him to a tutor who taught him the language. My son was happy but did not understand the meaning of his words. The tutor spoke with a accent that my son did not recognize.

Dave needs a new car. Dave is turning 18 in a few days. He wants to pick a brand new car for his birthday. He calls his dad to see if he can go to the dealership. His dad tells him he can't get a brand new car for his birthday. Dave asks his dad to pick him a sports car for his birthday instead.

Local Ad. Tim had a job that paid low wages. His company decided to advertise locally for more clients. Tim put up flyers around town. He hired some locals to help out. He made a lot more than he expected.
Too Much Soda. Tom was drinking soda. His stomach was upset. He didn't know what to do about it. He started to drink more soda. Tom wound up throwing up all over his couch.
Dog. Tim's dog needed to be trained. Tim went to the obedience school. Tim's dog was really obedient. Tim's dog got trained. Tim's dog is really obedient now.

Doves cry. I love the ducks. They make my house smell like fresh bread. But I live in Florida, which is too hot for ducks. So last night I ordered some pizza. But I have to move because the weather is too hot.

The Earthquake. There was an earthquake that started on the beach. The family stayed inside of their house while the waves moved. They heard a crack and heard a loud noise. A large hole opened up in the ground. The family had to climb out of their house.

The musical student. Julia had just started in a new class. She had a musical background but had never performed. One day her parents let her audition for the school choir. She sang and danced to many songs, getting very good. Julia was called up for a full part in the school choir.
Rita chokes. Rita was walking down the road. She was reading a book. She saw a car that had crashed into a tree. Rita began to choke. Rita died because she was choking on the book.

Large Ego. Sheena loved sports, and she was excited for a basketball match. Sheena had no idea she had a large ego and couldn't control it. When the game started, Sheena took a backseat. She got so into her mind, she forgot to block out the game. Because of that, her team lost the match.

Beer run. Jill was running late to her friends house. She needed to make a beer run to make up for lost time. She bought extra beer to have on hand. When she got there she realized she forgot her keys. She had to stop at the store to find the keys.

Tom the Drunk. Tom wanted to drink, but didn't know how to. He decided to drink as many beers as he could in one night. He ended up drinking 10 beers. His mom saw the mess he made. He was grounded for a month.

Tim gets in Shape. Tim had wanted to lose weight. He decided to start going jogging. He would jog everyday. Tim kept going and kept losing weight. He was very proud of himself for losing so much weight.

Criticized. Manny loved to play games on the Xbox. He would get really frustrated when he was not playing. One day, his Xbox didn't work and he could not play. Manny's parents got angry and grounded Manny for a month. Manny spent that month practicing video games.

Stale Dale. Dale bought a new house. His neighbors noticed the house was an eyesore. They were not impressed with the house. They asked Dale if he could fix up the house. Dale agreed and cleaned up the house.
Bathrobe. Joe needed a new work attire. He went to the store. He found a really nice and revealing blue robe. Joe purchased the robe. Joe went to work in his new blue robe.

Teaching Lesson. Kia's dad got her a summer job at the local YMCA. On the first day, Kia started teaching the kids some math. But when they started using the calculator, she forgot their lesson! She panicked, and thought her lessons weren't working. But her dad helped her remember her lesson and she got an A!

seeing eye dog. John had a dog named Buster. Buster was always alert to people and their dogs. Buster could see perfectly from a distance. John loved having Buster around. Buster is now a seeing eye dog.

Fire. My son started the car with the gas. He then got out of the car and went outside to start the house. I noticed a fire in the grass. I called the fire department to put out the fire. I took my son back inside the house.
Veteran's Day. Jim was excited to get a tattoo. He asked his dad to get one. Jim's dad took him to the parrot bar. He got a tattoo of a soldier's eagle on his arm. Jim got the tattoo the next day.

Hitting the curb. Jane was sitting in traffic one day. She noticed that she had bumped a curb. Jane decided she would hit the curb to clean up the mess. She hopped out and hit the curb. The curb was now a puddle of scraped up glass.
Travel to Hawaii. Tanya took a trip to Hawaii. She stayed at the resort on Maui. She visited all of the famous sites. Tanya also tried her hand at surfing. She enjoyed her trip so much.

Married. Cathy and Charles had been married for four years. They finally decided to get their divorce papers in the mail. Cathy was sad that she would have to get a divorce. Cathy's mom paid for a maid to clean and mow their home. Cathy and Charles felt relieved when they were out of the house.
Turtle Violation. Tom was out with friends on a boat. They were drinking alcohol. Tom brought a bottle of wine with him. His friends thought it was too much. They took a few bottles from Tom's hands.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. Andy and Larry were best friends growing up. They were good friends throughout high school. After high school, they both moved away. Andy and Larry lived in different states. I did not see them in 5 years and am now living in their new house.

Bad purchase. The store bought a large bag of rice. I opened it and took a bite out of the rice. The rice was raw in the middle. The cashier apologized for her mistake. We had to send the bag back for a refund.

Sisters Fighting. Kim had gone to her brothers room to play video games. She was on the couch when she heard a commotion. Her older sister was fighting her younger sister. Kim walked over and calmed the fight down. She was glad it was over.

Stomach. Lacy has always been a healthy girl. She wanted to start a healthy diet. Lacy didn't know what she was doing but went to the grocery store. Lacy found out she had gained a lot of weight from not eating. Lacy felt guilty but decided not to make any changes.
Spot the Dog. Spot the dog was scared of the dark. His owner bought him a special night light. Spot was so happy and sleepy. His owner put a candle in his eyes. Spot no longer sees the darkness.

Nasty Attitude. The bully at school had been bothering Ben for several minutes. When he decided to strike, he got into an argument with Ben. He started slinging words and cursing at Ben. After 10 minutes, Ben decided to run away. He hid in his house until the bully noticed him.

Lake. There once was a lake that was very large. There was a fishing hole there that everyone went to. One day, the lake was full of monsters. A man decided to take a boat out. The lake was closed forever.

Bagpipe. Bob wanted to learn how to play the bagpipe. He decided to hire a pro to teach him how to play. The pro worked on Bob for weeks. After a month of hard work, Bob could play the bagpipe. Bob was happy to have learned to play the bagpipe.

NYC. Kate and her family had just moved to New York City. The first night she visited she decided to go to Macy's. She picked up all the clothes they needed there and took them home. She was so happy to see how much people loved clothes. She decided she would shop there all the time.
Italian Food. Today, my family went out for lunch. We went to a local Italian restaurant. The food was delicious. We tried a lot of different things. We couldn't wait to go back!

Skydiver. Tom was training to become a skydiver. He had always dreamed of jumping from trees. One day he jumped off a cliff and twisted his ankle. The doctor said he couldn't jump anymore and the plan was cancelled. Tom still thinks about the cliff and dreams of skydiving one day.
Trapped Dog. Tim was walking his dog. His dog got stuck in a wire. Tim tried to get him down. He was too late. The dog suffocated.

Broken Television. Tom was watching TV one night. He noticed his television screen was completely broken. Tom called his local cable company to get his problem resolved. The cable company sent out a repairman to Tom's house that night. Tom was very happy when he got his television fixed that night.

Hamsters for All. My friends and I decided we wanted to have hamsters. We went to the pet store and got all of our supplies. We brought them home and set them up. Then we let them go outside and played! The hamsters had so much fun and we will have more soon.

Not what expected. My friend was going to the supermarket. He looked at the produce section. The produce was the same as what he normally buys. He took a closer look. Then he asked the person at the counter for more.

Friend. Heather was at a party. A boy came up and asked her for a date. Heather agreed and went home. They got into a fight and Heather was upset. She was upset because she didn't want him to go home.
Shane goes to a play. Shane was a small child. He never wanted to go to a play. His parents made him go to one. Shane really enjoyed going to the play. He now wanted to go back to the play.

Chalky. My sister's cat had been scratching all day. She bought her a scratching post. She put a drop of dish soap on the post to make it shiny. The next morning she took her cat to the vet. She had to get a whole new scratching post.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge decides that he wants to cook a nice meal for himself. He buys all the ingredients to cook beans. After buying everything, Jorge cooks the beans. However, his beans do not taste very good. Jorge realizes he needs to buy more beans.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack was out at the car parts store. Jack found a set of car accessories for his car. Jack decided to buy them. After he got home, Jack noticed he had to change his oil. Jack realized that he never bought the accessories when he was out.

Not Mad. Gina hated to leave her friends. One day, she decided to stay and watch a movie. She was disappointed in her decision. Her friends understood. She was glad they understood and she was not mad.
Pool. The girl went swimming in her pool. She was a bit scared. She jumped out of the pool. The waves carried her to the bottom. The girl was okay but a bit scared.

Cheap Move. Cayla needed a new TV for her home. She bought a cheap one off the Internet. Within a week it stopped working and had to be replaced. Cayla spent all her money to pay for the TV. Now Cayla doesn't want to buy one but hates paying for it.

Safe and Sound. I drove along the street with my little brother. There was a family of five people, including his grandparents. I was driving with him when we saw a car fly down the street. The driver stopped and got out to see what was going on. He was the one who hit the dog, and we called for him to come inside.

News. My niece's boyfriend took his girlfriend to a soccer game. At halftime the score was tied. Her boyfriend went up to her and threw the ball. The ball went over her head and she ran back to the bench. He told her it was okay, she was just going home.

Broken Arm. John was swinging from the second floor balcony. He decided to try to swing higher. He swung his arm too high and he broke his arm. John was very sad and started crying. His parents took him to the hospital and he had to get stitches.

Mary's Kitten. Mary was taking her cat for a walk. Mary's cat had forgotten his favorite bowl and was starving. Mary brought the cat some food from the kitchen. Mary's cat got down on the floor to eat his food. Mary's cat was full and happy.

The Mattress. Mary decided she needed to buy a new mattress. She looked around at the big mattresses in stores but none were right for her. She finally found one that she really liked. She was going to buy it so she could move her bed. She was so happy that she didn't feel guilty about it.
Tooth. The baby got stuck in the door. He cried all night. His parents had to buy him a toothbrush. They gave the baby his toothbrush. The baby got better the next day.

Migraine. I had a migraine the other day. I took a headache medication with food. After a while the headache went away. I went to see a doctor to see if I had a migraine. The doctor diagnosed me with a migraine.

RMV. I tried to stop drinking from a liquor store. I bought a bottle of rum and some rum punch. I tried to drive home, but it smelled really bad. I stopped at the liquor store. The clerk told me I needed to take them back to the store.

Basketball Rim. I was riding my bicycle home from school. My bicycle's rim was very worn down. I decided to patch up my rim with a piece of cloth tape. It took forever to smooth out, but I did it. I felt proud of the repair work I had done.

To much of a good thing. Mary was always bragging about how much she loves music. She plays music every day. Her friend said she should stop and listen to it. Mary did and she started to listen to it less. Her friend then said that maybe it wasn't so much of a good thing.
Rotten Luck. Dan's family went to a casino. Dan didn't have any money. When they won, he gave them all the tickets. However, no one won. Dan spent the rest of the night in a panic.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly is playing with her friends. She is swinging on her toy swing set. Lilly falls off the swing and gets hit in the head. She has to go to the hospital for a concussion. Lilly gets a cast on her head.

The Gym. Jake decided to buy new clothes. He went to the gym to find a new workout partner. Jake found a nice girl in the gym. The girl helped him with his new clothes. Jake is very happy with his new gym partner.

Reading. Lily had a lot of homework that she needed to do. She decided to read on the train to work on her assignments. The train was quiet, so Lily could concentrate. When it was time to get off the train, Lily began to read. She finished in just 3 hours.

An unexpected accident. Molly was playing baseball. She was swinging the bat hard when she felt a sharp pain. The pain increased and she fell down to the ground. She saw her daughter's head and it was in pain. She had to put ice on it and it felt better after.

Selfish People. Dan had bought a brand new truck. It had lots of room in it. As Dan got out to drive around he was stopped by a cop. He asked Dan what the problem was. Dan told the cop that he was speeding without a license.
Ruined Mailbox. The mailman dropped the packages on the ground. He picked up the broken pieces. He threw them away. He walked to the mailbox. He dug through the mailbox for the package he wanted.

Bleach Cap Search. Beth was running out of white bleach for her home. She went to a store to get a cap to put on her clothes. She was very disappointed when she only found one. She decided to bleach her clothes anyways. She got bleach all over her clothing.

grocery. Barry wanted to help poor people in his community. So he went to the supermarket. He found some food that he thought was too expensive for them. But then he remembered that they could also buy food that he wanted. He bought the food so that the poor could have good food.

Padding. The crib was very hard to crawl through. I bought some padding. I taped it tightly around the crib to make it less challenging. My son was able to climb in through the crib. Now, my son can crawl all the way into the kitchen.
mike walker. Mike walked in his shoes. His sister heard a noise in the woods. She yelled at him to get down. Mike put his head down. He got down and told his sister he was lost.

Movie rip off. I used to buy my girlfriend tickets to a theater when she lived there. She never thought she would actually go. We would always drive around town a long time. When I finally told her about the tickets she was surprised. She thought I was being really cheap.

Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is babysitting for a family that lost their baby. Tyler and the other baby sit on the floor. The baby starts crying loudly. Tyler runs over to the baby crying. Tyler cuddles the baby until he is quiet.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mom used to be my best friend. I stopped hanging out with her after her parents left the house. My mom found out I was hanging out with someone else. She fired me from my job, claiming I wasn't going to work. I was heartbroken.

Wedding Party. Katherine went to the wedding of her friend's boyfriend. They attended a small party after the ceremony. Then they went back home and watched a movie. After dinner, Katherine invited all of her friends. They all had a good time at the party.

Lost Deal. I was walking through my town today and stopped at a gas station. I got out of my car and asked for some snacks. The cashier informed me that my card was declined. I looked over at the card but there was nothing on it. I then realized that someone must have stolen my card.

Lansing Trip. Bob was a student at the University of Michigan. One day he and his class took a trip to Lansing. Bob loved being in Lansing, and had a great time. After the trip, Bob decided that he wanted to see Lansing again. Bob decided to drive from Michigan to California to see Lansing.

Easter Bunny. The little girl woke up early. She ran into the kitchen to look for her Easter basket. She was disappointed to see it was empty. She searched the kitchen for the Easter Bunny. Then she found it outside in her tree.

Bad Dessert. Sandy was making Thanksgiving dinner for her family. She had been working really hard. She had made many nice dishes. But unfortunately her dessert came out terrible. Sandy had to order a pizza to get it right.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike decided he needed to get a new computer. He decided to buy one at the local electronics store. Mike carefully compared pictures of many computers. He eventually decided on a Macbook Air, which he loved. Mike installed the new computer, and then got a good night's sleep.
Loud music. Jim hated loud music. He listened to loud music every night. His neighbors told him to get rid of it. Jim ignored them and put up with it. Eventually he moved to a different place.

Tax Evasion. John stole $1000 from a store with the intention to sell it later. John didn't take the money to the police station, nor to the owner. One day, John tried to leave town with the money, but his car broke down. John realized he couldn't leave town without being caught. John called his sister, and her boyfriend to inform them of his plan.

New York Vacation. John was planning to take a trip to New York City this year. John loved to visit his favorite historical sites. He thought that he would take the train and rent a car. However, John was shocked when he saw how expensive it was to fly. John could not believe how expensive plane tickets were in New York City.

College Applications. Jake needed to find a college to attend. He did some research online. He found an information about an applied college. He made a request for information. The information was not enough to help him find a college.

Generations. My friends told me stories of their family tree. They had been told this by their parents, but never told the whole story. I felt like I knew them better by listening to them tell me their stories. I went online and looked up information about them. I made new friends with people who shared my new knowledge!

Vegas. I decided to go to Las Vegas with a few friends. I didn't think much of it until I arrived at the casino. They gave me an old slot machine and told me to get a drink. When I did I played for a while, but then lost all my money. I vowed never to go back to Vegas.

No Hesitation. Ricky worked as a mechanic. He was on the job all day until 4 PM. Ricky had an extra shift at work to save for a car. He decided to call his girlfriend on the phone. Ricky finally left for his girlfriend's house.

Car in Parking Garage. Dan had been driving all night. Dan realized he could not find a parking space in his garage. Dan got a hammer and knocked down the garage door. Dan heard a noise from inside the garage. Dan saw that his car had broken in two pieces.

the song. Sandra loved the song. She sang it every night. But when she saw it was in the school play, she cried. Sandra decided to get on stage and sing it. Everyone cheered for Sandra when she came on stage.

The move. Randy had been staying with his family for three months. He really wanted to go home. His wife decided to make the move. They packed up all of their things and packed it all into a truck. When Randy got home he was really sad.

Coupon Clipping. I went shopping with my wife. She needed some coupons. I didn't have any but I found one online. When I brought the coupon in the store, it was all I had. I was amazed by how many I had printed there.

Online Shopping. Kris decided to make his own bed for the first time. He gathered up all his materials and started sewing. After all of the hard work, he felt confident he would finish. Kris went to the bed store and paid for the bed. He left feeling satisfied with the way his work turned out.

New Router. My internet stopped working the other day. I had to call tech support to fix it. They came out to my house a couple of hours later. They replaced the router for me. Now I have the internet working again.

Firebug. Nala's grandfather was a firefighter. They went down to his old house to visit him. There was a lot of smoke in the house! Nala's grandfather took her out to see the house. He showed Nala the old fire truck and talked to her about it.

New handbag. Susie really wanted a new bag. Her favorite ones was the ones in black. But the ones in pink looked so good she wanted a pink one too. So she went to the store and picked out a pink one. When she got home she realized she had never opened the zipper.

Space Mountain. We went on the Space Mountain ride at Disney. We rode the highest ride in the park. The ride was terrifying. We screamed throughout the ride. The ride was so scary that we decided to never ride it again.
Movies. The family decided to watch a movie. They chose to watch a horror movie. They sat on the sofa and enjoyed the film. The house was shaking. They decided to change their movie pick.

amnesia. Heather was a gymnast. During one routine, she forgot to balance herself. She fell and hit her head on the ground. Her head was bleeding but it didn't stop. Heather's coach took her to the hospital.

Getting Ears Pierced. Today is the day I will be getting my ears pierced. It is an expensive and time-consuming process. I have spent a lot of time researching and procrastinating. Today is finally here. After I get my ears pierced I will never want to have trouble again.

Total heat stroke. Ricky's dog was out in the backyard playing with a ball. She got a call from her sister to go check on her. When she got there, the dog was sprawled unconscious on the ground. She thought she could save him, but then she saw what happened. The ball had kicked her into a full on heat stroke.

To the Beach. Mary's family was staying in her hometown. One day the family decided to go to the beach. Mary ran outside to play, but it was too hot outside. Instead, her family decided to walk the beach instead. They walked the beach to the beach, where it was much cooler.

The Hair Band. Ella was at her cousin's house. Her aunt was helping her decorate. She was holding her daughter's hair in a bowl. She twirled the hair around and gave it a crazy style. Ella had fun decorating her bedroom for her.

Army Recruit. Derek applied to be a sergeant in the US army. He was selected and scheduled to interview. He took the test and passed it. Derek was then contacted by the recruitment office. He was accepted and set to go off to join the army.

Graphing Calculator. I wanted to learn how to use a graphing calculator. I decided to go to the library to ask for a graphing calculator. The librarian allowed me to borrow a calculator. I bought a graphing calculator. I was able to use it to graph many important financial data points.

Tail. Joe had just gotten a new boat. His dad gave him the keys and told him to put it on the dock. Joe climbed into the boat and started to paddle around. His dad yelled at him to stop but Joe ignored him. He got out of the boat and put the key on the dock.

Road Trip. Billy and his wife decided to go on a road trip. They drove to Arizona and stopped at a local river. They also stopped at a local zoo to see the animals. Once there, they took lots of photos. They had such a great time on the trip!

The Paper. Jim needed to write a report for school. He sat down to write but got distracted. Jim looked up at the clock and saw that it was almost time to go. Jim wrote for 10 minutes straight on the paper. When it was time to go, Jim went and finished his report.

The old town visit. One day while on vacation my husband and I decided to visit the old town. We drove to a quaint old town. We got into the historical buildings and had lunch. Then we went back to the car to go home. We loved the old town.

In Trouble. The children were playing near the creek. A large snake was waiting to eat some of the children's lunch. It took all of the children to jump into the water. The snake began to swim towards the children. The children had to swim to the creek to escape the snake.

The Goat. I was walking my dog through the park one day. He noticed a large, fat, brown and yellow goat. He was so big and fat! I decided that I would feed him. He ate the whole loaf of bread that I gave him.

Ferns. Cameron grew a beautiful garden in his backyard. He loved playing in the beautiful flowers that grew there. One day he planted a bunch of ferns along the garden perimeter. They blossomed into beautiful plants within weeks! He loved having a healthy garden in his backyard.

Siblings. Nina wanted to play the drums but her parents wouldn't let her. As a result she joined a band. At first the band sounded awful but the lead singer improved. In time the band got much better. Now Nina is very popular and her parents are proud of her.

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex realizes that he's fallen asleep watching television. His wife reminds him to get up and get ready for work. Rex realizes he'll have to drive to the office. He arrives 20 minutes late and is fired on the spot. Rex is now a father of two who has to get a good night's sleep.

Camping. A little girl loved to camp. She would be alone for the entire day with her brother. They had no idea it was going to be that scary. She had no idea how they were going to survive. She had one day to go, but she knew she loved camping.
The Game. The kids were playing a video game. They had just started playing. The game suddenly paused. They decided to get another game. They played until they were tired.

The Pistol. Dan was in the backyard shooting hoops. He hit a three pointer and his friends came running over. They all celebrated the shot. Dan ran to the hoop to show off his new pistol. Dan was so proud of his new pistol.

Leaf Collector. Dana loved to collect leaves. She gathered up leaves in her backyard and brought them to her plant. Dana would then leave them all over her house for birds to find. She also found leaves to sell on the internet. Dana made lots of money from her leaf collecting business.
Frank Finds a Friend. Frank is lonely. He decides to find a friend to play with. Frank gets some buddies together. Frank plays with his friends. Frank feels a bit happier.

Driving School. Amy was terrified of getting her driver's license. But Amy was a good driver and knew her parents would be proud. She practiced day and night until she passed her test. Amy felt so proud when her mom handed her the driving test. Amy's parents were happy she had passed her test!
Summer 1987. I was out for a walk in the sun. It was late at night and I got sleepy. I sat down on a bench. The sun shined on me as I walked to my car. The sun warmed my body while I walked home.

The Expensive Bill. Jane's bill came in the mail. It was over $200 for the cable TV she didn't want. Jane didn't know what to do. She called her cable company. Luckily, they gave her a better deal for a new box.

Sanitary. Tom was going to go camping with friends. He brought his own toilet paper and toilet paper rolls. Tom did not know he needed to use those. Tom was forced to use those. Tom brought his own toilet paper and toilet paper rolls.

Wednesday Dinner. I went to my first ever Wednesday night dinner with my friends. We decided to go to a seafood restaurant. There was a lot of crab meat. I was surprised at how delicious it was. My friends had fun eating it.

The Letter. A boy named Ryan heard his teacher say a boy was being picked to be in a school play. He wrote a letter to his mom explaining he wasn't interested. Ryan waited and waited for the letter. After many months Ryan got a letter. It was a letter his mom had sent to the school.
Fast Cars. Manny wanted to buy a new fast car. He checked every dealership in the area. He made plans with his friends. He bought a new fast car. He got to drive it home.
Wedding Disaster. Alicia was getting married. She needed to pick out her dress. She went to a local shop. She chose the perfect white gown. But the store had out of white gowns!
The Rug. The rug in my living room was falling apart. I bought some craft glue and painted it. Then I glued some of the pieces on. Finally I nailed it shut. I love the new look.
Hair Spray. I was getting my hair brushed. My friend offered me some hair spray. I decided to try it. It did not do what I expected. I then had to find something else.

Jake Finds a Friend. Jake was in an area with few people. He decided to join a chat room. People there were friendly and helpful to Jake. Jake was happy to have found someone to talk to. He also got to meet a girl there too.

Writing a Song. I wanted to write a song. I tried to write one that was beautiful. After a long time, I finally finished it. However, the song was not as good as I had hoped. I will not be practicing my songwriting skills any more.

Sandwich Thief. Bobby's family has a tradition of getting him a sandwich before school. The tradition is to get him a peanut butter sandwich with a ham and cheese. However, this time, Bobby was hungry and had a sandwich anyway. He devoured the sandwich, feeling satisfied that it wasn't a ham and cheese. As he left the classroom he saw a group of kids mocking his sandwich.

A bear spotted. Tim and his friends were out camping. They hiked all around the mountain looking for bears. Suddenly a bear began to chase them. Tim and his friends hid behind a tree all night. The next day they went back out and the bear never found them.

Fun at the Park. Billy was having a lot of fun at the park. He had just been there with his friends all afternoon. All of a sudden he saw a pretty girl. She was walking next to him and he got a bit jealous. Billy kept walking.
David goes fishing. David had a very boring day at work. He decided to go fishing. David rented a boat. He took his boat to a local pond. David had a very good day fishing.

The New Drone. Bob was a pilot for a small airline. He was always afraid of flying. He was hired to fly their new drone for a couple days. It was a really scary experience for him. The company offered him a raise the following week.

Answered Prayer. The pastor gave us an assignment to pray for the lost kids. The kids were very grateful, but they were also very sad. The pastor went to the office of the lost kids. He prayed there for everyone to pray and comfort each other. They were happy and relieved, and the pastor felt good.

One Store School Supplies. Janice wanted to buy herself some school supplies. She went to the school supply store. The store was out of all the supplies Janice wanted. She left the store empty handed. Janice drove to a local thrift store to buy the supplies.

Clean Towels. Beth had an important interview coming up. She had a job interview on Thursday. She needed to wash her clothes for her interview. She decided to do laundry. Beth washed the clothes she needed to at the laundromat.

piercing. Riley wanted to get her ears pierced. She went to the piercing parlor with her parents. She wanted her ears pierced in one ear. They said she could do it in the other. Riley's parents had the piercing done.
No experience. Tim was taking a test at school. He was very nervous. He didn't know the material well. Tim made a mistake. The teacher gave him an F.

The costume party. Abby was a girl scout. She was really excited for her annual costume party. All her friends came to the costume party. Her friends made a lot of funny costumes. Abby had a lot of fun.
The Test. Joe's teacher gave out a test to the class. Joe didn't know how to take it. His teacher explained it. He took the test. Joe got an A.

Daughter to Work. Nina wanted a baby. But she had never wanted one for herself. One day, she decided to start dating a man who worked. The man asked Nina if she wanted to become a mother. Nina accepted and is now a mother to six.
Greedy Child. A hungry kid sat at his desk. He stared at the stack of cereal. There was a piece of candy stuck in one of the pieces. The kid gobbled the candy piece. Then he looked at the cereal.

After Hours Capers. Kya was walking through the city. Suddenly she spotted a lost puppy. Kya found the puppy hiding in the subway. She took the puppy home and made it her pet. It's owner was very happy with the outcome.

Ruined Pants. Beth had bought a new pair of pants for school. As Beth was putting them on at school, she slipped. The pants ripped in the seam. Beth was upset that her new pants were ruined. Beth went home to change before her friends saw her.

New Underwear. Amy wanted to make herself a pair of new socks. She wanted to do this at home to make them for school. She went through her old sock closet. She found the pair she wanted to make and started sewing. She made the socks for school the next day.

Mildred Tries Out For Soccer. Mildred had always wanted to play soccer at her high school. She decides to join the team for tryouts. She practices every day for an hour. The next week she tries out for the team. Mildred makes the team and is happy.
Flossing Pain. I was flossing in my mouth. The toothpaste came out of the tube. I ran it down my throat. The toothpaste made me gag. I tried to spit it out but it just made more pain.
Dominick's Birthday. It was Dominick's birthday. His friends wanted to buy him a present. He hated presents. He waited in the corner for hours. He finally got his present from them.
Ice Cream. Bobby went to buy some ice cream. He went to the ice cream parlor. Bobby wanted to try a few flavors. He had the cream from a scoop bowl. Bobby thought that the ice cream was good.

A Wall of Burning Books. Carmen's mom always told her not to burn her homework. But Carmen loved to play games on her computer. And she would put a ton of homework on the coffee table. Carmen's mom thought Carmen should be punished. So Carmen's mom made her put her homework on the floor.

Biking Through a Puddle. James was out riding his bike on a wet afternoon. He kept hearing a crunch under his tire. He decided to stop to look. He saw a puddle of water below a truck stuck in a mud puddle. James hopped out his bike and rode into the mud to help.
US Invades Iraq. The United States went to war in Iraq. The war was very difficult. A lot of American soldiers were killed. The war was eventually over. Now the country is in political chaos.

Story. Bob was a writer in middle school. One day he told a story about a man and his dog. Bob thought the story was terrible. The teacher gave the story an F. Bob was happy that he couldn't finish the story.
Blankets. The cat was sitting on the sofa. It started to wiggle. The cat's owner reached under the sofa. The cat jumped on the blanket. The cat squealed with delight.

Envy. I saw a beautiful girl at the mall. My jealousy was reaching its climax. I decided to stare at her for one second longer. She turned around and saw me staring at her. She didn't let it bother her and ran away.
Old Bear. I was at the museum yesterday. I saw a old bear in a corner. It was dirty and looked injured. It was frozen on one knee. I had to go and pick it up.
The Pool. Jane and her friends went to the pool. It was very hot. They decided to go swimming. It was a lot of fun. They decided to go every day.

Swinging. Amy wanted to swing her arms as she left the house. She would practice every day on the playground. Her dad took her to the local park. She practiced there every day. She got really good at swinging after a week!
A skiing accident. Tim was skiing in a forest. He took a wrong turn. He didn't see anyone and slipped. He fell down into a creek. His friends had to help him out.
The Swan. Beth was on her way to the lake with her dad. She saw a beautiful swan. She swam closer to it. It took her awhile to get it's attention. Luckily she did and it swam closer to her.

A Difficult Reading. John was trying to study for an exam. His book didn't help much. John asked the professor for help. The professor suggested another book. John used the book as a reference in class.

Recital. I took an interest in saxophone playing. I wanted to audition for a jazz ensemble. I practiced hard. I finally had the opportunity to audition for the jazz ensemble. I was so excited when the call came back I cried.

The Grand Escape. Travis's friend called him to the phone. Travis told him that his mother was outside the phone. Travis's mom had been arrested for using drugs. Travis called his friend and told him to meet him outside. His friend was so happy, he drove him to jail.
Lost purse. Ally was on her way to school. She realized her purse was missing. She looked everywhere. Finally she found it in her bag. It had been ripped and the zipper was still on.

Lying. Tim got caught in a lie. His mother told him he couldn't eat candy until school was out. He didn't want to say anything and got into trouble. His teacher made him write a whole paper on the subject. Tim wrote a full paper without telling anyone.
Overgrowth. The plants in the yard were growing too much. Tom was tired of this. He decided to cut them. He didn't have time to tend to them. Tom had to throw them away.

The Driver's Test. Ricky was a nervous wreck in the driver's test. He got in the car with the examiner. The examiner started asking questions. Ricky felt more comfortable as the test progressed. The examiner gave Ricky a passing grade.

Green Thumb. Beth found a green thumb in her son's room. She picked it up, and put it on her wrist. The color was so strange, she was scared. She had never seen it before, and thought she should be more careful. Her son laughed at her, saying it was just a silly decoration.

Snake Escape. Bill and Jan were out fishing. Bill accidentally threw Jan's pole into the water. Jan was able to get the pole out of the water, but Bill was not. Jan grabbed a rope and pulled herself out of the water. Bill and Jan walked out of the river together.

Mandarin Chinese. I had an important meeting in an hour. I was running late so I decided to go to a Chinese restaurant. I walked into the restaurant and sat down. My Chinese teacher was very nice. She was able to give me a good introduction to the language.

Devil's Paradise. Jack went to a casino. He decided to bet all his money on blackjack. A cop showed up and asked why he was there. Jack had been busted by the cops earlier. The cop called the gambler's mother to tell her about the arrest.
Broken Axle. Tom was driving to school. He got a flat tire. He replaced his flat tire with a spare. Tom felt more confident driving around. It helped Tom pass his test.

Near Drowning. Mary was walking along a street. Her stomach was in the water. She was nervous that someone would be near her. She was forced to swim across the water to the street. She almost drowned.
Too fast. Kia was speeding through town. She drove over the speed limit twice. A cop spotted her. He pulled her over. Kia was arrested for reckless driving.

Boo!. The school cheerleaders were out for the season. They had a big race that was scheduled for the next day. During the race, the girls hit the field and competed. While the competition was going on, one of the girls tripped. Her teammates helped her up and she won the race!
time capsule. Ed found a box with a time capsule. He looked inside to see the time. It said it was 5:00 PM. He took it to the museum. Then he went home and looked at it.
Berry's Trick. Berry was an electrician. He was working on a project. Berry got stuck. Berry's boss saw him struggling. The boss told Berry to go home and rest.
Car accident. John was running late for work. He was very tired. He drove fast on the highway. When he got there he was not even stopped. A car slammed into him and his engine was totaled.

Falling tree. The Jones family had a large tree in their backyard. It had large limbs and branches. One day the Jones tree fell on the family's house. The Jones family had to go get a ladder to put the tree down. They put the tree in their garage.

Special Delivery. My friend and I took a trip from Boston to New York City. While we were in New York we stopped at Bryant Park. While we were in Bryant Park my friend asked if we could ride the E train. We went to Bryant Park on an E train, it was a special occasion. The ride to New York City was fantastic and a great time.
The Pie. Tina was trying to make a pie. She mixed all the ingredients. Then she baked the pie. The pie came out great. Tina was so happy that her family loved her pie.

Clean Room. John had a room full of clutter. It was full of clothes, books, newspapers, and so on. He decided to clean it out. John started by organizing his books into shelves. He then made sure his books were on top of shelves.

The Race. My cousin and I decided to go to the carnival together. We drove down to the big water park. When we arrived, we saw the giant Ferris wheel. We both got on the big roller coaster. We both had a lot of fun!

Lifetime Puppy. Tom got a new puppy for his tenth birthday. The puppy is always grumpy. Tom tries his best to get it to behave. Tom gets frustrated and tries to train him to act right. Eventually, Tom can get the puppy to stop making such a mess.

Bicycle Racing. John and Steve decided to race bicycles in the street. John would try to beat Steve by fifty meters. Steve would try to beat John by sixty meters. Eventually John won. Steve was not happy.

Free Samples. Tom worked at the local fast food place. They were giving away free samples on Wednesday. Tom was really excited to get some food. Tom got his food and went back for more. He was so excited that he kept eating.

Bike. Cameron wanted to bike for exercise. He decided to bike in his neighborhood to find a spot to practice. On his first trip, he biked down the sidewalk and into the alley. He fell and scraped his knee and broke his bike. Cameron decided to try again and ride in the street instead.

Don't make false promises. I took my girlfriend out to eat. I ordered an entree and an entree side salad. However, I had to eat without dressing it. They were not making the entrees in the salad dressing. After I left, they replaced the entrees with chicken breast.

Wheeled. Dan had always wanted to drive a car. Dan asked his friends to go to the shop and get him a car. After getting the car he got the mechanic to fix the brakes. Once the brakes were installed he went outside and drove. He had a great day with his new car and friends.

Secure System. The police officer called the bank. He wanted to make sure he had the right amount of money. When he went to the teller window the bank window was locked. The bank manager told him to go back to the front desk. The police officer went back to the bank.
Distracted. Tom bought a new iphone. He was listening to music loudly. His wife told him to turn it down. Tom listened to the music very loudly. He annoyed his wife.

Morbid reality. Theresa had been married to her husband for twenty years. One evening she had a heart attack while drinking wine. She was rushed to the hospital. She was pronounced brain dead. She never recovered and had to be cremated.

Chemistry. Tom's mom gave him an extra credit assignment for school. Tom needed to figure out how to do chemical equations. Tom studied hard on the homework. Tom made a B on his assignment. His mom told him that he failed his first grade.

The Football Star. Mike was a star football player. He would always score touchdowns on his team. One day, the game was at a big game. The team needed a touchdown to win. Mike scored a touchdown and the team won!
Flat. I had a big flat tire. I called my friends to let them know. They picked me up and took me to the repair shop. The tire was flat. They fixed it for me.
Lost Money. Tim had money. He decided to go out with friends. He told his friends he would buy them drinks. Tim's friends did not believe him. Tim went home with no money.

Bad Start. Tim was a manager at the local shopping mall. He always greeted customers with a smile and asked if they needed help. One day a customer complained that he did not greet him properly. Tim didn't listen and yelled at the customer. The customer sued Tim and won millions of dollars.

Mountain Trip. Barry went mountain climbing. He decided to climb the tallest peak in the area. The mountain became very steep. Barry felt himself slipping and couldn't keep up. Barry ran down the mountain and felt regret for not doing his homework.
Bad Grades. Tim was in class. And he made a bad grade. He decided to never make that grade again. But after a few months he got another one. He decided to not make the grades that badly again.

Cute Awakening. Jill had always had a secret that she wished she hadn't told anyone. When her mom told her that she should tell them she was nervous. However, when she told them, she had no problems at all. The girls complimented her and told her she was cute. Jill was glad she told them, but her mom was surprised at how cute she was.

Paul's Change of Address and Change of Heart. Paul was feeling very down after being fired. He began to think about all the money he could possibly have. Paul did not have the money he would need to live comfortably. One day, Paul heard about an old church that was open to the poor. Paul began going to church there more often after that.

Angry Feelings. I work as a research scientist. I used to always get angry easily. I was so annoyed that I was fired from my job. The company decided to give me more responsibilities. This reduced my anger and I am happier there.

College Troubles. Landon wanted to go to college but was worried about his parents. He worried that they wouldn't support him if he didn't graduate. He worried about his college prospects until he was invited to a party. There, his parents were there to cheer him on to graduation day! They had a wonderful time celebrating Landon's college-coming graduation.

Alan's Big Break. Alan had always wanted to be a baseball player. He worked very hard to be on the school baseball team. During his senior year of high school, he was scouted by the Yankees. Alan worked very hard at his craft to impress the Yankees. Alan is now a big league baseball player and he has finally landed his dream.

Reaching the peak. Tia loved being outdoors and had her bucket list. She was determined to hike to the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro. She prepared well and planned her trip. She arrived in Tanzania and spent two weeks hiking the mountains. She was so proud when she reached the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro.

Lip Gloss. I recently got my lip gloss. The color is a light pink. I tried to keep it from going on too long. Thankfully, the color wore off pretty quickly. I decided to keep the gloss in my lip gloss case.
Stray Cat. Joe's cat ran away one day. He looked everywhere for her. He put up signs. The next day he got a call from a neighbor. His cat had been found.
New pasta sauce. Susie loved pasta sauce. She decided to make her own. So she got the ingredients. But then she burned them. Susie was then disappointed.
The broken wick. Susie was lighting candles. She was trying to get them to go out. Suddenly the wick got stuck. It wouldn't let them out. She had to use a lighter to get it out.

Bookworm. My sister in law had a house on the second floor. There was a fire that ripped the roof off. They had to have their entire roof replaced. The book worm got stuck and wouldn't come out. They had to call a company that came out and got it out.

Spongebob. I have a crush on a girl in my class named Spongebob. She is the spitting image of Spongebob. I tried to talk to her to no avail. I decided to steal her pencils to talk to her. She ran away from me and now I'm alone.

Going Back to School. I never wanted to go back to college. I was tired of work and homeschooled. I had to go back to school after failing. It was hard and terrifying at the same time. I was not ready for the work and school atmosphere.
Sarah gets lucky. Sarah is having a bad day. She doesn't know what to do. Sarah gets a call. Her friend is being picked up by her sister. Sarah gets her friend's phone number.
All Nighter. Troy had a test at school. His eyes were starting to close. He knew he needed to be awake. So he stayed up all night studying. The next day, he passed the test.

Hiding the Gift. Karen went to a school party. Some kids threw a party and asked if anyone had a gift. Karen hid the gift on the dresser. After about an hour the party was over. Karen realized the dresser was broken and hid the gift.
Shocked. Kia was having dinner with her family. Suddenly she heard loud crashing. She ran to see what it was. She realized it was her baby brother! Luckily, he just cried for a moment.

Gig. I wanted to learn how to juggle. So I took up the sport. Alas, I couldn't really juggle well. So I decided to just practice outside instead. Alas, my practice sessions were unplanned and the gym closed.
Typing. Kenny hated to type a lot. However, it was very important to him. So he decided to improve his typing speed. He bought some software to type faster. But it didn't help Kenny at all.

Beach day. Tim was excited to spend time with his family at the beach. He packed a beach towel and some snacks. After dinner, they all piled into his car to go for a drive. After driving for an hour, they arrived at the beach. After dinner, they all laid out blankets and towels on the sand.
