Freshman Orientation. It was Julie's first day of freshman orientation. The principal introduced herself to Julie and other freshmen. The school was in the same building as the freshman center Julie worked in. The principal gave Julie a tour of the school. Julie was happy to meet new friends.

Pleased. I am so happy to be the first in line to pick up my lunch. I go to the store everyday to get a snack and some chips. Today I saw that the lines were very short and I was excited. I was surprised that I was able to be the first. I am so happy that I was able to be first in line today.
Bread. Tim had just eaten a loaf of bread. He decided to make a cake. He then put it on a plate. Tim accidentally dropped it by accident. It flew all over the place.

Electronic music. James wanted to make a new genre of music. He went to the music store to get samples of electronic music. He bought all the electronic music he needed. He recorded his music and shared it with friends. Now James is a big electronic music producer.
Saving a Life. Tim was having a heart attack. His family needed to do something. They drove him to the hospital. He had a cesarean section. He died that night.

Mushroom Pizza. Nancy liked to make food with mushrooms. She made the pizza dough and mushrooms. She also put the pizza in the oven to make it pop. Nancy then put the mushrooms in a bowl with the other ingredients. The pizza popped and she was happy.

The Job Offer. Dan needed to get a new car. Dan checked many cars in his local dealerships. However, Dan did not like any of the ones he saw. Finally, Dan saw an advertisement in the paper for a dealership. Dan decided he would make an offer and took the job offer.
The Bike. Jim got a new bike for his birthday. He decided to ride it all day. Jim fell one day and hurt his knee. He was too scared to ride it again. He bought a bike that was easier to carry around.
The Murder. In 1999 I was watching TV. A murder occurred on the screen. I became terrified. I screamed and got up. I never returned to watch TV.

Judy Know Football. Judy knew how to kick football. She decided to try out for her school's football team. The day of tryouts she was nervous but still confident. Her coach told her to try out and she did. The next day she made the team.

The Touchdown. Ben was wide receiver for his high school football team. He had caught a pass from an old friend of his. He was about to run towards the end zone. However, his friend missed him. Ben decided to pass the ball to the other team to score.
Stamp Collection. One day I found a stamp collection. It was made of old stamps. It was so cool looking. My parents decided to sell it for me. It was worth a lot of money.

A common scenario. Jim thought he was the fastest runner on his team. He trained everyday. He entered a competition for the fastest runners in his town. He trained for over a year. Jim got second place in the competition.
Tim buys a puppy. Tim always wanted to get a pet. He decided to buy a puppy. He got a puppy for his birthday. He loved his new pet. Tim was glad he got a puppy.

Court of Some Peels. A prisoner stood on the courthouse steps. He had a stack of old newspapers. The sheriff got out a pair of tweezers. He began to peel off the old newspapers. The prisoner walked down the steps and thanked the sheriff.

The Carnival. The kids rode the ferris wheel all afternoon. The ferris wheel had so much to do! The kids were so excited. After the fun ride, the kids went home. They could not wait to come back for more!
Lottery. We bought tickets to go to the casino. We spent all of our money. We played until our eyes were red. We left the casino. We bought the tickets at the gas station.

Luke. Luke was a young boy. He loved playing video games. One day his parents got him a new video game system. He played it all day but he never learned how to play. He was very sad because he couldn't play any more video games.

No Perfect Dress. Kara bought a new dress for her prom. But when she tried on it, she didn't like it. She tried on all the dresses on display. None of them fit. So, Kara had to go home without a dress.
Sand Castles. I made a sand castle at the beach. As I was making it, my foot slipped. The sand castle fell over. I went to pick it up. The castle was not very big.
Rainy Day. Kate wanted to go swimming. But it was raining outside. It wouldn't let Kate go out in the rain. But it would let her read for the day. It was a good compromise.

Kim's Son's Glasses. Kim was at the store with her son. Kim was trying on a pair of glasses that her son needed. The glasses were too small for her son's eyes. She went home to make him a pair that fit. Kim and her son wore the glasses the rest of the day.

Fixing the roof. I saw that my roof was leaking in my attic. I went to my local home improvement store to get some materials. After they finished, I inspected the roof. I installed new shingles to fix the leak. Afterwards, I left the house.
Shoes. My wife lost her old pair of shoes. She found a pair she liked online. I ordered the shoes off of Amazon. I shipped the shoes to my house. The shoes arrived on Friday.

The Boy's Dog. Gina had brought her new puppy into the house. He ran to the door to let her know she was home. But he was nervous to see the big brown dog who was sitting on his bed. The boy opened the door and pet the dog. Gina watched him play with his dog for a long time.

Burning Down. Jake was out hiking one day. He found a small fire pit by the side of the trail. Jake began to gather brush and tie it up. When it started to get really hot, he took his lighter out and started it. Before he knew it, the fire was out.

Ticket Hogger. Bill has always wanted to drive in NH. He saves up his money for his dream car. When he goes to his first driving test, he has a great time. He goes on to drive in many more driving schools. Now Bill owns his own auto insurance company.

Pokemon Hunting. My friends and I decided to go to the Pokemon Go website. We took off our shoes, grabbed some Pokeballs, and walked to the site. We were greeted by the cute lady at the front desk who helped us. After locating a nearby Pokestop, we each grabbed a Pokeball. It was time to explore, as we walked around a bit to see all the Pokestops.

Poor Clark. Clark hated himself. He had a job but it didn't pay enough. He got a job at a gas station. He met a nice young man there named Donny. Clark never regretted his decision to work at the gas station.

Wet Phone. Brett took his phone out of his pocket to wash it. When he put the phone back in the pocket it was wet. He looked around to see how others were washing their phones. Brett found a friend washing his phone. Brett thanked the friend for sharing his phone.

Picky Much?. The woman was trying to buy a gift for a classmate. She went to the gift shop and asked for a few recommendations. The store did not have what she was looking for. The employee suggested some toys that they both had. The customer took the toys home and placed them on her shelf.

Street Racing. John and Frank decided to go street racing. John got his friends to race him and Frank got his friends to win. After the race it started to rain so John and Frank decided to go home. While going home they were both soaked and covered in mud. Their parents made them clean up after their race and they had to stay home.

Tooth Fairy. Kelley's sister found a $20 bill. She told her mom, who said that it could be good luck. Kelley got on her knees to find out what it could mean. Her mom said that it was from the Tooth Fairy. So they went to the dentist to get a tooth pulled.
beans. I loved eating beans. I would eat them every day. One day I found some that were red. The beans were very yucky. I realized that I was allergic to red beans.

Odd habit. I have a very odd habit. I always get really stressed at work. When I would stress out, I would try to stay up late watching tv. I found out that it was extremely unhealthy. Now I stay up at night and sleep really well.

Grades. Timmy always did his homework in class. One day the teacher assigned a test on Friday. Timmy did not study for the test that week. Timmy did not do his best on the test. He failed the class the next day.

Walker Gets Organized. Walker went to his bedroom to put his clothes on. When he looked in his room he noticed it was very messy. He went downstairs and got his clothes in the dryer. When he came back in his room his room was clean and organized. Walker is happy he organized his room.

Science Project. Bob was assigned a project for science. He did his best to come up with a project idea. After reviewing his ideas, he was able to come up with an idea. He wrote a description and a picture of his project. Bob was proud when he turned in his project.

The Surprise Party. Jim had been in love with his girlfriend since he was six years old. He planned a surprise party for her and her family. When Jim got the party, he invited all her closest friends. When everyone arrived, he presented a cake, roses, and balloons. She was surprised and elated, and had a great time at the party.
Too much work. My coworker was sick. She needed her work cut. So we asked her to work extra. She agreed. The cut was too much though.

Hula Hoops. Cindy liked to do Hula Hoop tricks. She wanted to teach her brother. Her brother always did not like them. But Cindy kept trying and kept coming up with new things. They started to be friends with the best of them.

the Freeloader. Tim got a job as a janitor. Tim hated his job but could not stand living on his own. Tim tried to find a way to make money at his new job. He decided to do community service work. He was happy to make some money working at his new job.
The world. There was a world on the beach. It was a huge ocean. Bob was on it and looked around. He wanted to explore it. So he got out and began.

Bad Reception. John was a professional golfer. He played on the local golf course. John had a bad tee off on his first round. He felt very uncomfortable after he played. He never recovered from his tee off.

Eli. Eli wanted to take a bike ride in the park. He went to the park, but someone else wanted to bike with him. Eli was confused about his friends' intentions. Finally, he decided to let them ride with him. At the end of the day, they both had a great time riding together!

Running on Fumes. Nancy was baking a cake. The oven was ready to be preheated. The doorbell rang. Nancy didn't have time to put the cake in the oven. Her house burned down because of the smoke from the oven.

kittens. Annie decided to take her kitten to a shelter. She got there and found many cute kittens. She chose a brown one that she thought was cute. The lady at the shelter said she could have the kitten. Annie decided to take her home.

the graveyard. Beverly loved to visit the graveyard. Her friends would always comment on how beautiful it was. Beverly took a walk to the graveyard. She discovered a box of ashes and a coffin. Her friends were thrilled.
The Bagel. Sally made a bagel for herself. She found the right amount of butter and sugar. She added it to the batter. She let the bagel rise in the oven. She was so hungry she ate it!

Pancakes with Grandma. My grandmother loves to cook. I always love her pancakes with honey. I told her pancakes with sugar are bad for me. I gave her the recipe for pancakes with honey. My grandma made the best pancakes with sugar.

Overtime. Today is the last day of my job as a data entry clerk. I work at a large department store and have been here for over 20 years. I have been working this job for my entire life. My job is very stressful and a lot of fun. I am really looking forward to retirement and the new life of my own.

The Scary Car. Sam was driving home from work. A car pulled out in front of him. Sam quickly swerved to avoid it. Sam's tire went flat on the way home. Sam called the police and reported the accident.
Rainy Vacation. John and Tom were vacationing. It began to rain. John was afraid of the rainy. He stayed in the car anyway. They did not see the park.

The Cookie Exchange. The other day, I was walking to my school. I saw a box with cookies. I wanted to get a cookie, so I walked over to it. I opened up a box of cookies. There was cookie dough, which I really enjoyed.
Cereal. Cindy was making breakfast. But she had no milk! She decided to substitute a few teaspoons of powder for her cereal. It tasted great! Cindy was happy that she had no milk for breakfast!
Scuba diving. The Smith family went scuba diving. They had never been scuba diving before. They put on life jackets. They swam into the water. They had a fun time!

The Dry Milk. Jake was at home with his toddler. He was trying to feed him but the milk was not coming out. Jake tried to pour some into a milk jug but it was too big. Jake found that the jug was too small to fit his toddler. He filled it up by hand so Jake would not have to waste milk.

Vladimir Plays Pool. Vladimir wants to learn to play pool. He signs up for lessons. He works very hard for the first month. Finally he is a great pool player. Vladimir feels proud that he has learned to play pool.

Playing graveyard. Tom loved being at the graveyard. His friends always teased him for it. Tom eventually lost his enthusiasm. They kept teasing him. Tom eventually stopped being involved with graveyard.
Accident at Home. Tom was home alone. He heard a loud crash at the door. Tom tried to go to check it out. The door was closed. Tom called the cops and they said he was lucky.
Justin breaks down. Justin is driving down the road. He is going pretty good. All of a sudden his car goes flat. He pulls over and waits for help. His friend arrives and fixes his car.

Cathy's Garden. Cathy wanted to have a garden. Cathy went to the store to purchase seeds. After purchasing the seeds, Cathy went home and planted them. After planting the seeds, Cathy watered them daily. After watering the plants everyday, Cathy could see a garden.

Favorite Letter. Tommy really wanted to write a letter to his mother. He was afraid to write it. His mother told him she didn't like letters. Tommy began writing it anyway. He was happy to write it and send it.

Head Stuck. Kim was playing in her backyard. She knocked over some cans and the grass went up. Kim tried to stand back up, but she couldn't stand. She ended up getting her head stuck in the grass. She had to use a chainsaw to get it out.
Lost CD. Sam lost his CD. He searched everywhere in his car for it. Sam called a friend. Sam's friend gave him his CD. Sam was able to listen to it again.
cringey LDR. I met a girl online. She had red hair and brown skin. We decided to meet in person. We talked for hours. We ended up becoming best friends.

Losing Faith. Bob had always believed that Santa Claus wasn't real. He felt convinced that Santa would bring him presents this year. On Christmas morning, Bob woke up feeling disappointed and sad. Bob quickly realized he could have waited for months. He decided that there was more to Santa Claus than meets the eye.
Woods. The man walked in the woods. He was going for a hike. He saw a bear. He screamed. The bear ran away.
Alex's Sickness. Alex was always sick. His parents wanted him to get better. They made him play in the snow. Finally he got better! Alex loved playing in the snow!

Don't Do It. My mom asked me to buy her groceries. I decided to steal them. I didn't pay much attention and I got caught. I ended up getting a two week suspension. I was forced to do community service instead.

Ken's First Day. Ken is nervous for his first day at work. He has never worked with people in this type of position. When he arrives to his new job he meets some coworkers. They seem friendly and welcoming. Ken feels very relaxed and welcomed at his new job.

Not crazy. Amy was nervous about going to the library. She thought people were weird. As she got to the library she realized she was not. The librarian was not crazy at all. Amy decided to go to the library without worry.
Protest. Natalie was in a political protest. She wanted to get rid of cops. She threw a rock at a cop. The cop jumped on her. She was arrested and put in jail.

Fate. Ina sat alone and watched as her husband's friend walked out on her. She did not want to follow her, but she was too frightened. She watched him go on his way, and tried to be calm. But her mind went blank, and she couldn't get the thoughts out. Ina fell asleep with her head on her pillow that night.

Tom and the Turtles. Tom and his friends were playing with turtles. Tom was having a lot of fun with them. He had a really cool shell that they wanted to show off. It was a really cool shell but they couldn't decide what to put in it. They eventually decided on a turtle that would fit perfectly.

The Lasagna. Julie was making lasagna for her boyfriend. She carefully poured the sauce into the pan. When it was done, she sliced the noodles. She cooked the noodles for an hour. Her boyfriend loved the meal.

Nurse Talitha. Talitha was a new nurse in a hospital. She loved working with the sickest patients. She got very well into it. She knew she'd be a nurse her whole life. Talitha got the job and made it her mission.

Lost and resentful. Joe had an uncle named Harry. Harry was a big brother of his. The two brothers got into a big fight one day. Joe and Harry fought for the wrong reasons. Joe never spoke to Harry since that day.
Swimming team. I was a little boy. We were in our swimming pool. We were running laps and it was really hot. The water was really hot. Then we realized we were too young to go.

Campaign. Bob decided to run for public office. He did a good job during the campaign. People really liked Bob's ideas. When it was time to vote he didn't expect it. People elected Bob because he was running for president!

Final Match. Ivy was the last match of the tournament. Her opponent had been losing to her. Ivy was too nervous to keep up, and fell on the floor. When she got up, she found out her opponent had fallen on her. Ivy defeated her opponent with an arm wrestler.

Painting. Mary wanted to learn to paint. She looked up a few painting books on the Internet. Then she went to the local art store. There she bought paints and brushes and supplies. She got to work painting a beautiful house!

Lindsey's first drive. Lindsey always wanted to learn to drive. She asked her mom for help. Her mom suggested driving around town on a learner's permit. Lindsey got her learner's permit after her mom's house. She drove around town and had a lot of fun.
Karen makes a sandwich. Karen likes to cook. Karen decides she wants to make a sandwich. She makes a sandwich. Karen eats the sandwich. Karen is happy she made a sandwich.
Ron Buys A Phone. Ron has always wanted a smartphone. Ron buys a smartphone for school. Ron loves the phone. Ron brings the phone to school one day. Ron is glad he has a smartphone.

Moving. I met a great girl on my first day of college. We decided to go out to lunch. On our lunch break we stopped at a pizza restaurant. I told her I was moving to Denver. She said she would love to be my roommate.

Key. Sam was going into the house to get his key. He had to lift a heavy heavy box. He could not lift the key alone. He decided to try using his neighbors key. He was very relieved to find it was not as hard as he expected.

Ten Year Reunion. Dan and his wife Jane were both in their sixties. Dan was sad, yet hopeful that their ten year anniversary would be a success. However, their anniversary was a disaster. Dan's wife was upset, but he was pleased to see they were still together. Dan decided they should try to have a longer ten year reunion.

Cleaned Out. Kate was cleaning her house. She saw a mouse in the corner of the room. She looked everywhere. She looked under the bed, in the cabinets, and in the trash can. Eventually she realized it was only a cat, and not a mouse.

Summer dreams destroyed. It was about a month ago that I was feeling like life was not too bad. I went on facebook to see how my friend was doing. I read a story of a little girl who wants to be an actor. I immediately fell in love with the idea and told my friend about it. She then broke up with me over it.

Inconsiderate Neighbor. My neighbors are a family of four. One day I decided to feed one of the kids in their yard. He ended up kicking a car out of the driveway. I felt bad and apologized. Luckily, they understood.

Hide and Go. Dan was hiking up a tall mountain. He saw a group of boys playing hide and go seek. Dan went to tell them where to go. The boys all ran back to where they were. Dan was angry but also amused at the play.

Overwhelmed by technology. It was night time when I went to my mom's house. She has a huge screen television. When I sat down, I immediately jumped up and ran. I went all over the house to try to use it. When I went back to my place, I immediately took it back.

Crazy Neighbors. There was a loud noise outside Tim's window. Tim had to sleep in his bed that night. Tim's neighbors made fun of him for being late. Tim eventually grew tired of it. He eventually moved to another state.

Back Pain. I took my dog to the veterinarian for her annual physical exam. When she got out of the exam room, I saw she had back pain. I took her for a short exam of her back to compare her pain. After the examination, I took her to the veterinarian's office for a treatment plan. The plan included pain medication and a physical exam of her back.

True Challenge. Gina's and her brother were bored on the bus. Her brother suggested they play Truth or Dare. Gina was not sure about Truth or Dare. She was a little scared to be the Truth or Dare queen. But when they played Truth or Dare, Gina had a fun time.

Linda loses. Linda had a big game one night. Linda's team was losing by 30 points. Linda was so upset she called off the game. Linda decided to eat ice cream for a month. Linda didn't feel so bad when she lost the game.

Stranded Island. John was on vacation with his family. They decided to take a cruise ship to a nearby island. While John was at sea he had a really bad sunburn. He went to the shore, got some salt water and salted butter. John had a really great time on the cruise ship!

Social Media. Gina was trying to reach her crush Jamie online. She used a social media account to add him a message. But she was still getting messages from strangers. She was disappointed her friends didn't want to see his attention. She decided to try using a private email account instead.

Nick and the Doll. Nick always wanted a doll as a baby. He begged his parents for one for several days. Finally they said he could have one. He cried as he walked to the checkout. His parents bought him a doll.
Drinking. Tom wanted to have a drink. He walked to a nearby bar. There were several alcoholic drinks there. Tom didn't know which to choose. He wound up choosing the most disgusting drink.
Old Bed. It was a cold winter morning. Jim got up and looked out the window. He saw that he had an old bed. He didn't have any money so he had to throw it out. Now Jim had to sleep on the ground.

Slump. My roommate was a man who had a lot of problems. He was always lazy, late and rude. He would also constantly smoke while on the phone. One day I was bored and went to his room. I was surprised to find out he had his own personal space.

Fun pizza party. One day, my friends and I decided to have a pizza party. We all got together in the living room and we played around. At first we were having fun. Then we realized we were being watched. Then we realized we should have kept it a secret.

Celebrity Look-alike. Amy, a fan of Britney Spears, went to a concert for her favorite pop star. At one point, she spotted a familiar face. When Britney got up on stage, she recognized Amy. She smiled, but didn't say much to Amy. Amy didn't mind her resemblance to Britney at all.
Gun. I had a gun. I wanted to shoot a man. My friend tried to shoot me. I shot him. My friend asked me to stop.

Snake in the Yard. Garry's cat was sleeping in the yard. Garry thought he heard a noise in the next room. He went to check on the cat. The cat was still asleep. Garry found the cat sleeping on the floor.
Math Tutor. I used to work at a school. One day an adult tutor came in. He taught me a bunch of things I didn't know. After a while, I became good at math. Now I have a full-time job as a tutor.
Prom Night. The Johnson family wanted to go to prom. Each of the girls got a dress. They bought matching shoes. The girls met at a buffet after the prom. Everyone had a great time at prom night.
Iron. My daughter came home with a red iron. She was excited to try it out. She wanted to try a few drops. They looked so good she kept shaking them. Then she decided she liked the color blue better.

Goodbye Love. Sally's parents died before she was born. She was raised by a single mom. She was too young for much of anything, until she was six. Sally had a boyfriend by the name of John. She loved John but soon regretted her decision.

No Money No Honey. Sam was having a rough time in school. He was having trouble paying his bills. His mom suggested he try a little honey. She let him drink a little and he soon felt better. Sam now paid his bills and was well on his way.

Erin and the TV. Erin was watching a TV in her living room. Her television had broken. She couldn't reach to turn on the TV. Erin called her friend who was in the room with her. He was able to help her find a power outlet.

Old Stove. My friend Joe and I went camping. One night we got bored. Joe said he couldn't use his stove, so I went out and bought one. Joe found it in the trash, but we went home with it anyway. We both went back to camp with the spare stove.

Book of Mormon. Gina wanted to read the Book of Mormon. She looked everywhere for it in the library. But she had no books in her room. She decided to go to the library and borrow a book. She borrowed the book and read it.

The College. Dan was not a well liked person. His parents wanted him to go to a prestigious university. The school had a reputation for academic prowess and high test scores. Dan chose to go to the school. Dan got into the best college in the country!

baby. Irene was pregnant. She didn't realize she'd be a grandma! But then her husband surprised her with a large family! The three of them celebrated all their birthdays! After that, Irene never had doubts about becoming a grandma!
Glare. I was in class. It was nighttime. I could not see anything. My eyes began to hurt. I got up and went to the bathroom.

Where is my refund?. I had to get my computer repaired the other day. I asked my insurance company for a discount. They said no, the computer was already repaired. I had to send it back and get a new one. I still have a feeling that I'll be getting a new computer.
dead dog. John was walking his dog. The dog got loose from its leash. The dog got away from John. John was late to his work. John had to call for his friends to pick him up.

Seriously, They're Everywhere. My brother went on a camping trip this weekend. He was camping in a tent in the woods. All of a sudden, he heard some rustling and noises. He decided to go check on the tent. It turns out that bears had invaded the tent!
Samuel's sandwich. Samuel wanted a sandwich. But he didn't have a lot of money. So he went to the store. He found some leftovers. He ate the sandwich.

A miscommunication. A young woman was walking to her car in the parking lot. A man walked up to her and offered her a ride. She thanked him but the car was already full. The man became suspicious and asked for the keys. She opened the car and found that her car was not there.

Infection. Tim had an allergy to milk. He ate his entire plate without washing his hands. He kept scratching the skin around his mouth and nose. His face became red and swollen. His mom had to take him to the hospital to get an infection.

Picking just one. Lisa really liked one of the boys in her class. But she wasn't sure which one to pick. She kept trying to think. She ended up picking him randomly. But when she saw him in person he told her she wasn't his type.
maracas. I was working in the house. We were making maracas. It took a long time. Eventually I got the hang of it. Finally it was ready and we could drink it.
Jam or jelly. Jenna hated jelly. She would always eat it. She went to the store to buy some jelly. She purchased two jars. When she got home, she realized she didn't need any jelly anymore.

The Manual. A man started using a typewriter to write novels. He did not think it was a problem. Soon the typewriter ran out of paper. He had to manually type the entire novel. He did not enjoy the process at all.

Forgetful Sam. Sam was going to be a big brother for his nephew. However he forgot to get them new shoes. Sam's nephew thought it was funny that his mom was so forgetful. Sam never knew he would forget to buy them new shoes. He made sure to always remind them of this fact.

Cold Soup. A cold soup factory offered me a job working in their factory. I was very anxious about being here so I accepted. On my first day, the soup was very cold. My body was too cold and I could not work properly. I learned to be more careful when using cold soup in the future.

Wednesdays. My girlfriend always gets me to work on Wednesdays. She makes pizza, cookies, and brownies for me to enjoy. This week, I decided to make my own food. I made a casserole with spinach and cheese. I took it home and sat it down to eat.

Hiking Trip. Tom loved to go hiking. He planned to go on a long weekend hiking trip. It was raining all weekend so he stayed in a hotel. Tom felt better when he went hiking and he got to enjoy it. He was excited to plan his next hiking trip.

Every time. Anna was on her way to the store. She was just going to pick up a few things. The grocery list was long and complicated. But Anna was impatient and continued to go anyway. When she got to the store, Anna was dismayed to see it was empty.
Salty. The man ordered a burger. It was very spicy. He complained about it. The manager gave him more seasoning. He complained again and got a refund.

Over-reacting. Cindy was a child who was not a fan of cats. Her family bought her a kitten, but Cindy was still scared of it. She was afraid of it and kept crying when her family brought it home. She was forced to confront her fears. Cindy had the courage to be happy when she took the kitten home.
Ironing Clothes. Tom noticed his shirt was a little dirty. He decided to iron it. Tom used a new iron. He tried to finish the shirt. He burned himself.

Lizzie's Locks. Lizzie's favorite things to do was sleep with her hair up. She did it every night and she didn't mind it one bit. She would curl her hair just right every time. One day she decided she needed a new hairstyle. She finally found her perfect hair style.
Jacob's Lawn. One day Jacob had a job cutting grass. He had to pull a dozen of them. One of them got loose and fell down. Jacob had to cut it again. The lawnmower had a broken blade on it.

Banana Split. Lulu was in the mood for a banana split. She was on a mission to eat as many bananas as possible. She was so hungry she couldn't help it. Her appetite was too strong. She ended up eating the banana half and the cream half.
Speech. A man was giving a speech. He was nervous and got a little bit nervous. When he was done speaking, he saw the audience. They applauded him! He felt much more confident afterwards.
Snacker. John was very happy. Today, he was going to go to the new candy store. He walked towards the entrance and saw a lot of kids. He walked through the store. He bought a ton of candy.
Sushi. It was Tom's first time eating sushi. Tom was excited at first. But then he began to get sick. He thought that maybe it was just his imagination. He resolved to never eat sushi again.

Last Work Sandwich. Sandra had ordered a sandwich at a fast food restaurant. When she got home she realized she had forgotten her wallet. She had no cash but felt really sorry for the employee. Sandra got out of her seat to give the employee her money. The worker had a very nice meal for Sandra and she was glad.

Clark Watches Birds. Clark wanted to find a hobby to keep him busy. He thought it would be a good idea to watch birds. Clark bought a small binoculars for his backyard. Clark began observing birds in his yard. Clark was glad that he had started a hobby.

Egg. Sally liked eggs. She bought a dozen of them for her family. She put them in the fridge. On the way to the grocery store she dropped one. Sally was very sad that she couldn't eat eggs that night.

Not Realizing. I was waiting in line for a movie at the movie theater. The line was really long. Suddenly, a worker ran to me. He told me that he was coming to take my order. I thanked him and started to leave.

Best in Class. He was a big kid. He didn't mind being the class bully. He would often get in fights and get away with it. When he got older, the bullies stopped letting him bully anyone. He became the class bully, and didn't mind at all.

Trip to Australia. Neil had always dreamed of seeing Australia. When he was ten, his parents took him there. There, Neil saw a beautiful rainforest. And he stayed there until he could finally see it in person. Neil was glad that he had finally gotten to see the rainforest!

Our New Kayaks. The river was running low in many places. We decided to purchase a new kayak. We went fishing with the river all afternoon. We felt very lucky to be out fishing on such a beautiful day. We decided that the kayak would serve us well in the future.

The actor. I was watching the latest episode of my favorite TV show. The show was about a family trying to find their fortune. The dad tells a scary story about his experiences, and I was scared. I sat down with my book and looked at the screen in horror. I couldn't believe what I saw, so I turned off the TV.

Kiera. Kiera was a great kid, but a bad teacher. In tenth grade, she was suspended for throwing a fit in class. Her mom had to ground her for 2 days! Then she went home to cry and cry, but not in school! Her mom promised her a place at the back of the school library.
parking ticket. Fred had to go to court. He parked illegally. The parking ticket was for $200. Fred had to pay the fine. The court cost Fred 500 dollars.

Ruts. Tim was on a road trip. He decided to change the oil in his car. It was a dangerous move but Tim thought it was worth it. He thought the oil was very hot so it burned a little bit. Tim was more careful with oil in the future.

The Pizza. Logan was hungry and he was hungry all day. He opened up his refrigerator and saw pizza. He opened up the box and threw some toppings in. He cooked it and ate it. It was delicious and he finished it all.
New calculator. Bob wanted to buy a new calculator. He did not want to buy a new one. He decided to save his money. After a month, he had enough money. He bought the calculator and was happy with it.
Giant Squid. John and Mary were fishing. Mary kept catching fish. She kept trying to reel them in. Eventually she caught enough to take home. She shared her fish with John.

Gorilla. Gorilla was a gorilla. He was the pride of the zoo. He had a special house with a bathroom and a play area. The gorillas loved to use his house for their toilet paper. It was the best toilet paper in the world.

Sid is the life of the party. Sid loves to dance. He has a new video to show all his friends. He puts it up on his facebook and shows his friends. Everyone at the party loves his new dance video. Sid is so happy he made the video.
Skateboarding. Sam liked to go skateboarding. When he was younger he tried to do a trick. He fell and broke his leg. He wasn't able to skate the rest of the year. Sam stopped going skateboarding.

President. I was a young, unathletic high school kid. My junior year, I decided to run for class president. I walked into the gym and handed my speech and platforms to the students. I got a few laughs in, but then the kids all clapped and cheered. I realized that I should have stayed home from the beginning.
Wild Jump. Tom was walking home. He noticed some squirrels running through a bush. He got a rock in the way. He jumped and jumped and jumped. Tom didn't know how they could jump from trees.

Mike is stuck. Mike was at a concert. The crowd was having a lot of fun. A woman got too rowdy and began fighting Mike. The man was too scared to help. Mike was left alone and the woman never attacked him again.
Sneaking In. Jill was afraid of dogs. She hid under her bed most of the time. Her mom heard her crying. She finally went in and petted her. Jill laughed when she looked in the mirror.

Virginia Beach. John wanted to go to the Virginia Beach. He thought the water was too cold. He didn't mind though because it was free. He swam until he could swim forever. John had the time of his life.

Learning how to cook. Jill had never cooked dinner before. She was going to her first college graduation. Jill had no clue what she was doing. She was very nervous. Jill made it through it and learned a lot.

Promotion. Fred had worked at his job for over 20 years. He received an email in the mail thanking him for all his work. The email gave him his longterm career growth potential. Fred decided he wanted to take that opportunity to work even harder. He quickly took the offer and became a top employee.
Stephen gets bullied. Stephen gets bullied in school. He can't stand it anymore. He decides to stand up for himself. Stephen fights back. Stephen beats the bully up.

Sports. Tim had a problem with his friends playing video games. They were always winning, and Tim didn't want to play anymore. He started taking a martial arts course. Tim learned that he had a lot of potential outside of the gaming field. He began to focus on his hobbies, and less on video games.

Keeping Score. I was watching the big race on the TV. I got so engrossed in the race that I forgot about the scores. After a few minutes, I realized that the race was over. I started counting off the seconds. I was going to keep score but the race was so exciting!
Cat. Tim lived in the woods. One day a cat ran out of food. Tim had to chase the cat into the woods. Tim finally caught the cat. He let the cat in and the cat was happy.

Shuttle. The astronauts boarded the shuttle. They were scared to start it up. They all held hands as it started to move. They all cried as they walked onto the shuttle. They were finally going to explore space!

Mutual Attraction. Mary wanted to go out with Tim. They agreed that they would meet up for lunch at the new restaurant. Mary and Tim both brought a dish to the restaurant. A group of people came and they ate their meal. The group of people talked to each other as they ate.

Jimmy Drops History Class. Jimmy had a history class with his friends at school. His friend Dan dropped the class the next day. Jimmy called his teacher to ask her why he dropped the class. She explained to Jimmy that he couldn't drop it since it was a week ago. Jimmy realized that it was time for him to start the class with new friends.
Chipped tooth. Tom was eating chocolates. He chewed on too hard and the tooth chipped. Tom started crying. His parents took him to the dentist. Tom got his tooth fixed
Games. It was time for a snack break. Everyone wanted to play board games. We went to the store. We checked out our favorite ones. We made our way home with some snacks.
Digging. The man dug a hole in the ground. He got a shovel. He dug a trench for his kids. The man brought the trench to the house. He put a shovel inside for them.

The Cheating. Gina hadn't wanted to go to the library. But her friend Tami knew she was trying to stay silent. Gina hadn't wanted to go to the library. But Tami had a book she didn't have, so she borrowed it. Now Gina doesn't want to go to the library anymore.
Sandbox. She wanted to play in the sandbox. She dug a hole with her shovel. She rolled in dirt. Her dad made her play in it. She then had a fun sandbox day.

The ice cream truck. Samuel was at the ice cream truck. He was eating some chocolate ice cream. A man came up and asked him if he wanted some more. Samuel took one more scoop and then started to cry. The man had no money and left without Samuel.

Jane Opens a Candy Shop. Jane really wanted to make her mom a birthday present. She had never opened a candy shop before. She went to the store and bought all the necessary supplies. When she got home she began to open each candy. She accidentally put two pieces in the wrong bin.
The Bar. The boys were trying to find a bar. They searched a whole bunch of them. None of them were what they were looking for. They decided to just go to one. The next one was perfect.

Lonely elders. Abe was in charge of an elderly couple with no kids. He was worried because he didn't want them to worry. But after a few weeks of seeing them every day, he started to feel sorry. They made plans for a weekend getaway with his two sons. Abe's worry turned to joy as they came home with their sons.

Taxi Fight. There was a guy who worked at the local taxi stand. It was the first day of the tax season. It was very busy and he was busy alone. When the lights went off, he called out to an old woman. She got into a fight with the guy, and got hit by a car.

New Job. I decided to get a new job. I applied to my first job online. They rejected me because I was not ready for training. I decided to ask for help with my training. I began my training after receiving some private help.

Alone away from home. I have been living alone in my apartment for a few months now. I am beginning to wonder if I need to move in with my boyfriend. It's no use crying over it anymore. He does not seem to care enough to let me live there. He is already moving to another city.

Figure Skating. Ike wanted to learn to figure skating. He asked his sister to teach him. He practiced very hard. His sister was really impressed with his progress. She invited him to go skating with her after school.

Haircut. Janet hated her long brown hair. She hated how everyone made fun of her. She took a trip to the hair salon. She was surprised by how good the stylist was. Janet was able to get her brown hair in a bun with very short cuts.

Obvious but Truthful. The teacher told the class to write their answers down. Everyone took out their pen. They started to write down their answers. When I asked for my answer, I received an answer that was not my answer. I felt uncomfortable throughout class, and decided to give a free copy of the paper.
Limitless Embarrassment. My coworker took out her laptop. She opened the photo album. She took a look at her photo. I saw something on the bottom of her shoe. She had used her cell phone's camera.

Food Challenge. John had the highest score on the last test. The prize for the best score was a big prize. John didn't know what to do with the money. He decided to enter a food challenge to see who could eat more. John ate as much as he could and he won the challenge.

Mountains. There are many mountain passes in the Grand Canyon. One of them is called the "Tall Pines." One day I tried to go on the Tall Pines. I fell off the mountain at the halfway point. Now I go on them only when the scenery is beautiful.

Unknown Fees. Jill's electricity bill was $236. She called her utility company to discover a fee she hadn't paid. They said they couldn't figure it out either. Jill got an extra power line hooked up to her home and called the company. They fixed it for her, free of charge.

Bird. Jim watched a baby bird fly through his house. He decided to give the baby bird some peanuts. The bird flew up in the air and landed on the kitchen table. Jim opened the window and the baby bird flew out. Jim watched the bird for a while, and then went back inside.

Candles. I wanted to buy new candle. I asked around but no one knew what I wanted. I found some that were very expensive. I decided to go with something cheap. It burned out within seconds so I had to buy something else.

Figure Skating. My wife bought a new pair of skates in 2013. She had a pair of roller skates in her old skates. She was playing Figure Skating with her friend. My wife was not very good at skating. She was only able to grind and grind.
Restaurant. Tommy worked at a diner. Tommy was fired one day. He found another job within a week. Tommy's old boss found him a new job. The new boss fired Tommy the next day.

Last Minute Decision. My dad had to get a permit for a car. He went to the DMV by himself. He was not sure he could get it. He decided to ask a friend who was also driving. He was able to get the permit with that friend.

The Quota. The family had worked hard all month. They had earned some extra money from babysitting. Now it was time to pay the rent. They worked hard for two weeks. They had earned enough to pay the rent.
Arrested. Timmy was riding his skateboard. Suddenly, a car came by and hit Timmy's board. Timmy fell and scraped his knees. He felt very sad. After the police saw the video they let him go.

Pixy. Amy was a high school girl. She had not been to a dance since before she turned 16. She was afraid that her new boyfriend wouldn't be interested. At the dance the new boy sat next to her. They danced, and had a great time.

Presentation. John had a presentation on his product at work. It was going well until he forgot to mention his product. His boss caught him and asked him what the product was. John's boss found out what he was selling and gave him detention. John never forgot to mention his product again.

Adoption. Lucy was a little girl. She was adopted from a Chinese orphanage. Her adoptive parents thought she was a little crazy. They told her not to play with dolls. She didn't care and still plays with them today.

Sign Language. Josie wanted to teach her daughter how to sign. She began to practice daily at home and with her child. Soon her daughter's confidence grew and she signed a lot. She even added her own signature to some of her other paintings! Josie was proud to have taught her daughter how to sign.
Going Fishing. I had a few fish in the water. I went outside and grabbed the fishing pole. I headed out into the creek. I cast the line into the water. I caught a few fish that day.

Parking Spot. Joe parked his car in the parking spot. Joe was walking to the grocery store. The spot was very busy. Joe walked to the spot in order to get groceries. Joe forgot to pay for his parking spot.
Burned cookies. Lilly really wanted to bake cookies. She put the cookies in the oven. She let them sit for a while. When they were finished she took them out. The cookies were burnt.

Risk. Nia needed money, but she was a risk taker. She started her own jewelry business. She advertised it in her local newspaper and got customers. Soon, she had enough customers to make it a business! Nia became rich and famous - and very, very happy.

Front step trout. John and Mary wanted to go fishing. Mary wanted trout while John wanted catfish. They both tried to get some trout by the lake. Mary's catfish got stuck in a tree. They still caught a few.

Hillary is determined. Hillary is running for president. She has never been political. She knows the system is rigged. However she refuses to get in. She is still determined to make America great again.

Purse envy. Kia's boyfriend didn't have much money. One day, she thought he would enjoy a nice bag of cash. She thought long and hard about it. Then she decided to steal it from him! Kia was caught red-handed, and kicked out of his apartment!

The Catch. Jimmy loved baseball and he played on his team very hard. He played all summer and his skills were the best. After practice all the boys came over to Jimmy's house. They played catch all day long and Jimmy won a goldfish. Jimmy was very happy about his goldfish, he had practiced a lot.

teacher affair. Kim and Tom were having an affair. They decided to get married. The married were afraid to tell their teachers. One day Kim found the two teachers kissing. She asked them to stop but they didn't listen.

Cowboy Doll. My son had a cowgirl name Cowboy. He had red eyes and white skin. We named him after a cowboy. His eyes got bigger and his skin became gray. He turned into a huge man-cow hybrid cowgirl doll.
Fish. Kia was craving fish. She asked her mom to get her a few. They took the fish home and fed it. Kia was surprised that the fish tasted so good! She had lots of fish for dinner that night!

Wet Ending. Lana got up very early to do some laundry. She had a very busy day as a result. By the end of the day Lana had more laundry than she could do. Her mom had to come to help her out. Unfortunately, Lana wound up spending half of her day in the dry.

Gravy. Tom was in his kitchen making mashed potatoes. He didn't have a lot of butter. He had to use the back of a spoon to scrape the butter from the potatoes. Tom had an entire jar of gravy on his table. He was really hungry so he ate the whole jar of gravy.
Baby. One day I was eating a cake. My son was playing with me in the kitchen. Suddenly my son started crying. He said he wanted a toy. I gave him my favorite doll.

The Eyesore. Bill was always told he was ugly. His friends encouraged him to change his appearance. Bill did not like that his friends would try to pressure him. One day he asked them if he could wear glasses. Bill was happy to discover he loved his new appearance.
The Thief. Seth was shopping at a store. He saw a bag of chips on the floor. He saw the bag was $100 dollars. He stole the bag. Seth felt bad about what he did.
Walking to school. Everyday after school, Mary walked to school. One day she could not find her school. She walked around and tried to find it. She finally found it. She was so happy to find it.

Jumping. Linda was trying to learn to jump. She didn't know how to jump over a step. She tried jumping between a few chairs. It felt difficult, but she kept trying. Eventually, she could jump from the end table over a step.

The Shopping Cart. It was a hot and humid summer day. The kids were bored, so they grabbed a cart. They went to the grocery store, and bought a whole ton of things. They loaded the cart up with all their things. They loaded it back up at the house, and went outside to play.
New iPad winning. Alicia was going on a trip. She needed to buy an iPad. She didn't like them that much. She was going to go shopping. Alicia purchased the iPad she wanted and was happy.
The Pizza. I made homemade pizza for the first time last night. It was my grandma's recipe. It was so delicious. I served the pizza to my family at dinner. Everyone loved it.

Sparklers. Sam was walking his dog in the park. The dog spotted some sparklers. The dog started chasing them around the park. The dog got tired and stopped chasing them. Sam brought out some sparklers and let the dog play with them.

Classic car. Nate was going to pick up his classic car at the lot. He parked his car in front of a bunch of antique car dealers. After buying the car, he went back to his house to drive it. The car was so old that he couldn't start the engine. He had to call an antique car dealership to get it fixed.

The Game. The team had practiced hard for weeks. They were getting ready to play a huge game! They got their gear together and headed out. They practiced hard all game. They won by a lot and went home with trophies.

Clara's Algebra. Clara hated her math class because of the high number of tests. She practiced her algebra skills everyday until her test. She was afraid she would fail so she studied very hard for it. Finally, Clara passed her algebra test! She got to go home and her parents celebrated with her!

Getting Mugged. Kane's favorite place to eat lunch was a local coffee shop. One morning, he went to the shop with his girlfriend. She was nowhere to be seen. Kane called the police and waited for them to arrive. The police found Kane and his girlfriend kissing.
Cleaning Windows. Tom hated messy windows. He didn't have a lot of money for a good clean. He decided to hire a maid. He hired her on the spot. Tom finally had nice clean windows.
Milk. Tim was watching television. He decided to pour some milk into the blender. He put the milk into the blender. The blender turned on. The milk splashed all over Tim's living room.

What the Earthquake Made. On the way to work this morning I heard a loud bang. It was very loud and almost scared me. It sounded like an earthquake. When I turned on the news I learned it was an earthquake. Now I need to be prepared for earthquakes.
Torn Socks. Tom was playing basketball. He noticed his socks got torn. Tom went home and changed his socks. He never got any more torn socks. Tom had to buy new ones.

The new friend. Amy and Sara had been best friends since they were little girls. They had been playing video games for years and were really close. One day Sara decided she was going to give Amy a tour of her house. She showed her all of her games and their amazing collection. When she went away, Amy cried with joy.

Hangover. Kim went to the movies with her friend Lynn. The movie was about the Civil War. Lynn showed up to the movies with a bunch of Confederate flags. Kim and Lynn had a great time hanging out at the movies. The next time they went to the movies they had a new flag.

Beat the game. Tim loved to beat his friends at games. He would often try to make them beat him. One day, he beat his friend at chess. His friend gave him a gift certificate for a new video game. Tim was happy to buy it.

Home. Ben's grandfather passed away. Ben was sad and felt alone. Ben decided to build a house of his own. He bought everything he needed to build a house. Ben had a new home with his grandfather's help.

Frozen Pizza. Cindy's family was having a Christmas dinner. Her mom suggested she put some pizza in the oven. They weren't sure if that would be okay, so Cindy called her dad. Her dad had a few suggestions. First, put the pizza in the oven to let it finish baking.
High Blood Pressure. Tim was eating a sandwich. The blood pressure on his meter was very high. He couldn't figure out why. He called his work. They sent him to the hospital.

Yoga. I was feeling really stressed out after work today. I went to the yoga studio to relax. Afterwards I tried to get into some more poses. I tried a few different poses but I couldn't get into any of them. The yoga studio closed down for the day.
The Dog Race. It was dog racing season. My family and I were racing each other. I thought I could beat him so I took him around the track. He was faster, but he ended up losing. It was a close race.

New Television. Sam bought a new television for his house. The television wasn't powerful enough to work. He went online and ordered a powerful television. Sam waited patiently for his new television to arrive. The delivery man brought Sam the new television.

Apple Tree. I was in my backyard one day. I was working on my apple tree. Suddenly, all of a sudden a big storm blew through. All of my apples fell into the lake. The family got together and picked them all up.

Slurpee. I used to drink a slurpee every day. It was a cold beverage. I found a website about slurpees. It was disgusting to drink a slurpee every day. I stopped drinking slurpees and just used water.

Fun Times. When I was younger I had a really fun time at my friend's house. We had a lot of fun games and movies played. One day we decided to make the day a holiday by going to the store. We went down to the store and found a lot of fun things. We had a lot of fun shopping and celebrating our new holiday.

Video Games. I sat down to play a video game. I ended up winning but it was very sad. I kept the controller for a long time. I took it back to the store to return it. I felt bad when I got my money back.
Cartwheel. My friend was taking a photo. As he was walking, he lost control of his cartwheel. He ended up falling down. I grabbed the cord and pulled him up. We all laughed together.

Food. The waiter came to our table and took our orders. He prepared my food and placed it in my hands. I tried to eat the food. Since my stomach was upset, I threw the food away. He apologized and took my food back.

Race to victory. Marko wanted to become the fastest sprinter in his team. He trained hard every day. He practiced hard for a race. He competed in the race. Marko won the race and became the fastest sprinter.
Chinese Food. Tom wanted to eat Chinese food. He ordered some dumplings. They were spicy and delicious. Tom took them home. He tried to eat them everyday for a month.

Orchard. The family was going to an apple orchard. They had been to an orchard once. They were going to pick an apple tree. The family spent a long time picking the perfect tree. Then, they got home and went to eat the apple.

Turtle Encounter. One morning, Tom heard a loud noise in his kitchen. He went out to the kitchen and looked for the noise. He found the noise coming from the fridge. He opened the fridge and found a turtle on the floor. Tom released the turtle into the wild.

Fire. Tim wanted to cook some food. He tried to put a fire going but it didn't get going. He tried adding wood chips but the smoke just got worse. He finally added some propane and waited. Soon, the fire started to spread to the rest of the house.

New Phone. Tom was excited about his new phone. He could finally get the upgrade he wanted. Tom did his best to take good care of his phone. He did not realize it was already cracked by the time he got it. Tom had to get it repaired.

Animal Instinct. It was a cold night and the dog was cold. The dog felt his way around in the dark. The dog's head was very cold. The dog's ears were ringing. The dog felt relief as he looked around the room.

The Celery. I bought a bag of celery to give away at a soup kitchen fundraiser. I asked all of the people at the kitchen if they wanted to buy some. Many people said they had already buttered some. I gave away the celery and I left the kitchen with a few pennies. All of the people at the kitchen thanked me for my generosity.

Bishop. When I was young I loved to play basketball. I always got good shots and I scored a lot of points. My dad always had a hard time putting me on the team. I was upset that he couldn't put me on the team. I learned that he always had to put his own team first.

Jimmy Races. Jimmy and his friend John went to the local raceway. They decided to race cars on the track. Jimmy crashed his car and had to pull his car to the side of the track. He and John decided to split up and race off. Jimmy won the race.
Playing in a Band. Kia joined a local band. The lead singer was also part of the band. One day the lead singer quit the band. Kia took over the lead singer's spot. Now she plays bass instead.
Spaghetti. I made spaghetti for my friends. When they ate the spaghetti they complained. They told me I should add oregano. I tried adding it, but it didn't add enough. I had to throw it out.

Coming Out. Jane was at the bar drinking. She was on a few different teams at the moment. Jane's team had just lost so she wanted to come out. She didn't know anyone in the bar so went out on her own. Nobody liked her and she was kicked out.

Dylan's new car. Dylan just got his driver's license. He was very excited to start driving. He had a big test in a week and had to do well on it. When he was ready, he went for the first ride. He passed the test and he was so proud.

New App Department. Cheryl wanted to start a new app company. She knew she needed a great team to start. She hired a few people and set them up with desks. She set up a web site for them and put an ad for them. They started to get popular and have sales in under a month.

Bob and the Donkey. Bob loved his donkey, Skip. Bob's mom told him Skip would die if he left Skip alone. Bob decided to buy Skip a horse. Skip grew up and became an old, tired donkey. Bob decided to go to the store and buy another horse for Skip.
Tail rider. Dana loves horses. He would go to a show and see his favorite horse. A horse was chasing the other one. It was going so fast. When the rider stopped to look, the horse was gone.
Lost charge. Allie went to the store to get her charge. All the sudden it didn't work. She had to buy a new charger. She got the new charger from the store. Now she was able to charge her phone.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca woke up on Christmas day to a surprise. She opened her presents and there were two tiny kittens in them! She immediately jumped up and hugged her little kittens. She then played with them all afternoon, trying to make them happy. The next day, they were all asleep in Becca's bed.

Science Dissection. Irene wanted to study for her science class, but she had no equipment. She went to the store to purchase a microscope. At home, she set it up to use. She began to dissect a frog. She got to dissect a frog just in time to see a fly come out.
A Hot Day. It was 90 degrees outside. A large storm was approaching. The wind blew sand into the man's eyes. He went inside to get some water. He still could not open his eyes.
Robot Fighting. I tried fighting a robot once. I got punched and kicked. Eventually, I had no more spirit left. I decided to give up and get a job. This robot was a lot harder than I thought.

Knitting. Mary's grandmother always taught her to knit. But Mary was clumsy and needed assistance to do many tasks. She was asked by her friend to knit a hat for her grandmother. Mary learned how to knit and became very proficient. Her grandmother was very pleased with the hat she knitted for her.

Large water slide. I decided to go to the water park with some friends. I went down the big slide. My friends let me do tricks and take a lot of pictures. I got home and we drank a ton of water. We went home happy.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. The cat was very hungry. She looked in the kitchen for something to eat. She also looked in the cupboard for treats. She realized there was no dog treats left! She ate the rest of her dog's treats.

Jane and Cat. Jane's cat ran away one night. Jane had a lot of problems finding her cat. One morning, she awoke to a cat knocking over a cup of water. She rushed into the kitchen, and found her cat. Jane was so happy that she had found her cat!

Surfing Scare. Tim went to the beach to surf. He put his board in the water and sat on the sand. Suddenly he felt a tickling sensation. He looked down to see a tick on his foot. Tim jumped from the board and ran as fast as he could.

Girl Friend. Amber and her friend were talking one day. The girl asked her about her crush on the boy. She knew she was lying so she told the truth. The girl was upset and asked Amber to stop talking. She left her in disbelief.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy had a great job as a TV news anchor. One day she got called into the office for some urgent business. While there, she was shown a story on the news about her boss. She went back home very angry and vowed to quit her job. She found another job as a prankster but it's not what she wants.
Scuffed. I got a scratch ticket. The prize was a new watch. I had the same ticket on my watch. I scratched it off. I lost the watch.

Slow Internet. Dana's internet was running very slow. She called up the company and they said they'd fix it. He called back a week later and they told him they were in the middle of it. Dana was upset and complained all the way home. They told him to try other providers and he did.
Baseball Slide. Jim went to the park. He went up to the second base line. Jim jumped up to the baseball. He slid down the second base line. Jim was the batter on the second base slide.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester decides that he wants to try jumping rope. Lester sets up his jump rope and waits for someone to jump. No one jumps and Lester begins to cry. Lester decides that he will just jump on his friends instead. Lester becomes happier with jumping rope after that.
Peanut. The dog ate his bone. The bone was peanut. The dog threw the bone away. He barked a lot. The owner made him go to the bathroom to clean it up.

Water Skiing. Dee and her dad were having a water skiing day. They both got out of the truck to go down the river. Dee fell off of the river raft and hurt her ankle. Her dad was able to bring her down by himself. Dee was able to have a good cry and her dad brought her home.

Angkor Wat. My wife took us to Angkor Wat in Thailand. It is a beautiful ancient Buddhist site. We went with friends and family to take photos. The highlight of the trip was the great artwork. We took many great photos.

Worse Than Before. The wind was howling outside. It was blowing hard and fast. Kate had to drive fast to get to a store. She was barely able to make it on time. The wind blew more in the direction of Kate.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio has been out of work for two weeks. He decides that it is finally time to start looking for work. Horatio goes to his local grocery store. He applies to a variety of positions. Horatio is happy that he found a job.
The Cookie Burn. Alicia was eating cookies. She was doing her nails. The cookies were hot and burned her fingers. She had to clean them off. Alicia learned that her hand was allergic to cookies.
Construction Workers. Dan was a construction worker. He spent his day at a quarry. The quarry was not being used for its intended purpose. Dan's boss fired him on the spot. Dan is now unemployed.

Borrowed Money. The man borrowed some money from his friend. The friend was late for work. The man told his friend the money was going to pay back. His friend asked for the money back. The man gave the money back.

Scuba Diving. My friends and I went scuba diving for the first time. We went into the water, my friend and I attached all our gear. We then dove under the water for 10 minutes. When we got out, I was amazed at the clarity of the water. My friends told me I was lucky I was wearing the right gear.
Preacher. Joe's parents were out of town. They told him to stay in the basement. He spent the night there. In the morning, his parents returned. Joe had slept with his mother's book.

The evil dad. Jack's father wanted him to be a good kid. His dad took him to a nice quiet lake. The water was perfect for swimming and splashing. Jack was amazed at the great view. Jack's dad took him to the lake to have a good time.

sad news. I had a stroke in 2011. I woke up one morning and could not walk. The doctors told me my future was very limited. One day I realized I could still do many things. I am very grateful to be alive.
College. Tom was going to college. Tom wanted to be a scientist. Tom was rejected from college. Tom had to drop out. Tom learned a lot about school.

Punishment. My friend was getting angry at me. We were trying to find the reason why he couldn't come over. He came by and said he was grounded. I was upset and refused to talk to him. Later, I found out he was being bullied in school.
Skip almost drowns. Skip has a pool party with his friends. Skip decides to drink a beer in his pool. Skip nearly drowned in the pool. His friends swam to him to save him. Skip almost drowned too.
Dog. The cat ran up to the house. It jumped onto the couch and the dog. The dog then got angry. The cat scratched the dog. The dog ran away.

A big hike. Randy went on a hiking trip. His first day he had to hike all the way up to the top of the mountain. Randy hiked up and down the mountain. When he was done he had a great view of the entire state. He took lots of pictures.

Ice Cream Day. Bob decided he wanted to have a hot dog treat for lunch. He bought a pack of ice cream and went to work. Bob's co workers all complimented him on his hot dog treat. Bob felt accomplished. When Bob got home, he was happy to have made his day.

I love her too. Kelsey was a girl scout. She was about to get married to her husband. One day while camping, she met the man of her dreams. He was the nicest man she had ever seen. She loved him and didn't want to leave.
Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff gets a call from a friend. The friend asks if Jeff wants to go fishing. Jeff agrees. Jeff drives to the lake. Jeff catches a big fish.

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Sally went to the grocery store to buy cheese. She was buying some white Swiss cheese. When she got to the cheese, she realized it was over-saturated. She was very upset because she didn't like white Swiss. Sally wound up buying some dark Swiss cheese instead.

Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. When my daughter got pregnant, I had her find out the sex of the baby. I gave her a few weeks to think about it. When I found out she wanted an abortion, I went and purchased it. My daughter was not happy but did not want to do anything about it. I eventually found someone else to do the paperwork and she got pregnant.
Tara's Hat. Tara wanted to get a new hat. Her current hat was pretty ugly. She went to her local store. She bought a beautiful blue hat. She was so excited when she wore the hat to school.
Recycled Cans. Benny was cleaning out his garage. He discovered a box of beer cans. Benny had to throw out the cans. He didn't want to throw them out. Benny just put the cans in his garage.

Cake. Jan's husband told her he was turning thirty and wanted to bake a cake. They went to the store to buy cakes. Jan saw a cake that looked very good. She bought the cake. Her husband enjoyed the cake.
Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake was an older man. He was overweight. One day his son Dave fell off a ladder. Jake was angry. Jake threw Dave off the ladder.

Slide. Nancy had a beautiful dress that was pink and purple. One day she decided to wear it to a date. At the park she walked down the sidewalk and tried to put it on. It was too small. She had to find a shoe that fit over the top.

Grocery Games. The other day I was grocery shopping. I got distracted and lost track of time. I forgot to pay for my carrots, tomatoes, and cheese. I had to get them later. I don't know if I will be hungry any longer.

Track and Field Star. Joe was a terrific track and field athlete. He was on the varsity team for all four years of high school. During his senior year, he ran and ran. As a freshman, Joe ran and ran all night. Joe ran so well, he got a spot on the team as a starter!

Officer Helps. My wife's boss is retiring next week. He is retiring after 20 years at the job. Yesterday she called an officer in charge of the pension. She said she was going to transfer him to an office she knew. He will be able to retire early.

Sharing. We wanted to eat at a local restaurant that didn't have a drive through. We went online and looked for places that were open and closed. We ended up going to another restaurant we had never tried before. The prices were much lower than our usual place. We enjoyed our meal and went back to the restaurant we'd never been.

wallet. Kim was walking to the store. She went by the food court. At the store, she put her groceries on the table. Kim forgot her wallet in the grocery bag. Kim walked back to her car and was upset with herself.

Roller Coaster. When I was young, my favorite thing to do was ride a roller coaster. Every time we went, we had a big crowd. We always put our tickets in the front of our hands. When we got on, we would always look for the right spot. We rode it every time until we were old enough to not ride anymore.

The water on the books. Kia had a huge stack of books. She checked on all of them one day. There was a big wet spot on the books. She had to clean it with alcohol. Finally, she finished cleaning all of the books.

Christmas Shopping. I went to the mall to shop for a Christmas tree. I was looking for a certain brand. I found a brand I wanted. I paid for the tree and placed it in the parking lot. I went home and was excited about the tree.

Dave goes fishing. Dave was a fishing novice. He decided to get a fishing pole for his next trip. He went to the store and picked out a nice red hook. Dave brought the hook to his car and headed out. He cast his line and waited for his fish.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick had several errands to run one afternoon. While Rick was at the store, he saw a homeless man. The man begged for money, Rick decided to give him money. He went home, and watched the news for an upcoming store closing. A local store had decided to close for financial reasons, Rick was sad.

Faker. Bill wanted to play a prank on his friends. He wrote a poem to go with an album of baseball cards. He used a bunch of fake baseball cards in the album. When his friends got home from school they tore the cards apart. They were really angry because they thought the cards were real.

Cookies. I was making cookies for my girlfriend. She likes vanilla so I used that. I mixed the dough and then put the cookies in the oven. When the time was up, I put the cookies in the oven. They turned out to be delicious.

Stage. Tiffany had always loved music. She decided to try out for the school choir. On the audition day, she did very well! Tiffany was so excited to go on the stage. She went on the stage, and sang her heart out!

Great American Story. My girlfriend asked to take a drive out of town. I asked her what her favorite author was. She said her favorite author is Edgar Allan Poe. I told her Poe is a lot better than Poe! Now she has a new favorite author.

Soapmaking Disaster. I started my soap making process yesterday. I added a load of water and added the ingredients. Once it was mixed, I added the soap and let it sit. While it sat, I tried to move it around. The soap went flying everywhere when I tried to move it.
Bacteria. Anna was at the lake with her friends. She kept sneezing. She wondered if she was really drowning in all of the algae. She took off her sunscreen. Then she was safe from the algae.
Eyebrow pulling. Abe was a big fan of Star Trek. He loved how the characters' eyebrows appeared. In his opinion, they were very cool. He decided to pull them out. He never pulled them back in again.

New Bag. Jane was shopping for a new bag. She was debating between a leather or canvas bag. She went to the store and looked at different bags. After comparing prices, she decided on a canvas bag. Jane decided to purchase the bag.
The Dog. Eli found a dog in the woods. He decided to take it home. He brought it to his house and gave it a bath. Then he went to feed him. His dog loved him!

Choose. Jasmine wanted to play baseball for her school. But she couldn't decide between softball or baseball. Then she realized she'd be able to get better if she didn't choose. So she played both. Jasmine found out she could play baseball much better with both hands!
Ridiculing. I was working on a spreadsheet. I was working on a report. My boss decided to come up to me and ask me a question. I told him that he was a jerk. He didn't bother to listen to me anymore.
Low Carbs. My friend made some food. His brother came over to the table. He started eating the food. When he left the table he had diarrhea. He had to clean it up.

Ice Cream Truck. We had a birthday party last month. Our building's Ice Cream Truck played the music for the party. A few hours before the party the ice cream truck came by. The driver of the truck did not have enough money to pay. My wife took money out of my sister's credit card.

Snow Cone Surprise. Timmy loved snow cones. He had many of them. One day he found a snow cone maker in the back of the store. He got a cone maker for his birthday. He was happy when he got to surprise his girlfriend with a snow cone.

First day of Seventh grade. It was the first day of Seventh grade and I had no idea what to expect. I sat in my teacher's office and looked at her. She was kind and caring and said I was going to have a great day. I got out of my seat and went to the classroom. My teacher told me all the students were happy to see me!

Expired plan. Allie was really excited for the new movie. But she needed to see it before she could see the movie. So she called her husband to see if he would be willing to. Unfortunately it wasn't working. His plans for that weekend were already canceled.

A Milk-Tooth. Devin thought his girlfriend loved his milky hair. But she told him his milky hair was gross. Devin bought a pair of fake teeth. He put them under his girlfriend's pillow. He didn't feel weird at all.
Mantis. My dad bought a live moth. I had never seen one before. I thought it was funny. Then, my dad explained what a mantis is. Now I'm afraid of mantis.

Mother knows best. Tina was an only child. She was bored while her mom was at work. She decided to have a play-date with her friend Beth. After the play-date they had dinner with their mother. Beth then knew that Tina wasn't bored after all.

The Eyebrow Burn. Janet's eyebrow was beginning to hurt. She took off a section of the eyebrow and put it under her pillow. When she awoke, it burned and irritated her. Janet went to the doctors. They prescribed a medicated eyebrow burn that would work well.
Scared. Lily is about to be married. She has a large wedding to attend. She is scared of needles. Her friends tease her about it. She goes to the doctor to get it checked out.

The Kitten. I found a little kitten under my bed. I decided to take it home and give it a good home. I named him Lulu. Lulu and I stayed together for six weeks. After that, Lulu was my best friend and I felt I could trust him.
Gloves. My mom gave me my first pair of gloves. I was very happy. My brother and sister were mad at me. They would not let me use them. I cried.

The Bonus. John got a call on his bonus. John spent all day working on the bonus. When he received the check it was a very large amount. John started looking for a new job. John wasn't happy with his new employer.

Tired. I sat down at my computer to play video games. After five minutes, I fell asleep. I woke up to my neighbor's knocking. He said he had lost my keys and had to call the police. After an hour, I was able to go back to sleep.
Group Activity. Tom was bored at home. He didn't have any friends. He decided to have an activity at the park. At the park everyone had fun. Tom was happy to be involved in a group activity.

Need a Job. Gina always dreamed of being a reporter. She knew that being at her older brother's farm would be great. Her brother told her he needed to find a job to support his family. He wanted to hire her to work on his farm. Gina had never been in a farm before but knew this would be fun.
Study Up. Nate was very depressed. His mother tried to cheer him up. She made him take a test. He got very nervous. Nate failed the test.

The camp pen pal. Jenna wanted to write a letter to her friend at the camp. She looked in her backpack and found a pen pal from the trip. The friend wrote back to Jenna and told her about her day at camp. The camp was beautiful and fun. The friendship was sweet and the two girls became best friends.

Jane's nail party. Jane and her friends decided to paint nails. Jane's nails were a beautiful shade of pink. Jane's friends made a plate of pink cupcakes. Jane sat at the table to eat her cupcakes. Her nails were now pink but she liked them even more.
New Music. I saw some new music today. It was very popular in my city. The group is called INXS. I was so moved by their new music. It inspired me to become a fan of INXS.

Sam's Sail. Sam wanted to learn how to sail. He asked his dad to teach him. He sat on the deck, and his dad helped him. He made a few mistakes and his dad wasn't very patient. Eventually, Sam was able to sail with his dad.
