The Casino. Jack and Jill went to the casino. It was Jack's turn to play poker. He did very well on his first hand. He kept the same number of money on his next hand. He won the game.

Construction. A new apartment building was going up in town. Tom was looking for a place to move. He was a bit apprehensive about it. When he went in he had a good time. It made it a lot easier to decide to move there.

The Little Pig. Paco was a pig farmer who got a new pig. He called it 'The Pig'. Paco showed his pig to all of his friends and family. The pig was very fat and loved to swim. Paco made a new pig named 'Fat' to run around the farm.

Thief. Travis took a nap while on the bus. While sleeping, a passenger noticed his cup and put it in his bag. After a few seconds, the passenger noticed and reported Travis. Travis was shocked and angry at the person. He immediately apologized to the passenger for being careless.

The Garage. Tommy had a car garage. He painted it red to make it look more like a monster. His friends all hated the way it looked. They all tried to take it apart. Tommy didn't care and kept it as his favorite.

Total scare. Tina was in her first day at college. All the sudden she heard a person in her car scream. It was her neighbor. Tina freaked out and drove over there. She then freaked out and jumped out of her car.

Oogum Boogum. Dan was walking down a street at night. He was whistling Oogum Boogum. The car next to him began honking their horn. Dan was getting scared. Dan decided to not make any more whistling noises.

Boredom. I sat down to do some research for my work. But, all of the information I had on my computer screen was blank. I felt like I was drowning in information. I began to cry and walked around the office for an hour. I finally finished my research and went back to my desk.
Too Much. Nell's parents were always fighting. They would yell and swear and take her to her room. Nell would cry and cry. She would fall asleep and never wake up. Nell didn't want to leave home.

Lilly's Song. Lilly was playing in the school concert with her friends. She had a song stuck in her head for weeks. It was a really sad song. Lilly went home and got out her guitar. Then she started singing the song.

Money for Groceries. Karen went grocery shopping. She had bought several bags of groceries. However, she had forgotten her wallet. She put all of her groceries in her car. After she drove home, she had $50 dollars.

The Cave. Amber and her brother were exploring a cave in the woods. They had heard scary noises and were scared. They were sure they were alone and didn't want to get scared. Suddenly they heard footsteps and they had to run. They decided to stay in the cave for the night instead.
Messed up baking. Tina went to make cookies. But unfortunately she messed up. She tried to follow the recipe. But they ended up being terrible. So she had to give up.

The Rental Car. Kara's parents picked her up from school. They took her to a rental car lot. They picked her up and she paid her rent. Then they dropped her off at the office. Her first day was great!

Mystery. John loved watching the mystery on television. However, he did not think that he would ever solve it. After watching the show for many seasons, he became very frustrated. He decided to start reading mystery novels. Now John has solved every mystery on the television!

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert's girlfriend called him and said she had a surprise for him. Albert's girlfriend came home with a pair of new shoes for Albert. Albert's girlfriend wanted to go outside to look for Albert's shoes. Albert's girlfriend returned home and Albert was mad that she left. Albert's girlfriend walked outside to tell Albert's girlfriend he was unhappy.

Coup d'etat. Tom had a retirement party. He gave his employees a lot of cash. They decided to start a business. They created a company called Chedd. Chedd is now worth hundreds of millions of dollars.
Wine. I went to the wine tasting. The prices were great. I tried a few different red and white wines. I didn't get the red, but my friend did. It was a very good experience.

Trade Argument. Gary was angry about having to trade his friend. He told everyone to vote for him since he was the best. Everyone voted for Gary despite not knowing who he was. Gary was upset and told everyone to back off. He ended up getting traded anyways.

Danny moves out. Danny is a 25 year old college student. Danny wants to start making money He applies for jobs everywhere he can He gets interviews with 5 different companies He lands a job and moves out on his own.

The stolen bike. Tina went outside to check her mail. She noticed that she saw a bike that looked interesting. She looked around and decided to take it home. She put the bike in her front porch and set it up. Later that night she received a phone call and told her dad what she had done.

Relaxing Weekend. Randy and his wife went on a relaxing weekend trip. First they visited the zoo. Then they went to the arcade. After that they went to the park and the zoo. They played a ton of games and relaxed at home.

The American Dream. Diana had always dreamed of one day owning an airline. Her family didn't want her because she was too poor. However, one day, Diana decided to move to California. After she moved, she started working hard and buying an airline. Now she flies every week from California to Los Angeles.

Mile Club. Bill was a strong athlete. Bill would run marathons on his mile route. Bill decided to join the marathon club. Bill ran one hundred miles in a month. Bill broke his foot and had to stop running marathons.

The Swimming Test. Alicia was nervous for her swimming test. She was worried because she was scared to get into the pool. As she swam, she became more relaxed. Eventually, she was able to break the water. She was so relieved that her pool was safe.

Elizabeth's Bedroom. Elizabeth couldn't sleep. Her room was very messy and full of clutter. She asked her mom to start making her room more organized. Elizabeth's mom took her to the store and bought her some new bedding. Now her room is much easier to clean!

Migraines Or A Career. Mary was a health nut. She always followed the latest diet guidelines. Mary decided to go to an office and get a drink. She spilled juice on her shirt and needed a scratch-off job. Now she has a career as a consultant for a tech company.
Deadly consequences. Tina went to the swimming pool with her friend. They started to have fun. But she ended up drowning. Tina's friends tried to save her. But unfortunately, she died.
Acting strangely. Sean was in a play. He was chosen to be the actor. He had never acted before. He was so nervous! Luckily, he performed well.

Digs. I decided to make my own dicks. I bought a bag of salt to dredge out my dicks. I worked hard at it. When I was done, I had some beautiful dicks. I decided to put them on my Christmas tree this year.
Highway. John was driving on the highway. He tried to avoid someone in his car. They were trying to cross the road. He tried to speed up to get past them. But he lost control and hit a tree.
Expensive Accident. I was on the bench today. There was a loud noise. The concierge walked up to it. A woman was trying to get off. She tripped and fell.
Rick and the Ball. Rick was playing outside. Rick was bouncing a ball. The ball hit another kid's head. The other kid was crying. Rick bought him a new ball.

Prom. Jill wanted to go to her senior prom with Will. Will invited other girls as well as himself. Jill was hesitant to go, but she knew she had to go. After asking Will, Jill's stomach started to growl. After dinner at the dance, Jill and Will went to the after party.

First Night. The man went out on the city for his first night out. He walked down Broadway and drank a bit too much. When he got back to his apartment he realized he had no food. He had to sleep on the floor. That's why the man was glad to be home.

An Amazing Woman. Abby was told she would never win the lottery. This caused her to think very hard. She thought of many different possible numbers. One night, Abby met up with a number of women she never met before. After seeing the women, Abby realized that she had the power to change her life.

School play jitters. Kia was getting ready to be in the school play. She was very nervous about performing. At rehearsal, she dropped her phone and it shattered. It ruined the entire play. Kia was very embarrassed.

Cheap candy. Sara's stomach began to hurt. She had eaten a candy bar from the store. She did not realize she would get sick. She felt sick for several hours. Sara threw up all over her car in front of her friend.

Drained Battery. Kara was trying to watch a movie in her phone. The battery in the phone would not turn on. Kara took her phone to a local store. The store gave her a new battery. Kara was able to watch the movie on time.

College Graduate. My father's high school reunion was tomorrow. I am going to wear a suit and have a long dress. My father does not like the color red. My father thinks I'm going to look like a professional lacrosse player. I think he will have a good time and will not be disappointed.
Elephants. Tina went to the zoo. She went to the zoo to see the elephants. She stood in line for an hour. When it was her turn to feed, she got some peanuts. Her family laughed at how funny that was.

Bedroom. Kia's bedroom was a mess. It smelled gross and dusty. She asked her mom to clean it. But she couldn't spend time cleaning because she was busy. So Kia's mom gave her some toys and made a bed.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper was sitting by his front porch one day. Suddenly, he felt a sharp pain in his hand. He got up, seeing that he'd found a tadpole in his grass. Cooper ran back into the house. Cooper had to take the tadpole to the vet for its treatment.

Bad Bridge. I went on a ferry to the island of St Lucia. On the way to the island I had to pass by a dangerous bridge. It was so bad it was scary. My entire time there I was afraid of that bridge. After I went home I took the ferry back to the mainland.

Work. Eli was a construction worker. He worked all day long and had a lot to do. Eli was very tired the next day and didn't get to sleep well. He was extremely hungry, and he decided to go eat. When he got home he was starving but was happy to have work!

All You Can Eat. Eddie went to a Chinese restaurant. He ordered a lot of food. At the end of the meal he felt really sick. He had to be rushed to the hospital. He ate a lot of Chinese food and felt better the next day.

The Last Bus. It was the last bus home from the factory. The workers were walking along the tracks when they heard a car stop. The driver got out and got them to get on the next bus. They waited for a minute and then got on the bus. It took about an hour but they finally made it home.
Note. The teacher asked me a question. I knew what answer to give. I told her that the answer was no. She wrote her an F. She told me I could make the grade up next time.
Trapped Cat. My cat always wanted to come into the house. I tried to convince her to stay, but she wouldn't. I had a plan. I set the cat outside. The cat stayed out of the house for the whole week.
Caught in the rain. Allie and her friends went out. The weather was horrible. Allie was soaked. She was upset she couldn't leave. Her friends had to bring her to school.

The Sunscreen. Julia was playing outside one afternoon. She noticed she was having trouble breathing. She decided to buy some sunscreen. She bought a lot of it. Luckily, it worked and Julia was not sunburned.
Bicycle Accident. It was a very windy day at the beach. Tom was riding his bicycle. It started to rain. He pulled his bike to the side of the road. Tom was not seriously hurt.

Going to the Park. My kids wanted to go to the park. They started walking towards the gate. The gate was open but they couldn't go in. The neighbor's heard their cries and came out. My kids finally went inside.

Lost. Lois didn't know where her car keys were. She looked all over the house for them. They weren't in the car anywhere. She checked every inch of the house. Lois then realized she had left them at the grocery store.
The Climb. The man went up a large hill. He began to climb. His knees were becoming sore from all of the effort. The man stopped to rest. He got up the hill and started the ascent again.

Water for Cats. John went to the pet store to buy some cat food. There were cats in the food display, so John bought some. After he got home, John fed the cat his food. The cat ate his food. The cat sat on John's bed.

Paycheck. I got my paycheck. I tried to figure out what I can spend it on. The only thing I could find was a pair of pants. I could not find a pair of pants in my size. I went to the store to buy a pair.

Gymnastics. Julie had a big gymnastics competition. She decided she would be more prepared. She went and hired a coach. He helped her to prepare more. Julie was surprised to win her first competition.

The Wedding. Sue had waited ten Years to get married. She had gotten the perfect ring and wore it for the big day. On the day of the wedding, Sue was very nervous. But at the reception she met someone she really liked. The wedding was a wonderful success.

Internet Addiction. Tom was very tech savvy and always used the internet. Tom had to use his computer everyday for work and home. One day his internet went down and he couldn't use it. He tried to use a different router and was unsuccessful. Tom eventually had to call the cable company and find a new one.

Fallen Tree. John had to chop down a tree in the yard. He didn't have any tools. He walked around the neighborhood asking for the assistance of others. Several of them offered to help him chop the tree down. The tree fell into the yard and John was grateful.

Lazy. Bill was a student in high school. Bill loved to read, but didn't like to do homework. One day, Bill didn't have his homework and was late to class. When Bill arrived, his teacher told him to go outside. After, Bill got his homework done.
Break. Sue and I went to the beach today. She was playing in the water. I jumped in. However, she did not notice and fell into the ocean. I helped her out and she was okay.

Bryan and the song. Bryan was bored on his way to school. He tried to get into a conversation with some kids. The kids turned their music down. They ignored him. Bryan had to go home and listen to the radio instead.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto got a job offer from a company located in a new state. Roberto decided to look for a house in that state. The house was in a different state than the one he is looking for. Roberto drove all the way there in order to find his house. After a week of looking for his house he found it and it was very good!
Fast car. I always loved the fast cars. So I decided to go faster than a snail. Alas, I could not afford that car. So I decided to go faster in my mind. Alas, I ended up breaking my leg.

Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina was getting ready for prom. She was ready and waiting for her date. He showed up and she ran towards him. She couldn't believe how quickly he ran. Sabrina was crushed and was never going to ask him out.

Vacation. The vacation was in August. She planned to take a cruise. The cruise line was delayed due to bad weather. Ellie was sad, but still excited. Ellie went on the cruise and had the time of her life.
Scary Snake. Sally was walking around the woods. She saw a snake on the path. She was too afraid to approach it. She ran back to her car. She didn't see the snake after that.

The candle choice. Sandy had been craving a candle. She didn't have any at home though. She decided to make her own candle. Sandy's candle burned out before she could finish it. She decided she would just buy a cheap candle.

Lacrosse. We went to an indoor hockey match. A lot of people played lacrosse. There were several different sports to play. There were even teams from different countries. We ended up winning a lot of games.
The tractor. Bobby was pulling his dad's tractor. His dad pulled behind him. Bobby was pulling so hard. The tractor lost balance and fell over. Bobby hurt his arm and had to get a cast.

Showing Is Believing. Bill loved to go dancing. He decided to try stand up comedy. Bill got stage fright and began to cry. He realized that he had the stage fright of a lifetime. He took a deep breath and tried again.
Crushes. She had been with him for 2 years. He had no girlfriend. He liked her as a friend. She found out she was pregnant. They tried to get married.

Onions and Garlic. Anna's mom told her not to try onion and garlic. Anna was so hungry! But she still went to the market. There, she bought the onions, garlic, and peppers. Anna thought they were very tasty.

Just Beachy. Gina had gone out to play at the beach. She wanted to feel sand on her legs. But the water was too cold. So she put on a pair of sandals. It was so much better than a beach in the summer.

Student Loans. My daughter graduated college this summer. She went to a student loan company to apply for her loans. They took her to her bank to apply for a loan. She was able to apply for the loan. She was approved for a loan and is now debt free.

Forgetful Daisy. I remember when my father would help with the garden. One day he had trouble remembering who was planting the flowers. I had to remind him who was planting the flowers. I told him where the garden was located. He was happy to know his father remembered him.
Aaron. Aaron is a sweet boy. He has lots of friends. One day his friends take him to a store to buy a game. The game is a terrible game. Aaron is mad at his friends for taking him shopping.

Cold, wet lesson. Jane was doing her first water balloon fight. She was wearing a white swimsuit. Her friend did a white one. She got the balloon stuck on her tongue. Jane got out without hurting her.
Tails. The man tried on tails. It made his head and neck hot. He looked at the mirror to see if his tail was the right length. His sister told him his tail was too short. He bought a tail extender.

William loses the game. William was the star of his team. His team was playing against the school's rival team. William's team was down 4 points with less than a minute left in the game. William knew he had to score to win the game. William shot the ball and he made it, winning the game.

Blood Plasma. I went to the doctor yesterday to get my blood drawn. I explained that I have never had blood drawn before. They gave me a prick and drew blood from my arm. Afterwards, the doctor said it was healthy. Now I will donate blood plasma to others.

Hummingbird Day. Last Thursday we went to the park to see the hummingbird exhibit. I was so excited as it was my first time seeing them. The exhibit was full of birds all of different kinds. They all looked so beautiful. I enjoyed watching the whole exhibit.

Out. Anna's cat would not stop meowing. Anna finally gave up and called animal control. Animal control arrived quickly to scold Anna's cat. Anna and her cat quickly learned that it was not a meow job. Animal control let Anna's cat stay in her house.

Question. Gina wanted to know why the janitor never did her dishes. Her mom told her to wait for the principal. Gina would not listen to her mother. She left her room to go to the principal's office. Gina was late again.

Loss of Energy. I was sitting at a meeting, working on a report. I was typing the report for another half hour. Suddenly, I could not hold a pen in my hand anymore. I looked down and saw that my keyboard was broken. I was so frustrated, I had to move the presentation to another part.

A Car Purchase. Joe was a young kid and didn't know how to drive. He got a part time job and worked for a while. Joe was saving up to purchase a used car. He finally had enough money. Joe went to the dealership and bought a used car.

Trying. Tom bought a new car. The salesman helped him test drive it out. Tom was unsure about the car but tried it out. It was a lot better than the salesman showed it to be. Tom bought the car without a doubt.
IHOP. Today is National IHOP. Our 2 year old granddaughter went. She loved every minute of it. She said the people were so friendly. She said she will be back tomorrow.

Runaway Bride. Ricky was expecting a surprise for his birthday. But he didn't want his family to know. On his birthday, his cousins told him to go to his sister's party. They told him it was a girls' party. Ricky ran away from his parents.

Colorado. I went to visit my mother in Colorado last summer. We spent time hiking and skiing. I saw beautiful mountains and sweltering temperatures. I even got a chance to see my favorite band, The Cars. I had a great time and plan to visit again soon!

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. I was having dinner with some friends from work. I decided to throw my food on the ground. I had no idea why but I was really embarrassed. I decided to start eating more and exercise more. I didn't see myself eating or exercising for 3 months.
Driving. The woman went to the DMV. She was trying to buy her license. She drove up to the counter. She took her license and sat down. The lady smiled at her and then she drove off.

Mexican Food. Kelsi always loved tacos. So her friends took her to Mexican restaurants. She tried a new place that made them. Kelsi couldn't eat anything but tacos. But when her friends tried it, she said she loved it.
New album. Tina really wanted the new Drake album. She got all her friends together to see it. When they saw it, they all bought it. Tina was so happy. She was glad she had spent the money.

New Car. Tom bought a brand new car. Tom didn't realize there were many miles on the car. He drove the car to a friend's house. Tom's friend let him borrow his car. Tom's friend was very thankful for Tom's new car.
Stampede. Tim's football team was losing. They needed to score a touchdown to win the game. They practiced all week long. They took off the field and headed home. They won by one point!

The Tie. Dan needed a new tie for school. Dan went to the store to purchase a tie. Dan decided he would buy a brown tie to match his hair style. Dan loved the brown tie he chose. Dan was very happy with his new tie.

Puppy. It was time for the new puppy to come. The Smiths took a little puppy out for a walk. It wasn't long before they found it's home. They named the puppy Spot. Spot and the Smiths are very happy together.

The Scam. Jake was going to a concert. He had a friend give him an old ticket. They waited for hours and hours in a hot sun. Finally, they were able to get their hands on the ticket. The next day Jake called the friend and told him the good news.

The Swimming Lesson. Sandy wanted to learn how to swim. Her mom signed her up for a swimming lesson. Sandy practiced with her mom every day. Sandy became very good at swimming. Sandy was very happy that her mom signed her up for lessons.
Power Plant. Jenna had a very small electric bill. So she decided to turn it off. The next day, she watched the meter. And it was over 100% full. Jenna ended up spending thousands to fix the meter.

Snake Eating. We had just bought a house with our two sons. We decided to buy some chickens for a winter pet. The kids were playing with snakes. The snake bit one of the kids and they both went home. We never bought any snakes again.

New Friends. Sue had to go to a friend's house. Her parents let her go to the friend's house for the day. She spent the day talking and taking care of the animals. When Sue got home, she realized that she was bored. So, she decided that she would have a sleepover with her friends.
The Orange. Kate bought a bunch of oranges. She planted them in her garden. She was glad she'd gotten a bunch of oranges. She started to eat them. They were delicious.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake hadn't been fishing for a while. He went out on his boat with a friend. Jake spent most of the day fishing. He felt much better after fishing. Jake decided he would go fishing more often.

New Dog. The Smith family loved their pet dog very much. One day, their dog got out and escaped. The family searched and searched, but they couldn't find their dog. Finally, they called the police to help. When they got the dog back, they were very happy.

Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy's friend was not feeling well. Jimmy decided he needed to help. He got in his car and drove to his friend's house. Jimmy then lifted weights for his friend. Jimmy then drove his friend to the doctor's office.

Boiling Corn. My friend and I were in the basement of a friend's house. We were cooking corn. We boiled the corn for an hour. When we checked the water the corn was completely cooked. We were shocked that the corn was so delicious.

Todd Helps Out. Todd was shopping at the grocery store. He noticed a stray cat lying on the ground. Todd noticed this and walked over to it. The cat looked guilty but Todd didn't mind. Todd decided to give the cat a sandwich and pet him.

Reading Challenge. Bill was walking in his apartment building's hallways. He decided to challenge anyone to read fifty books. Bill read the books and challenged them to a race. He threw some books on the ground when they were not moving. The first person to read fifty books lost the challenge.

Bad reaction. Tina was having a good time at the pool. When she went out in the ocean she felt a sharp pain. Her legs were swelled up. She immediately went to the doctor. They found out she had a mild allergic reaction.

Dead Plants. Abe was trying to kill some weeds. He tried to smash the glass with a tennis ball. Then Abe got a good thwack. The glass shattered and the plants fell to the ground. Abe sighed and went to his garden to tend the plants.

Skydiving. Fred took his skydiving class one day. They were in a small cabin on a mountain. The instructor strapped Fred to the back of the plane. Suddenly, his parachute deployed. Luckily, Fred survived his jump.

Dancing shoes. Rita bought new dance shoes for a dance recital. She tried them on and immediately loved the way they looked. She tried them on again and she felt a different kind of joy. The shoes didn't work, so she went back to the store and asked for another pair. The store didn't have her new dance shoes so she bought a new pair instead.
New Shoes. I bought a new pair of shoes. My feet hurt when I stepped in them. The bottom sole had holes in it. I asked my husband to repair them. He fixed them for me.

Scary Sleepover. When my friends were kids, they had sleepovers. We decided to pretend to be ghosts. We covered our faces with white sheets. The adults would say scary noises. We never did that again.

Phone. Bill was looking for a new cell phone. He had looked at many different ones but none fit. He decided to buy a new phone. Bill went to the local electronics store. Bill purchased a new smartphone!

Ladoo. Neil was a student of Tamil Nadu. He learned about Tamil Nadu's famous Ladoo soup. He decided to make a rendition of the soup. It came out perfect. Neil took great pride in his Tamil Nadu food.
Spider. I saw a spider. I screamed. My mom looked for the spider. I saw a dead spider. My mom was relieved.

Classroom. I had trouble sitting in class. When I finally sat in my desk, I screamed. The teacher gave me detention for my outburst. When I got out of class, I was shocked to see the teacher had given me detention! I vowed to never scream so loudly in class again.

Katie Courier. Katie went out to get some food after work. She was going to go to a diner to order a drink. She walked by an ad for a pizza delivery service. She saw the ad and decided to order one. Katie enjoyed her pizza and was very happy about it.

Stamp collector. A stamp collector was walking through the neighborhood. He was very excited to find a rare stamp. He asked many locals for help finding a stamp. At one point, a man pointed a stamp out to him. The collector took the stamp and quickly took it home.
Loud Snoring. Sammy snored loudly in the middle of the night. He was sleeping when his mom woke him up. Sammy got up and looked around the house. It was only her pillow. Sammy rolled over to get it.

Tavon. Tavon was the smallest of three brothers. One day at school he got lost. The school was very small and he was scared. His older brother told him there was a map in the locker. Tavon found the map and was happy he was not lost.

Karate Class. Joe had wanted to be a Karate instructor his whole life. Joe started taking karate classes when he was in high school. Joe was really good at karate. Joe decided to pursue a career in karate. Now, Joe has a teaching job in a Karate Center.

The concert. Lacy and her friends went to see a concert. Lacy was super excited about it. She had never been to a rock concert before. When she got there, she was immediately overwhelmed by the music. It was something she would remember for the rest of her life.

Piano. Kia was a great pianist. She wanted to teach herself to play, but didn't have any pieces. She was sad, until a friend told her about a piano teaching program. There, she was able to take lessons all by herself. Thanks to her friend, Kia learned a lot more piano songs!

Fundraising. Beth's high school was holding a bake sale. Beth wanted to contribute to the sale, but wasn't sure what she'd bake. She got some of her family's favorite cookies and baked them. At the sale, Beth found out that she was not the only one baking. Everyone at the sale baked cookies to buy for the bake sale.

Money gambling. I went to the casino the other day. My friend bet me one hundred dollars. I took the money and decided to spend it. I ended up losing, but my friend was so mad. We don't gamble together anymore.
Happy ending. Alicia was in love. She was in love with a guy named Tom. She wanted to marry him. She told him how she really wanted it. She said it out loud in front of him.
Soda. Tom was always thirsty. He couldn't drink what he wanted. He went to the store to buy more. They didn't have it he liked anymore. Tom tried some and hated it.
Delivery. It was Sam's birthday. She decided to celebrate with her family. They planned to eat pizza. But it started to rain. So they went to the store to get umbrellas instead.
Ants. Dan and his kids were going to go fishing. His kid fell off the dock. His kid got a huge bump on his head. Dan cleaned the bump off. His kid went home and thanked him.

Forgetful Bob. Bob had a habit of forgetting to take his morning medication. Bob's doctor told him he needed to go to work. Bob left for work in the morning. While he was gone his mom took his medication. Bob had to go to work the next day with a headache.
New Hair. Rena just moved to America from China. She was feeling lonely. So she decided to dye her hair purple. She couldn't believe how good it looked! She couldn't wait to show off her new hair.
Eggs. I love eggs. One day I decided to make them. I boiled some eggs. After the boiling, I put the eggs in a pan. They were great.

Surprise at school. I was running around the playground when I saw this boy. He had my backpack on his back. I wasn't sure what he was doing so I asked him. He said he had something for me. He took the item from my back and gave it to me.
Fruit. The man picked some fruit. The fruit was delicious. The man gave the rest of the fruit to his neighbor. The neighbor was very happy. The man was satisfied with his work.

Bank. A man went to the bank to withdraw money. The teller told him to put a bag in the machine. When he got to the machine he forgot his bag. The man started over to the teller for his bag. He was so relieved when he found it on his way out.
Desk Builder. I decided to get a new desk today. I went to the local furniture store. I tried on four different desks before choosing one. I picked one out and paid for it. It was a perfect desk.

Doctor. My husband told me he needed to find a job. He started looking online for job listings. He found a job at the local hospital. The job paid $100,000 per year. He was excited to start working at the hospital.

Arcade night. I wanted to do something fun on Saturday night. So, I decided to have a local arcade night. I invited all my friends to play in the arcade. Then, we also played several rounds of Pacman. Overall, it was a good night.
Vegan. Kate wanted to become vegan. But she didn't want to give up meat and eggs. Then she decided she'd go vegan. She went vegan and couldn't believe it. She was not a vegan at all!

Big Deal. A man was waiting on a bus in the city. The bus was moving very slowly. The man began talking to a man next to him. The bus driver realized that the man didn't notice. The bus driver made the man sit down and give him his money.

Night Terrors. My sister in law called me from her hotel room. She had been seeing ghosts in her room. She told me she had been afraid of a ghost. I listened intently as she talked about how she had been afraid. We laughed together about her strange experience.
Yummy almonds. One day I was out on a hike. I saw some raw almonds and they looked so good. I took a bite and my mouth was bleeding. Almonds were amazing. I decided to buy some more.

Deep Cut. I cut my finger with my hand saw today. I started to cry at the thought of losing my finger. My brother came by and we spent the afternoon playing baseball. He took me to the hospital to get it treated. My finger was bandaged and looks better.

Tow Truck. Rita had been drinking heavily all week. She was a bit paranoid about taking her car to a mechanic. As a last resort, she pulled over and called for a tow truck. The tow truck arrived, and Rita was relieved to get it away from her car. The tow truck driver arrived an hour later, and Rita drove home.

Hidden Keys. My wife's coworker is a college professor. She had been planning a graduation party for weeks. On the day of the party, she hid her valuables in her car. We were unable to attend the party. Her co-workers were not pleased.

Bills big idea. Bill was a good mechanic. Bill had a very big idea for a big business. Bill made a huge investment for the idea. Bill ran with the idea and did a great job. Bill had the biggest idea in town and got the investment.
Online Dating. I used to date a man on the internet. I met him at a restaurant. We started dating for about a month. After a month we went on a date. We ended up falling in love.

The kitty finds a home. Rita was feeling homesick. She couldn't find her friends to play with. Rita decided to put an ad in the paper looking for playmates. She found a few nice kitties that she would play with that night. Rita was happy to finally have playmates after many years.
Lamb. Tina loved to cook. She decided she wanted to make a tasty dish. She went to the store to buy a small piece of lamb. She got home and began to cook it. It was a delicious roast!
Amazing sunglasses. Allie loved glasses. She was told her eyesight was poor. She looked into her options. So she got an amazing pair. They were beautiful.

Sick Day. The family went to the beach every summer. They didn't realize how sick they would get. They stayed at home all day and got very sick. They were forced to go back to the beach. Their health recovered fast.

Jenny's Accident. Jenny was riding her bike. She hit a rock on the road and skidded off the bike. Jenny's bike tumbled into a ditch. Jenny's mom found her bike in the ditch. Jenny cried when she saw the broken bike.

The Genius Was The Intern. Tommy liked to make his friends laugh. He knew how to play the recorder and the saxophone. He wanted to join a jazz band. He auditioned for the audition. He didn't get into the band but kept playing for fun.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky was grilling some fish. He left the grill to go eat with his family. Sparky forgot the grill plug in the back of his truck. When he came back, his grill was on fire. Luckily Sparky's wife came in and helped Spark clean it up.
Snitch. A little boy was playing ball. The ball hit him in the head. The boy ran up to his house. His mother yelled at him. The boy was grounded for the next three months.

Radio. Tom was really interested in the concept of music. He bought a cheap mp3 player. Tom could play almost any type of music on the device. He discovered that he could create his own music. Tom's music was so good, he wrote a whole book about it.

Teacher, Teacher. My teacher was always very nice. He never said anything mean to me. One day I was very rude to him in class. He got very angry and told me I was a bad student. Now I always keep a better attitude with teachers.

A piece of italy. Nora was visiting her grandparents in Alicante. They were taking her to see the sights. There was something special in the city of Alicante. She found an abandoned house on the outskirts of town. She thought it was so odd, she walked into it.

Personal space. One day, our granddaughter visited. Our granddaughter had a small pet parakeet. My son and I kept the parakeet out of her room. We were happy to see her use our room. However, her parakeet kept her occupied for hours.

Wild Concert. Tim's favorite band was playing a local venue. It was one of the last concerts they would play in a while. They were going to close the show with a super loud encore. Tim had no idea what to do or who to invite. He just kept moshing out and being a wild animal.

New Business. I started a lemonade stand this week. I had never sold lemonade before. I went door to door in the neighborhood and advertised my stand. I made a few sales that day. I hope to make even more this week.
Spaghetti. My wife is a terrible cook. She makes spaghetti often. She found out she was sick yesterday. She could not cook spaghetti today. So she bought extra spaghetti from the store.

The Railing. The man was walking home. He stepped on a nail and it went into his foot. He tried to go to his friend's house. His friends came to help him get his foot out of the rail. He was in trouble.

Boredom. I had always been interested in working on computers. In college, I purchased a computer science lab. While at college, my work involved a lot of manual labor. I found myself working alone on computers. In the end, I realized that working alone wasn't so interesting after all.

The Shot. Kerry wanted to impress a girl at school. She took the basketball from her hands and began to shoot. She missed badly, and everyone laughed. Kerry was so embarrassed, she had to go home. She was so embarrassed she didn't talk to her friends for weeks.
Speak. My teacher called me up. She told me that she had a speech. I walked into the class. The teacher told the class that I need to speak. I told the teacher I would speak for the class.
Art To Food. Bob was very lazy. He liked to eat only what he had with his meal. His wife had an idea. She got a box of art prints. Bob used the art to make food while watching tv.

The Planets. Neil saw a lot of planets at night in his telescope. He decided to make a planetarium out of them. He bought a huge box to hang them on the wall. Then he decorated the walls with interesting knick knacks. Neil was thrilled with his handiwork!
Lost Cause. Sam was very excited. He and his friend Dave had just moved to a new town. The boys didn't know anyone there. But they started to make new friends. They all got along much better after.

Wrong Guilt. John asked his girlfriend if they can go eat at a restaurant. She agreed and they decided to go to a fast food place. As John and his girlfriend was eating, they started to notice something. His girlfriend's phone was not in her hand. John ended up asking her for a drink.
Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim loved tacos. One day he saw an ad for a taco truck. Jim called up all of his friends. They all pitched in money for him. The day of the truck, Jim had a lot of business!

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. The girl was riding her bike down the street. A car sped by at high speed. The car crashed into the girl's bike. The girl fell down and cut her head. The paramedics had to help her.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky is a little boy with a crush on a girl named Amy. Amy wants a new bike for her birthday, but Sparky is sad. One day Sparky's mom made him a huge poster with pictures of her. Amy was surprised when she saw the bike she wanted, Sparky's. He knew she was mad that he didn't want her to get the bike.
Soaked. Beth ran out of water. She tried to use a hose to clean herself. It didn't work. She had to walk to the store. The store had a hose that worked.

Finding God. Bella was terrified of going to church with her grandma. Even when her grandma wasn't around, she would cry and stay in. When she grew older, Bella found an old church in the basement. There, she prayed and hoped to find peace. Instead, she found a world of sin and chaos.

The nerd. Tommy liked to be a nerd. He went to a science-fiction convention with his friends. He met a lot of really cool people there. He met this one guy and became really interested in him. The nerd was actually really cool!

voting. Caitlin went to vote for the first time in a long while. She had heard about the upcoming election for a local school board. She was excited to see who would be running the school. When she got to the office she was pleased. She had a good turnout for her first vote.
Dad saves Son. Bob was driving in the backseat of his son's car. Bob lost control of the car. The car rolled backwards. Bob stopped in his tracks. He was able to pull over to stop the car.

The Pens. Jenny loved to knit. She had a dozen different pens. One day she couldn't find her favorite pens. She went to the store to purchase them. When she got home, she was disappointed to not find them.

A Helper. Gina needed help with a book. She was a great reader. She could hold several pages in her mind. The book had pages of images she had never seen. She was helping to put the book on the shelf in the library.

Gary. Gary was a very good kid who never got in trouble. He always played by the rules and was very respectful. One day he got into trouble for talking back to a teacher. Gary decided to not be so nice to people anymore. Gary never got in trouble again.
Pizza. Sally made a homemade pizza for the family. Her family was very happy. They all ate tons of it. Sally felt great about her cooking! Her family appreciated it.

Being Greedy. I went to the supermarket. The shelf I picked up was out of my price range. I tried to put more items on the shelf. There were a lot of items I didn't need. I paid for everything and went home.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. Iris was getting married. She really wanted to be a bridesmaid. Iris took a test to see if she could do it. She was really nervous. Iris passed the test and was able to be a bridesmaid.
Birthday Cake. Last night my friend got me a birthday cake. I was really surprised and pleased. It had a yellow starburst shape on top. She thought it was amazing. I'm going to get another one.

Kilt King Ken. Ken was known as the kilt king of Ireland. A local man came up and challenged him to a duel. They met at a medieval tournament to settle the score. Ken won by a wide margin. The man said that he had been the real winner.

Staples. Jim went to the store to buy some kitchen staples. When he got there, he could not find any. Jim thought it was because he had left them home. Jim checked under his bed and found some. Jim was relieved.
Lost Wallet. Jim was walking home from work. His wallet was missing. Jim had to walk down a storm drain. The wind blew Jim's wallet into the storm drain. Jim had to walk back home without his wallet.

Audio recording. I needed to make some podcasts. So I decided to record my voice. I turned on my recorder and it was recording. Then, I turned it off. Then, I turned on the phone and recorded the audio.

Princess. Dana was very jealous of her family's riches. Her little sister had stolen the princesses dress. When her sister tried to get her attention, Dana screamed. She was about to hit her sister, but her mother calmed her. Dana realized that her sister's pride was hurt by what happened.
Kilt wearing dad. I wore my dad's kilt to church. I had to go in a puddle. The water was so cold it was frightening. I was terrified and my stomach hurt. I decided to never wear a kilt again.

Diet. John always wanted to lose weight. John was convinced to go on a diet. John didn't have the willpower to stick to the diet. John's body began to give out. John realized that it was time to stop dieting for good.
Lost Shoe. Cory had a big soccer match with his school. His mom took him out to practice. He fell during practice. His mom saw him on the ground. She yelled at Cory for not looking up before.
First date. Sam's first date was with Julie. He met her at the restaurant. They went out to dinner. They took a walk in the park. They had a great time.

Heart. Earl was very allergic to many things. He thought that he would die without a heart attack. One day, he ate a hamburger with mayonnaise. He threw up a large amount of mayo. His body died from anaphylactic shock.

Going Overboard. Jim was on vacation in Costa Rica. The weather was nice and he took a ton of pictures. He saw a waterfall and snapped lots of pictures. Jim was very excited when his boat hit the falls. He was so glad that he got the photo!
Long time to dry. Tina wanted to go swimming. She was all ready to go. But then it started to rain. Tina was soaked. She was so upset.

New Wallpaper. I purchased wallpaper from eBay. It was the cheapest price I could find. I did not expect it to arrive in a timely fashion. When I opened it it looked wonderful. I am proud of the wall I put up.

Jan goes to the dentist. Jan was eating breakfast. She noticed her tooth felt loose. Jan saw a dentist and called the office. The dentist asked what was bothering Jan. Jan showed the dentist and he told her to go for a root canal.

Tennis Coming of Age. I wanted to learn to play tennis. I bought a racket online, and looked for lessons. Every day after work, I asked my friends to play with me. I practiced with them until I was an expert. I felt very proud of myself for becoming a good tennis player.

Trumpet. Hannah was playing trumpet in a marching band. Her band was called The Circus Band. Her solo was to play a song from a Broadway play. Hannah did a great job on the solo. Her bandmates were all proud of her.
Squirrel. A squirrel sat in a tree. The squirrel looked at his food. He was not hungry. A bird sat on a branch next to the squirrel. The squirrel ate the bird's food.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard decides that he wants to grow a beard. Richard tries many different styles to grow a beard. After many tries, Richard has a nice beard. He is happy with how his beard looks. Richard is happy that he has grown a beard.

Silver Coins. I have always loved to collect silver coins. I went to the coin shop and looked around. I found a beautiful quarter and was in awe. When I found out it was a special coin, I bought it. It was the best quarter of my life.

Tea Time. My family loved to have tea every Saturday. We started a tradition in 1996. We would meet up in front of our building and have tea. Everyone liked the tradition. We did this several times in a row.

The Phone. Mary took her son to the park. While playing, he threw a ball to a girl. Mary was disappointed that he didn't buy her a new phone. He told her that he would buy her one as soon as she got the ball. The girl started to cry.

The Dog Park. Diane found a new dog park that had three trails. She and her kids ran and played all day there. They went down the three trails at the end of the day. They both felt very relaxed at the end of the day. Diane took them to their new dog park for more fun!

Tom's Diner. Tom was running late for work. He was eating breakfast when his alarm went off. Tom rushed through eating quickly. When he came out of his room, he quickly ran downstairs. Tom ate his breakfast as quickly as he could.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix wanted to make new friends. He decided to go to a coffee shop. At the coffee shop, Felix met an old friend named Tom. They met for lunch at the cafe. Felix and Tom became great friends.

Mylar Balloons. Harrison was having a great day at the beach. His mom told him she had a special surprise for him. She had him hold a balloon over his head. Harrison fell in love with his new balloon. He played with it until he couldn't hold it anymore.

Normal. Amy was so happy that the new store was opening. She ran into the front entrance and ran to the car. She was waiting for a man she had a crush on. A security guard stopped her and made her sit down. Amy was shocked and angry.

Fred Eats Salad. Fred decides he wants to eat a salad. Fred looks for the ingredients he needs to make a salad. When he finds the ingredients he needs, he buys the ingredients. Finally Fred makes a salad to eat. Fred feels satisfied that he ate a salad.

Riding Lessons. Tia and her boyfriend got into an argument. She decided to stop going to riding lessons. She told him he'd probably get injured and hurt, too. They argued, and she went back to riding lessons. But the two of them had a wonderful time that week.

The storm. Jack was playing outside in the yard. It started to rain very hard. Jack was too nervous and decided to hide in his house. A tornado came through his house right before he went back inside. Jack had to spend the night in his house and was very wet.

The Powder Room. Sarah was a little girl and she didn't have much room in her room. She would always use the back room of the house. She went to the hardware store and bought supplies. She started to paint a room to look more like her mother's. She painted it well and her mother loved it.

Lost Keys. Kate was leaving a restaurant with her kids. She realized she was lost. The keys were nowhere in sight. She had to walk ten minutes to a nearby restaurant. She had to wait about an hour for them to arrive.

Condo Values. Tim and Mary wanted to buy a new house. They looked up condo values to help them decide. They both liked the concept of a condo with a lower monthly cost. However, they could not agree on a value. They agreed to look at houses with different values next time.
Sled. Bob and Bill decided to sled down a hill. They both went very fast down it. They skied down it ten times. They had so much fun! They couldn't wait to go back.
Engagement. The woman looked at the clock. She thought she missed her appointment. She didn't have time to call her boyfriend. She decided to stay home. Her boyfriend was surprised at her choice.
Shots. The man took his son to get a shot. The son got scared of the needle. The boy cried and refused to get out. The man was fed up. He made the kid walk away from the needle.

Poisonous Gift. Tommy got a birthday gift in the mail. It was from a co-worker with a severe gambling problem. Tommy thought he could keep the gift in good conscience. Unfortunately, the co-worker's gift started causing him lots of stress. Tommy wound up letting the co-worker keep the gift.

Carrots. Kim had a vegetable garden. She had carrots, celery, onions, and sweet potatoes growing. The carrots were tough and tough. One day, a big storm blew through her town. The storms carried her vegetables all the way to her house.
The Excuse. Juan was feeling very anxious. He was really scared of flying. He called his mom for a ride to the airport. His mom told him she would drive him in the morning. He slept well that night!

The Monkey Emoji. Bob was sitting in class reading a paper. The teacher handed him a book. It had a picture of a monkey. Bob was very upset at the picture. He then angrily threw the book out the window.
The Meat. Billy loves beef. He bought a large amount of beef. He cooked it all night. He served his friends. They all loved it.
Bald. I was looking at my hair. I noticed I had an odd shape. I thought about cutting it off. I decided to get it professionally done. When it was done, it looked great.
Hair Gel. Anna's hair looked funny. So she decided to treat it herself. She bought a bottle of hair gel. Then she went to work. She was able to fix her hair with the gel.
The Stolen Shirt. Janet was working out. She had bought a new shirt. Suddenly she realized that her shirt was missing. She quickly went to look for it. Luckily, it was in her bag.

Coney Stew. My mom used to make delicious cheddar casserole. Today I was cooking it with the cheese and butter. I used her recipe and she said she loved it. I think I'm going to make it for her this time. I hope she says it's delicious.

Food order. Tom had to go to a new restaurant for dinner. They had a very long line. Tom knew they were overbooked and did not get in. He waited until the next day. Luckily, they gave him a free meal.

A Ride Home. Samantha took her car to the garage to make a left. She turned left and the right took off down the street. It was nighttime and the street was deserted. Samantha found a bench to sit on. She rested her head on the bench until she made it home.
Math Test. Lily has a math test. She has been studying all week. She knows she needs to study for this. When it comes time to take the test, Lily is very nervous. She makes a B on the test.

Drowsy. I had a lot of homework to do on Friday. I stayed up late until 5 AM playing video games. When I finally finished my homework, I decided to go home. I decided to play video games all day, until I was too tired to go back. When I got home, I was so tired that I fell asleep.
Holey skirt. Suzy wanted a new skirt. She was nervous about getting one. She found a red one at the mall. She tried it on and it looked great. Suzy was so glad she got the skirt.

Lick My Walls. It was a particularly hot day and I felt very hot. I got out my water hose and filled it with water. I sprayed all over my walls. Then, I sat down and felt a lot better. My walls were now licked by my dog.

The Fishing Trip. Lydia was having a wonderful time on a fishing trip with her dad. They had spent a long day fishing and were now heading back home. Her dad went ahead and grabbed a bite on his line. Lydia felt a tug on her hook and realized she hadn't bait it yet. Lydia quickly reeled her fishing pole back in and resumed her trip.

Snacks. Gina didn't have enough money for snacks. But her grandma insisted she had to eat breakfast. So she had to eat her grandma's famous oatmeal. But she was too hungry for it. Gina was upset she had to eat her grandma's oatmeal.
The Lost Cellphone. Carla was texting a friend. She lost her cellphone. She called a friend to come pick it up. She brought her phone to the Lost and Found. Carla's friend returned her phone.

Incommunicado. I was sitting on a bench today. As a result, the cops came and took me home. My sister got in the car and we were escorted by the cops. They searched my apartment. They left my stuff, but I had to call my lawyer for some legal trouble.

Paintball Challenge. Ken challenged his friend to paintball. They decided to start at a low level. After a few minutes of paintball, Ken challenged his friend. They both decided to push each other higher and higher. Eventually, Ken won the paintball match.
Beach Day. Tim was out on the ocean. He was relaxing by the water. His brother saw him. He offered to take Tim to the beach. Tim got into the water and had a great day.
Pick Me Up. A man was running late for work. He didn't have any time to get to work. He started up his car. He decided to pick me up. I gave him a lift and then he got to work on time.

Video. We got a new iphone last week. We were on our way out today when we noticed a car parked in the parking lot. I went inside and saw she was taking a video. My son and daughter laughed about it. We called the cops and got her to leave.

Related After All. I used to be attracted to men with fair skin. I told my friends about it. They encouraged me to go to the doctor. I went to the doctor and got my skin checked. The doctor told me my skin was very dark and needed bleach.

Bad date. I met a girl at the movie theater yesterday. She was looking for a place to take a cab. While I was trying to take a cab, she said goodbye to me. She went to see a movie with someone else. I was very disappointed and asked her why she's not coming to me.
Bird Attack. Gina's father was outside working on his car. A bird began to fly over to his car. She tried to swat at the bird. The bird ran off. Gina could not find the bird anywhere.

The Slide. We used to ride a slide down the hill in our neighborhood. It was a long, boring ride. I was almost nervous before I jumped off. I screamed when I jumped off the slide. I always bring a jacket with me now when I go down a big hill.
The dog. The dog jumped over the fence. She ran through the neighborhood. A passerby saw her. He called the cops. They arrested her for running into the neighbor's yard.

The Estimate. A man was in the army and the company he was with needed him more. The company told him they could not hire him as a sergeit. The man argued that it was not his fault they did not offer him an estimate. The company made him an offer, which the man accepted. The man decided he would never shop at a company that denied his requests.

Mitch's Accident. Mitch was driving home from school one day. Suddenly he felt his car shake and fall. Mitch was shaken up, but he was ok. Mitch was late for school, but he made it safely home on time. Mitch felt good about how he had reacted to the shaking car.

Strict Coach. Tim was in a wrestling tournament. The final match of the tournament had a belt match. Tim was nervous, but he did his best. The referee blew his whistle, but Tim didn't break a sweat. Tim won the match without a problem.

Pet Snake. Lola found a snake in the trash. She called the animal control and had the snake taken to the vet. She nursed the snake back to health. She decided to keep it in her house. Lola loved her pet snake!

Picking up Trash. Jeff is going out to take out the trash. Jeff is going out late at night and his trash can gets tipped over. The trash falls down the street and starts rolling into the street. Jeff notices the trash and picks it up. Jeff walks back to his house.

Bad Tip. Janice worked as a waitress at a diner. A very rude customer came in and talked to Janice. She felt sick and didn't know what to do. Janice walked away. She called the customer's boss to tell him.

Taking a Chance. Kate wanted to start her own business. She saved up money online. She also asked for help from friends and family. Finally she was able to open up her shop. Kate was happy that she had started something new.

Camp. Bob was a boy scout. He decided to go to camp with his friends. His dad was not pleased with his decision. Bob apologized and promised to be more responsible. His dad agreed and let him go home.
Puppy. John wanted a new puppy. He went to the shelter to find one. He could not decide between a blue or a brown puppy. He chose a brown puppy. His parents were happy with the choice.

Bathing Suit Failure. Tom went to the pool with his girlfriend. He wasn't aware they'd forgotten to put on a bathing suit. Tom's girlfriend accidentally dropped him into the water. Tom's girlfriend got out of the water quickly. Tom and his girlfriend got back in after a short while.

Fire. Anna lit a fire in her backyard. She went into the woods and forgot about it. While she was out of the house, her dog found the fire. The dog helped put the fire out. Anna was happy the dog helped.

The lockdown scare. A boy came into the school. He walked straight to the office and asked for a ride. The security guard asked if he had a ride for him. The boy said that he did not. The security guard locked the boy in the office.

Sister, Sister!. I was at a movie theater. I was bored and wanted something to do. I decided to go to the movie theater and see a movie. When I arrived I realized I left my wallet at home. I was upset that I couldn't see the movie I wanted to.
Missed Trash. Gina couldn't find her trash can. She had to go all the way back to the house. Now it was too late. Gina had missed the trash can. Now she had to go back to pick it up.

Broken Toe. Timothy had broken his toe. His mom was going to bring him to the doctor. They called the ambulance. Timothy's mom picked him up and they took him to the doctor. Timothy had to stay there for a few hours to heal his toe.
On the roof. I went out and bought a new roof. I had it professionally installed. My husband came home from work. He saw it sitting in the living room. He had to climb up the roof to get it.

Grand Canyon. We went to see the Grand Canyon today. We drove all day to get there. There was so much to see! We walked around and looked at all the natural beauty. When we got home we took lots of pictures.

Jan's Jilted Jawing. Jan was a mean girl. She constantly screamed and slapped people. One day, Jan was caught talking to a boy in class. She got in trouble at school. Her mother forced Jan to stop yelling so much.

Disappointment. Nate told his parents that he wanted to be a marine. His mother told him that she wasn't sure he was ready yet. In the end, she signed him up for physical education classes. He took his first few classes. His mom was satisfied and she decided to let him take swimming lessons.

Diary. I wanted a way to stay in touch with my friend. I got some free notebooks and began writing in them daily. I noticed I had no entries and it became hard to stay organized. I bought some pens and notebooks and began writing there every day. After a few weeks of this I had several entries and felt better.

The Jury. Linda and Peter went to court. They were both arguing for the same side. They decided to go to the courthouse and settle it out. They met in the courtroom and discussed the case. They both decided to vote together.

Severe Storm. Jake was taking a shower. Suddenly a hurricane came through. The shower was broken and the power went out. Jake ran to the store and purchased a new shower head. He was happy to not have a storm.

Bad Treatment. I sat down to read a book on the plane to Texas. A man behind me tried to talk. He became irritated with me and threw his book at me. It hit me on the head and broke it. I sat down and the man apologized and left.

Friends. I was playing chess with my friends in school. I lost all of my matches. However, we all had a lot of fun. I had a lot of new friends from school. Now I get to go to school with them every day!

Jump Rope Accident. Janice was jumping rope with her friends. They were going on a hill. Janice jumped onto the rope. She fell off and scraped her face. Janice was embarrassed and never jumped rope again.
Fight Sleep. Tim had a fight in his room. He had to get a nap. He went to the bathroom. Then he laid down. Tim fell asleep in the bathroom.

perfect attendance. Ally was very punctual to school. She never missed a day of school. At the end of the year, her school reported to the principal. Ally got a letter saying she had gotten a poor performance report. Ally was very upset and vowed to be better next year.

The hide and seek winner. Ally was playing hide and seek with her brother. She wasn't good at it but wanted to play. Her brother told her to hide and find him. But she ended up having fun and playing it. Ally won by a landslide.

Mitch's Money. Mitch didn't like to spend money. So when he needed to spend money he would put it in a bank. One day he went to the bank and didn't have enough money. Mitch decided to borrow some money from a loan shark. Mitch was glad to be able to use his money and save money.

Monkey See Monkey Doo. Jack thought he was the coolest kid at school. He would spend most of his time outside playing basketball. One day, he decided to spend some time in the woods. When he arrived he saw all his friends playing basketball in the trees. Jack thought that was just as cool as him playing basketball.
The Kite. Nia had just purchased a new kite. She took it outside to fly it. However, it flew higher than expected. Nia kept trying to fly it higher. It ended up staying in the air longer.
Lost Keys. Tom was out drinking. He left his house. Tom wasn't able to get home. He called his wife. She gave him a lift home.

The New Phone. Today I went to the store to buy a new phone. I found a nice silver one that I liked. I picked it up immediately. It did not work as well as I thought it would. I never bought that kind of phone again.

Solar Power. Joe and his family lived in Arizona. They had no power at night. Joe thought that this was because of their lack of a generator. He and his family started solar powered lights in their bedroom. Joe and his family felt much better in the darkness.

The Leak. Bella noticed water was leaking from her home. She called her contractor, who fixed the leaking pipe. The leak was repaired. The leak was not repaired. Bella went to look for a leak detector.
Rex. Rob wanted to be a writer. He wrote a great short story. A publisher liked the short story. He sent it to the publisher. They loved it!
Emergency. The power went out at my house. There was nothing to do. We had to call the fire department. The fireman arrived in a few minutes. We had to stay in the house for the rest of the day.

Quarters. My friends and I had just moved into our first apartment. We had only found a few quarters. I had to get the mail and go to the grocery store. When I got home I couldn't believe how much money I had. It was a new year so I made a big celebration with the quarters.
My Favorite Binky. I always wanted a binky. I asked my mom for one. My mom gave me a yellow binky. I loved it very much. Now I have a yellow binky.

Lost Puppy. Cindy found a small puppy in a tree. She brought the puppy home and named it Spot. Spot loved being around Cindy and would play with her. One day Spot got too big and Cindy couldn't get him home. Spot got home, but Cindy was sad to lose him.

Successful Mediation for Shared Child Custody. Sue and Jim argued over who gets to see their kid. Sue decided to mediate the custody battle. Sue's mom agreed to let the kids live with the father and Sue. Jim started the paperwork for the move. He moved the kids to their new home the next day.

The Marathon. Liz was training for the marathon. She was out on the trails by her local park. She was determined to run all of them. When she finished she felt proud. She had beat her personal record!

Wordsmith. Tim had a hard time writing words. His friend recommended he try online training. Tim signed up for an online training class. At first the classes seemed very difficult. However Tim began to feel less out of his words.

Floor. Anna's garden was thriving. But she was having problems growing enough food. So she went to the hardware store and bought some things. Anna started digging a well to put in her garden. Within a week, her garden was overflowing with fresh vegetables.

Pink Underwear. Tommy was about to go swimming. He was wearing pink underpants. They got stuck in the drain when he was walking past. Tommy panicked and tried to get them out of the drain. Unfortunately they got stuck too deep and Tommy had to walk out.

The Almost Revolt. Every year, the town of Compton would have a local election. Last year, the local mayor was challenged by a younger and more progressive challenger. The mayor resigned after the election. A local assembly was held to elect a new mayor. While Compton was a conservative town, the assembly was a step towards change.

Stepping on a Nail. Amy was playing basketball outside with some friends. She went to kick the ball around a bit. While kicking, she stepped on a nail. She felt a sharp pain shoot up her leg. She was out of the basketball for a few minutes.

Cake Disaster. Dana wanted to bake a cake. She bought all the ingredients, and mixed them together. After several hours of waiting, she put it in the oven. However, she accidentally turned off the oven. Everyone had to be let out of the house to go eat.

Gym class. Linda wanted to learn to do a backflip. She looked up a few videos online. Then, she bought a trainer's vest. She hired her own trainer to help her. After a few months, she could do a nice backflip.
Cutting my own hair. I had long hair since I was a child. The last thing I wanted to do was cut it. My best friend told me to cut it for myself. She cut it for me. I was so excited to get the cut.

Movies with girlfriend. I love watching movies with my girlfriend. We have always been competitive with each other. Until today when she came over and knocked me out. I was able to recover after awhile. We still talk about movies and it's fun.

Orange Seed. I was walking down the street one day. I picked up a handful of seeds from the ground. I went home and peeled them off the tree. I put them in a jar and gave them to my friend. We made orange sauce with the seeds.

Not Creepy At All. There was a strange man walking down the street. He seemed harmless to everyone else, until he began speaking. He said that he was from the future and his name was John. John introduced himself and told his stories. The people there were skeptical, but they all followed John to the end.

Nap Time. Lana's grandma insisted she spend the day in the sun. Lana was excited, but the temperature was too hot. She lay on the swings and played volleyball. When she got back home, she was miserable. She went inside to cry.

Cora. Cora was a great singer. She had a show with her friends at the city's hall. It was raining and thundering when the crowd started singing. Suddenly, a gust of wind blew the music away. And it all stopped and everyone was sad.

New Job. My wife just got a new job. She loves it, and she is going to stay with it for awhile. She will be moving upstate to a larger house. It is a great place to raise her children. I think she is going to love it.
Modern Dating. Tim was a young single man. He was looking for love. He had several relationships. He found his love in a popular online dating site. They met each other and got married.
The Paper. The newspaper was running a special. It was the same story they wrote daily. I was at work when I heard the announcement. It was too late. The newspaper had lost my subscription.

Santeria. I was studying the Quran for my degree. One day, I read that the word Shia was actually Christian. It made me very confused and sad. I realized I was going to have to rethink studying the Quran. I decided to stop studying the Quran after that.
Clip. John's friend gave him a clip of a cartoon. John tried to hide it from his mother. One day his mother asked him to show her the clip. John told her what he had. She laughed and thanked him.
Lost Dog. Tim lost his dog. He looked everywhere for him. Eventually Tim found him at a friend's house. Tim's friend let him stay there overnight. Tim never left his dog there again.

Lost Phone. Tim lost his cell phone. He had to walk all the way back home from work. It wasn't until he got home and it was lost. He called it a few times and finally got it. He was excited to be reunited with it.

Neighborhood thief. Maddie always felt uncomfortable with her neighbors. They always seemed to be having fun in their loud music. One day, she decided to take matters into her own hands. She confronted them about the noise and a big argument ensued. Now, Maddie is forced to deal with the loud music every day.

Making Lisa mad. Lisa was very mad at her mom. Her mom wanted her to do chores like cleaning and cooking. Lisa didn't know how to cook so she asked her sister. Her sister made Lisa some homemade chicken soup. Lisa loved the soup so much she made a full meal for her mom.

Frisbee. Gina and her friends went to the park. They all had fun throwing Frisbee's. The grass was so high they couldn't see far. After a while Gina decided to try a longer throw. It flew over the fence and into the grass.
New World. I was on vacation in New York City. I walked around town to get something to eat. A homeless man asked if I needed a drink. I poured him a drink. He thanked me and I was very thankful.

An Extra Treat. I came home from school and all the doors were locked. I looked around the house for my parents. I opened the door and noticed there were no parents in sight. I started crying and decided to sneak downstairs. When I turned the corner, I heard my parents yelling for me.

c-section. Kelly and her daughter were having a baby. Kelly was scared of c-section. Thankfully her doctor came up with a solution. Kelly was happy to see her baby being born. Kelly was very relieved.

Aluminum Foil Swords. My father's collection of collectibles include many types of swords. One of his favorites is the aluminum foil sword he gave to me. I had always wanted an aluminum foil sword of my own. I finally saved up enough money to own a foil sword. My father sent me a copy of my own sword to show me how awesome it is.
Shelby goes to new york. Shelby had always wanted to see new york. Her family lived in america. They flew to new york. She had a great time. She always wanted to go back.
Kim's big test. Kim has a big test tomorrow. She is not ready for it. She decides to pull an allnighter. Kim takes the test. She gets an A on her test.

Meatloaf. John wanted to make some meatloaf. He bought all the ingredients he needed from the store. John followed the recipe exactly. When he was ready to cook he took it out of the oven. The meatloaf was perfect!

NYC. This morning I went to visit my aunt and uncle in Manhattan. My Aunt went to the Empire State building. My Uncle got coffee at the coffee shop across the street. We watched the Yankees game on tv and had lunch. My Aunt and I had a great time.

The Farmer's Market. The kids were excited to go to the farmer's market. They walked to the front of the store. They bought some fruits and veggies. They then walked back to their car. The kids were happy to go home.

Camping Disaster. My friends and I were camping one night. We had just set up our tent when it started raining. I had forgotten my umbrella. It made our tent wet and cold. We all had to leave without having a good time.
The Boat. The family was on vacation. The boat went up the river. They were there for two hours. They swam and played in the river. It was a great day!

Kind Acts. One day, the Smiths went to a flea market. They found some antiques and some cheap trinkets. They donated half the items they found. The rest they kept and sold for a profit. The Smiths were really glad they got a chance to do good for others.
Soup Kitchen. Tom lived in the city. He noticed that people would donate food to the soup kitchen. He didn't know if he could do it. Tom decided to try. He ended up donating 5 bags worth of food.
book. Nate bought a book online. He got a lot of good information about dolphins. But then he was faced with another problem. He couldn't read the book. He had to return the book.

New pair of louboutins. Katie had to go to the mall. She didn't know what to buy. She couldn't decide between the new shoes. She ended up picking the shoes. Katie bought them and then wore them the rest of the day.

Conduit. Kia had just bought a new conduit for her kitchen. She needed to install it but it was so small! She put the bolt on and went to the kitchen. To her dismay, the outlet was not in the right place! Kia had to pull the appliance out and replace it!

The Snake. The kid liked to dig holes in the yard. His dad wouldn't allow him to do it. The kid dug a big hole. He was afraid he was digging a snake. His dad told him it was just a hole and the kid dug in.

The Prescription. Ella was always sick and needed to take medicine every day. She had found a new doctor who offered her a prescription. The pharmacist carefully wrote the prescription for Ella. When the day came she drove to the pharmacy. She took the prescription home and started to feel better.

The Stand. Jenny and her dad were out in the yard. Her dad was going to go to a friend's house. Jenny and her dad walked to the stand to buy some snacks. They got their snacks and then Jenny's dad came back. He went back and bought them more snacks from the stand.

Sleepaway Camp. Dan recently moved to a different country. Dan wanted to take a vacation with his family. Dan contacted a company that provided him with a vacation package. The first night of Dan's new camp was fun and exciting. Dan was glad to finally be able to stay with his family.

Presley. The bandmates got together one night. The guitarists were in a state of disarray. They had made a mistake! They practiced until they were confident they'd made it right. Then they went out for their first show!
Dog Ate My Homework. Timmy was doing his homework. He had it all set up and ready to go. Suddenly he heard barking. His dog had ate it all! Timmy had to start all over.

Wet Pants. Kate was in a rush to catch the bus to work. She couldn't keep her hands off her purse. The bus was running really late. Kate was about to be soaked. She was relieved when it stopped early and they were on time.

Presidential Campaign. The presidential election was coming up in November. John really wanted to be president. He did everything possible to make sure he would win. When the votes were all cast, he won. The entire country congratulated him.
Taffy. I tried to sell taffy at my job. My boss bought me a dozen. The cashier took one to her customer. She gave me ten for twenty cents. I was amazed at her generosity.

Fishing Alone. I took my son fishing with me today. He is not very good. He never catches anything and throws it back. My son said he would catch a fish today. I laughed when he came back with a stick that was no longer a rod.
magic mug. Lily loved to drink tea. She bought a mug to drink it from. But it wasn't magic. She poured water into it. She drank her tea with the mug.

Bluebirds. Joe was very happy to see bluebirds. They always appeared at the top of the feeder. Joe started watching them one morning. He was amazed at their beauty. He decided to buy some bluebirds to study more.

Street Fight. The street fight began when two men began to pick a fight. The smaller man began to charge the larger one. The larger man raised his fist and a fight ensued. The smaller man began to run away when he was hit by a punch. Eventually the two men were separated and the fight was over.

No Mail. I went to bed, wanting to stay up late. I was so tired I didn't hear my alarm go off. After 20 minutes I heard my neighbor's voice. He had missed his delivery truck. He was running late for work.

GO HOME. Mia wanted to see her family. She drove to her parents' house. She begged her parents to allow her to visit. Finally, her parents agreed to let Mia see her family. Mia was so happy she returned home.

The Grapes. Maggie was making a strawberry jam. She took the jars from the refrigerator. Then, she washed them and put them in a basket. She squeezed a bunch of fresh grapes in the jar. Maggie was very pleased with how her fruit jam turned out.

Turtle Rescue. One day at the lake, Maryann found a turtle on the shore. Maryann brought the turtle home with her. Maryann fed the turtle. The turtle grew bigger than Maryann and grew sick. Maryann took the turtle back to the water.

Coin Return. Bill found a coin at the store. He brought it home and hid it. He found out someone tried to return it. He tried to return it, but someone beat him to it. Bill took it back and won it back.

storm. A storm was forecasted. The Smith family decided to go to the beach. They packed a towel, cooler, and swimsuits. They found some nice places to sit and wait for the storm. The next week, it rained three inches!
