Ray Rides a Bike. Ray was a young boy who wanted a new hobby. He decided to get on a bike and ride it around his neighborhood. Ray rode his bike around for a couple miles on a sunny afternoon. Ray began to feel very exhausted after riding his bike for a long time. Ray decided he did not want to ride a bike anymore.

Careful Driver. I had a big test coming up. I practiced with a new car every day. At school I was nervous, but confident. I took the test and I was very happy. On the day of the test, I was very lucky, I passed the test.

Backup Receiver. The ball landed in the back yard of Tim's house. Tim ran inside to retrieve it. Tim heard a loud pop. He noticed his receiver had popped. Tim replaced the receiver with a new one from the yard.
The Dog. A man was walking his dog. His dog suddenly ran into a ditch. The man called the police. The police came and told him to check on his dog. The dog was okay.
Bike. The man bought a bike. He went to a local bike shop. He bought a bike he liked. The man brought the bike home. The man rode the bike around town.

Chiggers. Anna had a problem with her fingernails. They were getting chipped and becoming dull. She got a pair of cheap plastic chiggers. She used them for a while but soon noticed a difference. They were much better at keeping them clean!
Loose Shirt. Tom was trying to change his shirt. The button on the shirt was too loose. Tom kept pushing. Eventually he got it stuck on his shirt. Tom tried to yank it free but it was too late.

Sounds Like The Plot To A... Linda had a lot of homework to do. She was in her history class when she heard a pop in her ear. She was trying to concentrate on her work when the sound hit her. It was a random noise that scared her and she began to fall. When she fell she realized it was the movie she had been watching.

Taken for granted. Anita was at a bar. And she began to drink and talk to other people. After a while, Anita's friends became very jealous. And Anita started to feel left out. She began to drink even more to forget her feelings.

Providence. I am Chinese and my uncle is white. He said he was going to surprise me with a trip to Providence. He took me to an upscale shopping mall. I looked at many expensive watches. I also purchased new clothes and makeup.
Funeral. The man went to a funeral. There were candles everywhere. He took one of the candles. The candle broke and made a big fireball. He had to extinguish the fire with water from a bucket.

The Furry Blanket. Dane was going on vacation. He got a fluffy blanket for his bed. He liked to tuck into it during the flight. He couldn't wait to take a nap in it! Dane couldn't wait to fly home with his new blanket.

Best Present. I gave my mom a new dress for Christmas. I didn't know what color it was. She told me it was a blue dress. I looked online and found the dress she wanted. I bought the dress and wore it to work the next day.
Violence isn't the answer. Tom was upset at his girlfriend. Tom began to beat up on her. The girlfriend asked Tom to stop. Tom began to hit back. The girlfriend filed for divorce.

Pentatonix!. Tom loved playing the guitar. He listened to lots of heavy metal. He got really into it and began writing a lot of songs. He put his music on the internet and fans began to really enjoy it. Tom soon became popular and a record label signed him.
breakfast. I was on a diet and needed some food. So I asked my friend to go to a restaurant. She said okay. They gave me a nice omelette. But it was too much to eat.

Fostering A Dog. I rescued a small dog from the street. I took him to a dog shelter and found him a loving home. The dog became very affectionate to me, and I loved him. I took him back home, and he was so happy! Now I take him to my house every day and make sure he gets fed.

The Christmas Tree. The family loved decorating for Christmas. They bought a giant Christmas tree. It was the biggest one they had ever seen. The kids got to climb the tree. They got to make dozens of decorations.

Sunglasses. It was a nice fall day. I decided to take my sunglasses off. As I walked into the room my sunglasses fell off my face. I looked down at them to find a glint in the black metal. I grabbed my sunglasses and continued my walk to work.

Landon's Lakehouse. Landon had a beautiful lake house in the woods. He invited all his friends over for a party. All the guests got to stay in the lake house. Landon cooked fish for all his guests. Landon had a great party with his friends.

Painting. Kim went to a park with friends. There was a nice painting at the park. She asked the artist to paint for her. She painted the park a beautiful color. Kim and her friends loved her painting.

Cheer tryouts. It was cheer tryouts time at Joe's school. Joe was nervous but excited. He made a lot of good moves during the tryouts. The cheerleaders told him they wanted to cheer for him. They all voted for him and he made the team.

Dead Battery. Tom kept waking up in the middle of the night. He would get up several times with the same sound. He finally noticed the dead battery on his phone. He was able to charge it with a spare battery. Tom kept waking up with the same sound.

Laura's Flowers. Laura got flowers for her boyfriend for Valentine's Day. She told him she had to work early. Laura didn't realize the flowers were wilted. They were still good, though. Her boyfriend still loved them.

Snack Bars. I had trouble keeping myself from eating snacks. One day I ate so much candy, I had no more willpower. I ended up throwing up and vomiting into a trash can. I had to wait until my parents let me go to the bathroom. Now I try to avoid snacks as much as possible.

The Sand Dollars. Jim was at the beach with his family. They dug a hole in the sand. Then they found a bunch of sand dollars. They buried the money and looked for another hole to dig. Soon enough, they had found a whole beach.

gunfire. John was on vacation in Paris. His hotel was attacked by a gunfight. John escaped the gunfire but was injured. The police caught John and charged him with murder. John was sentenced to death and his execution was planned for.

Branching Out. Sally needed to buy new hair products. She browsed the internet for ideas. She eventually settled on something new. She went to the drugstore and bought it. She loved it and wore it out immediately.
Bank Trip. I walked to the bank. I needed to deposit my check. I put my deposit slip into the machine. It did not spit out my deposit slip. I had to call to get the deposit slip out of the machine.

Tickle. I was playing tennis in my driveway with my dog. I went back to my house to go to the car. I didn't see him for a couple of minutes. I went back to my house and asked him if he wanted a tickle. He licked my face for a second then ran away.
Worst musical. Allie went to see Hamilton last night. It was rather terrible. Allie had to leave. She could not believe they ruined it for her. She couldn't wait to see other musicals.
Rupture. I had a bad cramp. I went to the ER. They sent me home with pain meds. They told me that I ruptured a tendon. They took me off of the bed.
Rat Problem. Annie was at a party. She went up to a table to get a drink. Annie spilled her drink all over the place. A bunch of people at the party were upset. They told Annie she had to go home.

Taking the Dog for a Walk. Gina was taking her dog for a walk in the park. The dog was going to let his master know he was hungry. Gina's dog was barking at a squirrel in the park. Gina could hear the dog barking and the squirrel in the distance. Gina turned around and went home to change her clothes.

Serving Time. My wife's boss is retiring soon. One of the employees is retiring for the first time. He has been working 80 hours a week. Today he told us he was in the building and couldn't go to work. My wife hopes he will visit his sister in-law.

Plan Ahead. A woman bought a cheap house with low maintenance. When she lived there, she made sure to always keep her house neat. She got an apartment for a lot of money, and cleaned her apartment every day. A few months later, she saw an inspection with paint leaks on the house. The woman was very upset, and bought a car instead.

Closing down the A&P. The family drove down to the a&p shop. They went in and looked at their options. The a&p was a bit out of their price range. They decided to get a more expensive one. They walked out with a brand new car.

The Parrot. Ben decided to teach his friend a new language. His friend was fascinated by the concept. Ben wanted to give it a try himself. Ben bought a parrot and trained it in Spanish. His parrot can now talk to him!

Spray Paint. Tom bought a spray paint gun for home improvement. He went to the hardware store to get paint. The store owner asked Tom to pay him fifty bucks for the paint. Tom had never painted before so he said okay. Tom spent all his money on spray paint and got paint all over his house.

Football. I played football growing up. I was always very good. At the age of thirteen I decided to play for my school. I was very good and made the team! I was very happy and went to play football professionally after that.
Hair. I went to a barber's to get my hair cut. The barber took a while cutting my hair. The barber was trying to squeeze some of the hair out. I told him that it's too much. The barber was not happy.

Putting away groceries. Fred was putting away groceries in the house. His neighbor noticed that the groceries were being put away. He told Fred what happened. Fred didn't know how he could do anything. Luckily, Fred's neighbor was understanding.

The Piano Lesson. Jenny wanted to play piano but she was scared of it. Her mother told her to practice every day to learn. Jenny was afraid to take up the piano and give it a try. Finally Jenny took the piano and began to play. She was so proud when she finally played piano well.
Foggy problems. Sam went out on a hike. It started to rain. Sam couldn't see and got muddy. Sam called a hiking buddy. His buddy arrived to help him out.

Space Heater. Gus wanted to impress his girlfriend by heating her bed. So he went to the store and bought a space heater. Gus was very proud of his accomplishment. His girlfriend was very impressed with his space heater. Now Gus has a new heater in his bedroom.
Lost. Tim lost his phone. He couldn't find it anywhere. He searched everywhere. Eventually he gave up and asked a friend for help. His friend gave him a call and Tim's phone was found!
The Field. It was a beautiful day. Tim and his friends went for a walk. They went to a field. It had beautiful flowers. They walked home in the nice weather.
Slump. The apartment was a mess. So Tom hired a cleaning crew. He had it all done in an hour. And they found several items he forgot about. He ended up spending three hundred bucks.
Allergic to Cats. Tom went to the pet store. He noticed a cat in one of the cages. He freaked out a bit. The cat was harmless. He decided not to pet it.

A spill in the bag. Jane had bought a new bag for school. The bag had several different types of books. One day, she opened the bag and spilled the books. Jane was not able to get the books out of the bag. She had to throw out all of her books.

Cooking is Important. Sue knew she needed to be more healthy. She went to the grocery store and bought some healthy things. She then went home and cooked healthy foods. She felt more healthy the following day. Sue felt like she needed to be more active to stay healthy.

Book. Nola had a hard time reading. She had to read books to pass the time during the summer. She had been reading in secret because she was afraid. Her mom surprised her with a new book. Nola was so excited to finally be able to read.

Mountain. The group climbed the tallest mountain in the park. Their goal was to climb to the top of the tallest peak. The summit was so high! They made it just in time. They were happy to see the huge clear mountain in the distance.

Todd's First Bike Ride. Todd was about to buy his first bike. He was very nervous and didn't want to fall. Todd told his mother to help him pick the perfect bike. Todd's mother told him to be careful and rode him around the block. Todd fell three times but luckily his mom was very careful.

Dress caught. Meredith had a special dress for the dance. It was purple and very pretty. She wore it to class one day. All her friends raved about how pretty the dress was. Meredith decided to never wear such a beautiful dress again.

Dollar Store. Gina wanted a new pair of jeans, but they were very expensive. The closest thing she could find was at the dollar store. But it was a long walk to get there. She walked inside, and the cashier informed her she was a dollar short. Gina was upset, and she left without the jeans.

Losing balance. The class was trying to move across the room. I had fallen on my face and needed help. I tried to lift my head up. Unfortunately my mom had to help me up. After that day, I always keep my head up.

Kujata. The Japanese were in a hurry to make the trip to the US. They had just arrived at the airport, and their flight was taking a while. When they finally arrived, they were all ready and waiting for their luggage. They unpacked everything, and checked their bags into their room. They were in town in a few minutes!

Biking. I was on a road trip through the mountains. I noticed someone riding a bike down a hill. He was not looking where he was going and went too fast. He crashed into a tree and suffered minor injuries. I learned to be careful on the road from then on.

Checker Floor. There was a checker floor on the sidewalk. My brother and I were playing checkers. My brother pushed me into the checker floor. He slipped and fell and got up. We started to laugh at how silly he was.

fridge. It was Christmas and I needed to get a new fridge. I walked to the store. The salesperson was kind enough to help me. I got everything out of the box. Afterwards, I was very happy with my new fridge.

Pool. There was a big storm. I was in my living room, reading a book. The storm was so loud it knocked down my bookshelf. I jumped into the pool and I was soaked. I decided it would be a good idea to bring books next time.

Wires. Tom was a computer programmer. He learned how to wire his laptop. He needed to wire it for wireless peripherals. Tom couldn't find the correct wires. He had to buy more from the hardware store.

Dream Team. Jack was a very good basketball player. He decided he wanted to join a team. He practiced day and night with his team. The day of tryouts came and he tried out. They selected him as the team captain and he was very proud.

Sara's Big Move. Sara wants to move to another city. She has been saving up money for a while now. She has been saving up for a down payment on her house. Her mortgage is paying off nicely. Sara will be moving to her new city in a few weeks.
Not Solid. Tim was cooking a pot of rice. He put a small amount in the pot. Then, he took out the pot. The pot was not solid. Tim cleaned the pot and it's loose.

Metal in a Microwave. Ben went to the store to buy a metal detector. He got a cheap detector and then bought some metal. Ben found a ton of old coins in his detector. He decided to take his detector to a coin expert. The coin expert told Ben that he found some very old coins.

Operation Table. We decided to play a board game. We put all of our board games under the table. Our friends sat down and started talking. We decided to just keep playing. We finished the board game and then all went home.
Crayons. Sara was coloring. She was using crayons. She dropped a crayon. It fell onto her floor. It broke into small pieces.
Philip Got Punched. Philip was walking home from school. It was dark and rainy. Philip stepped in a puddle. He slipped and fell. Philip was knocked out cold.
The earthquake. Briana and her family were in Mexico. They were on a boat in the ocean. Suddenly, they heard a loud rumble. The boat rocked and then crashed. The earthquake hit and they all died.

The Train Delay. I was riding the subway home yesterday. A train was waiting too far away to make it on time. I called my mother to say I was stuck on the train. She had to tell me the weather was bad. Luckily, she was able to get off the train and get home.

Cells. Kia was expecting her first child. She was nervous about what would happen. She read about the benefits of early pregnancy testing. She was reassured by her doctor. Soon Kia was ready for her first baby!

Glass down. Tim had a friend that loved to glass. Tim decided to put his friend's favorite glass in a bowl. He filled it with cold water. Tim then put the bowl on the counter. Tim's friend was happy about how the glass looked.

Family Vacation. It was time for the Smiths to take a family vacation. They packed a suitcase full of clothes, games, and toys. They boarded a train that would take them to their destination. They unpacked their stuff and got comfortable on the train. When they arrived at their destination, they unpacked all the stuff and went home.

Megan Makes A Fire. Megan gets a paper with a fire in it. She goes to the kitchen to make a small fire. She puts some wood and paper on a stick and puts it in the fire. The fire goes out and she uses a lighter to start another one. She makes her first fire and her house is quiet for the night.

Lost Game. Dan was playing with his friends. He decided to try his hand at Pokemon Go. Dan got too excited and ran towards the screen. When he landed on the screen he immediately lost control. Dan went to the store and bought new headphones.

Thanks for the Pictures. Jenny and her parents were on vacation in Italy. Jenny wanted to show her dad how much she liked him. She took a lot of pictures to show him how much she adored him. When the photos were all over the house, her dad got so angry. He never saw her again.

David loses his wife. David and his wife had been married for many years. One day while grocery shopping David decides to buy eggs. He goes to the store to buy some eggs. After buying the eggs he realizes they were expired. David's wife comes home and tells him that she doesn't want him back.

Cheap Frames. I found an old framed poster for the Boston Symphony Orchestra on eBay. I didn't have enough money to pay for it. I decided to steal it and sold it for only $4. I used that money to buy myself a nice violin. Now I feel great because I'm the best violin player in my neighborhood.
New Job. I got a new job. I had never made a ton of money. I felt confident I could make the cut. I worked hard and slowly at first. Eventually I was comfortable making the cut.
Chris. Chris bought some beer at the store. He had never tried any beer before. After a few sips, Chris realized that he was not drunk. Chris felt regretful. He decided to only buy beer from then on.

I'm Not A Cry Baby. Jane was playing in her room when she heard a strange sound. Her parents told her to come downstairs because her room was burning. Jane's parents left the room as Jane began to cry. Jane's siblings were all in the room when Jane began to scream. They knew Jane's room was ruined so they helped her clean it.

The Sunburn. Nancy decided to go for a walk outside. She was out in the sun for a long time. As she got into the city, she started getting sunburned. She decided to stay inside all day instead of going for a walk. Nancy wasn't as sunburned as she thought she was going to be.

Partner. Bob and Sue were best friends. One day Bob and Sue decided to get a dog. Bob decided to take Sue to the shelter. They found a dog that was very malnourished. They brought him home, and he became their new partner!

Drive Away!. My mom always drove her car away from my house after dark. She would always look for something that would cause it to stop. I would hide in the basement for an hour just to be safe. One night she had no luck finding anything. She eventually found the key and we were able to drive away.

They all ditched him. Rita thought her boyfriend might be cheating on her. She didn't trust him but still pretended to love him. One evening at dinner she pretended to love him but then stopped. She thought he might not want her back so he stopped. Everyone laughed and Rita was devastated.

Do the Right Thing. It was my son's first day of junior high. We were taking his first science test, and he was nervous. He stayed still and listened to what the teacher was saying. We finished the test with a high grade and we all had a great time. He learned a lot about science and morals, and even earned an A!

Buying a cell phone. John had just purchased a new cellphone. He realized he didn't have any money saved. He decided to borrow some money from his brother. He went to the phone store. They were out of his credit card.
Garden. The man planted a garden. It grew very quickly. He sold all of the produce. He made enough money. He planted a second garden.

Jan pays rent. Jan lived with her mom until her mom died. She was so sad that she did not pay rent. Jan called her dad and made him pay rent. Jan's dad paid rent for the next month. Jan went to school to get her own place.
Skip has dreams. Skip had a big dream. He wanted to live a long and happy life. He got a call one day that he was accepted to medical school. Skip started school the next year. Skip is now a doctor.

Dad's Secret Profession. My dad works in a call center, not in the fields like he used to. I think he's a therapist and he's not. He likes to tell people that he was a doctor when he was younger. The next day he called me and told me that he was a lawyer. He was joking.
The Pillow. I went to bed in a new bed. The pillow was my favorite. It was soft and fluffy. But it was getting very warm in the winter. I decided to sleep in a warm bed the next night.
First Football Game. Tim was going to his first football game. Tim bought a ticket. He had to get there early. Tim found his seat. Tim caught a foul ball.

Falling in the Handstand. I got into a handstand. Suddenly, the air became very tight. I felt my back snap. When I went to grab my legs, my knee went through. I ended up laying on the floor for ten minutes.

The Flu Shot. Jack didn't want to get the flu shot. His doctor said the shots were very safe. Jack went to get the flu shot anyway. Jack did not like the feeling of the needle go in. The doctor felt bad for Jack.

Grass In The Bed. Sue's husband was going camping. He needed to buy new bedding for his tent. He went to the hardware store. They had grass in his bed! Sue's husband didn't want to sleep on the grass now.
Nervous Mom. Amy was babysitting her sister. Suddenly she heard a scream. She hurried to the scene. She saw her little sister being abused by her dad. Amy rushed in and comforted her.

Saint Patrick's Day. My daughter woke me up this morning. She said she wanted to do something special for Saint Patrick's Day. We all went out to eat breakfast. We all had pancakes with orange slices on the side. It was an awesome tradition.

Dust. Bob and I went for a walk around the neighborhood. He started to sneeze and his nose became red. The pollen inside Bob's nose kept him from getting any sleep. I went back home and put on my boots. I went back outside to take a hot shower.

Popcorn. I love to eat popcorn. Unfortunately I hate when it is burned. This is why I go to the kitchen to buy popcorn. But I don't know what I'm doing when I buy it. I'm usually just going to buy some crackers instead.

Ninety Years Old. John's eighty nine year old neighbor died suddenly. His neighbor was not a well liked person. John didn't want to upset his neighbor. He went to the cemetery and cremated his neighbor. John's neighbor was very sad.
Hot Water. The man turned on the tap. He saw water in the basement. He turned it off. The basement smelled fine. He turned on the water again.

Bad Donuts. My husband and I made donuts this morning. First we put the dough in the hot grease. Then we put the batter in the lined pan. We put the donuts in the tray and heated them. After ten minutes, the donuts were cold.

Right Racquet. Sam was on a tennis team. The team was losing by a single point. They decided to run a game of one on one. Sam was able to score a point on his very first volley. Everyone cheered for him on his first serve.
Taxes. Tom's taxes were due at the end of the year. He had forgotten about them. He called in to ask about them. They told him they'd forgotten about them. Tom had to pay the extra money that year.
Bad consequence. The teacher yelled at my friend. I got mad and asked her to move. She refused. I got in trouble. She was mad that she didn't move.

Friend of a Friend. My dad went to an office party. He saw several attractive women. He wanted to impress them so he took his shirt off. He also grabbed a guy's shirt and put it on. He got a number of dates with the attractive women.

Domestic Violence. Tommy didn't have a girlfriend and he was dating his cousin. He was going on a date with his cousin's wife. When he got to the restaurant he saw his cousin's wife being assaulted. Tommy was terrified and immediately called 911. The police arrived and Tommy was glad he called.
The Cops. Lila was walking home from school. Suddenly a cop stopped her. The cop accused Lila of theft. Lila realized she'd left her wallet at school! The cop let her go with a warning.

Prayer. John woke up one morning to a knock at his door. John opened the door and was shocked by what he saw. John's dog had been hit by a car and died. John went outside to find his wife and kids crying and crying. John got up and came back in with a huge bouquet of flowers for the kids.

Puppy Race. Lola wanted to do her part to raise money for the new dog shelter. She decided to enter a dog race for her money. She trained and trained for the race. The day of the race came and she was ready to compete. She lost but thought about doing even better next time.

Movie Night. Tom and his girlfriend decided to watch a movie. They were debating on whether or not Suicide Squad was a good movie. They were debating so long, the movie actually ended. After the credits, they couldn't decide on a winner. It was a close call, but Tom ultimately picked Suicide Squad.

Turning The Drone Against Him. Tim bought a drone. He wanted to fly it around the neighborhood in his yard. He didn't have any way to make sure it was safe. One day he let it fly without a safety cord. The drone flew off and hit a neighbor's tree.
Holy Frame. Jenny got a job painting pictures. She painted a church mural. The whole church was amazing. Jenny was proud of her work. The church hired her to paint more of their walls.

Golf. My family played golf once a week. We would play at a local golf course. We would get together after work and get a little bored. We would go on longer drives and get more into it. The golf course was a fun family tradition.

The Miscalculation. Dan had a lot of work to do. His spreadsheet was out of date. Dan decided to go to the store and buy a new one. Dan went home and started working on the spreadsheet. Dan spent two hours looking at his data and made an error.

The Book. John had a really rough time writing his next book. He was stuck on one word for over an hour. Finally John wrote down a few ideas for the book. He decided to combine them into a single word. Now his book was complete and he could start typing.

Arranging the place cards. Today I was going to arrange the place cards in a new folder. First, I realized the cards needed to be arranged alphabetically. I put my cards on the table in alphabetical order. I folded them and arranged them alphabetically. I put the folders back on the table and organized.

Dog. I have a dog named Buster. Buster likes to sleep on my lap. I have to put my arm around Buster to get him out of the bed. Sometimes I have to move him to get him to sleep. Buster is not very happy when I do that.

Trading Lunches. Jill had always wanted to be a stay at home mom. But she didn't want to be alone. One day her husband suggested they trade lunches. It was great idea because she'd be able to do both jobs. Now Jill does both jobs.

An Unexpected Rodent. Molly had just moved into her new apartment. She was trying to get rid of her trash but her dog wouldn't let it go. The dog wouldn't let Molly throw it away or give it away. Molly went to the pet store and bought a large garbage bag. She went back home with the bag and threw all her dog's trash in it.

Game Night. My family and I wanted to spend quality time together. We decided to play Monopoly, a board game. We each owned a small fortune. We used the money to buy a new board game. We got to spend quality time together.

Unsweetened. Gina's mom was a bit hesitant about giving her a candy bar. She worried that Gina might not like it as much as her siblings. But Gina's face lit up when her mom handed her the chocolate bar. When she bit into it, she found that it was indeed delicious! Gina was happy to have a new favorite snack!

Graduation. It was almost time for our annual summer reunion. My wife decided to invite all of our friends and coworkers. The party was held in my home and we all attended. We ate and drank and had a blast. Afterwards, we all went our separate ways.

Kobe's Last Game. Kobe is at his last game of basketball. He's up to the last shot and is going to miss. The ball goes to him but he can't make it. The referee points to the floor and the shot goes in. Kobe was out for the rest of the season with a broken leg.
The Passports. Kelley wanted to fly to Canada. She had to get a new passport! She filled out all the forms. She was so excited when the forms were filed. She flew to Canada and enjoyed it.

Boston Trip. Jim and Ann decided to go to Boston for their anniversary. When they got there, they decided to go to Old Sturbridge's. On their way home, they discovered an old woman had died. She had a heart attack and passed on. Their anniversary was ruined and the decided not to go again.

Army. Davy wanted to join the Army. He signed up for basic training. At basic training, they forced him to run and jump rope. Davy got so tired, he fell asleep on the run. After training was over, he was sent back home.
ADHD. My niece has ADHD. She has to stay up late at night. She has trouble staying up in the morning. She stays up late playing video games. Her mother is worried because she cannot keep her up.
Bad Friends. I met my friends on my way to work today. When I got there they had a beer. When they ordered food, they did not like it. The food was cold and hard. I don't like my friends anymore.

The Fabric. Jenna had bought a new dress. The fabric was very stretchy. She was able to wear it a bit without hurting herself. However, it got in the way of her breath. Jenna had to take the dress back to the store for a refund.

New lab gig. Yesterday I got a new lab job. I had to travel to New York City to get to the new lab. The first day I was so nervous I could not sleep. I woke up and got on the elevator. I made it to the new lab, and my boss there was very nice.

Fitness Competition. Tom went to the gym to get a personal record. He worked hard all week. The next day he took a test with more weight. He could barely lift the heavier test load. He was embarrassed when he was caught in the lift.

Gas and Money. Jane needed to get gas for her car. She was able to use her debit card to do so. Jane only had enough money for 10 cents. Jane decided to use her debit card. She made her gas payment and was able to get it.
My new Sister. I was at my grandma's house. She was acting kind of strange. I went to check on her. She was crying very loudly. I was relieved to find out it was her sister.

Street of 3G. Last week I went to the street to go to work. A woman was standing in front of a 3G tower and was using her phone. She was paying $15 a month for 3G. She started texting her friends who were on the same plan. She was so annoyed that I didn't text her back.
Peanut butter and jelly. Lucy was craving peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. She had a few on her mind. She did not want to eat them. However she ended up having to eat one. They were delicious.

Tickets in Texas. I was taking a trip to Texas with my boyfriend. He was going with me to see a football game. We decided we needed to see the game. We went to the stadium, but it was sold out. We decided to go to another city instead.

Moses Went to Church. One day Moses went to church. At church Moses met the pastor. Afterwards, Moses went to see his favorite football team. Moses went home happy. Moses decided he would go to church every week.
Bathing suit. Lisa went to the beach. She went in the hot sun. Her bathing suit got too big. Lisa decided to change. She bought a bathing suit for the beach.

The Wholesale Club. Aya wanted to buy a new coat. She found an excellent online store. There was a sale on their coat. Aya bought it and went to pay. She was disappointed when she learned she had to wait two weeks for it.
The New Kid. A new boy named Ryan walked up to Kim. He was shy and didn't want to approach her. Kim decided to approach him. Ryan turned around and ran away. Kim was furious and ran after him.

Football Pals. The cousins loved the game of football. They met at a park one day. They threw a ball together. They made it to the top of the endzone together. The cousins decided they were going to get together for next season.

Babysitting nightmare. Sue was excited to see her friend at her house. She invited her over to watch a movie. She was so excited when she heard her friend's voice. Her parents walked in and told her that her friend wasn't home. Sue couldn't believe it.

A Used Car. Amy was shopping at the car lot. She bought a brand new car. She couldn't wait to drive it home! When she got home she took the keys and realized it was a lemon. Amy decided she would never buy a lemon car again.
Tyler's huge mistake. Tyler is driving to his friends house. He is about halfway there when he runs out of gas. He hits a pothole. He gets pulled over by a cop. He is charged with a big mistake.

Marco Makes His Bed. Marco had a big problem waking up in the morning. Marco went to a sleep doctor to help him. The sleep doctor gave Marco some pills that helped him sleep. Marco took the pills to sleep every night. Marco made his bed every morning.
New Shoes. Joe needed new shoes. His old ones were so worn down. He went to the shoe store. They had great selection. Joe was happy with his purchase.

Off to the Races. Gina's parents were going to the county fair. She was only four and couldn't ride her own bike yet. But her older sister and her cousins would be able to. Gina hoped she could ride her bike without them noticing. She was glad she would be able to ride with them this summer.
Rent. Brent rented an apartment. Brent hated the apartment. Brent complained to the landlord. The landlord told Brent he couldn't lease to anyone else. Brent moved out.
Celebrity sighting. Suzy went to a local celebrity sighting. She looked at all the stars. She noticed a famous singer. She felt so honored. She couldn't wait to get tickets to meet him.

The Long Bike Ride. Gina's family decided to take a long bike ride. The family would spend hours riding their bikes around the park. Gina thought it was fun but had a hard time keeping up. She was afraid she would fall off and hurt herself. Gina was relieved when the ride was over.

Ticket. Tom loved riding his bicycle. He always picked up a ticket for riding without a helmet. He told his parents about his habit. He was eventually ticketed again. He got his first speeding ticket on his first trip to the DMV.
Rent Money. I asked my girlfriend if I can rent my car. She said that I can. I got my money from a deposit. I took her car home. I paid for the rent with the money that I got from the deposit.

The Rain. The kids ran outside for some play time. The sky was dark and gloomy. The kids ran inside for some shade. The rain had stopped and they were able to play outside. They had lots of fun playing.

Fake. Anna tried to hide her identity from her boyfriend. He noticed she was not wearing her favorite clothes. He asked her why she was not wearing her favorite. She admitted that she had been drinking the night before. Her boyfriend stopped asking her why she wasn't wearing her favorite.

Final Moments. Bob's family went to a beach vacation. They played volleyball there for hours. But his volleyball ball went over a large rock. Bob tripped on the rock and fell on his back. Bob woke up with a black eye and a bruised back.

Kitty Keeper. Carol was on her daily walk through the neighborhood. She saw a little yellow kitty. The kitty was very hungry and Carol offered to give it food. The kitty eagerly gobbled up the food. After the kitty got it's fill it was very happy and cuddled by Carol.

Sleep. Anna was tossing and turning in bed. She finally found herself falling asleep. Suddenly she heard her mom calling her name! Anna jumped out of bed and ran to the door. She was so late to school!
Mechanic. Joe needed a new car. Joe did not have the money to buy a new car. Joe asked his mom for a loan. His mom gave him a loan for a new car. Joe bought a car.

Too Many Dogs. Mary found out her new neighbors had five dogs. Mary decided to take the dogs to the pound. At the pound, Mary met with one of the dogs. The dog seemed afraid of Mary. Mary returned the dog to her house.

George visits the comic book store. George needed some new comic books. He went to the comic book store to find some. The store was out of his favorite ones. George tried to explain to the cashier that he needed more. The cashier understood and gave him more.

Rick Nick and the Bee. Rick was riding his bicycle to work. A bee swarmed Rick as he was riding his bicycle. The bee stung Rick in the forehead. Rick went home and got a bottle of bug spray. He was glad to be safe and continued to ride his bicycle.

Painting. Bob took his girlfriend to the art museum. When she went to take a picture she tripped on a nail. She ended up with a giant bump on her cheek. Bob didn't ask for much until she looked in the mirror. She saw her picture and was horrified at her ugly cheek.

Food. Jim and his wife went on vacation. They ate at lots of restaurants and tried many new things. Jim loved the sushi. Jim loved the new Asian restaurant as well. They decided to go there more often.

Climate Change. Tori worked for the United Nations. She wanted to stop global warming. She decided to go and protest at the capitol. Tori was arrested. She was convicted of disrupting the day to day operations of the UN.
Cancelled. I called my brother's phone. I couldn't hear him on the phone anymore. I tried to talk to him. He didn't answer. I realized I had to go to work early and he had called early.
Parade. Tim's dad took him to a parade. Tim had always wanted to see the floats. After watching the parade Tim was very happy. His dad took him to the souvenir shop. Tim got a huge smile on his face.
Mexican Restaurant. I went to a new Mexican restaurant yesterday. The food was very tasty. I ate almost ten tacos. I was very full after that. I will definitely go back to this place.

Lost. We took a bus to a new school for the first time. The driver looked at us, and asked where we were going. He asked what we were getting, and when we arrived we were confused. He wanted us to take the bus home, but we had no idea. He asked again, and finally we remembered that we were in the wrong bus.

New Printers. I wanted to buy a new printer. I had a few old printers that I really liked. The new printer I wanted was more expensive than the old ones. I finally found the perfect printer. I purchased it and felt accomplished.

Dress Code. Lucy was having a birthday party. The adults were going to dress formally and no one else. At the party they discussed dress codes. Lucy did not agree with the adults and she wanted to go home. The adults did not tell her that they would not dress formally.

A baby's fall. Rita was out running errands one morning. She began walking up the sidewalk. Then she heard a loud noise. She realized it was a baby falling out of the tree. Rita quickly picked up the baby and carried him to safety.

Frozen Food. Tom wanted to save some money. He had a lot of frozen food he wanted to buy. Tom had the freezer door open for a bit. Tom took some out and put them back. He ended up spending more money than he expected.
Friends of Mine. My friend's girlfriend got dumped by her boyfriend. She didn't want to be a girlfriend. She was very lonely. She talked to me on facebook. Now we are trying to be friends again.

Affair in Storage Room. My family had a big party last weekend. We went to a hotel in the basement. Everyone hid in the closet. My aunt and uncle had an affair. My brother in law is a divorced father and lives in Alaska.

Ultrasound. I had to use a portable ultrasound unit. The machine was very sensitive. It could only see the small bones of my fingers. I asked a friend for advice on the best way. She recommended using a large magnifying glass.

Running out of time. Samantha was finishing up a book report for school. She wasn't able to finish it in time. She called her teacher and told him she had to leave. The teacher offered her an extension but she declined. Samantha ended up getting in trouble.
Jogging at the park. Tom's mom went to the park. She wanted to spend the afternoon jogging. Tom ran into some trouble. It took him hours to get back out. Tom still enjoyed his time.

Abandoned Home. Linda was at home alone. She decided to stay home and watch television. Unfortunately, she found out her house was closed. She was left to go to the store alone. The next day, Linda found her house open.
secret. I was walking down the street. I found a pair of shoes. I was trying to keep them from others. I went back to my house. I hid them in my pocket.

The Horse. Jane loved riding horses. She rode the horse all the time at school. One day, she went riding alone. The horse bucked her off and Jane fell down. Jane broke her arm and couldn't ride again.

Imaginary Boat. A man went on a boat trip. He was the captain and had a huge imagination. He made a big boat out of a small raft. He went to the beach and imagined he was in the boat. The boat didn't move at all.
Waitress. I always wanted to be a waitress. I applied to become a waitress. They told me no. I tried to prove them wrong. Unfortunately, I was not very good at waiting.
Broken arm. Fred was working on his car. While working on it he dropped his wrench. The wrench broke into pieces. He got a rag to clean up the mess. The rag got all of the pieces off of the wrench.

Lost Tooth. It was early in the morning when Ben woke up. He noticed that he could not find his tooth under his pillow. Ben tried to move the pillow under his pillow. The pillow was too thick. Ben had to get a tooth pulled out of his pillow.
Bad Dog. Jim's dog got sick. So Jim took him to the veterinarian. The veterinarian gave Jim some medicine. He gave his dog some more medicine. The dog is now fine.

Flee. Ava fled with the other girls to the forest. She saw a giant snake there. She yelled for her mom, but she wasn't far. Then she saw her dad waving her off. Ava and the other girls were happy, but not as happy as she was.

Bad Skyler. Skyler couldn't understand how a dog can drive on a skateboard. She thought the dog must be really cool to do that. She tried to explain it to her son. Skyler's son refused to accept it. Skyler's son refused to listen to her.

Dog's Behavior. Tara had recently gotten a new puppy. She and her husband were going on a trip and the puppy kept jumping. Her husband brought the puppy back to the kennel. Her husband had the puppy checked out and the puppy behaved well again. Tara was happy that the puppy wasn't jumping on other people.

Too many kids. Tina had a few children of her own. It was an exhausting and confusing job. It took her years to find the balance. Finally she figured out the best thing to do. She started a daycare for the children and made a lot of money.
Saving a cookie. Tom and Mary were shopping at the mall. Mary wanted to buy some cookies. Mary saw a great deal on cookies. They were ten dollars each. Tom and Mary bought a lot of cookies.

The Old Man. Tina was riding her bike home from school. Her mom's old, crippled son ran next to her. He stared at her in a weird way, but Tina didn't feel scared. He just started walking toward her, and Tina stopped and got out of her bike. She waited for her mom, and when she got home, she gave the old man a hug.
Computer. My computer stopped working. I needed to buy a new one. I researched all of the options. I decided to buy a Mac. Now I have a computer.
new kid. Sammy was at the grocery store. She saw some new shoes she liked. She asked the clerk if she could buy them. The clerk let her. Sammy was excited to buy the shoes.
bored. Ike wanted to do something. He did some research on mturk. Then, he decided to do mturk for fun. He got paid very little money for the work. But it was enough to keep him busy.

Fire. Avery was cooking some beans. She left her pot on the stove and left the door open. Avery's pot caught on fire. Avery had to call the fire department to put out the fire. Avery now has to learn to be more careful from now on.

Dive Bar. I was out at the dive bar yesterday with some friends. I ordered a beer and some appetizers. The bartender took my order, and showed me to my table. When it came time to pay, I did not have enough money. He had to pay with my debit card.

Terrible Name. Rita was on her way to her first day of school. She walked to her classroom and found her name on the door. The name was spelled incorrectly so she gave it a misspelling. The teacher noticed the mistake and corrected it. She didn't have to give the girl a name for the rest of the year.

A Towel. The cat was laying in a hammock in the yard. It was very cold outside. The cat began to mew. It was getting too cold for the cat to stay warm. The cat snuggled under the hammock for the night.

Dang Cat. Tim hated his cat a lot. The cat was grumpy and inconsolable at times. His friends always had to keep him company. One day Tim decided to get rid of the cat. The cat is now a friendly stray and Tim loves him.
Target. The man pointed at something. A small ant came out. The man pointed the gun at the ant. The man fired. The ant died instantly.

The Eater. Mary liked to eat. She would eat everything she could find. She would buy a lot of food at her favorite store. Mary's friend told her to buy more food for herself. Mary stopped eating so much because she ate so much.
Walk. Jim wanted to go on a walk. He went to his favorite park. It was very busy at the park. Jim felt annoyed by the crowd. He went back home.

Performing a concert. It was my turn to perform at my cousin's wedding. I nervously performed my first song for the couple. They were so impressed, they gave me a standing ovation. Then they handed me my trophy, as promised. I really loved performing the show.
Janitor Job. Tom needed to get a job. He decided to become a janitor at his workplace. He found a job he liked. It paid well and he loved his job. Tom liked his new job a lot.

Jack's Dog. Jack is a new dog owner. Jack's new dog is very energetic and quick. Jack is afraid of dogs that are bigger than him. Jack's dog is a lot of fun for Jack to be around. Jack has not had any issues with his new dog.

Cleaning the yard. Jim was helping his dad with his yard. He noticed the yard was covered with dirt and mud. His dad had to clean the dirt off. Jim and his dad began to yell at each other. Jim's dad took the hose to the hose.

He will pay. Bob's wife was a heroin addict. Bob tried to quit cold turkey but it didn't work. Eventually, Bob had to go to a rehab center. Bob was able to get clean for four weeks. His wife was happy and thanked him profusely for his help.
Swing Time. Molly wanted to learn to dance. She signed up for lessons. At first they were difficult. Molly practiced every day. Soon, she could swing any time she wanted.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff was feeling very sad and lonely. His friend suggested that he call a therapist. Jeff did so and a few days later he got a phone call. A counselor had found him a new friend and they both felt happy. Jeff is now happy and very attached to his friend.
Old diary. Tom was talking with his dad. His dad mentioned an old diary. Tom remembered reading about it. He asked his dad about it. His dad told him it was just a joke.
Christmas lights. There were so many Christmas lights at Tom's house. Tom bought so many. He could barely see them. Tom put them all up to the house. He loved them so much!

The Appointment. Jane had an appointment to see a doctor. It was her first time in a long time. Jane arrived early and went to the appointment on time. They ran some tests and then Jane started to see the doctor. She made an appointment for an ultrasound to help diagnose her cancer.

Pajamas. Tim wanted to impress his friends. He bought himself a new pair of pajamas. Tim tried them on in front of everyone. He felt very confident in his new pajamas. Everyone was impressed with Tim's new pajamas.
The warning. It was a dark night out. Gina was out with her friends drinking beer. Someone started passing out. Gina told them to stop. They got out of the way and stopped a car.

The Old Roller Coaster. Cathy and her family went to a amusement park. Cathy saw an old roller coaster. It was the same one they rode as kids. Cathy was scared the kids would get hurt. The kids felt unsafe and went home.

Big Test. It was Math class at school. The teacher announced to the class that the test was very hard. All of the students were very confused. After a while, they realized it wasn't so hard after all. They finished the test and felt proud of themselves.
Bonding Time. Jim had a bad job. His wife did not trust him. She felt angry and jealous of Jim. Jim and his wife went on vacation. Jim and his wife had fun bonding time.

Adler. Ike was taking out the garbage. He saw the bottom of the bag drop. It dropped on the floor with no air pockets. Ike grabbed a rag and began to clean the floor. After an hour, the bag was clean and ready to be reused.
The Castle. The kids were walking to the park. They saw a huge castle. They all climbed to the very top. The castle was beautiful! The kids had a wonderful time looking at it.

New dog. The dog that lived in our house has been sick all winter. We've been watching her all the time. The cat has been looking for the dog. I think my husband might have gotten her sick. I think he might have gotten the cat sick as well.

No Donuts. The man ate his donuts slowly. He thought the donuts were done. He was still hungry. He was too impatient to finish his donuts. He finished them too quickly and his hunger got the best of him.

Buying another car. I got my first car after graduating college. After two months, my car was old and beat up. It was expensive and it didn't meet my needs. I didn't want to buy another car. I decided to sell my old one instead.

Wood Wins. I decided to buy a car with my new wood money. I found a very cheap used Mitsubishi Eclipse on the auction block. I paid for the car at auction with cash. The car was a dud but I liked it so I kept it. Now I have five different wood cars.
Snorkeling. Amy went snorkeling one day. She was only 11. She didn't realize how good it was. She went back to school the next day. Everyone complimented her.

Randy gets the girl. Randy has been single for quite awhile. He goes out every other weekend. One Sunday he has the girl of his dreams. They are on the same flight. Randy gets a girl and they are married.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve wanted a job with lots of money. So he joined the army and joined the army reserves. After the war Steve found out he was the only man to be sent away. Steve was sent to Germany and had to work the entire year there. Steve was not happy that he had to stay in Germany for a year.

Frombo. Ben's new friend told him there's a new ice cream shop in town. Ben went to it with his dad. The ice cream was good, but he didn't like the prices. They bought it anyway and they returned home. They decided they would try the new ice cream shop instead.

Responsibility. I once had a job that I was very bad at. I didn't care about anything or anyone. I was a total slacker. When my boss fired me, he told me that I did it on purpose. I was shocked and hurt.

Major Regret. In the second week of spring break a girl I know went to the pool. She swam and played with friends. The day after she got out, she told her mom she had a terrible cold. The girl felt horrible for lying about having a cold. She didn't tell her mom, though, and she got her a cold anyway.

Deer Huntress. Abby was excited about the upcoming Christmas holiday. Her parents decided to take her to a hunting range. There, Abby learned a lot about hunting. She also learned how to shoot a deer. Abby had a great time at the range with her parents.

Self Esteem. I wanted to be self esteem builder and I signed up for an exercise program. I would run every single day, but my back and shoulders hurt. I decided to stop and start running because it felt good. My back got better and I began to get stronger and stronger. Now I feel great, and I'm proud of how I look.
Ross The Gamer. Ross was a gamer. Ross played many different games. He wanted to be the best at playing games. He practiced every day. He finally became the best at playing games.

Cherries Jubilee. Cathy decided to get a new kitchen table for her apartment. She asked her neighbor Mary to paint a picture for her. Mary painted a picture of a family of cherries. Cathy took the painting to the apartment building management. The management department gave Cathy two free table tops.
Pothole. I was driving home from work. All of a sudden I felt a big hole. I pulled over to see what it was. A pothole had popped in my tire. I was able to change it in a minute.
New Handle. My old handle broke off one day. I looked online and found a replacement. It was a standard black plastic handle. I bought it at a discount store. The handle worked very well.

After School Getaway. My mom took my younger brother to see her in Florida. He was so excited to go. They had to drive over 20 hours. Then she told me they went to a hotel. It was the best after school getaway my brother had ever had.

Candy. The kids were playing with some candy. The other kids saw them and told the dad. The dad decided to take them to the store. The kids were really disappointed when he got back. They couldn't eat anything.

Chemistry Lab. A teacher at an elementary school set up a chemistry lab. One of the students told a joke to a classmate. The classmate told a joke about his teacher. The teacher saw the joke. She gave the student a zero.
Condo. Joe bought a new condo. He wasn't sure what to do with it. He went to the bank and got a loan for his deposit. He was able to pay off his new condo. He put a yard out on his new condo.

The Date. Jane wanted to impress Bob. She thought that she would ask him on a date. She was very nervous when the day came. On the date she was excited and flustered. Jane and Bob went out for pizza and had a wonderful time.

The Early Baby. Dottie and Bill are expecting their first child. They're not quite sure what to do. Neither one of them wants to wait. They have an idea. They will both work until it is time to have the baby.
Volcano. The family was at a campfire. They made s'mores for the fire. As the s'mores burned they heard a loud noise. The campfire had exploded. They all ran out and waited for the police.

Crushing Like a Frog. I was walking home from work one day when a huge tree branch fell on my head. The branch was very old, and bruised my scalp. I got out my phone and started to call the ambulance. The ambulance driver was very understanding and took me to the hospital. After 3 hours of treatment, my scalp was healed.

Crush. Tim had a crush on a classmate named Molly. Tim was too shy to confess his feelings. He stayed in class until he saw her walk past him. She turned and said hi and he almost dropped his pencil. Tim's crush came over to kiss him and he was elated.

Bumping into old friends. Yesterday I saw my friend Bob. We hadn't seen each other in a while. I stopped at the coffee shop to catch up. I introduced myself, and he was very nice. I had a lot of fun talking with him.

The paint compromise. Barry recently moved into a new apartment. He didn't want to paint it himself, as it would take too long. Barry called his friend Bob, who was a car painter. Bob suggested they paint the apartment a different color instead. Barry agreed, and Bob painted the apartment red instead.

Test. My friend Fred is gay. Fred's parents told him they wouldn't allow him to take a test. He took the test anyway. It turned out to be a homosexual IQ test. Fred has been suspended from school for two days.
Diet. Sarah was a skinny girl. She tried a diet to lose weight. She ate lots of sweets. Then she realized she was no longer eating enough. Sarah started eating more and lost more weight!
Annoying toy. Tina needed a toy. So she bought the one she wanted. But as she opened it, she saw it was so annoying. It was not allowed for her to play with it. So she put it back.

Harper Gets Lost. Harper took his mom for a walk in the park. They walked all over town and around the neighborhood. Harper got lost in the park and was very scared. He could not find his mom and went home to find her. Harper's mom called him inside and told him that she found him.

Cake. I was looking for some gluten free cookies. I looked everywhere for gluten free ones. I did not find any gluten free ones. I found a very tasty chocolate cake. I decided to try the chocolate cake.

Back Breaker. I once had a roommate who was a very nice guy. He had a hard time giving me what I wanted. So I decided to break his back. I took it out with a baseball bat. He laughed the whole way through it.
Dog Bath. When I was young my best friend was a pit bull. She and I were good friends. She decided to let me take her to the dog wash. I took her to the groomer. After the bath I made her dinner.

The Soup. Jill loved soup. Her mom made a fancy soup for her for dinner. It was so good that Jill decided to make more. She got the ingredients ready and took them to the kitchen. Jill ate her soup all night!

A Movie. The kids were bored. They decided to watch a movie. They all wound up falling asleep on the couch. When the movie ended, they were ready for a nap. The kids woke up and had to go find their friends.

The Lunchtime Pizza. Tara worked hard all day and was ready to take a nap. She had to get some things done early the next day. She got the pizza to her work and had a blast. She even bought a new sweater! Tara was exhausted and needed a nap.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa's brother had just moved out the house they grew up in. Lisa's mother was having a difficult time finding a job for him. Lisa was a college graduate but still needed a job. Lisa was tired of waiting on her brother to find work. Lisa was looking forward to working with her brother on an after school project.
Hoop. Tim was doing an activity at school. He was doing the hula hoop. He kept trying, but it was too hard. Eventually he got really good. He could now do the whole hula hoop!

Acid rainy. The rain came down hard and loud. It was pouring water on the windows. When I was trying to fix it, I couldn't reach the bolts. I was too late, the rains were pouring through the windows. The house was flooded and my car was soaking wet.

Go to the Store. I needed a new backpack for school. I decided to go shopping at the local outlet mall. I bought a backpack with my favorite colors. I went home and spent the afternoon wearing it. My backpack fit me very well and I felt good about myself!

Crafting a Business. John's friends wanted to go shopping. John was nervous because he was not a good shopper. John went to the craft store to look around. John found a few items he really wanted but he wasn't sure what to get. John bought the items he found and made a few hundred dollars.

Costume Contest. The class decided to dress as characters for a Halloween costume contest. They were excited because they were going to win a prize. When it was announced the winners, they could not decide. They decided to split the prize between them. The winners had a great time that night.
Silverfish. Sam's parents took him fishing. Sam caught a big bluegill. Sam ate the whole fish. He felt really sick the next day. Sam never fish again.

Renee goes Camping. Renee and her friends were camping. They spent all day and night in the forest. At the end of the day they were very tired. They decided to sleep it off in their tent. It was a very relaxing trip for both of them.

The Chairs. The family sat down on the swings. They hit the ground and the swings started to move. They were going up and down the steps. The baby started crying. He ran to the swings to find his mom.
Bus still waiting. Allie was at the museum. She needed to go back to school. Allie had a long walk back. It took her 10 minutes to get back. She ended up having to wait an hour.

Picking Flowers. Sara planted some flowers. She picked the flowers at her front porch. Her mom planted the flowers on the neighbor's porch. Sara and her mom picked the flowers at the neighbor's house. The neighbor came over to the porch.

Big Fishing Trip. I went fishing with my dad yesterday. We drove to the river and waited in the boat. After waiting for an hour, we pulled in. We walked in the water for hours. I caught a twelve pound catfish.
peanut scare. The girls were watching a scary movie. At the end, they watched it again. The new movie had a lot of zombies. One girl went to the bathroom. When she got out, she had a runny nose.
Winter coat. It was very cold outside today. So Kelly decided to buy a winter coat. She found the perfect coat. It was black and white. Kelly is glad she bought the winter coat.

Inheritance. Kelley had to inherit her mother's house. She looked at the property and decided she didn't want to sell. Kelley had an attorney come look over the property. When the day came for Kelley to sell, her friend told her about the inheritance. Kelley went to the attorney and learned she had a lot of money.

Driving at Night. Mitch had always been afraid of driving at night. He was afraid that he would be run over by a car. Mitch had to get a license to drive. He drove into the night without being seen by a police officer. Mitch never drove at night again.
Judy's pastry. Judy was baking a pie for her mom. She decided to try to make it. Judy followed the recipe exactly. When she gave it to her mom she was not happy. The pie had gone into the garbage.

Annual Trip. Sam took his wife to a new place every year. He knew she didn't really like it so he was careful to make her happy. This year he was planning a trip to a new town. It was the first time she would be away from the city. Sam made sure to make a great impression.

Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy loved to bake cookies. One day she ran out of flour. She decided to make her own flour. She went to the store and bought flour. Kimmy used her homemade flour to make her very first batch of cookies.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes was a xenophobic man. He would destroy anything that was alien to him. He destroyed the painting of a city, as well as many others. Xerxes thought this was the end of xenophobia in Britain. The painting was stolen later that year by the British Museum.

Bhishma. Bhishma has a very bad temper. He was out on parole, but didn't listen. He was very angry about being back in prison. After 10 minutes of yelling, the officer sent him away. Bhishma was sentenced to 10 hours of community service.

History Test. I had a history test on Friday. I knew the answers but not the time. I stayed up all night Thursday studying. When I got to class the next day I was tired. I didn't do well on my test that day.
My Cat Fluffy. Fluffy was a great cat. She would run around all day and play fetch with me. I loved Fluffy more because she was a cat. After one day, I discovered that she had died. I was very sad.

The Joke. Tommy laughed at a joke his teacher told. His teacher didn't like the joke. The teacher wrote out some of the words the teacher thought. The students had to write out the whole class. The students found some humor in the joke and laughed together.

Doing a good favor. I was doing a favor for a close friend of mine. My friend had told me that I would be paid $100 for a favor. I decided to buy a beer at the grocery store. I gave the beer to my friend and asked for $50. He told me that he already paid $100 for a beer.
Gerald. Gerald was a truck driver. He decided to drive to the farm one morning. Gerald got out to see the field. The fields were empty. Gerald was very angry.

The First Grade. Samantha's parents enrolled her in first grade. She was nervous and excited. On the first day of school, she met her new teacher. She enjoyed having a new teacher. Samantha's new teacher was very nice.
Too many shampoos. Allie got a new shampoo. It was great. But it had a side effect. Her hair started to fall out. Allie was really disappointed.

The flat tire. Tina was walking to work one day. She noticed her left tire was flat. Tina pulled over and got out of the car to change her tire. Once out she realized her left tire was too low. She had to walk all the way to work on her broken left tire.
Free. Tim was having a party. It was at a fancy restaurant. But he was hungry. So he offered to share his meal with his friends. They both got what they wanted and felt happy.
Precious. I once wanted a pair of pajamas for my sister. I decided to get some at the mall. I bought them and took them home. I gave them to my sister. I was proud that I had a gift from my sister.

silence. Mandy never bothered to speak up for herself. She never told her mom. She never spoke up in class. She never stood up for herself. Finally, her mom told her she was no longer welcome in their home.
Locked out. Tim was walking home. He was late getting home. The door was locked. Tim tried to break through with his keys. He had to call the police for help.
home ec. My wife's mother had a nice home ec. She was very neat. She bought us all fresh flowers. She showed us the yard. We loved it.

A mix up. I needed a new keyboard but did not have enough money. I went to the computer store and looked at the computers they had. They were all too expensive for me so I decided to go home and try to make money. I got to the store and walked out with a bag full of money. I went to the computer store and bought a new keyboard.

One day of Starvation. Sam was going through some intense exercise. He was very energetic and full of energy. He was hungry but also had a racing urge. He did something stupid and got very sick. Luckily he found some food in his bag and didn't die.

Getting Fired. Tom was a manager at a local fast food restaurant. Tom's manager was not having much luck. Tom was having lunch with coworkers. The manager told Tom his boss had been sick. Tom was fired for being disrespectful.

Bye Dad. The father of a 9 year old boy called from the phone. The boy said he had to get to the store. The boy left the phone on the couch when he got to the store. The phone went back to voicemail. The boy hung up when the phone rang again.

Sign Me Up. I applied for a new job today. I had to wait six hours for a call back. When I got a phone call, I was so stressed. The callers said they would call me in an hour. In an hour I had an interview and they called me to offer me the job.
The Cow. Today we went to visit my uncle. He had a cow. He showed us where to sit, and where to eat. He milked us all, and gave us cheese. It was a fun day.

Sick. Tom was a cook at a local diner. He really enjoyed cooking. One day he began to feel unwell. His boss noticed his sickness and took him to the hospital. They gave him a shot and Tom felt much better.

The Trapeze. Tim went on a trapeze in New York City. He was excited but nervous. A trapeze master walked into the audience and introduced himself. Tim was amazed and loved it. He went on many more shows after that.

From Girlfriend To Landlord. A family was struggling to make ends meet. They had to move to a new city, but they still lived at home. Their only source of income was their houseboat. They scrimped and saved and eventually bought their own boat. They lived on their boat until they were able to get a mortgage.

Santa Claus. A man went to visit Santa Claus in the morning. He saw him only once a week. He waited in line for 12 hours. He was finally able to see Santa Claus. He loved how he was finally able to see Santa Claus.
New Car. Tom got a new car. His car broke down on its first day of driving. Tom called a friend for help. His friend got him his car. Tom started his day off with a bang.

New Boss. Dan recently got a new boss at his job. Dan was nervous about his first day at this new job. However, Dan did well in the interview. Dan was glad that he got the new boss. Dan could not wait to start his new job.

Computer Programming. A new computer was coming out and Andrew wanted to build it. He was very good at programming so he thought he could do it. He worked long and hard on the project, but was too proud to share it. When it was time to ship, his computer wouldn't turn on! Andrew was very disappointed with himself.

Bubble Bubble. Lana wanted to make some bubble gum. She didn't have any in her kitchen so she asked her mom for some. Her mom took her to the store to buy some. Lana bought enough bubble gum for her whole family. She decided to try making it but it was terrible.

Soft Serve. Tom was a competitive basketball player. He spent a lot of time working on his vertical jump. He would jump around like crazy trying to get better. At the local tryouts, he tried out for the team. The team decided to sign him and he became a starter.
grades. Timmy was always late to school. So his teacher gave him detention. He started skipping the classroom. The teacher eventually found out. Timmy was then sent to his room.

Smart Move. Bill had gotten into a fight with his friend at work. He decided to ask Bill's boss to drop his suspension. Bill's boss was afraid Bill was going to lose his job. Bill's boss agreed to drop the suspension. Bill got to work without any problems.

Son. Kya was born a boy, but her gender never came into question. In her high school years, however, she started experimenting with cross-dressing. She wore makeup and long hair and gained many male friends. Then, at her 15th birthday party, her mom announced her true identity. Kya was born a girl, and she loved it!
Grass. The grass needed to be cut. Bob didn't have a mower. He decided to cut the grass himself. He mowed his neighbor's grass. He decided to hire a neighbor to cut his grass.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. I was talking to my friend, and she told me how beautiful laces are. She told me that her mom made them in the 1940s. This shocked me, because laces had been in style for thirty years. I was very confused, until I realized laces were a cultural phenomenon. I now believe laces make people look good, no matter what era.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos realizes that his garden has become very large. He decides to pull the weeds from his garden. Carlos spends the day pulling weeds from his garden. He feels good that he have managed to pull all the weeds. Now he will be able to start a garden from scratch.
New fast food. I went to get a new burger last night. I ordered it from a drive through place. When I got it it was delicious. I immediately asked for more. I wanted to get that again.

Accident. The man was at a red light. He pulled over to the side of the road. The car was going too slow. The man pulled his car in front of the car in front of him. They hit each other and the man crashed his car.

Dream. I had a very negative dream the other night. In the dream, I was riding a train across a vast ocean. Suddenly a whale breached the water, frightening the train! The train had to wait for a few more minutes before leaving. In the end, the dream turned out to be a dream.

Building a dock. I went to my local pool and looked at all the options. I chose a bright blue color to paint it. I filled a bucket with paint. I sprayed the bottom of the dock with the paint. I then painted the side of the dock with some black.

Painted Lines. Earl decided to paint his porch. He painted a huge green strip along the sides. Then he painted another large green stripe on the front. He took the green strips and painted some yellow lines. Earl put the yellow lines back where they were and continued painting.
Clothes. I went to the mall to buy some clothes. I walked around, looking for something to wear. I finally found a nice dress. I took the dress home. My mother came home and said that I looked great!

Too Tired For Work. John had been working all day. But he was too tired to get out of bed. He had to call in sick. When he arrived home he was still too tired to get out of bed. So John went back to work.

Signs of Spring. The trees in our yard are all in a state of shock. Their leaves are starting to turn orange. We went to the yard today to see how it looked. Some little squirrels are making a home. I guess Spring is here!

Losing Weight. Kelley was eating a big dinner with lots of dessert. She was feeling really full, so she ate more than usual. Suddenly, Kelley was very hungry. She had a small bowl of cereal that she finished. Luckily, Kelley got back to her normal eating habits before she went home.

Comics. One of my favorite genres to read is superhero comics. I was really excited for the new Superman movie to come out. I saw it was going to be great, and I was very excited to see it. It was a really great movie, and I got to read the new Superman comic. I am really looking forward to the new Superman movie.
Plums. I wanted to make some plums. I went to the grocery store. I purchased lots of plums. I drove home and made them. They were delicious!

Funny Face. Eli's mommy told him not to be so funny at school. Eli was determined to be more serious. So he got a paper mache mask, an ugly green one. At school, the other kids laughed at him. Eli learned not to be so serious in school.

Tooth pain. Mary went to the dentist for her first visit. When she arrived, she was scared to go in. She had to go in for an exam. She did not want to be hurt. The dentist told her she had a mild infection.
Too Tall. Miley was 5 foot 8 inches. She was eating dinner with her family. A friend said that she was too tall. Miley was embarrassed but tried to eat the food. She was too short to eat the food.

Not on your Side Today. Bill and Bob were arguing and Bob lost. Bill wanted to know how Bob lost. Bob said that he left his phone on the train. Bill thought he was lying so he called the train company. Now Bill and Bob don't fight anymore.
Zoo trip. The family took a trip to the zoo. They went to the lions cage. The lion's trainer was very nice. The lion took a picture with each kid. It was a fun trip.

quick trip to the store. I drove to the store this morning. As I got in the parking lot I looked for some food. I searched through the food selection and found a chicken sandwich. I put it in my cart and drove home. When I got home I sat down and enjoyed my meal.

The Baby Shower. Gina had a baby shower today at her friends house. She had invited everyone she knew. They all brought gifts and food for the family. When Gina arrived her friend Beth brought a bottle of baby lotion. Gina was surprised and grateful for the gift.

Crust. A new tv showed came on the air in my small town. I called and set an appointment with the show's producer. She went in and I told her all about the story of the show. She gave me a quote. I paid and left her a note for the show's manager.

Rich Family. Charles wanted to own his own farm. He bought a small farm and set up a shed. When he got it he felt confident and happy. He soon noticed the fence was missing something and had to go back. He now has to buy a new fence.
Cheating. Tom was in high school. He decided to take a pop quiz. Tom messed up his answers and got an F. Tom was devastated. Tom decided to never cheat again.

Birthday. Amy's daughter was very excited for her birthday. She wanted her hair cut very short. Her mother gave her a box of scissors. She began cutting her hair to her satisfaction. Amy had a great birthday with a new hair style.
Store. Daryl went to the store to buy some candy. He got in line to pay for it. A man behind him tried to bribe Daryl with candy. Daryl took the candy from the man. The man left a tip for Daryl.
Cavities. Tom was playing basketball at school. He got a bad foul. He had to go to the clinic. Tom got a cavity. The dentist fixed it and Tom was good again.
Walking in the rain. Sandra was walking home from school. It was really dark outside. The streets were really slippery. She was afraid she would slip and fall. Luckily she only fell once.

Best Christmas. My girlfriend and I planned a trip to Mexico. We couldn't wait to see our best friend. Unfortunately, our friend did not want to go. She wanted to stay home instead. I had to force her to go because of her selfishness.
Karen. Karen is having a baby. Her husband doesn't know what to do. He asked Karen for some advice. Karen told him to try everything and he did. Karen is now very happy with her new baby.

Fued. I was working as a hair stylist. I was having some trouble with a customer. She was dissatisfied with the color of her hair. I tried to convince her to buy a new hair color. She ended up giving in and bought a red color.

The Tie Choice. James and James' favorite tie was getting dirty. James decided to wash it instead of buying another. He cleaned out all the stains he could and tried it on. The knot on the tie was too big, so he had to get another one. James decided to try on the tie with the other one, it fit perfectly.

Cracked Screen. Molly was using her computer. She was trying to finish typing an essay. Suddenly she heard a crack in the screen. The screen broke instantly. She had to take it to a repair shop right away.

The Chalk. The children wanted to learn how to make great art. They gathered some chalk and began drawing shapes. They began to color in their drawings on the chalk. After a few hours, the kids started to see results. The chalk had made a beautiful picture!

The School Year. Miles had a new year's resolution. He wanted to go to summer camp this year. He bought a lot of sports equipment. He started going to camp. He liked it so much, he ended up joining the high school team.

The Missing Keys. Charles had locked himself out of his house. He was trying to get in but couldn't find his keys. He looked all over the house but they were nowhere to be found. Finally, he found the keys in his pocket. He unlocked his door and went inside.

The Last Towel. Janet was traveling and was trying to sleep. She got to the hotel and her room and realized she had no bed sheets. She could not find a clean towel anywhere and it was too dark. Janet did not know what to do. Luckily, her friend was a hotel maid and offered to help her.
