The Abandoned Car. Jake was in the backseat. There was a car in the middle of the road. Jake went over to see if the car was abandoned. The car had no tags or papers. Jake didn't know the owner and was very upset.

Competition. Anna was not very athletic. She was always nervous about her next big event. The day of the competition she was afraid she would fail. She started the run as nervous as she could. She completed the run and felt confident about her abilities!

Louis and the computer. Louis was a young man who was very interested in computers. Louis went to a computer store to look at all the computers. Louis decided to buy a new desktop computer. Louis then bought a new gaming computer and a new mouse. Louis has had the best computer experience he has ever had.

High School Football. Last Saturday we played High School football. I wasn't very good at tackling but I did a lot of rushing. After two minutes I had a fumble and lost the ball. Our coach was really mad. He gave me a huge talking to for being so stupid.
The Play's the Thing. Kate was the star of a school play. She would be on stage singing her song. She was very nervous. Then she stepped out onto the stage. It was just what Kate needed.

Painted House. My boyfriend and I bought a cheap house in the country. We bought a few cheap boards and painted them. Our house looked terrible when we moved in. My boyfriend made us put it up for sale and painted it. It sold for a lot of money and we moved on.

Happy Birthday. On Saturday, I woke up and got dressed. I put on my favorite sweater and shoes. I made a hot dog and some soda. Then I went outside to play. When I got home, I cooked dinner for my family.

Quinn and Rowen at Recess. Quinn and Rowan liked to play hide and seek. They would play until the sun was out and the wind blew. Quinn and Rowan liked to stay in the woods. One day Rowan saw that Quinn had been playing in the woods. Rowan told Quinn that he couldn't see him anymore.

The New Dog. Cindy's dog was very old and sick. She wanted to get him a new puppy. She went to the pet store and picked out a new puppy. When she got home, her dog seemed happy and healthy. She was so pleased to see her dog so happy!

Hot and sticky room. Travis is trying to learn Spanish. He has decided to go to Mexico. He thought it would be a lot easier. To his surprise however he hated it. He realized he needed a lot more practice.

The Fly. Joe wanted to play baseball one day. But he was always afraid of the big fly! So Joe bought a fly catcher. And he practiced catching with his fly catcher for many hours. But the day finally came and Joe got a fly!

New job. Sara was hired for her very first job. She was very nervous. She did not know anyone or what to do. Thankfully, her team was very nice and helped her out. She worked very hard and made some great friends.
Rick is hurt. Rick is playing baseball. He is up to hit. He runs into a wall. His baseball gets caught in the wall. Rick hurt his knee.

A Friend's Thanksgiving. I visited my best friend at her house for Thanksgiving. We had a lot of food to eat. After dinner, we went to the movies. We had a lot of fun seeing all the family around the table. I hope we have the same kind of Thanksgiving again in the future.
Treat. Dan was at a bar one night. He noticed a pretty girl sitting nearby. He got up and tried to flirt with her. Unfortunately Dan wasn't that into her. Dan decided to just leave and go home.

Olivia. Olivia had been looking forward to the movie all week. It was getting closer to the release date. She was really looking forward to it. She saw all the previews online. The movie ended up being really disappointing.
Apple Pie. Jenna decided to make an apple pie. She looked up a recipe. She mixed all the ingredients. She put the pie in the oven. She ate the pie when it was done.

Motorcycle Accident. Jeff bought a motorcycle last week. He is going to ride around the block tonight. Jeff forgot to wear his helmet while riding the bike. Jeff hit a rock on the way. He got his helmet broken and had to buy a new one.

Car. My friend's car was behaving weirdly. It would stop running every time he tried to start it. I took it into the shop to have it examined. The mechanic said the car needed a new transmission. He paid $5000 and the car was fixed within a week.

First Time Shaving. John has never shaved before. John was nervous about his first shave. John shaved his face with his girlfriend's help. It was surprisingly smooth and easy. John loved his new shave.

Registry Wit. Bob took his wife to register their kids in school. He was very embarrassed by the paperwork. Bob went to his boss and explained his situation. His boss gave him the extra paperwork Bob needed. Bob went home and registered his kids, feeling good.

All Work, No Play. Lance worked for his dad's construction company. He had lots of good friends but none that he could play with. One day Lance and his friends decided to play basketball together. They all played very hard. Lance's dad was very proud.
Too Drunk. Bob went to the bar with his girlfriend. She started getting too drunk. Bob decided to drive her home. He went too far and they got pulled over. He was too drunk to drive her home.

Winning. The couple decided to go shopping. They drove to the mall and bought lots of clothes. They were so excited to wear them to school. When they got home, they put their clothes in their closets. They had a great time at school wearing the clothes they bought.

Movie Night. I always get invited to a movie night at my work. One year I was chosen and I had a fun night. I made sure to bring a snack to stay healthy. After the movie ended my friend and I watched tv. I went home and had a good night.
Bicycle Accident. I took my daughter to the park. I put her on the swings. She jumped off of the swings and fell. She broke her wrist. I grounded her for a month.
The Pianist. Cora loved to sing. She wanted to be a musician. She practiced every day. She began to play her cello. Soon, she was a famous musician!

Speak To His Mom. I woke up the other morning and couldn't hear anything. My wife said he wasn't speaking to anyone. He had just fallen asleep at his desk. We were both worried so we went and checked on him. He was sleeping so hard that he had knocked his favorite cup over.

The Birthday Party. Eve always wanted to be a princess for a birthday party. Eve called up her best friends, and asked if they would be princesses. They decided to have a princess theme party. The princess theme party was a hit at the party. Eve and her friends felt proud and happy.

A Crazy Sandwich. Cathy was a healthy woman. She decided to make herself a healthy sandwich. Unfortunately, Cathy forgot to cook her chicken before eating. The chicken was raw and tough. Cathy was disappointed that she had to eat the sandwich.

Pancake Time. Dakota had always loved pancakes. Every morning he would make them for breakfast. His mom got tired of waiting so he got a second job. Dakota still cooked breakfast for her every morning. One day she was sick so he stopped and started cooking pancakes for her.

The Basketball Showdown. The local high school team had a game this Saturday. One team was very good and played very hard. The other team was very good and played a lot of sloppy basketball. The game was tied at halftime, but the home team came back to win. The crowd cheered when they both scored, and they both won the game.

The Bucket. I walked down to the river to find some gold. I found a bucket with a hole in it. I filled it with water and then threw it in. When I dug the hole I found a gold ring. I had found the treasure of my dreams.
Floating down the river. Susie went to visit her grandparents. They had a nice river house. She brought her friends. They got on the boat. It was fun to float down the river.

Alan's Eulogy. Alan was invited to give a eulogy at his son's funeral. He was nervous about doing this. He thought he might mess up. But when he began, he forgot why he was there. Everyone clapped when Alan delivered the eulogy!

Credit Card Debt. The family wanted to pay bills. They decided to use a credit card to pay bills. They got card debt in the mail. They sent the credit card debt to collection agencies. The collections agencies sent them letters.
Trip to the beach. I went to the beach. It was a long trip. It was exhausting. I had to use the bathroom a lot. I had a blast.

Ralph's Dog. Ralph's best friend's name is Fluffy. Ralph would often go for walks around his neighborhood. One day Fluffy was running alone around the block. Ralph's neighbor came and saw Fluffy run away. Ralph was sad that Fluffy had been stolen from him.
Hiking up Hawksbill Crag. We drove up to the trail head. I put on my hiking boots. Then I got on my water bottle. I started walking. It took a few minutes to get to the top.
The Playground. Dina decided to go to the playground. She went down the slide. Then, she went on the swing. Afterwards, she went to the water park. Dina had a good time at the playground.

Lawyer or prosecutor. Molly loved law and had a passion for it. Her dad wanted her to become a prosecutor. But Molly just wasn't very good at it. She decided to keep her dream a secret from her dad. When she graduated college, she told him the truth.

Food Truck. Margo's mother was out of town this week. She came home to a restaurant in a new neighborhood. Margo hadn't seen any food trucks in the neighborhood. Margo bought some of the food on the sidewalk. She took it to her mom's house and made a delicious meal.
First kiss. Tim was on a date. He really liked the girl. He had a crush on her. He decided to kiss her. She immediately kissed back.
Cruise. The family went on a cruise. First they went to the Casino. Then they went to the aquarium. Finally they went to the Beach. Everyone had a wonderful time.
Baby Bottle. Jenna wanted to have a baby. Her period was not regular. She did not know what to do. Jenna finally went to the doctor to have an ultrasound. She found out she was pregnant!

The Big Test. Sam had a test coming up. He got very anxious before school. Sam stayed up all night studying for the test. The morning of the test, he felt much more prepared. Sam took the test and made an A.

The Dog Bowl. The kids were cleaning up their house. They found an old dog bowl. It had a hole in the bottom. They filled it with dirt and took it out to the trash can. It still worked and they were able to use it for dinner.

Peach Ice Cream. I was in the mood for some sugar free ice cream. I decided to make some. Unfortunately, peach ice cream was not what I wanted. I searched for a banana ice cream, but that wasn't good either. I decided to get some plain ice cream instead.

Strange massage. I've never done a massage before. However, my friend wanted me to do one. She offered me the offer to do her back for her. I declined as I didn't feel comfortable doing something so personal. She later offered me to massage her back for her and I declined.

Four Minutes. The woman was supposed to be in four minutes. She was running really fast. She had to cross three lanes to get to the next stop. She made it just in time. She had to cross another lane so she could go to the other stop.

Horror Film. Ken loved watching scary movies. He especially loved the ones about serial killers. Ken was too scared to be in one. Ken finally decided to be brave and see one with his girlfriend. The film was so scary he broke down in tears.

Old Jeans. I bought a pair of jeans. I realized they were too old to wear anymore. So, I took them to the cleaners. They measured me and they took them back. I was shocked to find the jeans were still in good condition.
Eggplant. I decided to make an eggplant dish. First I washed and peeled the eggplant. Next I peeled the onion. Then I peeled and peeled the capers. Finally I put the eggplant in a pan and cooked it.
The Rescue. Jill was in a terrible car accident. Jill was unable to get to a hospital. She called 911. A rescue team drove Jill to the hospital. Jill was happy to be alive.

The Divorce. Trey had been married for two years. He and his wife were fighting a lot. One day, his wife decided she didn't want to be married anymore. She called his parents and told them she wanted a divorce. Trey was very sad and cried a lot the rest of the night.

Finally Alone. Gina was in the backseat of her parents car while they were on a road trip. Suddenly her family stopped and she began to cry. She begged her parents to let her see her grandma again. Her parents told her she was too old for that, and there was no hope. In tears, Gina hugged her grandma and smiled at the sight of her smile.

Put on Your Pants. Tom wanted to impress a girl at a party. He wore his best jeans to the party. The girl loved them. The whole party loved Tom's jeans. Tom was so popular that he decided to wear his pants often.

The Science Experiment. Drew was experimenting with some chemicals. He poured a small amount of a chemical into a glass tube. His eyes started to get a little blurry as he held the tube. It didn't take long for his vision to return to normal. Drew was glad he had been holding the tube for such a long time.

Cass. Cass had been drinking all day. She felt really drunk. She tried to drive home but got stopped by police. Cass was arrested for drunk driving. Now Cass has to spend the next few days at her house.

Tina's Dinner. Tina had forgotten to cook dinner! She tried to make a simple meal from her frozen chicken. She was worried about not being able to eat it all. Luckily she managed to cram enough food in to satisfy her hunger. Tina was very happy about the dinner she had cooked.

Car. Bill was looking for a new car. He was going to look through the used car dealership. Bill went to test drive a lot of the cars. Bill then bought a blue Mitsubishi Eclipse. Bill drove home in the Eclipse after being happy with his purchase.

The Irritating Neighbor. Dan was tired of being told to put up curtains. He took it up on himself to go ahead and do so. Dan's neighbor saw the curtains and didn't like the idea. Dan explained the situation and waited. A week later Dan heard from his neighbor the curtains were installed.

Camel Ride. Jack was riding a camel. He wasn't paying attention and fell off. Jack broke a leg and had to go to the hospital. His family was very upset. Jack learned to be more attentive when riding camels.
Horace Eats Donuts. Horace decides he needs to eat some donuts. He goes to the grocery store to buy a dozen. Once home he eats the donuts. He feels much better. Horace is happy that he ate donuts.

Early Breakfast. My wife and I always wake up early for breakfast. Usually she makes scrambled eggs and bacon. Today she made scrambled eggs and bacon. I ate breakfast without eating anything. We were happy to see we were eating breakfast together.
Getting the last ipad. Allie really wanted an ipad. She begged her parents for one. Finally they said yes. So she went to get it. When she got it she was so happy.
Brought Lunch. I worked hard all week. My boss sent me a thank you note. It was for bringing lunch to work. I forgot all about it. We all wondered why I forgot about the lunch.

The catch. Maggie was at the county fair. She was playing on the swings. She wanted to see who could catch the biggest fish. She got up on the big hill and grabbed a large rock. As she lifted it high, she caught the fish!

Sober. I was a drunk college student. I decided I needed to sober up. I spent a few nights in the ER, and decided I was better. I went back to my dorm room, and changed my life. I never got drunk again, and am still sober.
The restaurant. I wanted to get sushi at the new restaurant. I went there on Sunday. The restaurant was amazing! I ate the sushi. I thanked the staff and went home.
Hat. I saw this hat on sale for $100 on eBay. I ordered it. I paid for it with cash. It arrived two weeks later. The hat was a beautiful red, cheery yellow hat.

The snakebite. Lucy was laying on the floor in the living room. She looked up and saw a snake on the floor. She screamed in fear, thinking it was real. Her dad took her to the hospital and they said it was a false positive. She was relieved that it was not true.

Birds. Bob was feeding his dog in his backyard. He was using a fish bowl. He filled the bowl with water for the dog. Bob left the bowl there for a few minutes. Afterwards, a large flock of birds flew out of the bowl.

Teeth whitening fail. Allie was scared of the dentist. She did not want to pay the big fee. Yet the dentist would not stop. Finally Allie had a tooth whitening. To her dismay she had to pull out the teeth.

Going to the Zoo. Cara wanted to take her son to the zoo. He wasn't an animal expert, but she promised he would enjoy it. He thought it would be fun and they met some of the animals. Afterwards, they drove to the zoo and he ran to the monkey house. Cara let him stay there for a while and he enjoyed the zoo.
New Camera App. Sam was a smartphone user. He did not have a compatible camera app. Sam's friend encouraged him to download an app. Sam reluctantly did so. Sam is very happy with his new camera app.

New dress. Kelly wanted a new dress. She had an old one that she wore all the time. She found the perfect dress that she loved. It cost a lot and she did not have the extra money. Kelly decided to be frugal instead.

Wrong Number. Nancy was driving on the highway. She suddenly saw a light at the other side of the highway. She quickly drove on to the other side. She ended up hitting another car. The light turned red and she ended up missing the first one.

Mean Dog. It was Halloween and Amy was bored. She decided to go out and enjoy the night outside. When she got home she realized she had left a huge mess. Her mother explained her dog didn't see her when she left. Amy spent the rest of the day cleaning up the mess.
The Tower. The boys had an adventure. They climbed to the top. They looked down at the city below. They ran for the street. They couldn't wait for their next adventure!
Fish Tales. I wanted to take a cooking class. My mom decided to let me take it. The instructor showed us how to fry fish. The fish was very tasty. I decided that fishing lessons would be fun.
Newspaper. I heard a loud noise. I went to the kitchen to find what it was. The newspapers were all scattered across the floor. I cleaned them up. Then I went back to reading my newspaper.

Driving to the beach. Rita was feeling lonely after living in a small house. She decided to go for a drive. While she was driving to the beach she realized how loud the car was. It was too much and she couldn't hear anything. When she got to the beach it was quiet and she had no idea why.

The Apple Orchard. The Smith family went apple picking. The children found many good looking apples. The grandchildren enjoyed the apples. They returned the rest of the way. The Smith family went home with a bag full of apples.

David forgets about the sandwich. David is playing basketball with his friends. He is trying to make a basket for his teammates. David reaches for the ball and takes it away. He forgets about the sandwich and goes for the basketball. However, David is now too tired to play basketball.

Bad grades. Tim was a bad student. He failed all of his classes. He had to repeat a lot of his classes. Tim passed all of his classes and got good grades. He was relieved to see that his grades had improved.

The Show. It was the final season of a big series. Everyone was watching. They were excited for the new season to start. They all got together and made predictions. The predictions were wrong and the show was cancelled.
Beach. Nate and his sister decided to go to the beach. They packed up a beach towel. Nate brought his surfboard. They jumped into the water. They had a good day at the beach.

Bad Tooth. It was a warm summer day. Bill was outside drinking a glass of soda. A loud crack appeared on his tooth. A worker with the town dentist saw what happened. Bill went in to have it checked out.

Day Off. It was day off from work and Gina went to the park. She didn't know a single person. She spent the whole day alone. She was tired of the sun beating down on her. She slept in her car when she got home.

Making Out at the Movies. Tom and Julia went to the movies. They planned to see a new movie. The movie was rated R. They brought their parent's permission slip. They were able to watch the movie without being caught.

Charlie Helps Paint. Charlie had always wanted to paint his living room. However, he didn't have any paint for the living room. His mom decided to take him to the store. She bought him some paint for his living room. Charlie was happy that he had paint for his living room.

Black and white party. Last week my cousins threw a black and white party. I am not sure why people would do such a thing. It is so strange that people celebrate this holiday. However when I went there I enjoyed the fun. I am glad my cousins threw the party.
Unhappy about the gift. Maggie got a gift for her mom. It was a doll. She was very happy with it. But it didn't turn out to be what she wanted. The doll was shaped like a raccoon and ugly.

The Gay Sister. Sophie's mom was having trouble keeping up with her social life. Sophie went to her mom and told her she needed a place to stay. Her mom decided to let her stay at her grandparents house. Sophie's mom became friends with the gay sister. Sophie and her mother eventually got along.
Water. Diane was washing her hands. The water was too hot. She opened up the faucet. The water was too cold. Diane turned off the water.
Visit. We had a housewarming party. We sent out invitations. I got the mail on the last day. I saw my sister in law's car in the driveway. We drove down the street together.

Back to School. Amy was starting her first day of high school. She was nervous but excited. She gathered her supplies. She met her friends and made new friends. Amy had a great first day of high school.

Late Night TV. Tom really enjoyed his late night tv. He got new channels one night that really caught his eye. They were all on the same night, so Tom was happy. Tom found a few more channels to watch. After a couple more hours, he had enough late night tv.
iPhone reveal. I went to the apple store yesterday. I picked out a new iphone. It was pink. I couldn't believe it when I saw it. It was the perfect color.

Thrones. Jane's favorite show is Game of Thrones. She really wants to be in it. She's been begging her boyfriend to let her be in it. Her boyfriend is against it. Jane decides to go see her other boyfriend.

The Brave Fireman. Cory was a very brave fireman. While others worked for others to make extra money, Cory did it alone. He worked hard and saved his money for over 20 years. He finally retired and had enough money to retire. His family was very proud of him.
Met at a Bar. I met up with my best friend at a bar. We talked about our interests. We made plans to meet up again. It started to rain. We left early and met at a hotel.
Cooking White Rice. I really like eating white rice. So, I decided to make a few batches. They were really tasty! But, they were also very expensive. I decided to only eat my own rice from then on.

Mini golf. My friends and I decided to play mini golf. I played mini golf with my friend, Jeff. When we were done we sat and had a beer. I had a lot of fun, it was my best golf game ever. We decided we would play another round of mini golf.

Dancefloor. Jane was practicing her dance moves. She was making a mistake though and dropped her feet. The floor was wet and sticky. Jane was covered in mud and had to use the bathroom. The next day she took a bath and it dried her out.

Shirtless. Troy was a successful businessman. He never wore pants to work. One day, he had to go to a fancy party. He couldn't find a shirt to wear to the party. He decided that he didn't mind a little longer.

Short Stories. Sally was a young writer. Her mother wrote her a list of writing tips. She wrote a short story about it. Sally's mother liked it and said it was great. Sally decided to put it in her collection as a thank you.

The careless destruction. Macy was cleaning her home. She was sweeping and sweeping. Unfortunately, her broom was full of dust. She accidentally knocked over her tea kettle. The tea kettle broke into many pieces.

Big Change. Bill decided to buy a new sports car. He looked through lots of ads for different ones. He went to his local car dealership and spoke with a salesman. He was very impressed with the price of the car he was offered. Bill was so excited that he went home and changed his name to Bill.

glasses. I have been trying to get my eyes checked. I went to the eye doctor but he told me my vision was terrible. He recommended I get glasses. He gave me his glasses and they look great. I can't believe how great they make my vision.

More Books. Jim had a lot of books and was moving to a new city. Jim went to the library and checked out new books for his collection. He put his books in the moving box. He packed his new place in his new box. Jim took the books out and was very happy with his new home.
Emma's track race. Emma wanted to run a mile. She set herself up on a track. After a long run she was feeling pretty good. She was able to run for miles. When she was finished she won her race.

Overstepping Boundaries. I once went to a friends house and they gave me a tour. It was an old country road that was a long way up. During the tour we were told that we were not allowed in their yard. I went back and realized they had a dog there as well. I ended up walking the dogs to get out of their yard.

Terrible Haircut. Tom was a professional baseball player. He worked on his hair for a long time. He was always dissatisfied with his short hair. One day he decided to cut it even shorter. Everyone was shocked and impressed.

Birthday Cake. Dan loved birthday cakes. He always ate a lot of them at his birthday party. He finally decided to make his own birthday cake. He gathered all of his favorite ingredients. Dan made his very own birthday cake.

Team Morale. John was a high school basketball coach. During the last game of the season his team was losing. They were down by 4 points with 15 seconds left. John called a timeout to discuss his team's performance. John's team was able to regain control of the game and win.

A Bad Cut. Dan was at the pool. He was wearing a fancy new pair of wetsuits. He had just finished jumping into the pool and was about to go home. When he went home, his face was swollen and red. Dan had to go to the emergency room to have his cut treated.

Cheaters. Sam and his wife were having a very nice dinner at a restaurant. At one point he tried to order some food without paying for it. She asked him what he was getting and he told her. It turned out that he ordered a drink that was too expensive. Sam's wife was very angry and demanded an apology.

Park Accident. Nancy and her son decided to take a drive around the neighborhood. While they were walking a dog ran loose. Nancy chased the dog down the street. She finally caught up to the dog. The dog looked injured but was okay.

Indigestion. Jane had a difficult time with her indigestion. She was forced to go to the doctor every month. Eventually it became so severe she had to go to the ER. When she arrived, they did a procedure that removed her appendix. Jane was much more able to eat afterwards.

Luke Plays Guitar. Luke has always wanted to play the guitar. He decides to take lessons. Luke practices very hard to become better. Luke's next lesson is that night. Luke becomes very good at the guitar.

Pull Up Me. John was running late for school. John decided to get a pull up. John did not have the cardio to do pull ups. John decided to practice pull ups all week. John was able to run to school on time.

Getting a snack. Jill was going on a field trip. Her class went to the museum to learn about animals. When they got there, she wasn't allowed to leave. She had to go into the school cafeteria. Jill wasn't allowed to go home until she ate.

Rita visits her grandparents. Rita had lived in the same state her whole life. Rita wanted to visit her grandparents. Rita's friend told her she could visit them. Rita decided to visit her grandparents. Rita was happy she could visit her grandparents.

Childhood Games Made Real. Sam wanted to play monopoly with his younger brother. The brothers argued and fought. Finally Sam calmed down. The decided to draw straws and pretend they won. They won and enjoyed a game of monopoly.

Pearls before (Guinea) Swine. Tia was visiting her grandmother's house. Her grandmother's sister was visiting the house with her daughter. Tia had never seen her grandmother wearing pearl earrings. Her grandmother let her borrow some of her jewelry. Tia was so excited to see how she had made her ears so pretty.

Making a New Friend. Sasha had just moved into a new house. She was scared of all the new people she would meet. She went to the animal shelter. There, she met two kids and one girl. They all became friends.

Worried. We were worried that the baby might be a boy. We put a poster of a boy up to see if that would help. She looked at the poster and then looked at the floor. She then asked if that was a boy or a girl. We shook our heads in disbelief.

Burn. Bob burned his hand while cooking dinner. He was not in a great mood when he woke up in the morning. Bob felt sick and rushed to the hospital. His doctor prescribed him some medicine. Bob took the medicine and was feeling a lot better.

Open Door. The dog barked and meowed. I ran to check on her. She was laying on the ground with her head in the air. I picked her up and put her in my arms. She rolled around in the arms and purred happily.
Pink Shirt. Ricky and Jessica went shopping. They both wanted something to wear. They saw a bright pink shirt. They both screamed at the color. They went home in tears.

Camping Trip. The Smith family took a trip to the woods. The kids decided to camp out in a tree line. They found a campsite and roasted marshmallows. They had fun until it started to rain. The children went back inside after their fun trip.

The Bad Hair Cut. Tim's new girlfriend was having her very first haircut. Tim wanted to give his girlfriend a special treat. Tim didn't have enough time to do his homework. Tim decided to leave early to go get a haircut. When he got there, Tim's girlfriend looked like a mess!

Santa Claus. The neighborhood children were excited to see Santa Claus for the first time. They were holding a large bag of candy. When it was their turn, one child took a bite. It was his turn and he took a bite of the candy. The kids laughed as the bag flew open and the bag fell to the ground.

Cabin Fever. Sue wanted to take her boyfriend camping for the weekend. She got his tent set up, but there was no water in the tent. She realized the tent had become dehydrated. She called up the manufacturer for some replacement tents. Sue's boyfriend was able to sleep in the tent all weekend.
Cold Pizza. A boy sat down and started eating pizza. It was cold. The boy got too hot. He had to throw it out. He bought a pizza oven.
Eggs. My friend bought a carton of eggs at the store. I went to take the carton home. The carton was empty. He took the eggs out to the carton sink. He had forgotten to put any back in the carton.

Clancy Makes Toast. Clancy feels that she needs to make some toast for her breakfast. She decides to make a small loaf. While she's preparing the bread, she spills coffee on her. The coffee ruins her new bread. Clancy decides to never make toast again.

Jumping. When I was a little kid I was too excited to sleep. I would jump up and down and pretend I was flying. I jumped out of my bed one night and got stuck. My mom had to carry me down the stairs. When she was finally able to get me down I started crying.

Peppermint Bark. Tom was at a carnival. He was having a lot of fun. His favorite was the funnel cake. He tried the bark, but it was not very pleasant. Tom decided he would stick to plain mints from then on.
Hospital Visit. I went to the hospital to see my friend. The doctor examined me. He gave me some shots. He told me I was going to be okay. He sent me home with some medication.

Miniature Dining Room. We decided to decorate our mini dining room with some antiques. We went to an antique store. We bought a lot of lovely antiques. We put them in our dining room. Everyone commented on how great the look was.
The Snow. A man sat on the bench. The man was bored. He dug through the snow. He found a treasure chest. He turned the treasure into the town treasure men.
The Well. I went to the well today. The well was very deep. The well operator kept drilling until the water receded. It was so deep, we got scared. We stayed under the well all day.
Nathan. Nathan wanted to lose weight. He decided to change his diet. Nathan added vegetable to his diet. He also added more fruit. He was pleased with the results.

A Bridge Not Too Far. Tim was running late for work. He had been at the airport for two hours. He went across a bridge and it looked much further than he thought. He was worried he would be late again. He decided to turn around and go back home.
Door Slamming. I was in a rush getting into my car. The door slammed shut behind me. It was so loud. I had to leave the car and get out of the door. After the door was closed, the door did not slam.

Shot in the Leg. Iggy was playing football. He was running down the field and was tackled. Iggy fell to the ground and his leg was cut. He was rushed to the hospital. Luckily the injury wasn't that bad.
Reading. I read a book the other day. The book was a mystery. I have never really liked mysteries. It was very intriguing. I enjoyed the book a lot.

Illegal Street Vendor. Tina always carried her handmade loaves on her daily walks. The police were after her for illegally selling food. Tina knew she wasn't breaking the law. But she didn't care. She didn't feel the need to go to court to prove her right.
Strong Beer. Alicia was trying to get drunk at a party. She didn't have any beer at home. She went to the party anyway. She started feeling sick. Alicia had to go home.

Basketball Tryout. Manny was nervous to try out for his school basketball team. He spent his summer practicing in his backyard. He also ate very well and got his muscles buff. Manny did very well at tryouts and impressed the coach. Manny's team made the high school team and he made it.

Stuffed. I got a new puppy. He started chewing on everything. I was fed up and decided to take him to the vet. The vet told me the puppy needed to be fussy. I finally gave in and put him on his pillows.

Crunches. Tim was trying to lose weight. He wanted to find a way to lose weight fast. He searched for a great exercise program. He learned that running everyday would help. Tim incorporated the running everyday and lost ten pounds.

Too Afraid For A Second Date. Molly was nervous to ask Alex for a second date. She was even more scared when he was acting like a gentleman. She was in a bit of shock by the end of the date. Alex was also in shock. He said he'd never do anything like that again.

Salt in the pepper shaker. It was the first night I tried salt in the pepper shaker. I thought it tasted fine but ended up burning my tongue. I had to cut it out with a fork. I then realized I never cut it all out. I used salt for one more time before I decided to give up on that idea.

Broken Dishwasher. I moved into a new apartment and needed to buy a dishwasher. My first choice was the dishwasher but it was broken. I was not happy so I searched other options. The dishwasher was on sale at the store and I bought it. It was so much cheaper than buying a new dishwasher.
Firing employees. Amy wanted to fire her employees. She decided to call into the boss. She explained the situation to the boss. The boss understood. He ended up hiring her employees.
Pageant. Sally wanted to be on the school's swim team. She was good at swimming. She practiced everyday at the pool. She got a spot on the team. Sally made the team!

A Good Bartender. Mark went to a bar for his birthday. He had never been to a bar before. After leaving the bar, Mark began to feel anxious. He felt that he was a bit lost. Mark left the bar, feeling embarrassed to be there.

Bill Goes Skydiving. Bill was tired of working very late one night. He decided to get out of bed and go skydiving. The next morning, Bill woke up to a very loud noise! He quickly realized that it was the parachute system, not the wind. He was sad that he would have to go skydiving, but happy it was over.

Bob's Big Break. Bob's dream was to work in the business world. Bob worked hard, but he wanted to be rich before he retired. Bob applied for many jobs and finally got a job interview. Bob was very nervous but did his very best. Bob got the job and now owns a successful construction firm.
Real Mom. Tom's mom was very upset at him. She told him he was not a real father. Tom was very confused. Tom eventually apologized. Tom's mom forgave him.
New shoes. I really needed new shoes. I looked everywhere. I looked online and in stores. I found the perfect pair. I bought the shoes and wore them out.

The Storm. A strong wind blew through the mountains. Trees began to collapse and the ground was flooded. The water began to seep under the ground. The people living in the area did not evacuate. A town called in to evacuate all of their residents.

Greg Raposo. Greg wanted to learn to rap. He decided to take a rap sheet from his local library. Greg went home and practiced with his friends. His friends said he had a great new talent. Now, Greg is the nicest guy in the neighborhood.
Ugly Art. Tom was a great artist. His latest piece was a large face painting. He used a heavy brush. But as he was about to paint, it was dirty. The painting looked horrible to Tom.

Price Matching. Kathy needed to buy a new lamp for her house. She checked online for the cheapest price and found a good deal. Unfortunately, her husband had already bought one for a better brand. Kathy didn't mind. It really was a price matching situation!

Decision. Lester was a very curious child. One day he went outside alone and saw his parents walking home. They were having a conversation. Lester began to cry because he wanted to leave. He ran back into the house but didn't see his parents again.

Falling at the rink. My family and I went to the skating rink last Friday. After leaving, we got on our skateboards. My son fell and broke his arm. I had to go and get a bandage. My husband told me it was the worst day of my life.

Beanie Babies. Abe was an avid bean bag tosser. Every time he got a new bean bag, he threw it. His friends were not so sure about that. But then one day, Abe threw the exact same bean bag for everyone. They were all very surprised and happy about it.

Beer. My daughter-in-law Lila and her husband bought a new house in 2006. She lives there now. Lila's husband, John, had an interview in December. He needed to talk to her boss about a promotion. The interview went well and John got the promotion.
Food Poisoning. Jared was eating a pizza. He noticed a bad smell in his stomach. He became nauseous. Jared ran to the restroom to vomit. Afterwards, he felt better.
Robot. Josie went on a robot trip. It was with her class. It was a very cute robot. But it had two problems. It needed batteries and was very noisy.

Questioning. Gina's friend Tami wanted to know if Gina wanted to go to the library. She asked Gina if she wanted to go. Gina wasn't sure about the library, but she said she would. Tami wanted to know why Gina wasn't going to the library. Gina didn't answer and Tami continued to ask.

Left Out. Seth's family didn't have a lot of friends. Seth would always try to meet people at the bars. One day, Seth met a girl and they hit it off. They hit it off so much that they stayed out partying. They made a date for dinner at a famous restaurant.

Boring Movie. Tim hated watching movies. He felt like the plot was unoriginal and uninteresting. He couldn't understand the movie. He kept asking for the right subtitles for it. Eventually his friend was able to fix it for him.

The Angry Model. Lacey was very mad that her toddler was whining. She walked to her son's room and grabbed his bassinet. She got mad as soon as she turned on the television. She began to yell at him. Then she threw the bassinet at him.

Bill's Wife. Bill is a police officer. One evening while patrolling he notices that a car is being followed. He pulls the car over and asks for the driver's license. The man is Bill's wife. Bill's wife is arrested for driving under the influence.
How regretful. Tim was at the gas station. He bought lottery tickets. Tim scratched them off. He lost all of the money. Tim was crushed.

Dog House. Bobby was going to his third summer in a dog house. He was excited when they were ready for school. But when they arrived, he saw a new boy having fun in one. He knew he would have to take a bath and change. So he asked his mom to get him a dog house with a towel and dog beds.
Bat. My neighbor's son had a bat. He came out every night to play. One day, I went to check on him. He was lying on his side. He had thrown the bat across the yard.

Backpacking Trip. I went on a backpacking trip with a couple friends. We were in the mountains, hiking for about a week. We finally made it to the city and decided to buy pizza. I brought it to my car and realized it was too full. I decided to just pack sandwiches instead.

Random. Ana was visiting her friend Mary. Her family had gone to visit their cousins. She didn't know anyone from that cousin group. She didn't like to spend time with strangers. Anna decided she would make an exception and spend time with Mary.

Severe Reaction. Bill had an allergy attack at the beach. He tried to stay calm. He was told it would pass after a few minutes. However, several people were rushed to the hospital. The allergy attack started a chain reaction that shut down the whole area.

Solar Panels. John really wanted some new windows. He looked up local solar panels and decided to install them. He went to the hardware store and picked up the needed supplies. John then went home and looked at his options. He decided to install the solar panels and saved some money on the energy bill.

Wet Floor. Sam worked at a construction site. One day a construction worker slipped on the wet floor. Sam helped the worker get up. The worker then slipped on the wet floor again. Sam helped him get up again.

The purse. Kate was going to her first date with a man. She was very nervous and didn't know what to wear. She looked in her purse but it was very plain. She was a little disappointed, but decided to try again. Kate's date took a picture and sent it to her, with a very nice purse.

Soul Mates. Jill met a man online who had the same dream as her. She had always wanted to be a witch. Jill met a man who said he would take her to the next level. She met a friend of the man and met them there. They were both ready for their dream to come true.

The Fit. Jenny was shopping at the mall with her mother. She was trying on clothes to make sure they fit. After putting on a few pairs she found her perfect dress. She tried it on but it didn't fit right. Luckily her mother helped her find a size that was close.

I Walked Home. I had a stroke in October of 2011. I am still walking a few blocks home each day. I have decided to start taking a shorter walk to improve my fitness. I have already noticed a slight decrease in my walking. I hope to keep walking everyday until I can walk a mile.
Museum. Tom wanted to go to the museum with his friends. The museum was closed. He decided to go to the nearby state university. He bought a bunch of college books. He enjoyed his trip.

Pickpocket. Ned was on his way to the mall. But he saw a woman with a red sweater and a purse. He decided to give her the sweater and the purse. But when he noticed her, she was too excited and left quickly. Ned felt bad and decided to return them later.

Hearing. Lena was a baby and she could hear her parents. Her parents weren't paying attention and weren't paying attention. Her mother was on a call and listening to music. She heard Lena's loud scream and went to investigate. Luckily she noticed a diaper in the crib and Lena was okay.

Professional Photographer. Ronda decided to learn to take photography classes. She found a photo studio and enrolled. She spent several months practicing and reading about photography. Finally she went to her first photography class. She was excited to finally be a professional photographer.

Try. He was the fastest kid in school. He loved to run after school with his friends. He was never caught but kept on running. One day, his teacher caught him running too fast! The teacher called him up for detention and told him to slow down.
Baseball. The couple went to the park. They went to a baseball game. The ball was far from home. The pitcher threw a fastball. The batter hit the ball into the center field.
Spicy Food. Tom was hungry. He decided to order some food. When he opened his food, it tasted good. However, Tom noticed something. The food was extremely spicy.

Trash. I am a firm believer in recycling. I decided that I would try to do my part. One day I went to the supermarket and bought some bags. I filled them up with food. Then I took them home and placed them in the trash.

music with sticks. Sandra loved to play music. She was a good dancer and she practiced every day. Sandra moved to the mountains to teach her stick dancing. Her friends all came and watched as she danced on sticks. They learned a lot from watching her.
Bad tattoo. Susie had a tattoo. She hated it. She didn't want it to stop hurting. Yet she kept getting it. Eventually it got infected.
Cheerleading Squad. Kelli was a cheerleader. She wanted to be a dancer. She tried out for the squad. They told her she wasn't quite good enough. Kelli is now a ballerina.

School Winter. My friend Sally has two boys. The boys played a game to see who could sit on the hot tub the longest. The game went on all night and they sat on hot tub for hours. The next day they both came home exhausted. They said they had spent all night playing the game.
The Belt. The woman put on her belt. She went to the store to buy some more. She looked through the belts. The belts were too big. She went home without the belt.

Waitress. Liza was a waitress at a local diner. She worked there six months. Then she decided to go back to school for business. She graduated with her business degree. The restaurant now has a new cook and she loves it.

Messy Hair. Sally was in the bathroom when she noticed a hairball on the floor. She didn't want to get it, so she put some shampoo on it. She then grabbed the broom and started cleaning. She got in a few more loads of laundry and left to dry. When Sally came back it was still curly.

Scared. Sammy was about to leave the store. He was carrying a bag with his groceries. He was almost on the curb when he noticed a snake in the bag. He pulled out his phone and called the store owner. The store owner got Sammy and his groceries to safety.

Easter Egg Hunt. The children of the neighborhood were excited for Easter. They wanted to find some Easter Eggs for their mother. The first few kids started to throw eggs at each other. The first kid in line threw the egg wrong. They still found several eggs that day.
College. Mary wanted to go to college. She studied for many hours. She got all A's in every class. Mary was offered a full ride scholarship. Mary became a college professor.

Live in Person. It was the last week of the year for our company. A year earlier I had a great time at a company picnic. Now I can't believe how much technology has advanced. I can see into people's minds from three feet away! My boss has made me wear gloves so I can't see into their minds.

Thud. The dog yelped loudly as I opened the door. I didn't want to go to sleep and get the dog wet. I opened the door and let the dog in. The dog bounded into the house and knocked on the couch. I was so tired I fell asleep in the chair while the dog ate dinner.

Logan's Mistake. Logan was driving to work one morning. His car started to make a loud noise. He pulled over to see what the problem was. He found his car flat on his side. Logan had hit a bump in the road while driving and could not change a tire.

Lost Keys. Barry was trying to leave for work. He looked everywhere for his keys. He went to the kitchen. There he found them under his cupboard. Barry was able to quickly get out of work without being late.
Cell Phone. Liz wanted a cell phone. She went to the store to find one. They had many different types. Liz picked a pink one. She bought it and was happy.
The Baby's Toy. Sara's mom brought her baby to the store. Sara's mom picked out a baby toy. Her mom gave her the toy. Sara's mom took the toy to the store. Sara had to go back home.
Safe. Sally was walking in the park with her dog. It had gotten loose. She thought it would get away, but it didn't. She went to check on it. It was dead, her dog.

Pee Break. I was a new employee at the coffee shop. Today I was sitting at my desk when a customer came by. She told me she had a very important job interview. She asked me if I would like to go out for coffee after. I told her I would do so if she let me pee on the floor.

Potato. Tommy wanted to get a pumpkin for halloween. He went to the store and bought a bag of potatoes. He got home and chopped them up. Then, he boiled the potatoes in a pot. He then popped them in the oven and ate them!

Drag Racing. My friend told me about a drag racing competition. We decided to enter a race. I had a really strong car. Unfortunately, I didn't have the right tires on it. We had to pull back a little to make the race go faster.
Freeway Speed. Tom was on his way to work. He was on the highway. Tom was going at very high speeds. He lost control of his car. Tom hit a guardrail.

Baby's First Tooth. Julia was cleaning her room and felt something sharp. Her baby's tooth had come out and he was crying. Julia gave him a tissue and told him to stop crying. She took out the toothbrush and cleaned the area. Then she gave him a mouth rinse to clean his teeth.
Wrong Flavor. Ken bought a can of soup. He brought it home to use it. He used green peppers instead of onions. Everyone thought it tasted funny. Ken realized he put the wrong flavor in his soup.
Grown Apart. My sister in law is 70. Her husband is 80 and divorced. He married a 78 year old woman. Their daughter is 40. My sister in law is bitter about her divorce.

Shoe Lifter. Kara had to get her old high heel off. She'd been wearing it for a few months when it fell off. She searched all over the house, but it was too late. Her heel had popped right off! Kara had to buy a new one.

Kicked out. Drake had a problem with drugs. His parents decided to try to kick him out of their house. They called the police and made an announcement. After a day of waiting, they finally got him out. He had no idea where his parents had taken him, but he was happy.
The backup singer. Dane was a backup singer. He had a solo at the end of the show. His friend got a hold of him and told him he should do it. Dane was so surprised. He went into a full blown song.

Dumping for someone else. I was dating an older guy. We decided to take our relationship in a different direction. He started dating someone else and we didn't like it. We tried to talk it over but he just wouldn't budge. I dumped him and moved on.

Meet The Manager. Jane didn't think she was good enough to get a promotion. So she spent her weekends making a new manager. The day before the meeting she hired an assistant. The boss was impressed by her performance. And he promoted her on the spot.

Business. Tina's dad had trouble making money. He didn't know what to do so she helped him open up a restaurant. She didn't mind that it was a small business. He was still proud of his daughter. Tina was the happiest girl in the world.
Ice Skating. I used to skate all the time. I started to get older. I had to stop skating. I decided to go back to skating. Now I skate to relax and not to get any exercise.

Zombies. When Joe was a little boy, he loved zombies. As he grew up he was very afraid of them. When he got older he decided to face his fear. Joe had to face his fear and face the monsters of the night. Joe learned a lot about himself and his fear.

Doing the Dishes. When I was little I had to do the dishes. I loved the feeling of scrubbing the dishes. However, my mom hated washing dishes. One day we had a big party and my mom washed dishes for everyone. That day we all bonded together over doing dishes.
Tea. A friend asked me if I would like tea. I decided to bring a bag. When I was done, my friend told me he was having some too. I told him I would like to have tea too. We had a nice conversation.

Claire and John. Claire was jealous that John was getting picked on at school. Claire decided to be a bully for John. She decided to hit him right in the nose. The boy turned and looked at Claire in shock. Claire felt guilty and apologized to the boy.

Reading the diary. It was late and I had to read the diary by myself. I crept into the room and hid in the corner. Then, I read it aloud to myself. After it was finished, I tried to pretend to read it. It worked like a charm.
Peppers. The family was having a barbecue. They decided to roast some peppers. They all had a big bite. They all thought they were delicious. The dinner was even better.
Injured Arm. Joey was riding his skateboard one day. He hit a rock in the ground. He fell down and broke his arm. Joey had to wear a cast for two weeks. He was sad to have broken his arm.

Charm bracelet. Suzie needed a charm bracelet for Christmas. She went to a jewelry store and looked at their styles. She liked one, but it was very expensive. Instead, she found one at the craft store that she liked. It cost her almost nothing to make.

Makeup Artist. Sally hated wearing makeup. She hated when her friends made fun of her for it. She decided to enter a pageant to show her face to the world. She went on the show dressed in lipstick and a tight dress. Her face was instantly recognized by a tv producer.

Pigs. Doris took her daughter's pig outside. The pig scratched itself and began to roll around. Doris tried to get the pig back in the house. She gave up and called animal control. They came and took the pig away.

Cornelia Finishes a Book Report. Cornelia had been procrastinating writing her book report for almost a week. Finally she decided to write a quick summary of her progress. When she finished her summary, she began to review it. After a few hours of review, her review was more complete than ever. Cornelia was glad that her book report had been completed.
Pencils. I wrote a poem. I needed a pencil. I decided to ask my neighbor for one. He gave me his pencils. I wrote the poem.

Bob Nearly Gets a Ticket. Bob was late for work on Tuesday. He didn't realize his car keys were in the ignition. He was pulled over by a police officer. The officer wrote him a ticket for leaving his car unlocked. Bob almost forgot about it when he got to work.

Bad smell. Yesterday I went to the store to buy some canned peaches. I went to the canned peaches and tried them. I bought two jars of peaches, but the peaches smelled bad. I went to the store to return them to the store. The store gave me a refund for the bad smelling peaches.

World Series earthquake. On September 8th, 2013, there was a large earthquake in the Pacific Northwest. At first, there was a mild earthquake. Then, there was a very bad earthquake. We were very nervous about the future. We got an evacuation order the next day.

Pitbull Party. We went to a pitbull party in our city this past weekend. The kids were being very loud and obnoxious. I told them to be quiet but they didn't listen. They went too far and started making a mess. Luckily they were all gone within a few minutes.

The Research Project. Drake had a research project due at school. He spent the afternoon researching his project. He wrote many drafts but nothing was perfect. Drake had to postpone his project until the next day. He returned to class the next day ready for his research project.

Emu and Ostriches. Tom was taking a nature hike in the forest. He noticed some emus and ostriches fighting. Tom tried to calm them down. They just kept fighting even though Tom tried. Tom decided to not go on the hike.

Writer's Block. I started a novel last year. I have to finish it before I can submit it to agents. Today I'm writing a chapter for the novel. I cannot decide if I should submit it today or tomorrow. Today I submitted it to a publisher.

Viral. Joe loved a YouTube video. It had been posted on the Internet by a famous vlogger. Joe decided he would like to watch it. Joe started watching the video every day. Joe eventually became a YouTube vlogger himself!

The New Home. Toni was moving to a new home. She had heard great things about a new neighborhood. Toni met with some people and made plans to explore. She made an appointment to move in. She couldn't wait to be a part of the neighborhood!

Rufus Visits Florida. Rufus has always wanted to visit Florida. He saves up money for two months to take his trip. He boards the plane and is very excited to see Florida. He spends his first day enjoying the beach and visiting with friends. Rufus is very happy that he had visited Florida.

Monopoly. Seth got a lot of money from the board game Monopoly. He thought his wife might like it so she started to read it. They argued about who got to take the properties. Eventually Seth's wife took it. Now they never play Monopoly again.
Volleyball. Nathan was not very good at volleyball. He had never even played before. His friend offered to show him. Nathan practiced and practiced. He got better and won more games.

Astronaut. When I was a kid, I wanted to be an astronaut. My parents said that it wasn't possible. One day, I found out that there are astronauts living right here. I decided to go to college for a career in space. After college, I became an astronaut.
attention. Eve was in the hallway of her college campus. She was very lonely. Suddenly, two boys passed her. They noticed Eve's eyes. They asked her what she was doing.
Picking berries. Alicia was going on a picnic. She decided she was going to get some berries. She packed a basket with them. She went out on the swings. She then picked the berries she wanted.
Car Key. Tom was a very careful car owner. He always made sure his car keys were secure. One day a thief came in his house. He tried to steal his keys. Tom was able to use a car key and keep his car.
Shopping at Target. Tim went shopping at the store. He bought a few things. The store was packed with customers. Tim waited for a long time. After Tim left, he went back home.
Dan can't fly. Dan wanted to try to fly a plane. Dan went to his local airport. Dan got a small plane license. Dan started flying his plane. Dan had fun flying his plane.

The Pacific North. Nina traveled by car from California to Hawaii on a vacation. As the car got closer to the Pacific, it began to get dark. Nina realized that she was lost and stopped at a gas station. She bought a bus ticket back to California. The next day, she went back to the gas station to look for her ticket.
Reading. I found out that I was reading a lot. I realized I needed to change that. So I read all the books I had. I read all the good books and bad books. I then changed my behavior to read less.

Late to Class. I was in class today and needed to leave. I told the teacher I would be late to class. Unfortunately she didn't believe me. She told me I would be in trouble. Thankfully I didn't get in trouble and I made it to class on time.

Discontinued. Gina's older brother was a big gamer. She begged him to not use his Xbox. He said she was too young to understand why she was upset. She got upset and stormed out. Her parents were infuriated.

The Move to Tulsa. The Johnson family had lived in Tulsa all their lives. They were tired of living there, so they packed up. The family moved across the state to Tulsa. The kids got lost when they arrived. The family was very sad and never returned.

Geese. The geese were flying high in the sky. He watched as they swam in circles. One of the geese darted into his path. He ran as fast as he could to get away. The geese made a noise and then ran away.

Old Water Bottle. My friends and I went to the beach one day. We had a good time drinking our drinks. We didn't realize that our water bottle was very old. It wouldn't stay put for very long. We had to throw it away and get new ones.

Sports Day. The kids woke up early for school. They were happy to see a football game start. The kids played hard for the game. At the end of the game the crowd cheered. They were glad to see the team win.

Chase. Gina and her friend Mary were riding bikes. But Mary was distracted by the sound of cars passing by. Gina began to feel unsafe as the cars became closer. She felt more and more out of control as the bikers continued. The cars were racing and she decided to ride away from the area.

Not Enough Ingredients. Sam wanted to make a sandwich. He decided to mix the ingredients together. Unfortunately, he messed up on the bread. Sam made an even worse sandwich. He decided to eat it anyways.

The Bum. Kevin was a senior in high school. He got invited to a party. He arrived at the party and immediately noticed something wrong. A bum was standing behind him and everyone else was too drunk. Kevin left early and never went to that party again.

Durpston. I bought a cheap knockoff guitar from the thrift store. I played it in my apartment for a while. Then I tried to break it. I hit the jackhammer on the top. I smashed the top into tiny pieces.
Wango. Sue always wore wigs. One day she was going out. It started to snow so her wig got caught. It was stuck on her face. She had to go get it removed.

Resourceful. Jane wanted to take the train to work one day. She figured that since she had extra time she would do that. Jane arrived in the city and started to research the options. Her transit authority told her that she would need a pass. Jane had to use the subway from that point forward.
Train Ride. Tom wanted to take a train ride. He went to his local train station. He bought a ticket. He boarded the train. He enjoyed the ride.

The Barista. Sophie worked at a local coffee shop. She was not very good at it, and the customers were not impressed. They asked her for a different coffee than what they had. Sophie tried her best, but the customer still wanted a different drink. Sophie ended up leaving the shop that day.

Driving to Work. Bob had to get to work on time this morning. He tried driving to work but the car in front of him would not stop. He did not want to waste time so he drove very slowly. A semi slammed into the side of his car and it started to move. Bob was thankful he was not in an accident.
Valedictorian. I wanted to be valedictorian. I knew I had to do well on the final. I practiced very hard. My final grade was a B. I was so proud of myself.

First Day of School. On the first day of school, I met some new friends. One of them was an older girl named Lisa. We played on the swings together all day long. We also ate lunch together at lunch time. I was sad when my family and I went home that day.
Save Often. Amy was at work. She was bored so she decided to go home. She took a cab to her house and got in her bed. Amy made some calls and left work. She was more alert at home when she got home.

Football Star. Brent was not much of a football player. His coach told him he needed to pick it up. Brent practiced hard every day. He ran sprints and jumped higher and higher. Now Brent is a star football player!

Lecture. Alicia took her son's science class. She was hoping to show him how important it is to science. He told her he did not want to participate. Alicia was upset but accepted it. She left the room upset her son didn't like her lecture.

Arcades. There was an arcade that John liked to go to. John decided to buy a ticket for one hour for a free game. John played the arcade game for twenty minutes. John was able to beat the arcade game. He was able to get a prize for beating the arcade game.

Going to the Movies. My friends and I got tickets to see Star Wars yesterday. We were so excited about seeing the new Star Wars movie. The show started and we went upstairs for the big fight. We ate popcorn and ate snacks. The whole time we all had a great time and stayed up late.

Car Sick. Candy and Timmy had a car sickness. They tried everything, but nothing helped them. Finally they gave up and went to the doctor. The doctor told them to cut sugar and eat fruit instead. After a week of fruit and no car sickness, Candy and Timmy.

"School". My friend's son is in kindergarten. He is learning the alphabet. He has trouble finding the letters C, R and V. Today he was looking for the letter C. But when he looked for the letter, the teacher didn't write it on the board.

The Therapist. Julia went to see a therapist. The therapist talked to her about a lot of different problems. One of them was anxiety. The therapist was able to calm her nerves. Julia no longer has anxiety problems.
The pony. Joe loved horses. His parents wanted him to ride a horse. Joe was terrified. He decided to give it a try. Joe became a proud horse rider!

Police. When I was little, my dad always beat me. One day my dad called the police on me. He beat me up and my clothes were blood stained. He took me home with a black eye. He told me to not ever try to be so mean to the police again.
Honey Pot. I got a box of honey pot for my sister. She had to get it to work. She wanted it to keep her sweet tooth happy. I was able to get the honey pot working for her. She was very grateful.
Lost Friend. I was at the fair with my friend. She decided to go home. I couldn't find her. It took me hours to find her. After that I didn't hang out with her anymore.

Random. The woman came in the door. She wasn't in the mood to talk to anyone. She began to shout out the window at everyone. No one knew where she was going but she seemed intent on it. By the time she calmed down, most people were out of breath.
project. Tim and his friends wanted to build a snowman. They wanted it to have big eyes. They went to the store. They bought big eyes paint and brushes. They made their snowman big eyes.
Test. Cindy has a big test tomorrow. She has been studying for weeks. She is very nervous. She finally took the test and passed. She was relieved and happy.
Beer. The man bought some beer. He took it home. The next day he realized he had an alcohol problem. He decided to quit drinking. He was too afraid to do it.

Meter Monitor Or Thief. One day, a meter monitor for a store came by to clean. While he was there, I tried to steal a soda from him. He caught me in the act and gave me back the soda. After this, I never stole from him again. I was very proud of myself for not stealing anything.

The Long Flight. Tom was on a long trip to New York. He noticed that the plane was starting to smell bad. He realized that he had forgotten to wear deodorant. Tom finally remembered to wear deodorant. His flight was much better.

Birthday Beach Trip. For her sixth birthday, Jan's mom promised her a surprise. On her birthday, Jan's mom told her she was taking her to the beach. The next morning, Jan's mom called her and asked if she'd like to come. Jan couldn't believe it. On the beach, she found out her family had packed her a beach chair!

Benjamin Played Video Games. Benjamin was tired of spending his money on video games. He wanted to find a better way to spend his time. Benjamin decided to take up boxing. Benjamin got very good at boxing. Now, Benjamin is able to make more money doing something he enjoys.

Disappointment. I tried a new brand of shampoo today. I thought it was really great at the first application. However, it was too strong for my hair and scalp. I decided to return it. I now have a new brand of shampoo that is much more gentle.
New Show. Tom was watching a new show. It was so funny. The show got really popular. It was eventually picked up for streaming. Tom loved it.
The Car Wash. Jared's car needed a weekly cleaning. He was sick of the carwash. He got a car wash instead. Jared loved his car washing. Now he had fresh paint for his next car.
New Bag. A new designer bag was released. I saw it at an outlet store. I purchased it online. I wore the bag out to the bar. A man said I looked better in the new bag.
Girls. Tara was very scared to go outside. She was always too afraid of boys. Her mom and dad bought her a big brother. Tara learned to love her big brother. She was never scared of boys again.

Tree. We live on an old pine tree. It has many branches. Today we found a lot of baby maple sap in a tree. We put it in a bucket and grabbed some maple syrup. We put it in the tree and it began to drop.

The Wait Game. The coach told them to stay after school and stay after game. It was the longest game of the season. The first quarter ended with the score tied. Then the second quarter started and they were down 7 points. Finally, they were able to break the game open with a touchdown.

School dance. Sarah wanted to go to the school dance with her friend. Sarah didn't have a date to go to the dance. Sarah called her friend Bethany. Bethany invited Sarah to the dance with her. Sarah attended the dance with Bethany and had a good time.
Getting a Raise. Tim had been working hard at his job. He was only paid the minimum wage. Tim decided to negotiate a higher rate with his boss. Tim's boss agreed to a larger rate. Tim got his raise.

Giving Up. I was working on the computer all day. I was very tired but not sleepy. At lunch time I decided to do some of the work from the evening. I made it through the day and was not tired. I gave up and took a nap instead.
Thunderstorm. It started to thunder and lightning. The thunder lasted a while. It started to rain. A small lightning bolt hit the house. The house was knocked down and the storm was over.

Ball Game. My brother and I were rooting for the baseball team. We wore all black in honor of them. They won the game and were in first place. After the game, everyone was celebrating. I was very proud of myself for coming up with such an idea.

Enchanted Village. Nancy was taking a vacation. She loved the idea of being in an enchanted village. Nancy bought herself a few tickets. As she approached the entrance, Nancy realized she was lost. Nancy panicked and wandered around the park in the rain.

Popout. Sue was at her favorite restaurant. Her family was having her special burritos. When she arrived she sat down to wait for her order. The line was so long she didn't know what she'd order. Luckily her manager offered to take her order and she got it right.

Quex Quacker. There was a man who ran a small convenience store in town. The man decided to hire a black man for a full time job. The man made a deal with the quacker to run a small store. The quacker ran a full service store. The man was happy with the deal and quacked well for the man.
Paid to stand in line. I went to the mall yesterday to buy a pair of pants. The line was very long. There was a lot of people there. After a while I was pushed aside. I left quickly.

barn raising. I have a friend who has a huge horse farm. She asked me to help with the barn raising. I agreed but my truck broke down the week before. I had to leave early to get the truck. When I got to the barn, I realized I had forgot something.

Dog. Anna had a dog named Rosie. One day Rosie was left in the kitchen by her owner. Her owner was upset that she wasn't there to help her with the dishes. She called Anna's parents, who took her to the store. They helped Anna replace her dishes and buy a new puppy.

Art Obtains Understanding. Janet's son came home from school with a picture of a pig on his shirt. She asked him what the name was and he said it was Andrew. She called Andrew and told him what he had done. He apologized to Janet and she forgave him. Now Janet keeps her son's picture on her dresser.

Crazy. Gavin was having dinner with his friends in a very fancy restaurant. When the waiter brought them their drinks, he noticed something. Gavin's card wasn't accepted at the restaurant! He realized his credit card had a negative balance. Now, he didn't have a way to pay for the food.

Room for Happiness. Lori was having a terrible day at work. She had to stay late to fix her computer. She spent the whole day staring at her computer screen. When she got home, she made a cup of coffee. She felt much better when she finished the cup.
Long Time. Gina was in line at her favorite store. She waited for her mom. When her mom finally came, she ran towards Gina. She held out her arm and called for her mom. Gina waved at her mom to stop.

The Eggs. It was Easter morning and Gina was so excited for eggs. She made her mom breakfast in bed. She then grabbed the eggs from the fridge. They were covered in chocolate. She decided she would eat them all at once.
Cooking. Sally loves to cook. She loves to eat good food. She also loves to help people. So she joined the Peace Corps. After a few months, she was cooking for people all over the world.
Need feet to run. The man went out to run. He saw a friend walking. He felt like running after him. He got too tired to run. He lost his friends race.

Jackson. Jackson never learned how to cook. Every night, Jackson had to stay up all night to cook. Finally, Jackson had learned how to cook. Jackson went to a restaurant and was embarrassed by the food. After that, Jackson ate well for a month.

Snowball Fight. Tom's friends decided to have a snowball fight. Tom decided to join. He wasn't very good at throwing them. He threw one too hard and it hit another friend. They decided to not have snowball fights anymore.
Sugar. Sam was trying to lose weight. He tried to eat healthy foods often. His willpower was getting weaker. He gave in to temptation and ate sugar. Sam ended up with lots of sugar in his body.

Dishonest Andrea. A family's cat had an ear infection. They tried everything to get it to drink water. None of the remedies worked. They called an animal vet. They got their cat a new cat food that worked!

Too Big To Flush. Gina needed to clean out her bathroom after her mom left. Her brother's trash could not be picked up for the long trip. It would be a waste of time to throw all the trash in the trash can. So she emptied the trash into a bag and took it out the car. As she went to close the bag a small cat ran out and gobbled it up.

Sunday Morning. Sam and his wife were up late Sunday morning. It was Sunday, so they were starving. After dinner, they were too tired to make it to the movies. Sam decided to go out with his friends instead. They all had a great time and got caught up on a movie.

Bitcoin. My friend just told me that he bought some bitcoin. He was excited because he thought the price would go up. I didn't buy into this, but he did. He told me that he's considering buying some more. I think he will and that might change my opinion of this currency.

Driving. Kirk was on a road trip. He was nervous about how he would get to his destination. Kirk had heard good things about driving in a school zone. Kirk got into his car and started it. The road felt great and Kirk got to his destination.

Making a Video Game. Tom was a game developer. He had no idea what to do with his life. His wife suggested he start his own video game company. Tom worked hard on the business idea. Now his company makes a lot of money and he's happy!

Rhonda Visits a Museum. Rhonda has always loved learning about history. Her local museum has a special exhibit about her ancestors. Rhonda learns about the history of different cultures. She takes many pictures of the exhibit at the museum. Rhonda is proud that she visited the local museum.

Wine Lover. I love to drink wine and I like to win it too. I bought a lot of wines and set out to buy even more. I am a wine lover and have many bottles of wine. My cellar is always full of old, wine filled bottles. I keep many of the bottles in the cellar and make wine in them.
Cattle. I needed some extra cash. So I bought some cattle. I went to the ranch and sold them. I kept the money and went home. I decided to build my own ranch.

Final Exam. Tim has a big final exam tomorrow. He has not studied at all. Tim decided to pull an allnighter. When he got to school, he overslept his alarm and was late. Tim was not allowed to take his exam that day.

The late gift. Macy was going to give her mother a special present. She waited until the store was closed so she could make it. When Macy went to the store, she was very upset with the selection. She quickly found something she liked and bought it. Her mother was happy to hear that.
The Swimming Competition. Sarah loves to swim. She entered a swimming competition. Sarah wanted to win the competition. She practiced and practiced. She got a bronze medal.

Patience. Rita bought a new purse online. She waited for several weeks before she received it. The delivery service never called or sent her any letters. Eventually, she called the manufacturer of the purse. He told her they were out of stock and sent her a new one.

Family Ski Trip. When my husband and I were young we took the kids for skiing. We were excited for it because we had never done it before. We rented out a house and went to our local hill. We went down and saw the big snow and went down it again. We went home exhausted but happy we went.

Tornado in the Mind. Sam was sleeping one night and heard a loud crash. He heard loud bangs and then heard the tornado tearing up. Sam got up quickly and started running as fast he could. The tornado had gone right through his home. He called his insurance company and they sent someone out to check on it.

Bad Christmas. John was excited about Christmas time. But then the next year, nothing happened. This year, his parents bought him nothing. John was disappointed. But, he still had a great time with his family!
Sweater. Kenny loved the new sweater he bought. He wore it every day. One day it was very cold outside. He tried to put it on, but it kept slipping. Kenny regretted his purchase.

Fishing Trip. I decided to go fishing with my friends. I packed my rod and reel with my favorite fishing bait. My friends all came over to my boat. We drove to the lake and got started fishing. We all had a good time fishing.

Spanish Test. Kia is studying for a Spanish test. She gets the test early in the morning. But then she realizes she does not know how to answer the questions. She goes back to bed. By night time she knows the answers.

Wire Hangers. I am trying to learn how to wire hanger. I tried to learn on the Internet. I purchased a set of instructions from a company. It took me a long time to get the hang of it. Finally, I was able to wire hanger properly.

World view. My friend is a student at a university. He wants to improve his college experience. So he went on a reading tour around the world. He ended up visiting six different countries. He ended up having a much better experience on his reading tour.
