Rainy Day. John wanted to go for a bike ride in the rainy. He decided to take his bike to a nearby park. However, he did not bring enough water with him. He did not know that it was going to rain. He was glad he had brought a bottle of water with him.

Glenda. Glenda was a sad old woman. Her family did not let her have a party or party with friends. Glenda began to make requests for friends to come over. One of her requests was that they host a party at her house. Her family went to the store and bought her a host and a party.

Family. Halloween was approaching and my kids wanted to do something fun. They went out to the yard to play hide and go seek. My daughter found her favorite doll and hid under the bed. Her brother found her and she was happy. She went home and we put the lights on and had a great time.
Flat Tire. My friends and I decided to go for a drive. We got stuck in a snowstorm. My friend started to roll over his tire. He called his dad to get him out. His dad helped him to change his tire.

Riding Lawn Mower. When it was summer, we put our lawn mowers up in the garage. We got some rope and hooked up to the mower. The mower started working, then stopped. It would not start, so I found my dad's ladder. I pulled the mower back up and it started working.
Leaving. Tom was getting older. He wished he could move out of his parents house. Tom applied for a job in another state. He got the job. Tom moved out of his parents house.

Boring Main Event. Tim was watching a boxing match on TV. Tim was rooting for his favorite boxer. He wasn't sure the fight would go his way. He was happy that it was ending after a hard battle. Tim congratulated the fighter afterwards.

Chair Claimed. Kate bought a new recliner. But she realized it was not the right size. She looked online and found an expert who had the problem. They ordered a new one and sent it back. Kate was very pleased.

Running. I was playing baseball with my friends outside. My ball landed on a branch and got pulled. I tried to climb the tree to get the ball. When I tried to climb the tree, the branch broke and I fell. I was unable to get the ball up.

Fired in One Day. Diane was fired from her job. She went to the job fair and found a job. She didn't know how to work the job. Diane practiced hard at the job fair for a year. Now Diane is back to work.

The Spite of Rodents. Cindy was petting a cat. She was trying to pet him. Suddenly, a tiny little mouse ran up to her. It didn't seem to be injured and it licked her face. Cindy had to run away and throw up.
Softball Tryouts. Allie wanted to try out for softball. She practiced with her sister for weeks. Finally tryouts came. Allie did not make the team. Allie was very disappointed.

New Sister. Janice is the new sister at her elementary school. She is really shy and doesn't talk to anyone. One day a boy named Sam asks if he can sit with Janice. Sam has a lot of fun with Janice and they become friends. Janice and Sam become great friends.
Drews big date. Drews has been single for a while. His friends set him up on a blind date with a girl. He meets the girl. They have dinner. They have a nice date.

First Day. I came to school yesterday. The first day of school was scary. My teacher introduced me to her class. She helped me become friends with my classmates. I can't wait to go back to school next week.

Water Slide. Kathy loved water slides. Kathy asked her mom to take her to the water park. Her mom said they could go on any one of the slides. Kathy chose the half pipe. Kathy and her mom had a lot of fun on the water slide.

The Blender. Jill wanted a new blender. She went to the store to look for one. Jill saw a new one that had a nice green handle. It was a lot cheaper than Jill expected it to be. Jill was excited to purchase her new blender.
Scared. The man was going to die. He decided to do something bold. He walked outside barefoot. He started a fire. The fire scared the man away.

Joy. Joy was a little girl who hated animals. She didn't like cats or dogs or anything. She was very afraid of clowns. One day, she was invited to be on the front lawn. She was so happy that she jumped right in the middle of it.

The Compassion Of Crazy. The dog barked a lot more in the car this morning than usual. I looked outside and saw a very small kitten in a box. He ate most of it right there in the front seat of the car.
Countdown. There was a big countdown to the election. The man counted down. He said one, two, three, four. He got up to the microphone and began to say. He was finally elected.

The bird. Mary had a pet bird that lived in her house. She loved the bird and fed it every day. One day it ran away and came back late at night. Mary was afraid that it was stuck and would be lost forever. Thankfully, the bird found its way back and Mary was very relieved.
Waterfall. The man walked along the river. He got very tired. He stopped to rest and put his feet in the water. It felt so good to rest. The water felt so good it made him sick to his stomach.
Ride. I walked to the bus stop. There was a bus going to the same stop. I got on the bus. I got on the next bus. I went to the next stop.

An accident. Karen went out to drive in the car. She was driving at a very good speed. She heard a car pop its hood. Karen looked up and saw that the car was upside down. She pulled over and the driver was fine.
Coffee Coffee Coffee. I made my own coffee at home. I bought all the ingredients. I went to the grocery store. I bought all the coffee beans I needed. I made the coffee in my kitchen.

J'accuse!. The football team was losing the game. The team was down by 13 points. They called a timeout to discuss their strategy. The coach told them that the game was over. They were angry at the coach but decided not to cry.

Wild Scare. Tom was on a camping trip with friends. He was drinking a cup of coffee. Suddenly a large shadow started to come out. It scared Tom and everyone else. Tom and his friends decided to never go camping again.

Cancun. I decided to go to Cancun. I booked a trip to Cancun through a web site. My flight was in the morning and the day of my trip was sunny. I couldn't wait to go to Cancun. The weather was perfect and I had a great time.

Laundry. Amy had been washing her clothes for days. Her washer broke and she needed to clean it. She went to the laundromat. She didn't like the way it was run. Amy had to wait until the next day to clean her clothes.
computer class. Joe started his first computer course. He learned to use several programs. He was in and out of the classroom. Joe did really well in the class. He got a good grade!

Lasagna. Kim decided to make lasagna for dinner. She mixed up all the ingredients she had and put them in a pot. After a while she waited for it to cook. It cooked for awhile but then stopped. Kim realized she had put too much salt in the lasagna.

The New Bike. I got a new bike for my birthday. I rode it home from school. A man had to help me get it in and out of the garage. I crashed it several times. The owner took the bike away, and I learned to always ride with training wheels.

New PHone. Mia was looking for a new phone. She was not sure if she wanted a new Samsung or an Apple. She decided to see which one she liked. She saw a pink iPhone in the Apple store. Mia bought the pink iPhone.
Rock climbing fun. I went rock climbing yesterday with my friend. It was a lot of fun. My friend taught me the basics. Then I got some pointers on where to go next. We ended up doing five routes.

Angry Mom. Sam's mom told him not to play ball on the grass. Since Sam disobeyed his mom, he tried to play ball anyway. The ball rolled under the fence and went over the fence. When Sam's dad saw this, he went outside to get the ball. As he was running, the ball hit his head on the pavement.

Lunchtime. Jenny wanted to make a quick snack. She put some grapes in her blender and began to pour. When she looked at the bottom she saw she had used too much water. She had to put some extra on the pot to make it work. Luckily, it still tasted good.

The Bears Game. Lacy was watching the Bears game on TV. There was only one more game left. The Bears were leading with 7 seconds left. Lacy threw the ball to the right. It went into the stands and made it!
The Roadside. There was a big storm. A young boy was driving on a road one night. Suddenly, the road was covered in ice. He couldn't stop in time. He had to call a tow truck to take him home.

Jay's Garage. Jay decided to clean up his garage. He decided to take apart the front and back of his house. He also got rid of junk. Jay took the junk he didn't want and put it in a box. The next day he cleaned his garage again.
Sick Day. Joe is very sick today. He is coughing and sneezing. His mom has an idea. Joe's mom cooked him an egg and poured lemon juice over him. The next day Joe felt better.

Barking Dog. A friend of mine lived in a very small town. Her neighbor was a white guy, and had a dog. He would always bark at the dog. She thought he was trying to get her attention. She eventually decided to just leave.

Release the Stress. Ken always felt stressed in his life. He would get angry at things he felt were unfair. Ken realized that he needed to release all of his stress. He took a few days off from work. Ken went back to work and was less stressed.
City. My family went on vacation. We went to the city. We went to the museum. We saw the circus. It was a fun trip.

Bomb threat. Tim's school was having a contest to win free lunch. They were offering a reward of some free lunch if they could make one. Tim was really good at making elaborate scarecrows. He was afraid he would win but ended up winning. He ended up getting to pick out his free lunch and got more snacks.

Rocket Surgery. Ike's dad worked on a rocket in his garage. The rocket had been crashing for Years and it was time to repair it. It took a long time to fix, but finally they had the rocket in working order. It was finally time to test fire it and it exploded! Ike's dad was very disappointed with himself for not working sooner.

Gum Hair. The lady was getting dressed for work. She had to pull out her gum to use her bathroom. She had a large pack of gum. As she was putting it in the washer, it slipped and stuck. It left a huge mess and ruined the bathroom.

Plane. Sam was excited to fly in a plane to Hawaii. He got a boarding pass and went on board. It was very busy at first. Sam stayed on the plane for three hours and had to take a bathroom. The plane landed safely, Sam was so happy!

Lucretia Prints Her Paper. Lucretia was working on her school paper. She needed to print her paper. Lucretia decided she would print her paper. She printed her paper. Lucretia gave her paper to her teacher.
The Accident. It was a rainy day. Kia was driving home from school. A car was driving in front of her. It slammed into her car. Kia was taken to the hospital for a broken arm.

Christmas shopping. Sara decided to go shopping. She went to the mall to buy gifts for her family. Sara did not have enough money to buy all the gifts. She gave her mom and dad each $25 to spend on the gifts. Sara had enough money to buy the gifts for her family.
unrealistic. John went for a walk. He saw a big shadow in a tree. John was too scared to get up. John waited until his brother had finished his breakfast. John crawled into his bed.

Clown Lover. Hannah had a crush on a boy in her class named Rob. She was very shy and scared of strangers. One day, she got in trouble and her teacher made her sit on the floor. It was so uncomfortable that she had to leave the class. Hannah now spends most of her time at the park or playing with dolls.
Fire. John was having trouble with his apartment fire alarm. He had an idea. He took a nap on the couch and waited. The alarm went off. John ran to get the fire extinguisher.

Games. Samantha loved to play games with her friends. She liked to play chess with her best friend Beth. One day, Samantha's mom brought home a board game set. She and her friends decided to play chess. The two friends had a great time playing board games together.

Pizza Delivery. I ordered a pizza. I called and ordered it to be delivered to my house. The pizza never showed up. I finally called back and ordered it to be delivered. The pizza showed up in the house in about an hour.

Disney World. Last week my family took a trip to Disney World. We got on a plane and headed to Florida. Once we arrived we went to the park and stayed a week. We took a lot of pictures to remember the trip. Now we are ready to go home and make memories to last a lifetime.

The Pets. There were a lot of stray animals in Amy's neighborhood. She was a kind girl and did not want to have them. She put out a sign asking if anyone wanted to help keep them. Within an hour, a dog was found and brought home. Amy was so grateful for such a kind gesture!

The suet and the squirrel. Jenny was cooking dinner. She decided to mix up some suet and rice. When she put the food in the pan it splashed everywhere. It was so messy that she had to clean it all up. After she was done cleaning she cooked dinner on the stove.
The Football game. Tom's team was playing in a big game. It was a big football game. The game lasted all the way until the last play. Tom was in the last play. His team won the game.

Ears. Tom was eating with friends. His friends all wanted to eat the same food. Tom wasn't paying attention to his ears. He didn't notice it and he accidentally bit them. His friends didn't care and didn't mind Tom's mistake.

Work's a Beach. Joe was a young kid who grew up by the beach. His favorite spot was to get his sandals on and swim. One day his mom told him to be careful of the beach. Joe disobeyed and got into a fight with his mom. Joe never had fun at the beach again.

Apartment Repairs. Dan's girlfriend was very rude to him. Dan decided to buy her a set of headphones. Dan went to the electronics store and purchased them. Dan took his girlfriend out to the mall. Dan's girlfriend was impressed and didn't seem to notice at all.
Bad temper. Tim was at home with his mom. He was playing video games. His mom told him not to play video games. Tim got angry and kicked his mom. Tim never apologized for being bad to his mom again.

Picnic Clean Up. My daughter's volleyball team was playing in a tournament. The team had an after party for the team members. The party was at the volleyball court. The volleyball court was dirty. We spent the rest of the game cleaning up.

Morning. It was the morning and Gina didn't feel like going to work. So she went home and turned on some music and laid down. She lay there and fell asleep for an hour. But when she woke, she remembered she had homework to do. So she got up and did her homework right after she fell asleep.
Rally. I decided to go to a rally. I had never been to one before. At the rally, people were chanting about a candidate. I decided to join them. I learned a lot that day about the candidate.
New candy shop. We were shopping at the candy store yesterday. We tried some different candies. We found some really yummy ones. My wife likes the ones with fruit. I think she might like it as well.
Cook Work. Bob's sister had a big day at the office yesterday. She needed to make food for everyone. She decided to make tacos. She made the meat. When she was done she was shocked she was finished.

Chess. Lilly loved to play chess. She had a friend named Bill who played chess online. Bill and Lily practiced their chess skills everyday. One day Lily challenged Bill to a game of chess. Bill won the chess match!

Gamestop. My friend Tom was looking for some video games. He went to Gamestop and bought some games. When he got home he started playing them. He played for hours. Tom went back to the store and bought more games.

Detention. Cathy was pulled over by the police. Cathy's father pulled up. He gave her a warning for speeding. Cathy rolled down her window to see what he said. Her father got into an argument with the police.

Frank's Diet. Frank had been going through some issues. He went to his doctor to get some advice. The doctor told Frank to lose weight. Frank followed his doctor's advice. Frank lost 20 pounds in just a few months!

The Dusty Puppy. Lily and her dog had just had a baby. They spent all day playing with their new puppy. Suddenly, her puppy was running through the living room. She looked around frantically to see who had left him in the house. Then, she found her baby and brought him back to the kitchen.
Mascara. Cody wanted to buy some mascara. She went to the drugstore. She chose a pretty black color. She took it home and put it in her eyes. She loved how mascara looked.
Our Visit. Last year we visited the Grand Canyon by plane. We drove up there on the highway. We walked a long path. We saw lots of animals and landmarks. It was a beautiful trip.

Cockroach. My neighbor said he heard a loud noise in his kitchen. I said the noise was a cockroach. My neighbor said his wife couldn't tell the sound from a fly. I took out a vacuum cleaner and sucked up all of the cockroaches. My neighbor was happy to see it was gone.
Survival. John was out hunting one night. He heard a rustling under his bed. John crept over to see what it was. His cat had taken the food and was snacking on it. John set a trap and caught her.
Bread. I love to eat bread. I decided to make bread from scratch. I gathered the ingredients and put them in the toaster. It ended up toasted. Alas, I burned the toasted bread.
Tired in the line. Susie was in line at the grocery store. She needed to get home. But it was too long. Finally she realized she was being rude. She was kicked out of the store.

Case. Sam's car broke down in the middle of the road. Sam had no idea what to do, so he pulled over and asked a stranger. The stranger told him to push on his chest and wait for help. Sam began to push, but couldn't get the car moving again. The stranger jumped out and helped Sam push the car to work.

Cat Fur. We lived in a condo for two years. Our building had a cat that was a problem. The cat would urinate in the grass everyday. A neighbor complained to management. Management gave him a pill and the cat has been better.
Car Wash. John needed to wash his car. He drove down to his mechanic's. John was asked to take his car in for a wash. John drove there in his car. His mechanic was able to wash the car for free.

The preconceived notion. I had always wanted to be a professional wrestler. One day, my friends and I saw a wrestling tournament. The crowd was very enthusiastic and wild. I tried my best to follow the moves, but it was difficult. I realized that I was going to be just a spectator.
Reenactment. Sam went to a carnival. He was going to see a reenactment. It was very dangerous. He got too close to the actors. He fell off the rollercoaster and got hurt.

Brad and the water life. Brad loved his wife and their small house. One day they were on vacation in the jungle. They took a break from the water to relax in a cave. Brad fell into the cave and died. Brad never recovered from his loss.

Taxi. The taxi pulled up to my house. The driver told my parents he was here for a short while. When he told my parents what time, I was so grateful. Later, my father told me he forgot to tell them. My parents told me they had already called the cops.
Nature. My friend Joe was hiking yesterday. He was looking for a different trail to take. The path was much shorter. But Joe made it to the end of the trail. It was nice to see the view.
Ben's new pet. Ben was at the pet store. A puppy appeared at the window. Ben played with the puppy for a while. He brought it inside and set it up in a cage. Ben was happy to have a new pet.

Larkscall. Ruth loved to listen to Larkscall. It was her favorite song to listen to. One day she heard it was played at the fair. She went to the fair with her friend. They listened to the Larkscall while they rode the ferris wheel.

Tennis. Tom wanted to try out for his school's tennis team. Tom did well at practice the week before tryouts. On the day of tryouts Tom did really well. Tom made it on the team! Tom was very happy that day.

Christmas Morning. Kylie was waking up on Christmas morning. She heard her parents laughing at her. They were laughing at the snow outside. Kylie wondered why she woke up so early. She went downstairs and ran to the tree to greet Santa.

Tabby. Tabby was the cutest cat. When I found her, she was a stray. I took her to the vet who gave her some medication. After a few days she started to act sick. The doctor told me she had food poisoning.

Forgotten toothbrush. Sally forgot to brush her teeth one morning. She brushed but felt her mouth and gums and decided to go to work. There was nothing she could do for the rest of the day. Sally called the dentist and explained the situation. The dentist cleaned her teeth and told her she had to go home.

Homemade Cards. Jill bought some cardboard to make cards to give out at school. She took them to school to give out to the kids. Jill handed them out to the kids and they loved them! She made more and more cards for the rest of the year. The school year was a success for Jill.

On the Subway. Gina was on the subway heading to work. She was waiting for the next stop. As she was walking, a man in a hoodie asked her for money. Gina felt uneasy as she had never felt this man before. She quickly turned around and ran to get off the subway.

No Kenny. Today I found out the identity of my new neighbor. I drove up to his house and knocked on his door. He was very happy to tell me his name. He told me that he has a beautiful wife and they have three children. I told him that was a great surprise.

Torn Pantyhose. Kelly was on a field trip with her school. They were on a trail when Kelly noticed a pair of pantyhose tearing. They were hanging off of a rock by a branch. Kelly yelled for them to be taken off. The pantyhose were so torn that Kelly had to pick them up.

Valentine's Gifts. Jack and Sally wanted to make their dad something special for Valentine's Day. They went to the toy store to get some gifts. Jack's dad took a lot of pictures of their gifts. They presented the gifts to Jack and Sally's dad in the front yard. Jack's dad said he was looking forward to receiving them.

Gayle's chores. Gayle was doing chores around her house. She was cleaning the floors, the kitchen, and the bathroom. Gayle washed all of the dirty dishes. She was happy to see the dishes that had been thrown away clean. Gayle went back home and relaxed.
Working hard. I tried really hard to be a doctor. I studied very hard. I did very well in school. My parents and teachers praised me. I made sure I stayed in school for the rest of my life.
Metabolism or illness. I was feeling lethargic. So I read an article that said eating fat would make me healthy. I put it into practice. I decided to eat more vegetables and fats. And it worked.

I Almost Killed Myself Playing Pokemon Go. A little girl named Sophie loved to play Pokemon Go on her smartphone. She would randomly run down the street at night, trying to catch a Pokemon. After hours of running, she finally caught a Pidgey and named it Sassy. Sally began playing Pokemon Go and felt more at ease after she caught it. When she got home that night, she took it on the playground to play with
Chef's Kitchen. Darlene wanted to be a chef. She enrolled in culinary school. She worked hard and loved her classes. She graduated and went to work as a chef. Darlene became a great chef.

James's New Job. James got a new job that was less stressful. James started getting to travel more. James was a great worker. The boss complimented James on his hard work. James was happy to have a new job.
Macy's Favorite Ice Cream. Macy loves eating ice cream. Her parents told her that ice cream was unhealthy. Macy ignored the warnings. Macy ate many ice cream puffs. Macy developed a stomach ache.

Mule and Plow. Jill had to mow the grass on her farm. She hired a mule to help her. The mule got lost and Jill had to go all the way back. She had to keep looking for her. It took her hours to find him and start his mower.

The Jail. Mavis was being arrested. She was charged with burglary. She went to the jail to await the outcome. She was excited when she learned she would not be in jail. Mavis knew this was her last day in jail.

Keep on Giving. The man put on an old pair of tattered tights and socks. He put on a red cape and a yellow beanie. He walked down the street in the rain and stopped to pick up trash. A man approached him and offered him $100 for the tights and socks. The man declined and went to take the money.
Working Stores. I bought a new dresser to place under the bed. When I put it in, it would not fit the bed at all. I was so mad. I called a local store and got a refund. I was so happy.

Goaltending. Timmy is a goalie. He always tries to make the goalie's save. Unfortunately for him, Timmy can't read. The other team always makes fun of Timmy for this. Timmy will be practicing tomorrow.

Banana boat. My family and I went on a trip to the bay. We found a banana boat that we took home. The boat was small, but we managed to paddle to the shore. I gave my brother a big kiss on the side of the boat. We drove back home safely after a few hours.

The Beach. Last summer I went to the beach. I stayed in a nice hotel on the beach. I played volleyball all day long. I did not get in any sun so I went inside to get some rest. I was too excited for anything to cool off.
Lost for Awhile. He looked everywhere for her. She didn't know where she was. She asked for directions. He finally gave up. She was nowhere to be found.
New Shoes. Sam was running late for work. He couldn't find his new running shoes. He was stuck in the parking lot. The parking garage was too far away. Sam eventually found his shoes.

The Fireman's Dog. The fireman was called out to a house fire. He noticed a dog with two puppies in the house. He ran inside and fed them. The puppies were very happy to see him. The fireman took care of the puppies for a whole hour.

The New Alphabet. Mary was trying to learn the new alphabet. Her teacher had her memorize the alphabet for one week. She tried hard and couldn't remember it all. She asked for a dictionary but the teacher gave it to her. Mary took the dictionary home and started to learn it.

Time Lost While Playing. Toby was playing catch with his friends. He was having a lot of fun until he realized he couldn't catch anything. Toby tried for an hour before giving up. After a couple hours, Toby's friend Jake found him. Jake offered to play catch with Toby and Toby happily accepted.
The Cat. Jill's cat had been missing for days. She was afraid of cats. She looked everywhere for it. Finally she found it lying in the snow outside her house. It had jumped out and run away!
Spoiled. Kate didn't like pizza. She found some leftovers in the freezer. But she was hungry. So she ate it. It was okay, but she regret it.

Can't see who's calling. I was trying to call my friends. They were on the phone with their mom. Suddenly, my mom hung up. She wouldn't answer, so I decided to call her on my own. Luckily, she answered after a few seconds.

Animal safari fun. It was my first time to go on an animal safari. I didn't know much about them but knew it would be fun. I was surprised at how wild they were and how scared I was. I didn't know how long I would be there but it was worth it. I went back the next day with a new respect for wildlife.
Out of Beer. Tom ordered a beer from a local brewery. It was his first time. He had a good time. Unfortunately it ran out of beer. Tom wasn't able to finish it.

Home Econ. Dina always loved watching the news. She didn't like that she always had to read what she saw. She decided to try her hand at public speaking. She went to law school and became a public speaker. Dina loves being on TV now.

Cranky. Kate heard a sound outside her window. She went outside to see what the sound was. Kate walked to her car to look at the tree. She was startled to see a raccoon staring at her. Kate realized the raccoon must have heard her noise.

Can't Click Away Fast Enough. My friend had a very boring day at work. She could barely do anything. The only thing she did do was play a video game. At the end of the video, the screen went black. She was so disappointed and didn't do anything for a month.

Too Hot For Ice Cream. The weather was cold outside. Tom bought ice cream to eat. He decided to eat some ice cream too hot. It was so hot Tom couldn't even eat the ice cream. Tom had to be sick for two weeks.

My niece. My niece is only 30 and has been in her 20s for 25 years. I think she is going to marry someone in the coming year. She is very good looking, so she's on a lot of magazines. She also has lots of connections and is successful. She said she will probably get a divorce, though.

Jacob Breaks His Phone. Jacob was playing basketball. His phone started to run out of battery. He couldn't find a charger. He decided to get a charge. Jacob found a charger and had fun playing basketball.

Riley is too loud. Riley is a 12 year old boy. Riley's parents always told him not to play loud. One day Riley was playing loudly and broke a light bulb. His parents didn't believe him and told him to turn it down. Riley now plays quieter.

Elizabeth can't kick. Elizabeth was going to play kickball. She was excited and ready. Then she realized she had no kickball shoes. Elizabeth had to borrow one from a neighbor. Her kickball game was terrible because she couldn't kick.

Cleaning the house. We had to clean out the entire house. We were cleaning out all of the clutter and junk. Once we were done, we realized that our dog had been outside. She had been playing outside for hours. It made it difficult to do the cleaning.

Too Fat. Jared was trying to lose weight. He would eat too much and not enough exercise. Jared got in trouble at school for not being fit enough. He was in trouble for almost a month. Jared had to quit school to fix his eating habits.

Small world. Lucy and her family have been friends for 50 years. Her family is in the same hospital room for several of their visits. Lucy's family has moved to a different hospital room for a shorter stay. Lucy is the only one who hasn't made any new friends. However, it's been fun to meet new people and make new friends.
Going to School. Tom was going to school. He hadn't paid attention in class. He was nervous. When he got there his first class was swimming. He had a great time in class.

Mahabharata. The Mahabharata has been out of print for over fifty years. The Bhagavad Gita was finally published in English. A great deal of effort has gone into making it available. The Mahabharata was re-released with a new introduction. It is a great addition to the canon of Indian literature.
Blanket head. I was laying in bed when i woke up. My blanket was not there. I looked everywhere in my house for it. I looked in my car and my living room. I finally found my blanket on my bed.

The Promotion. Larry was having trouble finding work. He sent out job applications everywhere he could. He did the same with his resume. He sent the resumes to every company in the state. Larry's friend Larry got him an interview.

Sledgehammer. A man found a large metal spike. He took it to the hardware store to see if they would sell it. They laughed and said that it would cost a lot of money. The man brought the spike back home to start a small business. Now he owns a metal shop.

Being rude. Sam really wanted to go to a party. He saw his friend at the door, but he was busy. His friend told him to come inside. As soon as Sam came inside, he was rude. Sam realized he shouldn't be rude at a party.
Test. John has a big exam next week. He has not studied at all. He decided to play video games. When he got to class, he was exhausted. He decided to pull an all nighter the next day.
The Pencil. Cynthia was writing a paper. She got a pencil from her bag. She was trying to write her essay but it was too short. She decided to use a larger paper. Luckily her teacher was not aware.

The Babysitter. Amy had a babysitter on Monday. Amy's mom told her she would buy her a new outfit. Amy got dressed up and brought a new outfit home. Her mom saw the outfit and said it was the best one. Her mom bought her the outfit and Amy was happy.

Dark Stranger. I was on my way to the cinema. All of a sudden a dark figure came out of nowhere. It scared me and I quickly got out of my car. I turned around and saw the culprit. I called the cops and told them that the dark figure was me.

Mounting Bills. Joe owed over $200 in student loans. He decided to go to an ATM. After a few hours, he realized that his account was empty. Joe then called his school to tell them about it. They said that he couldn't pay them back yet.

Addictive Game. Jake always enjoyed playing board games. His friend suggested he try playing poker. Jake was skeptical, but played the game anyway. He won several hands of poker before losing everything. Jake learned that he should never doubt his abilities.
Marco Visits Utah. Marco had always wanted to visit Utah. He saves up money so that he can go one day. Finally he gets enough money. He packs up all his things and flies to Utah. Marco visits Utah.

The Interview. My former coworker Sue was hired as a research associate. She was interviewing her current boss for a new job. She spent all day reading and researching about him. At the end of the interview, Sue felt confident she got the job. That day she was called into the boss's office and she was fired.
Stray kittens. I was walking home from the grocery store. There was a stray kitten in my path. It was looking for food. I gave it a few pieces of bread. It licked them happily.

Spring Water. Bob got home after work one day and noticed a cool, refreshing stream. He got the ladder out and took a taste. Bob was amazed at how refreshing it was. He went back inside to take a closer look. He was amazed by how it tasted and decided to go get some more.

Driving again. John drove a taxi to the store. His boss called him into his office. John's boss was very surprised to see John drive again. His boss asked if he had gotten a new license. John smiled, and told his boss he had.

Seth Rides a Bike. Seth is a middle aged man. His friends suggest that Seth try to start biking. Seth buys a cheap bike at the store. While out riding Seth feels very smart. Seth is happy he is going to start biking.

Ribs. Tiffany's husband cooked ribs for dinner. She asked her husband to be more careful. He said he would be careful but it sounded awful. Tiffany tried to find a good substitute. She found rice, and her husband tried it out.
Fluffy Socks. I bought some new colorful socks. They were super fluffy. They were also pretty cute. They were pink and sparkly. They were the perfect socks to wear.
The Dare. I was in high school. We had a dare. We dared each other to do a secret handshake. I refused. I got grounded.

Battle of the Bands. Tina was going to have her first band competition tonight. She practiced for a week. The day of the competition Tina practiced more than anyone else. When it was time to compete Tina played her best. Everyone cheered when Tina won the competition.

Terrible perfume. Suzy was going to have a shower. She tried some perfume but it was horrible. She could not stand the smell. Finally she decided to change it for the bathroom. She used deodorant instead and was happy about that.

The Prisoner. There was a man named Joe who was arrested. Joe was in prison, but he wanted to leave. He went to the prison and told his friend how he wanted to get out. His friend helped Joe find his way out. Joe was free and his friend was very happy.

Clean Up Your Toys. My sister in law had an antique doll for ten years. The doll was so dirty that she had to take it to the cleaners. The doll was in bad shape, so they gave her a sticker. My sister in law was very happy with the sticker. Now her doll is clean and sparkly.

Wrestling Show Disaster. Tim was going to his first wrestling show. His mother told him to not wear any clothing. Tim was going to see a few matches. During one of them he got really into the ring. He started getting into trouble and his mother had to step in.

Winner. My wife won a contest. She got to pick three items to get for her family. She put the items in a big box and went to the post office. She went there, got the box, and counted the money. She left three bags of money.

The Smallest Player. Jack and Eric were the small brother of two brothers. They were going to be in the school basketball championship game. Jack and Eric were very good basketball players but their brother Jack was bigger. Their dad put a bet on Jack's team to win the game. Jack lost the bet because Eric and Jack beat him by 15 points.

New years eve. It was the night before New Years Eve. I woke up early so I could get ready for the party. I quickly got dressed and drove to the party. The party was very loud and startedle me. I never went to that party again.
The Staircase. Mary was running late for work. She had a terrible cold. She couldn't get to her car. She slipped on the staircase. She felt really embarrassed as she went down the stairs.

The Cereal. Today my son woke up and decided to make breakfast. He decided to make cereal. He poured himself cereal into bowls. Then he put milk and milk in the bowl. Finally he put eggs in the bowl for him.
Cleaning Up. Jenna's house was in disarray. She decided to clean everything. She picked up all the stray clothes and junk. Then, she scrubbed every surface. Finally, she was ready to relax and relax.
The Sunglasses. The man put on his sunglasses. He wore them out of town. He was walking around downtown. It started to rain. He went home without his sunglasses.

mike is angry. Mike has a lot of anger issues. Mike's friends always try to make him feel better. Finally Mike's friend recommends anger management classes. Mike goes to anger management class. Mike learns how to control his anger and becomes happier.
cotton candy. Rita loved cotton candy. She ate a big handful. Then, she felt something burn her tongue. She spit out the cotton candy. And, she learned to never eat the candy again.

Windy River. Tom was on vacation in the mountains. He decided to take a boat trip on his favorite river. The river was very windy and dangerous. Tom tried to stay calm but he was scared. Luckily he managed to make it safely.

Laughing. I always think it is funny when people laugh at me. They think it is because my teeth look funny. The other day I had a toothache. I had to get it checked out. The dentist told me I need to stop smiling.

Pharmacy. My wife went to the pharmacy. She needed to buy a pregnancy test. The woman at the counter said it would cost $20. She said she could not afford that. My wife had a test performed at a local hospital.

The new job. I was laid off from my last job. I needed to find a new job, but didn't know what I should do. I decided to search for opportunities online. I found a job that I liked, and applied to it immediately. Within a week I was notified of an interview.

Purchasing Decisions. Joe and his mom were making dinner. It was Joe's turn to pick up the turkey and carrots. He chose the turkey, but he didn't know what to get with the carrots. He asked his dad for advice on the matter. His dad offered a suggestion that Joe should get both the turkey and the carrots.
Fire. I woke up to my alarm going off. I grabbed my phone. I looked out the window. A fire truck was parked in my driveway. I ran to the car to stop it.

Dumb Prank. My mom had some gum stuck to her tongue. She used a toothpick to poke it out. When my dad saw, he asked her to put some ice on it. I did the same thing with the gum. She still said it wasn't my prank.
Lola drinks coffee. Lola loved coffee. She decided she wanted to start drinking it more. She bought a bagel to start. Lola drank a lot of coffee. Lola was so happy about the caffeine in her coffee.

Michael goes to prom. Michael was at the dance. He was a popular kid. He had been asked to go by a girl named Marissa. Michael got dressed up in his best tuxedo. Michael was the prettiest boy at the dance.
Lanterns. We went to the local thrift store. They had a great selection of lanterns. We bought a big assortment. It was a great purchase. We brought them home and added them to the lantern display.

Online Chess. I played online chess against an old friend. We play chess on a server in California. On my side, I was winning at first, then lost the game. Afterwards I had to check my email, but it was gone. It turns out he has gone on vacation.

Clams. Nia bought some lids from the grocery store. She put them in her mouth and waited for them to cool. But they kept popping! She had to throw them out. She couldn't believe that clams were so slippery!

The Dance. Allison's friend's wedding was this weekend. Allison had not invited her to the dance at all. She did not want to ruin Allison's plans. She asked her mom to go instead. Allison's mom said she would go with her.
Painting Pottery. Jenny wanted to buy pottery. She decided she needed a new set. She visited a pottery shop. Jenny was amazed at how much they had. Jenny decided she was going to buy some.

Books. Gina's dad had promised to help her buy school books. The only problem was that the books were too expensive. Gina didn't want to buy the books. She wanted to get her dad some money for other things. But the books were a problem too and she couldn't make him buy them.
Degrees. My professor told us that he has many degrees. I could not believe it. I was amazed and asked him to explain the degrees. He did. I was very confused and left the room in tears.

What did mom tell you  about talking to strangers. Sally was in line at a gas station. She was very hungry but she was also thirsty. When she was about to pay she saw a young woman on her phone. She introduced herself and the two talked for almost an hour. By the time the car left Sally felt much better.

Mturk. Anna hated making payments on mTurk. So she quit working and went back to school. But then she realized that mTurk was good for her. It paid for everything in her budget. Anna decided to stay on mTurk forever.
Leg. I ran out of the room. I found the water gun on the desk. I threw it at the ceiling fan. The fan shot a lightbulb. The light bulb burned my leg.
Elephants. Tom loved elephants. He got a job at the zoo. He loved working with animals. One day, he saw a baby elephant. Tom was so touched that he helped the elephant out of it's misery.

Volleyball Match. Tom joined his school's volleyball team. Tom was good at hitting the volleyball. Tom had trouble staying on the volleyball court at all. Tom became frustrated when he couldn't score any points. Tom quit the volleyball team.
A waterfall. It was a very hot summer day. Jill took a relaxing stroll down the river. She saw a bright yellow waterfall. She was captivated by it. It was amazing and she took many pictures.

Michelle's New Puppy. Michelle's mother brought her a new puppy to live with. Michelle decided to get her friends to help her get it. Her mother and friends bought the puppy and named it Buster. Buster and Michelle played together all day. They named Buster their new best friend.
The baby won't sleep. Timmy was playing outside. His baby brother was napping on the ground. Timmy walked up and sat with him. Timmy told him to take a nap. Timmy's baby brother went to sleep.
Growing up. Carly was born in a poor country. She learned how to work with other people. She worked hard for years. Finally she graduated from college. She decided to move to the United States.

Grease Fire. My brother and I were in a garage playing with firecrackers. I was using a pipe to poke a hole in the roof of a house. My brother began to grease the firecrackers against my arm. This created a small fire which lasted about ten minutes. My brother eventually let go of the firecrackers, and I never used them again.

The Circus. Samantha went to the circus. She liked to sit on the monkey bars. She also loved seeing the famous animals. Unfortunately, the clowns were really annoying. Samantha had to leave before the show.

Life Changes. I am excited about starting college. One of the first things I will do is start the new year. First thing I do is buy a new suit. I think that is a good idea because I am going to be there for 4 years. After that I go out for my first date.
Pen Caps. My dad has a box of pens. His favorite is the Datsun 240Z. He used to buy a new one for me. I hated the feeling of having a new pen. Now I always know what pen to buy.

First Day of Work. Today was a very scary day for me. It started with the traffic stop I had to make. After that, I walked over to my office building. Then, I met with a nice therapist. After seeing my therapist, I started my first day of work.

No Friends Left. Karen went to the store to get food. She was a bit upset she had only left one bag. She realized that there were no more food in the store. Karen looked around for another bag but had no luck. After looking around the store for another bag she left the store.

Allergy Medication. Amy was allergic to many nuts. One day she decided to get an EpiPen for her nuts. Her mom took it reluctantly, thinking she needed the shot. Amy told her mom she was allergic. They gave her the shot anyway, and it helped her stop being allergic.

Sweatpants. Tim and Tina wanted to go to a party. Tim and Tina thought the best attire for such a party would be sweatpants. They asked a friend of theirs to try a pair on. Tim and Tina loved how the pants fit on them. They decided to wear them to the party.
Angela 5. I met an old friend in high school. We fell in love in college. We dated for five years and fell in love again. I proposed marriage to her. She said yes!
Italian. I was very hungry. I went into the kitchen and grabbed a can of sauce. I threw the can in the microwave. After about 30 minutes, the can was empty. I decided to go to the store to buy more.

The Office. Cynthia was tired of working for the boring office. She thought that her coworkers needed a change. She began volunteering at the local soup kitchen. It was the best job she'd ever had. She was glad to help the less fortunate.
Keurig. I used to drink coffee from a Keurig. I would have it every day. One day I stopped drinking it. My Keurig stopped working. It is now broken.

Tibet. Neil went on a Tibet train trip. There were so many beautiful things to see. The Tibetans greeted Neil with kindness and kindness! Neil realized that Tibet was his favorite place in Tibet! Neil was very happy that he went on a Tibet train trip.
Hockey Game. We went to the rink for a hockey game. We had a lot of fun. We played for hours. The ice cream truck came by. We were happy that we went to the rink.

The worst cup of coffee. I decided to make coffee one morning. I went to the kitchen, grabbed my coffee maker, and began. I heated up the coffee maker and poured it into the cup. I then waited for the coffee to brew, at which point I had no coffee. I then had a cup of coffee at the table.

gold. John was hiking in the woods one day. He was having a great time when he noticed he was out of water. He could feel the ground beneath him dripping. He got a flashlight and looked at it. It was an old well buried for a long time ago.
Soft Avocado. Tom was hungry. Tom made avocado. Tom put avocado in a bowl. Tom ate the avocado. Tom felt hungry.

The Kiss. A few years ago, James was playing with his friends at a party. James didn't know that his friend Tim was at the party. James was upset that Tim wasn't there, but didn't want to say anything. As Tim approached James, Tim smiled, and leaned in for a kiss. James felt so guilty that he stopped talking to his friend.
Trying hard. A man went to the bank. He had been robbed recently. The robber demanded some money. The bank teller gave it to him. The man tried to run away but was stopped by police.

The broken tail light. Karen was driving down the road. She looked in her rear view mirror. Suddenly, a light from her tail light appeared broken. Karen pulled over to see if it was broken. Thankfully, the light worked.
Mouse. My little mouse kept getting bigger. He was so tiny. I was getting ready to put him in a cage. Then I realized he was growing so fast. The cage was too small for him.

Missing the Last Episode. Sam was binge watching a show online. He was so caught up that he missed the last episode. Sam was annoyed, but it was worth it. The show did get better after that. He decided to watch it more often.

Catch the Thief. Bill had a favorite pair of sneakers. They were black with big rhinestones on them. But one day, he noticed his favorite sneakers were missing. He looked around and could not find them. After looking for an hour, he decided to take them to a store.

Contaminated Shorelines. Kenny went to go swim with his friends. They decided to go swimming in the ocean. Kenny decided he would go for the entire ocean. Unfortunately, he was swimming in polluted ocean water. It was not good for Kenny to get in the water.

TuTu. I found a cat in the street one day. It looked injured so I took it home and nursed it back to health. My neighbor saw what I was doing and called animal control. The animal control person came and took the cat away. The cat was given away to a friend that weekend.

Lipstick mishaps. Rachel was painting her nails at the mall with a pretty pink polish. She began to paint a large circle of the nail polish. Suddenly, she cut her finger on her pink pen. As she ran to the bathroom to wash it, the pink pen was blood. Rachel carefully washed the wound with a clean cloth.

Jackpot. Riley was playing poker at the casino. He was about to make a winning hand. Suddenly, he was hit with a surprise. He was actually in the exact same hand! Riley had actually won ten thousand dollars!
Boring Movie. Tim was bored one afternoon. He decided to watch a movie. It wasn't much to watch. Tim wound up getting too distracted by the action. Tim wound up falling asleep early.

John Visits His Grandma. John decides to go to visit his grandmother. John drives down to his grandmother's house. John talks with his grandmother for hours. Finally, John has a nice visit with his grandmother. John is glad he visited his grandmother.
Clothes Shopping. I needed new clothes. I went shopping at a store. I found a lot of cute clothes. I bought them all. I put them in my closet.

Brand. Randy was a vegan who wanted to eat bacon. He decided to search for a burger that wasn't vegan. He couldn't find any bacon in a store. He decided to buy some non-vegan buns. His burger turned out perfectly.
First day of school. It was my first day of school. I was so nervous and scared. I was afraid to be in class with people. But thankfully they did not make me nervous. Everyone was nice and fun.

Tokyo Trouble. I went to Tokyo to do some shopping. After shopping for a bit I was about to leave. A bus driver tried to stop me but I was too fast. I flew through the air and landed in the middle of the street. The driver had to jump out of the bus window to stop me.
Nice investment. I found an investment that I really liked. It was going to be ten dollars. I put in thirty dollars. The next day I made a nice profit. I was pleased with my investment.

Sick Daughter. The parents decided to send their daughter to the doctor. The doctor said their daughter is not feeling well. The parents decided to call the girl's school to reschedule. The doctor's office rescheduled the doctor's appointment for a later date. The parents' daughter came back to the doctor's office the next day.

Failure. Gina was in line to go inside a store. She needed to purchase a shirt. However, her mother told her no. In addition, she was told she could not leave without her shirt. This made Gina very upset.

Camping. My friend went camping today. He is a good man, but has never gone camping before. I went with him because I wanted to go with him. He did not want to go, though, so I stayed home. He told me that he was bored the entire time.
Borrowed car. Tim needed a new car. He had one that was out of gas. He had trouble making the payment. He finally got enough to take the car back. He paid it off and saved money.
First Time Drinking. Tim was at his friend's party. He was really thirsty. He decided to drink from a glass of water. It tasted disgusting. Tim realized drinking water was a mistake.

Javier Scores A Goal. Javier is a soccer player. He is playing in his first game of the season. His team is losing. The game is almost over and Javier is the last player left. Javier is awarded a goal for his amazing team performance.
Noisy Toddlers. A baby was making a lot of noise. My wife asked me to try to quiet it down. I bought ear plugs. They were not enough. I took them off and went back to sleep.

Fold Them. Samantha bought some fabric and fabric scissors from the store. She used the scissors to cut shapes out of the fabric. She glued each piece to the pattern pieces. Then, she pasted the pattern pieces onto a table cloth. Samantha was glad she had bought the fabric scissors.

Surprise Dinner. It was finally time for Thanksgiving. Amy had been hoping to not be hungry any more. She had been watching TV all day. Her family had been waiting an hour. She sat down at the table and ate a big turkey dinner.

Tornado Alley. My friends and I heard the tornado sirens. We ran towards the house. We had been warned about a tornado in the area. We waited in the basement. We felt safe until the sirens went off again.

Bob's Son Hits a Homerun. Bob had to catch a foul ball in the last inning of a baseball game. Bob had never seen anything like this before. The batter hit a line drive right into the stadium! Bob's son hit a homerun in the 9th inning! Bob had never seen a baseball game play so exciting.

The Epidemic. There was a bad epidemic across the town. Everyone was coughing. Nobody knew the cause. Finally, an old woman came forward. She told everyone the epidemic was her childhood vaccinations.

Read to Me. The teacher asked me to read a letter to the class. I didn't understand what the letter was supposed to mean. She kept trying to spell it out for me. I kept trying until she said the right word. I sat there, stunned at the end.
Speech. The student was being praised for their speech. He stood up and looked out the window. The teacher noticed. She told him to stay back. The student kept going on and on.

Newbie. Sam was very new at his job. He didn't know any of the employees there. He decided to make new friends quickly. One of his new friends introduced him to another employee. Sam made many new friends with that employee.

Arm Wrestling. There once was a young man who loved to lift weights. He often lifted more than he should have. He would often hurt himself when he lifted heavy. He felt ashamed to tell his parents about it. The next time he was asked about it, he told them the truth.
Swimming. Diana was going to the pool. She went down the deep end first. Then she pushed off. She swam in the pool for an hour. Afterwards, she decided she wasn't as tired after all.

Homework Help. Kim's homework was due today. She decided to go get some help from a friend. Her friend came over and helped her get started. She finished the homework before her friend came over. Kim thanked her friend and went home.

NYSE. I am not a market maker. I make my own money and sell it on the internet. Today my broker said the price of gold was $1,200 an ounce. That was a new high. Now I am betting on gold futures to see if it will move higher.

The Find. The teacher was walking in the hallway one day. He found a small ball near a chair. He picked it up and put it in his desk. He brought it back to class and showed it to his students. One of them was so excited she took the ball and ran away.

Candy Store. It was a hot summer afternoon. I decided to go buy some candy. At the candy store, I saw all these pretty things on sale. I decided I really wanted some of these candies. When I got home, I immediately started eating all of them!

Sleepy. I went for a walk to get some fresh air. It was a sunny day but I wasn't wearing my sunscreen. It was freezing so I stayed outside the entire time. It was so cold that I had to go back inside my house. Now I wear my sunscreen everywhere.
Kidneys. My wife's boss has kidney problems. She went to the doctor yesterday and he prescribed some pills. She was worried about him dying. I offered to pay her to keep him healthy. She said no.

Jackie's New Shoes. Jackie is tired of wearing the same pair of shoes she has for Years. One day, she notices that she has many shoes that she likes. She decides that she needs to buy three new pairs of shoes. Jackie spends an entire Saturday shopping for a new wardrobe. Finally, Jackie has a new wardrobe that she is happy with.
No Response. I tried contacting the support person via email. He responded to my email. It took him thirty minutes to reply. He told me his email address. I hung up.

Truman's Keyboard. Truman was a poor man on the streets. He got by with a cheap keyboard. Truman's friends told him he should buy one with a keyboard. Truman bought one with a great keyboard. Truman's keyboard became his favorite.
Games. It was game night and the family was very excited. The games were all very competitive. My dad had a favorite game that he liked to play. We each picked one out to play. Everyone had a blast.

Mturk. I am a web developer. I've never made a website before. I asked my friend Dan if he would teach me. Dan showed me some basic coding techniques. After watching videos, I started making my own website.
Noises. Maggie is walking to school. On the way her feet start to make sounds. She starts to walk slower because of her noise. Maggie arrives at school. She is a few minutes late to school.
cookies. Sue was hungry. She decided to make some cookies. She bought all the ingredients. She followed the recipe. They were good.
Sign the Autograph. John is a baseball player. He had a great game at the game. During his next game, he was hit in the face with a pitch. His face was swollen. The players signed his jersey.
Spin class. Jill went to Spin class. She got spinners to learn to spin. She was a good student. She was told she got spinners for her birthday. She was excited.
The Couch. Tara was walking in the park. She sat down in the grass. She felt something wet and sticky under her feet. She looked down and saw she had stepped in a puddle! Tara screamed and ran away.

Car Accident. John was driving home from work when he was involved in a car accident. His front left tire went flat, and the car spun into the air. John was knocked unconscious by the impact, and could only be saved by a bystander. He was rushed to the hospital where they hooked him up to monitors. The monitor monitors were able to give John vital information and helped.

The trip. The Johnsons were taking a trip. They needed a new suit for a big vacation. They went to many stores and could not find anything. Finally they found a nice suit. They were so excited and could not wait to wear it.
Money. Tom wanted to be a millionaire. He started his own business. Tom invested all of his money. He eventually went bankrupt. Tom no longer had any money.

The Snowball King. A young boy decided to throw a snowball at a girl. He went to her house and threw the snowball at her window. The girl screamed and ran outside. The boy ran after her crying and apologizing to her. The girl laughed and told him to be careful next time.

Stan's Hat. Stan was a manager at a clothing store. Stan decided to wear a hat to work. A customer complained about Stan's hat. Stan changed his hat in front of the customer. Stan made a small sale for his customers.
Peppermint tea. Lisa went to her cousin's house. He had a peach mint tea. She tried it. It was awful. She would not drink it again.

First Dye. It was Gina's first time dyeing her hair. She thought she would hate it but she loved how it looked. She decided to just go with it. She put on a lot of makeup. She looked in the mirror and said it was her best color yet.

Stray. Tina found a stray dog on her way home from school. She brought him home, and tried to keep him. One day, a neighbor boy saw her dog. She tried to run back to the house. Unfortunately, the boy tripped her, and she was seriously injured.

Long Journey. The family decided to travel by bus. They boarded the bus to go to their destination. The driver was very rude during their trip. They were glad when they arrived at their destination. They decided not to take the bus again.
Theo. Theo was a very fat cat. One day he got very sick. He threw up all over the house. The owner decided to take him to the vet. Theo came home, and his owner took him to get his medicine.

Aurelia Learns to Tango. Aurelia has always wanted to learn to Tango. She finds a local tango course in town. The first class is a lot of fun. Aurelia loves her classes. She is so happy she took the opportunity to learn tango.

Not a Federal Holiday. When I went to visit my grandparents this past weekend. On my way there, I noticed that the highway was closed. I asked my grandma where the highway was. She told me it was not a Federal holiday. I drove to my grandparents house.

Swimsuit. Benny was excited about his upcoming swim meet. His mom bought him a new swimsuit. He was very proud of his new swimsuit. At the meet, it rained a lot and made him really sad. He wore his swimsuit even though it rained that day.
Corner. Bob and I were driving home from the movies. We came upon a really bad curve. Bob could barely see in front of his car. I was driving really fast. Bob finally slowed down.

New Puppy. Jack's mom was out of town for the summer. Jack would be staying with his uncle's and their friend. Jack was looking forward to seeing the new puppy. When the two boys came over to play with the new puppy, they got lost. Jack's uncle said it was ok, they were just lost.

Ken's Kilt. Ken was taking a trip to Ireland. He decided to buy himself a kilt. It was hard to get his kilt through customs. He eventually got it through and went to the beach. Ken felt like a real man after that.
Military. Tom was a high schooler. He wanted to join the army. Tom trained very hard. Tom passed his test for joining the army. Tom was very proud to be a soldier.

Unaffectionate. Gina had no choice but to go with her mother. She wanted to go to her friends house but her mother was upset. They fought at first and ended up throwing plates of food. Then the two girls got along well, even if it hurt their feelings. Now Gina and her mother make sure they talk before they eat.

The Arrest. Joe was walking with his headphones in his ear. Suddenly he saw flashing lights. He was stopped and arrested. Joe pleaded his innocence to the police. The officers just laughed at Joe and left him alone.

New Boys. Sara has always been a tomboy. She never thought she could find love. When she met a new boy, she couldn't help but flounce. She felt like a tomboy. When Sara asked for a date, her date said no.
Accident or fate. My cousin came in front of the bus. It had a broken window. He got out of the bus. Then he saw a car in front of him and crashed into it. The bus driver had no choice.
Cable Service. I got a new cable TV. It didn't work very well. I complained to the cable company. They sent someone out to fix the problem. They fixed the problem in 2 days.

Vance Veers Verbose. Vance and a friend were walking along the sidewalk. Suddenly, a cat ran out into the street. The cat made a weird sound with its mouth. The two boys didn't understand what it was. They eventually understood after watching a video about word plays.
Early Race. The early races were starting to stack up. Joe was up to the pack in points. A new runner got the lead and kept the pace up. Joe was caught up and outclassed. Joe won but came in second.

Anniversary Gift. Teddy had never gotten a gift for his girlfriend's birthday. He went to the store. He looked at all the presents, but nothing stood out to him. He decided that he wasn't going to buy anything. He asked his girlfriend if she wanted a gift of any kind.
Las Vegas. I just took a trip to Las Vegas. First I went to the Bellagio. Then I went to Caesar's Palace. Finally I went to the Palms. The highlight of my trip was the Palms.

The Picture. Margo was in a photography class at school. She had a project to submit to the art committee. She decided to pose for a picture. Margo posed in her living room. Her mother was so proud that she gave her a framed art piece!

Lost Voice. Sam had a long lecture to give today. He had to do it over speakerphone so people wouldn't disturb him. He couldn't hear himself even in his car. He couldn't find his voice at all in the car. Luckily the next day someone recorded it and he could hear.

Basketball Superstar. When I was little, I loved to play basketball. I would practice in my garage all the time. I practiced all summer long. At the first basketball game, I scored 35 points. The coach called me an All Star.
Injured. Timmy was running a track race. His foot got caught on the top of the pole. It snapped his ankle. Timmy was carried off the track. He needed eight staples in his ankle.

Jason gets robbed. Jason was walking home from work. Suddenly a man comes up and grabs him. The robber takes Jason's wallet. Jason decides to run away. Jason does not make it home in time to get his wallet back.

The Speech. Joe was giving a speech for his job. The speech was in front of his team and his boss. He talked about what his team would accomplish. He had a good message and his team listened. His boss complimented him on his performance.
Cheese Bandit. I love cheese on crackers. I used to hide it in my crackers. One day I put cheese in my crackers. Then the thief stole my crackers. I never hide cheese again.
New Car. Timmy got a brand new car. It was very fast and expensive. He had lots of fun driving it around town. He showed it off at his new school. It was a great car.

Cute Girl. Sara was at school with a friend. She saw a cute guy sitting with her friends. She asked her mom if he would like to sit with her. Her mom made him come over and sit with her. Sara and the cute guy became friends.
Broken Stove. Ken was hungry. He was eating dinner. But he saw that his stove was broken. He called his friend to bring him food. Ken's friend brought him food.

The Pizza Coupon. Jenny had saved her money from a birthday party. She had a coupon for a large pizza for ten dollars. She decided to use it to eat pizza for free. She ordered two large pizzas. When she got home, she felt sick from all the food.

Snowstorm. Tom's car was making a funny noise. It was snowing heavily and Tom wasn't used to it. He drove really fast around the street. Tom hit several deep snow banks. Tom broke his brakes in the process and couldn't get out of it.
Saying Hello. Sally liked the man next door. She wondered if he was lonely. She talked to him on the phone. She talked to him at length. Sally asked him out on a date.
The Code. Sam wanted to buy a video game. He didn't have the money. He told his mother to tell him the code. The next day she came and told him. Sam had to pay the money for the video game.

The Bar. Billy's friends took him to the bar to watch a movie. They were having a good time drinking and smoking. Billy drank too much and got very hung over. He went home and slept in for two days. Billy had a bad time and his friends had to let him down.
Ice Cream. Candy went to the ice cream parlor to get some ice cream. The line was very long. Candy was getting impatient. She waited a long time. Finally, a woman with her was able to take her order.
Bruce Dog. Bruce had a black dog named Spot. Spot ran away one day. Bruce looked all over for Spot. He found Spot in a garbage can. Bruce found Spot and he and Bruce had a nice time.

Car Lock. Sara's car was locked and she needed to get it unlocked. She called a locksmith and had him come over. The locksmith unlocked the car for Sara. She drove it home and parked it. She returned to her house unlocked, happy with her new car.

Wrong Pizza. Tim bought a new pizza. He brought it home and started eating. He got a bit sick after about an hour. Tim realized it wasn't his pizza. He called the restaurant and they gave him his correct order.

Colin wants ice cream. Colin has always hated ice cream. He thought it tasted too sugary. Colin read a great book about ice cream. Colin learned about the history of ice cream. Now Colin loves ice cream!
DJ. The man started a new business. He wanted to play the trumpet. He bought a trumpet online. He practiced every day at home. Now he plays the trumpet professionally.
French Fries. John and Amy had a date. They went to a french fry restaurant. They each got one and a side of fries. They both complained. The waitress offered to take their money home for dinner.

Clean up duty. Lara had a job as a babysitter. It was her job to clean up the house for her family. She often neglected to clean when she was working. Lara's mother warned her not to clean anymore. Lara ignored her mother and cleaned her house all day.

bank. Anna needed a new bank account. She did not have enough money to open one. She thought about going with a traditional bank. But then she found a website offering free account opening! Anna decided to switch to this online bank account!

Discount. Jim was upset with how much he spent at the grocery store. He decided to take the coupons offered to him. He spent almost all the coupons that were on sale. Jim realized that the coupons were really good value. He was able to lower his grocery bill by taking the coupons.

Break Not Break Up. Kate and her boyfriend broke up a few months ago. She wasn't sure she would see him again, but he'd been fighting. She found a new guy she could go on a date with. When she arrived she was shocked by how nice he was. She was so surprised she wanted to see him again.
A Snack. Kia was really hungry. So she went to a local restaurant. She ordered her favorite burger and fries. She gobbled them up right away. Kia was very full and happy!

Trey's Soup. Trey was making soup for the first time. He boiled the potatoes and cooked them first. Then he added all the ingredients in a big pot. After he stirred in the soup, he added butter and cheese. It all came out very tasty!

Losing a Wallet. I had a bag of groceries in my backpack. When I got to the checkout, I found I had lost my wallet. I had no idea how to find my wallet so I searched everywhere. Eventually I realized I had accidentally taken it to another car. I had to run all the way back home.

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing. Jim was at a carnival. He was playing a game and trying to get a prize. Suddenly, he got attacked by a wolf. It was very large and scary looking. Jim decided to not get any more carnival games.

Jill's Surprise. Jill had not planned to make a cake for her family. But when she turned the oven on, she knew she had to bake a cake. She knew there was no way of getting the cake to brown the way she wanted. She left the oven unattended until it was hot. Jill was surprised when the oven didn't brown the cake like she planned.
Greg's party. Greg's friend was turning 18. He wanted to throw a party. Greg threw a party. His friend got a lot of drunk. Greg's friend apologized to Greg for the party.
Christmas Gift. Tom bought a gift for his brother. The gift was an Xbox. The brother loved the gift. Tom got a bunch of games for the Xbox. His brother was happy.

College advertisement. Alicia had a college ad in the paper. She thought it was so cute and wanted it. As soon as she saw it, she put it up. Alicia saw it was for a nursing program. She was so excited and thought that she would apply.

Home Perm. Sam was going through his old stuff. He'd put his clothes into the washing machine. Then, he'd get some old underwear. Sam thought he would throw the underwear in a box. He forgot all about it.

A Car Baby. Sasha was a new mom. She had just had a baby and didn't have many friends. A friend invited her to come stay with her. She was happy to see her friends but not in the mood to be friends. She was disappointed her mom didn't see that she was just upset.

Slow keyboard. Sara got a new keyboard for Christmas. She thought it would be faster than a mechanical keyboard. But it turned out to be incredibly slow. Sara couldn't even type very fast. So she decided to buy a mechanical keyboard for next time.

Pretty Pictures. Lisa was having a rough day at work. She noticed her coworkers making inappropriate comments. So she made some pretty photos to put on her wall. And all of the comments stopped. Lisa's workday became a lot better.
sky. Ava took a stroll through the park. She had a great view of the city sky. She climbed a tree to get a better view. But the branches were too short! Ava had to climb back down.

Tonight's Supper. I've been working all day and have not had time to eat. I decide to order myself a nice, tasty meal. My wife and I enjoy the meal. We are both full. We are excited to go back home and eat.

Interesting Run. The runners lined up for their meet at the start line. They were eager to begin their race. One of the runners ran underhanded. He was given a red shirt and a pink hat. The other runner laughed and thanked the winner.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana was on the way home from college when she heard about a homeless shelter. She went there and found a bed for two people. After two weeks Jana fell in love with the girl and took her home. Jana and her mom were happy and her mom started a charity. Jana became a regular at the homeless shelter where she felt loved.
Fajitas. Lucy wanted to make Mexican fajitas. She bought all the ingredients. She found that they tasted terrible. She decided to switch the ingredients. She made a new recipe instead.
Earl gets in trouble. Earl is a little boy. Earl is playing with his toys. His toys make a noise. Earl gets in trouble. He gets taken away by his parents.

Train Ride. A man sat down in the train to hear a woman's story. The train began to move forward. The man and the woman talked about their lives and jobs. The woman shared a story of how she met her husband. The man and the woman had an enjoyable train ride.
Sharks at the Aquarium. My brother took me to the aquarium. I watched as the sharks looked at me. They were not afraid of me. The sharks swam around me. Afterwards, they ran out of the aquarium.
Jealousy. My niece has long hair. She wears long, bold, wavy hairdos for a living. She hates to comb it. I told her her hair is her best feature. She became very upset.
The broken arm. Amber was at the pool with friends. She was on a high dive. Suddenly, her hand slipped. She fell right on her wrist. She broke it and was taken to the hospital.

Pepper safety. Jenna is a little girl who loves her peanut butter. She doesn't know that when she eats it, it can make her sick. She found out about peanuts and decided to be safe. Her mom said that it's okay, so she didn't tell her dad. Jenna ate some peanuts and felt better.

Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike was hiking through the woods with his friends. Suddenly, a bear appeared in front of them. Mike was scared but tried to remain calm. Mike's friends continued on to the next trail. Mike made it safely back to the truck.

Baby Passport. Lisa went on vacation. When she got home, she realized she lost her passport. She could not get it back. She asked her family members for help. Lisa got her passport back later that year.

Media Day. Today was the day the school announced its annual media day. I decided to stay home and watch a movie with my sisters. As a joke, we were all dressed up as characters. When the announcement was made, I was the only one that stayed in. Everyone else was in the theater and had fun.

The Ring. Amy found a beautiful ring at a pawn shop. She thought of buying it but didn't have enough money. She tried to find another job to earn the money. Her friend Beth told her she could use the ring as a babysitter. Amy bought a membership at the same pawn shop.

Simple Hunger. I was at a soup kitchen. I didn't have much money and needed food quickly. I ate a lot of soup and bought more. My stomach growled and I realized I had no money left. I left the soup kitchen and walked home.

I'm Sorry, Baby. Gina's mom was supposed to have a new dress for Christmas. When she was ready, she made plans to go shopping. When they got to the mall, she realized she didn't have her phone. She asked her siblings for theirs but none were home. They decided to ask her dad and he came out to her aid.
Hoping for a snow day. Alicia was watching television. The snow had just started overnight. She woke up to find it had snowed more. It was getting dark outside. She was hoping for the worst.

President. Bill was running for president of his class. He told his classmates to vote for him. When the vote was held, everyone voted for Bill. He won by a landslide. Everyone was surprised by the result of the vote.

Visiting Santa. I went to visit my family for Christmas. I went to the mall to shop for presents for the kids. The mall was closing so I went back home. When I got home the presents were waiting for me! I opened them and got lots of presents for the kids.

Bicycles are Fun. Ricky really wanted to learn how to ride a bike. He had his dad help him build him a bike. He spent all weekend training on his bike. Ricky took the bike to the local park. He spent the next few days riding his bike around the park.

Knockout Gas. Tom was driving through the desert on his way to work. He was a little drunk. Tom's car started to fill up with gas. Tom wasn't aware and got a huge blow out. Tom never drove drunk again.

A grade. Ethan was excited about his upcoming test. He needed to get an A for this important test. He started studying the day before the test. When he got to school, his teacher postponed the test. Ethan still got an A.

Creepy Basement. Gina lived in a basement. One night she heard sounds coming from the basement. The basement was being followed. She was scared of the basement. She went into the basement to investigate.

The Mailman. The mailman came over with the mail. A man asked the mailman to deliver the mail to him. The mailman went up to the man and handed him the mail. The man thanked the mailman and the mailman gave him a raise. The man put all the money in the bank and ran away.

Vineyard Blues. Gina had planted vines in her backyard. She put the vines in a vase to fill it with water. She watered them every day. She finally had water in the vase. But Gina was sad to see the vine die.

Cat and Dog. One day the cat ran out the house. He ran into the street and started chasing a dog. The dog and cat didn't see each other. The cat jumped into the street. The cat was struck by a car and died.

Alternative. I went to a school where there was a play. The main character had to be changed. I thought he was a very boring character. I decided to do my own take on him. I learned a lot about character construction and he was great!
Law Breaker. Abe was a tough man. And he always did what he thought was right. But one day, he didn't do the right thing. And he ended up getting in trouble. So he spent a year in prison.
