Mario. Mario decided to learn to skateboard. He found a place where he could practice outside. After a few weeks, Mario had really good skills. He was able to do a lot of cool tricks. Mario is really happy he learned to skateboard.

The Closet. Jude was cleaning his closet. He found a box of old books he no longer wanted. He took them out of the box and gave them to his mother. She thanked him and gave him some books for her birthday. Jude felt really bad about throwing away those books.

The Surprise House. I always had a bad feeling about getting a new house. However, when the time came, I couldn't help but do it. I knew exactly what I wanted, even more so than my dad. I went out and started searching every house I could think of. I found the perfect house, and it was absolutely perfect.
Fair. The family went to the fair together. They had fun at the carnival. At the end of the day they went home. They sat on a log to watch TV. They had a good time.

Hungry. Gina was at her grandma's house with her family. She was hungry so she looked for some food. She opened the fridge and tried to find something. The only thing she could find were her Grandma's old cookies. Gina was sad because she didn't know what to eat them.

Grilled cheese. Karen went to the grocery store to buy some grilled cheese. When she got home she got out a cheese grater and started to grind the cheese. She let the cheese dry out a bit and started to grate. As she was grinding, her dog came running in and started to chomp at it. Karen let go of the cheese and started to clean up the mess.
The Tulips. I planted tulips in my yard. They grew tall and tall. There were so many of them. Eventually, the tulips died. It was a sad day.

The Call. Amy heard a loud noise coming from the school. The sound came from her phone ringing. Amy tried to call back the school. Nothing would ring. Amy walked to the phone and dropped the phone on the floor.

Intern to Director. Alicia wanted to be an actress for her entire life. She applied to several auditions. She auditioned for a film. The director liked her audition and hired her. Alicia started working as an intern for the director.

Boredom. Jenny had a very important exam on Monday. She decided to stay up until midnight studying. When she got to school she was exhausted. She tried to study but her mind was blank. Jenny ended up falling asleep at her desk.

A Day at the Beach. Today I went to the beach. I wanted to have a nice day relaxing and not get sunburned. It started to rain very hard so I stayed at the beach until I felt better. After I felt a little better I went home and rested. My day at the beach was the best ever.
Stomach. My mom told me she felt hungry. I decided to eat some food. It didn't taste good. My mom was disappointed. She apologized and ate it.

Lingering Cramp. Tom was on a bike ride with friends. He had a bit of cramping going on. He decided to lay down and use the cramps as an excuse. Eventually he couldn't keep it any longer. Tom had to get off his bike and go home.

The Bonfire. When I was a child I was camping with my cousins. We made a fire on our dirt campsite. I was afraid my mother would catch me using this fire. When she found out she took it away from me. I never made the bonfire again.

Shin. Irene was working in her garden. She found some small pebbles that looked like rocks. She picked them up. Then she saw that the pebbles had a strange shape. The shape looked like a human's shin!

Out of battery. Kelly was in a hurry to get to work. She got to work and realized her phone was out of power. She immediately went to get more. It didn't have any batteries so she had to go all the way home. Luckily she was able to get home just in time.

Raging Rivers. The river was roaring from the current. The river was carrying lots of sediment. The sediment washed downstream. The river slowly began to lower. The sediment was carried downstream by the current.

The Broken Pot. Sean was boiling some beans. He was getting distracted with other things. Suddenly he remembered his pot had broken. It was the only thing he'd had left. Sean had to fix the pot before he could cook.

Aliens. Tom thought aliens were coming to earth. He gathered a lot of tin foil and plastic bags. Tom's friends didn't believe in aliens. Tom invited them over for a talk. Tom convinced everyone they were being silly.

The Fender Bender. Larry's truck was making a loud noise. He looked to see what the problem was. He checked the hood and found a headlight stuck. Larry called his friends over to come and fix it. He was so relieved to have his truck stop making a lot of noise again.
First dibs. Today I got some lunch for the family. My daughter took me first. I decided to get the shrimp. She really liked it. She took a bite right away.

Losing the mail. I dropped off the mail one day. I got a bad feeling that it had been stolen. I looked all over the house for it. I finally found it under the couch. I returned it the next day and got my mail back.

Gerry. Gerry went to visit his grandfather who lived in the woods. His grandfather was very old and sick. He could not speak and he had no family left. Gerry was sad, but his grandfather died peacefully. Gerry was very proud that he visited his grandfather.
The Coming Out. Julie was not comfortable with her family's lifestyle. She started to tell them she was gay. At first they were shocked. Eventually they supported her. Julie felt relieved and loved.

Runny Makeup. Ally woke up late for school one morning. She was so tired from work. When she realized her makeup wasn't fully applied she ran to the bathroom. She tried her best to finish but it was way too late. She had to run to the bathroom again.

The Promotion. I have been working at the same firm for five years. One day a coworker asked me for advice on getting a promotion. I told her I knew everything she was doing and that she should. She was happy I told her what I knew. She is now promoted above me!

Charlene the Song Bird. I once wrote a song for a man that had an album release. I had to go to a store and purchase the album. I was nervous about writing the song in the middle of the road. The album had music on the inside, and the lyrics on the outside. It was the best album I've ever listened to.
Heart Attack. Tom was having a bad day. He went to the doctor. He had a test done. They told him he had a heart attack. Tom was in a lot of pain and went home.

ice cubes. Ed's mom brought him some ice cubes. She asked Ed if he wanted to see what they were. The ice cubes were cubes of water. Ed thought that was a strange request. Ed's mom smiled and said she would give him one when he was ready.

Struck. Gina was driving home from the movies. A car in front of her sped up and cut her off. She tried to keep her eyes open, but she lost track of time. The car hit a tree behind her and her car slid down the trunk. Gina was relieved when the driver took the other car's insurance.
The Anime. Sandy wanted to watch anime. She did not know which one to choose. She decided to watch Cowboy Bebop. She was very confused the whole time. She decided to just watch Cowboy Bebop instead.

Oliver's Birthday. It was Oliver's birthday and his mother was throwing a party. Oliver was really excited. He wanted to see his favorite video games. Oliver was playing with his friends at home. Oliver's mother had forgotten his birthday, though.

The Lightning Storm. Tina was driving in a dark parking lot. Suddenly a large storm came across the lot. The lightning bolts hit the car next to hers. Tina decided to pull over to the side of the lot. There was a long pause before the car was able to move.
Fleas. I was bitten by fleas yesterday. They all jumped all over me. I couldn't get rid of them all. I decided to clean them off. The fleas are gone now.

England. I was on the last leg of a five year trip to England. The first few months we saw the sights. Then we got settled in and took our time exploring. We went to Buckingham Palace and Buckingham Castle. We really loved our time in England.

Camping Trip. Lacy was excited to spend her summer camping. When she got there it began to snow and the campsite was dark. Lacy and her friends decided to make flashlights to light up the place. When it started snowing the girls made the flashlights. They were able to light up the camping place and keep warm.

Fast Playing. I got a new PS4 and wanted to play a game on it. The game I wanted to play was the newest one. When I went to the store I bought the game and tried it out. When I got home I installed the game and started playing. I got really good and played the game all day.

The Contest. Janice was taking a math test. A friend offered to help with the contest. He told her if she got an A in the test she could help. Janice did the test and got an A in the contest. She got to reward her friend who helped her a lot.
Heavy rainstorm. Yesterday was really heavy rain. We had a storm. The rain was crazy. We got a lot of mud. We had a lot of problems getting home.

Home Work. I was a little lazy as a child. I took my clothes off to the closet and didn't wear them. The clothes stayed in the closet for 2 weeks. When the clothes were folded they had holes in them. I was late to work and everyone laughed at me.

Sea Turtle. My brother loves to fish. He went down to the river yesterday and caught a sea turtle. He took it home and put it on display. His brother took pictures of it and put them on his Facebook page. It was a great day.

Dinner. Maggie went to her friend Beth's house for dinner. Maggie got to know all of her friend's family. She was sad when her friend told her the family was getting divorced. She had always wanted to go to her friend's house to have dinner. She was happy to visit and catch up with her old friends.
The Vest. Tom bought a gift for his girlfriend. It was a little vest. Tom put it on for her at her birthday party. Afterwards she asked him why he didn't just buy her one. He just had a lot of fun.
Baking a Cake. I was going to make a cake. I had no eggs. I decided to just leave it out and hope for the best. It came out looking great! I was surprised it was still good after all.
Dentist. Tom was scared to go to the dentist. He figured it wouldn't be bad. Unfortunately he got an infection. Tom had to be put under. He had to have it fixed.

Regrets. I was playing in a videogame with my friend and I. I was running along a path with no obstacles. All of a sudden I saw a giant rock in the way. I didn't move a muscle and kept walking. I eventually died in that game.

The Shower. The kids were going to shower. They had no clean clothes to wear. They didn't know what to wear. The moms told them to just wear whatever they wanted. The kids agreed to wear whatever they wanted.

Mugged. My friend Ben went to the casino yesterday. While he was there, two hoodlums approached him. One of the hoodlums stole his money. When he asked his friend to call the police, Ben did not. Ben called the police but they had to wait until the next day.

Protest. John was on his way home from work one day. He noticed a cop car in his mirror. He pulled over and got out to ask for his license and registration. The cop told John that he had been pulled over for speeding. John was shocked and thanked the cop for the information.

Carson Wins the Game!. Carson was playing poker with friends. He was losing the hand and could not recover. He decided to fold. His friends laughed at him and told him he should've folded. Carson was crushed that he lost the game.

Late Flight. I had a flight out of town. When I got to the airport they were giving out late flights. I had to check my bags and I was late to my flight. The next morning I missed my flight and had to reschedule. I didn't mind because I knew they would be nice.
The GoldFish. Sarah got a goldfish. She brought the fish to her dad's room. She put a bowl over the bowl. She put her hands inside the bowl. The bowl stayed over the bowl.

Rose and Her Rose. Rose was a very pretty rose bush. She had a yellow rose inside of it. She didn't like to share her rose with anyone. One day, a boy tried to steal her rose. Rose chased the boy off, but she couldn't catch him.
Desert Journey. Candy loved traveling. Her family took a trip to the desert. They ate all the food and drank lots of water. They were exhausted and went home. Candy couldn't wait to go again.

Molly's Beau. Molly's brother always wanted to have a dog of his own. One day, Molly's brother brought home a new puppy. The new puppy was even dumber than Molly's old dog, Beau! She was very disappointed, and thought that Beau would never be her dog. But, soon after her brother took home Beau, Molly's brother adopted him!
Race. Jenna wanted to run in a race. She got the training wheels off. Then she got in a car. She drove to the park. Jenna ran the whole race.
The Scissors. Ava was working on her paper. She was making a stack of scissors. She was going to cut through her paper. She accidentally cut her finger instead. Ava's teacher was furious.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom wanted to play videogames with his friends. Tom's friend suggested getting a mechanical keyboard. Tom went to the store and purchased one. Tom started playing with the mechanical keyboard. Tom's friend complimented him on how great he was.

Movies. Kara wanted to see the new movie Star Wars. She asked her mom if she could go. Her mom said yes, but they would have to make sure she's awake! When they got to the theater, Kara was too tired. Her mom took her home so she could watch movies at home.
FB Affair. Tom was having an affair with his girlfriend. She got suspicious and confronted him. Tom denied it. She found some evidence and confronted him. Tom was caught red-handed and grounded.
Sinking Boat. Billy's dad took him to the beach. He went swimming. He went to the deep end of the ocean. Billy jumped in. He swam away from the ocean and back to shore.
The Man with the Cane. There was a man with a cane. He always gave his cane to people with trouble. One day, the cane was stolen. The police investigated the theft. The man had to get a new cane.

Girl Scout Cookies. Amy was a girl scout scout. She was out selling cookies. She was selling a dozen cookies. Amy lost track of time and her cookies ran out. Her troop was sad she had to buy a new batch.
Car accident. Lucy is driving to work. All of a sudden she is swerved. Her car is sliding across the road. Luckily she isn't hurt. She decided she will pay more attention from now on.

The Turkey Leg. Trey had a lot of Thanksgiving traditions. He always cooked the turkey for dinner. This year, he was cooking on a new recipe. He wasn't quite sure how it would turn out. When he tasted it he had forgotten all about the traditional Turkey Leg.

A lost wheel. Linda was on her way to a job interview. As she drove, she started getting very nervous. Suddenly, she heard a loud noise. Her car started to veer off the road. She was unable to get it back on the right track.

Cavities Galore. Bob always had cavities. He was at his dentist's office one day. Bob had one more visit to get them checked. The dentist found more cavities than he had before. Bob had to get 12 cavities fixed by the dentist.

The Proposal. Tom had been dating Sarah for several years. Sarah was excited for her birthday and Tom wanted a gift. Tom decided to surprise her with a romantic dinner. They sat at a nice restaurant and had a nice meal. Sarah was very happy and told Tom she loved him.

Exchange. Mary's mom and dad are Chinese, and they came to America for a visit. At first Mary didn't know they were taking a school trip. Then her mom and dad talked about the differences. At the end of the visit, they agreed to send Mary to China. The two women exchanged things and made plans to meet again.
Secret Smoker. Tom wanted to become a smoker. He bought an oil burner online. Tom used the burner everyday. Eventually, Tom forgot about it. Tom's friend found the oil burner.

Down the Stairs. My neighbor came by to see what was the matter. She had a bad cough and was wheezing heavily. I took her upstairs and helped her breathe. I put the dog in the front yard and let her down the stairs. I went to the store and bought a few things to make her feel better.

Spaghetti. Tom was watching a movie at his favorite restaurant. He had a craving for spaghetti. He looked in his refrigerator to see what was on sale. He decided to go to the store and buy some sauce. He was excited to eat spaghetti for dinner.
The Track Meet. Mark was a track star. He ran a mile every day. He had a big race coming up. He was nervous about it. He did great and won by a mile.

Used Books Suck. Jane was at the library with her mom. The librarian was showing Jane a few books that she had. She had no idea what Jane was reading so Jane looked for a description. She found out that it was a novel but was not sure how old it was. Jane was annoyed because the book had been used too many times and was ugly.

The Burger. Sandra decided to make a burger. She decided to make a chicken burger. Unfortunately, the chicken turned out too tough. Sandra had to add more ground beef. She ended up with a very juicy burger.

The Accidental Crime. Dan was a very honest and ethical person. One day, Dan found a wallet on the ground. Dan knew that it was valuable and had the money to buy it. When Dan called the police, they informed him that he was a criminal. Dan decided to have a lawyer handle the matter.

Making Music. One day I was walking home from school. A girl in my class asked me if I would like to make her some music. I gave her some chords, and she asked for my opinion on it. I told her I was not an expert at music, but I would give it a try. I then made her some great tunes that she was able to enjoy.

System Failure. I have a high school computer that is connected to the internet via a cable. I have heard stories that the internet has a failure on occasion. I tried to update the system on my computer the other day. The system update gave me an error message. I was then able to use the internet again.

Trick or Treat. Billy was a very naughty boy. He loved to get the candy from trick or treatingers. When he got a bunch, he went to the candy store. He got more and more until he had all of the candy. He took it all to the park with him.

Football. I got picked to play quarterback for my high school football team. I practiced hard all summer. In the fall, I tried out for the team anyway. I gave it my best effort and scored the highest number of touchdowns. I was so excited to hear that I practiced even harder next year!

A Wild Zebra Attack. Marlene had a favorite stuffed zebra. He wore the zebra costume to school as part of the school's Halloween event. Marlene was walking home from school when a wild zebra appeared. Marlene screamed and the zebra charged at her. Marlene and the zebra ran into the school building, avoiding the principal.

Food. My friend Tim was a chef for years. One day he decided he wanted to open his own restaurant. Tim searched for local chefs to work with. They told him it was too hard to hire people. Tim decided to hire his chef friends instead.

Walking in the store. I went to the grocery store today. I walked in a different store than usual. The front desk person didn't know me and didn't see me. He was very nice. Now I know who is in the store with me.

Busted Pipe. Tom was at home watching TV. He heard a loud noise coming from the kitchen. He checked the pipes and saw that they were busted. He called the plumber right away. The plumber fixed the pipes and Tom was happy.
Justin's Job. Justin needed a job. His wife didn't have a job. He decided to ask his mom. His mom said yes. Justin started his first job a few weeks later.

Like father like son. Dani and her husband always watched their son play. The son would often go out and play without Dani's knowledge. Dani's husband was tired of waiting for the son to return from school. Dani's husband convinced Dani that his son wasn't good enough for work. Dani did the right thing and took her son to his school.
Bad Weather. Tom had been up all night. The weather forecast had called for rain. It was too dark outside to see clearly. Tom decided to stay put. His girlfriend didn't mind.

Marty's Roach Problem. Marty was home with his toddler when he noticed a problem. His toddler's bathroom was infested with roaches. Marty went to the store to buy bug spray. Marty sprayed the entire house with the spray. Marty's daughter no longer had any problems with roaches.

Making chili. I decided to make chili. Alas, I was out of chili powder. I decided to make some from scratch. I used canned beans from my pantry. Alas, I forgot to season the beans before adding to the chili.

First Snowfall. Gina wanted to learn how to drive. She asked her older brother to teach her how. When she got home her brother was waiting. He taught her how to drive the snowmobile. It was snowing so she could not use the snowmobile.

Gas pump. I went to the gas station to get gas one day. I bought some stuff to fill a pump. When I got back home I tried to start the pump. I pressed the on button too long. The fuel began to leak out of the fuel line.

The Playdate. Gina and her cousin Mary were having a play date. They liked each other a lot. Gina and Mary had their favorite candy. But neither of them could decide what they wanted for candy. They decided to play a game, and each pick one candy.

New Shirt. Sam's shirt ripped in the washing machine. He decided he needed to buy a new one. He shopped around until he found a good pair. Sam bought the nice shirt and was excited to wear it out. Sam's new shirt was great.
Last Minute. Tim was in a hurry. Tim forgot to pay for his favorite drink. Tim left the bar with no money. Tim made the best drink for himself. It tasted delicious and made Tim's day.

Tired. Tim's car died on him one night. He was on his way home from work. He got a call from his parents that he was coming home. He drove there and waited. His parents were there and they took him home.

Delivery Mistake. I ordered a frozen pizza online. When the pizza came I tried to open the package. Since the package was hot, I got burned. I contacted them and they gave me a replacement. I received the hot pizza and enjoyed it.

Peapod. I downloaded Peapod to check the weather before my trip. I opened it and it showed me there was snow all the way to Chicago. I checked the forecast and decided not to go. I was worried the weather might be worse. When I got home I found the app had given me a notification.

Game. Tom's son wanted to play the board game Monopoly. Tom was not very good at it. He agreed to teach his son the rules. Tom watched his son play the game over and over. Tom's son learned to play Monopoly very well!

March. Sally was very excited to be in a march. She marched in the parade for about five miles. When it was time to go home she was very tired. She had such a good time. She was glad she had marched in a march.

Angry. Shelly went out of her way to make a good impression. She sat down and wrote her first speech. She tried to keep it as brief as possible. To her surprise, the class was quiet. She ended up missing her speech completely.

Food Sale. I bought a few bags of chips from the vending machine. I went out to the car to get some money. The driver took the chips to the curb. I put the chips in my car and drove home. My friend and I each got $5 for our chips.

off the beach. My wife and I took our daughter to the beach yesterday. She was feeling a little sun burnt. So we stopped at a gas station. She bought some sunscreen and applied it on. After she left, we left and she did not get sunburned.

Loud Music. Sammy's parents didn't let him listen to his music. He was going through an argument with his mom over it. The whole family was in the living room. His mother asked him to turn the music off. Sammy listened to the music without argument and enjoyed it.

No Knife. The teacher gave us instructions to help us start the exam. We began to work in the classroom with our new tools. After 20 minutes, the class took a break. However, the teacher noticed that all of our knives were missing. He took all of our knives away from the classroom.

Lexie brings breakfast. Lexie needed to get breakfast for work. She checked her fridge and realized she was out of eggs. Lexie looked online for other options. She settled on pancakes and waffles. Lexie was happy to have breakfast for work.

Vegetables. I've never eaten a vegetable before. I saw some recipes online that were green bean and kale. I looked up recipes that were green beans and cauliflower. I decided to make some. I loved the taste and I was happy with how they turned out.

Grocery store. Yesterday I went to the grocery store. I forgot my wallet at home so I walked everywhere. I had to search for my wallet. Eventually I found my wallet in the checkout line. I payed and went home.

Store Clerk. The store clerk was not a good person to work for. The customers always complained about her rude behavior. The customers refused to go to her stores. One of the customers took her to court and won the case. Now the clerk gets to keep her job.

Revenge. Gina had been watching the new trailer for a while. She was upset the new trailer had a lot of violence. She wasn't sure if she could watch it again. But she saw it on the TV and wanted to watch it. It was just a trailer and Gina was bored anyways.
The Book Fee. Timmy loved books. He asked his dad for a book. His dad said he could have one if he paid him off. Timmy promised to pay him back. His dad took him to the library to get his book.

Baseball Fever. Billy was at the park with his dad. He was watching the game when his dad handed him a bat. The ball hit Billy's foot and he got sick from the pain. His dad took him to the doctor and he was given some medicine. Billy got better in a few days and the ball was his again.

Climbing. Joe was going to work. He wanted to get into a better workout routine. He decided to climb a mountain. He tried many different routes but failed at a certain route. After he failed, he realized he needed to work harder.

A sad day. I left work one morning and saw that my dog had died. I was heartbroken and didn't know what to do. I went home and got in the car. I went to my sister's house and we buried her. That was the saddest day I ever had.
Camping. Timmy went to camp with his friends. He saw a beautiful girl there. Timmy took his girlfriend out camping. They had a great time together. Timmy's girlfriend was attracted to Timmy.
New Running Shoes. Liz needed new running shoes. She knew she had to buy new ones. Liz looked everywhere for the perfect pair. She could not find them in her size. She finally found the perfect pair.

Reuniting. Jim was moving to a new city. He was nervous about not knowing anybody. When he got to school, he made several friends. Jim soon became best friends with them. Soon, Jim and his friends became great friends.
Owner. Jill had a dog. The dog was named Oliver. Jill put Oliver outside every night. Oliver didn't go outside, but Jill was upset. Oliver went outside and was chased by a dog by itself.

Tech Troubles. Lara worked in a large office with a lot of technology. She had tried to be more tech-friendly during the day. Eventually people began complaining about lag and other issues. Her boss was understanding but she wasn't happy. Eventually she had to quit her tech job.

Salad. Amy was hungry. She went to the grocery store to buy some food. When she went to pick up her items she forgot her wallet. When she got back to her car the salad was gone. She was very upset and she drove back home.

Math Mastery. I am a very good math person. However, I can only remember half of what I learned in class. I have a difficult time remembering the next part. I try to think of new ways to keep track of the information. I use a sheet of paper and a pencil to help me remember the next part.
Softball. The kids had never played softball before. They were all excited to play. At first it was quite difficult. They learned a few new plays and got better. The kids loved the sport.

Karen's Trip. Karen wanted to take a vacation. She researched what she could do for her vacation. She read many books about local history. She looked through her social media accounts. Karen had a great time on her trip to Costa Rica.

Ants. A few weeks ago I noticed some weird sounds coming from the kitchen. I looked up what was going on and found out I had ants. They were biting my legs and arms. They weren't really biting, but they hurt so bad I had to go to the emergency room. They were given antibiotics and now the ants are gone.

Louis Breaks Down. Louis is driving to work one day. He hears a noise coming from his car. Louis pulls over to the side of the road. Louis looks around and see's a nail in his tire. Louis calls triple A to make it to work on time.
Cream. I needed to get some cream. I went to the store to get some cream. I bought some cream. I got home and started using it. I loved the cream.

Quentin Cleans House. Quentin realizes his house is very messy. He decides to clean the entire house. At first he finds it very hard. Finally he finishes cleaning the entire house. Quentin is happy to have clean house.
Fighting Neighbors. My parents called my mom. She wanted to talk to my little cousin. She asked her to come to the park. When my cousin showed up, he began to yell at her. She ended up walking away.

Good Neighbors. I used to go to my neighbor's house when I was younger. I always had a lot of fun seeing them laughing and talking. They did not have much to do today though. So I was very disappointed. I will not be going to that house again.

The Conference. John was in charge of a large conference. He took the day off to take care of some personal business. He was so busy he hadn't seen his own company at all. The conference started and John realized that he wasn't there at all. When he got there, he realized that he had been fired by mistake.

Janice's First Day. Janice just turned twelve. It was her first day at school and she was nervous. The first day was great because no one bullied her. Janice made friends quickly. She can't wait to come back next week.
Hungry. I woke up today and was starving. I checked my fridge and found nothing. I went to the kitchen to get some food. I grabbed a sandwich from the refrigerator. I sat down and ate.

Pizza Pie. Jane was making a pizza pie. She mixed all of the ingredients together. Then, she placed it in the oven to bake. As soon as it was finished, she took a slice. Jane enjoyed her delicious pie!

Closer Desk. Gina's grandma was moving to a new apartment. The new desk was not much smaller than her old one. It was only 7" wide by 4" tall. Gina was worried it would be difficult to move. Her grandma had used a different desk before so it was easy to move.

Work. Tom was working for the first time at his new job. He had to get some work done quickly. Tom did not know what to do on his own. He decided to ask his friend what to do. His friend gave him some great advice that helped him quickly.

Leg Press. My friend Dan and I started to play football. We played football in a yard with the grass. Dan decided to try to lift a box over a fence. Dan lifted the box over the fence. Dan hurt his leg and had to stop playing football.

Lactose. Molly was lactose intolerant. She couldn't drink milk that was dairy-based. Her roommate would always force her to drink it. One day Molly decided to just drink water and go without milk. She now enjoys her water and not her milkshake.
Animal safari fun. Fred decided to go on an animal safari. he loved the safari. he was enjoying every minute of it. he got to meet many different types of animals. he decided he would do it again.
Oven shopping. Sam decided to take his wife shopping. He went to the store and asked for bread. He bought a loaf. Sam brought the bread home. His wife said that she didn't like bread and she ate it.

Door Handle Disaster!. Kia had installed a brand new door handle. It had a huge rubber ball on the bottom. She had trouble pushing it up with her fingers. She tried to use a small rubber band as a lever to get it up. She ended up getting the door handle stuck and ruined.

My niece. My niece was born in January. My nephew got her in August. She started to cry at birth. It turns out she could not get out of her birth mom's arms. My nephew did not cry because he is an adult.

Cancer. Mary was a very pretty girl. She thought she'd never get cancer. One day she was diagnosed with bone cancer. Her family was very worried about her. Sadly, Mary had cancer and passed away a few months later.
Baby. Our cat loves to take naps in our bed. She snuggles with us at night. She snuggles in the morning. We put up a special napping spot under our bed. Our cat now sleeps under our bed.

Transit Photos. There is a transit blog at a transit museum. They take photos of various buses and trolleys. I like the shots of old buses. Last week, they published a photo of a trolley. I was delighted.
New Leg. Tim loved gymnastics. He practiced daily. On one day he tripped and fell. His knee was broken. Tim could no longer do gymnastics.

Hepatitis A outbreak. Sally is the mother of 5 kids. She has been getting sick and is sick at school. Her kids had an outdoor basketball game. The kids played for hours. Sally got sick from the food and could not go to the game.

Robbery. One day, a bank was broken into and many cash was taken. The police were called, but nobody was injured. The teller of the bank was a good citizen. The police did not tell the whole town about the break in. The people were upset about this, and a bank was robbed.

Hack. The boy liked to hack computers. His parents told him he needed to stop. One day he broke one by messing up a few keystrokes. His parents then made him turn his hobby into a job. Now the boy is very careful about what he does with his hands.

The Heat. It was a hot summer day. Mary wanted to cool down. She got in her car and drove to a cool park. Mary sat by the pool and watched the water cool down. She felt refreshed and took in the refreshing heat.

Cereal and Milk. Jill was running late. Her cereal and milk were getting low. Her boyfriend picked her up and she quickly got home. He went out to the store to get more cereal. Jill had trouble getting her cereal and milk.
Old shirt. Susie loved her new red shirt. She wore it out one night. Unfortunately it got stained. It was ruined. Susie was so sad.
Tantrum. Tom was really drunk. His wife told him to go home. She told him to not drive. He drove to a friend's house. Tom then threw a tantrum there.
Gymnastics. Julia was learning gymnastics. She was very good at it. She practiced with her dad everyday. She finally got to the Olympics. She was so proud of herself!

Mike's Dream. Mike wanted to be a police officer. He went to school for it, and graduated from school. Mike got a job at the local police station. The job gave him all the money he needed to be a cop. Mike is now a policeman, and he loves it.
school id. Lola had been to so many different schools. She was sick of them and wanted out. Lola found a school she really liked. She made an account and signed in. She was finally ready to go!

Float Plane. Dan was learning how to fly. He strapped on his parachute and waited for his instructor. His instructor showed him where to deploy the wings. Dan saw that the wings had trouble opening. He knew he would not fly with wings in a real plane.

Jane Moves Out. Jane was a very successful manager at a law firm. Her boss announced a mid-year layoffs. Jane was very sad and she was thinking about her future. She decided to move out of the office and start her own firm. Jane is happy that her boss is moving out.

Visiting. My family was staying at my uncle's house. We were visiting the lake house. My aunt brought her baby. I was watching him while his mother fed him. When he was eating, his mother told him to spit out the food.
Old Friends. Gina's mother and brother moved out of town. Now she had to spend time with them. Gina felt more alone. She went to a friend's house. They played video games for two hours.
The Pork Dinner. Timmy hated pork. He always thought it was gross. Finally, his mom made him a pork dinner. Timmy ate it all up quickly. He now knew pork was gross.

John burns the biscuits. John is cooking biscuits. He starts to put them in the toaster. He forgets about the toaster. He forgets about the biscuits. John forgets about the biscuits and burns the toaster.

Scrapbooking. Nita was collecting old photos. She would take them to the scrapbooking ground near her home. She would try to make them look as good as possible. Some of her favorites would become even more prized. Nita loved the memories she made from the scrapbooking ground.
Facetime. I got in a fight in our new home. The family member with autism kept saying hi. I told him to go away. He refused to do so. My wife and I ended up yelling at each other.
Stuffed Animal. Sue was in the grocery store. She saw a bunch of treats. Sue picked out a stuffed animal. She was very happy about the purchase. Sue took it home and kept it as a family member.

The Weird Deer. The deer ran through the field at full speed. A car was trying to overtake it when it ran into the ditch. The deer was able to climb out of the ditch and walk home. The owner chased it for awhile until the deer finally went home. The deer was so excited and curious and it never stopped running.

Ventilation. Tim was playing basketball. The ball came into his house. The ball made a loud noise. He opened the windows and the ball stayed in the air. Tim never got another ball from that house again.
Hair. The man combed his hair. It looked bad. He decided to bleach it. It made his hair look much better. The next time, he would bleach his hair.

A Job At 14. Molly had recently turned 15 years old. Molly wanted to find a good job for her growing up. She contacted a local high school recruiter to help her find a job. Her first interview was with a local high school. Molly got the job of her dreams with the high school recruiter.

Spaghetti. Anna had a hard time making spaghetti. She tried to go to the grocery store to buy the ingredients. But she ran out of spaghetti sauce! She called her mom. Her mom brought her spaghetti and they both made it together!

Gravy Boat. The family rented a motorboat for the summer. They spent many weeks out on the lake. They ate lots of seafood. They also swam a lot in the water. They all had so much fun they decided to make it a regular event.
Wetting the Bed. Ken's bed was wet. It would stay wet for days at a time. Ken bought a new bed pad. It was a cheap plastic pad with a hole in the bottom. Ken was able to dry his bed.

Interview with Strange Man. Brett was walking down the street. He saw a man with large glasses and a pony tail. The man looked angry and pointed a gun at Brett. Brett called the police. The man was arrested and Brett felt foolish.
The Jack O'Lantern. There were children playing outside. One of them threw a small rock. It hit the jack o'lantern. The jack o'lantern lit up. The kids cheered and started to sing.
Tea Time. Rosa and Ted were having tea together. Rosa was too tired to keep talking. Ted was too sleepy to keep talking. Finally, Rosa had had enough. She made a cup of tea for Ted.
Loan Shark. Benny was desperate to buy a new bike. He found a loan shark in the market. He made a small down payment. He was able to buy the bike. It cost him a lot less because of the loan shark.

A Flat Tire. Barry was driving to work one morning. He had forgotten to put on his belt. He put on his knee pads but it didn't protect him. Barry was in a lot of pain and almost passed out. Luckily, Barry's coworker gave him his spare key and a lift.

Teacher. Bill wanted to be a teacher when he grew up. So when he grew up he went to college and got a degree. He worked hard in school and graduated. He was able to work with kids and give them a great education. After working with kids he realized that teaching was his true calling.

Skiing Black. Ivan and his friends were on a ski trip in Colorado. It was snowing and freezing in their ski area. The weather was bad enough to make them miss a big ski area. They decided to skip the ski area and head to the river. A strong current pulled Ivan and his friends out of the river.

A Stolen Coat. Julie decided to dress as Elsa for Halloween. She tried on all of the costumes she bought. She was surprised to find that she left her coat at home. She was so embarrassed about the coat that she ran home to change. Once she got to the store she gave up and bought another coat.

Acoustic Guitar. I went to an acoustical music festival. While I was there, a friend invited me to play his guitar. At first, I was reluctant to play. I was so tired when he asked me to play. After playing for a while, I became more comfortable and happy.

Dream to Reality. Diane's dad had been laid off from his job. He had been sick for a while and had been unable to work. Diane decided to apply for a job he had been offered. Her resume was filled with work for someone else at the office. She was told by the hiring manager that the man was no longer available.
Helpful. I was in a hurry. My parents called my mom for help. They called her when she was at the store. She drove right past me. It was a good thing I helped.

Making potato chips. Lucy wanted to make potato chips. She went to the kitchen to get the ingredients. As she was mixing the ingredients, she knocked her cup over. Lucy began to cry. After she cleaned up the mess, she was able to make her chips.

A New Friend. Kaya had a pet snake. One day, Kaya's friend brought her a new snake. Kaya's snake began to act aggressively towards her. She was so shocked, she immediately put the snake in a box. Now, Kaya is much more careful about who she lets around her snake.

Money is no good. Bill wanted to make money. He decided to get a part time job. He went door to door on the weekends. After a while his first batch of clients paid him a lot of money. He quit his part time job and got full time work.

Skipping Lunch. Sally was late for work. She walked to her car to begin her drive. Her stomach growled loudly. As she stopped to eat her sandwich she started to feel sick. Sally decided she would not eat her lunch that day.

Shaving. Gina was on her way home from work. But the roads were closed due to a storm. She was hoping to get home before dark. When she got to her house it was dark. Gina was surprised by how dark it was.

Irony. Tim wanted to look good for his wedding. He tried to dress the part but it didn't look right. He tried to do his best but it just didn't look right. His friends didn't seem to mind though because they loved it. Tim was happy that he looked good in the end.

Wine Taster. Barry always had a crush on a pretty girl named Julie. Julie went out with Barry to a wine tasting event. Barry drank all the wines at the event, tasting many different wines. Barry found out Julie loves Pinot Noir. He proposed to Julie that night at dinner.
Hill. Ben took out his chair. He went to the back of his desk. He sat down on the bench. He took out the last book he had and read. Ben left the library satisfied.

Beating the Rain Home. It had just rained outside. Dana and her family were playing outside. A huge rain storm started rolling in. Dana's family ran inside to take cover. Dana's family had to wait in the rain for 20 minutes.

Pizza party fun. Susie was having a pizza party with friends. When she got there, she saw all of her friends. Susie was disappointed when no one showed up. Susie then decided to have fun and make up a joke. She was surprised when her friends all laughed.

The Lost Contacts. Ava lost her favorite contacts. She looked everywhere for them. The bus was coming and she needed to be on time. Finally, she checked behind her desk. There, she had found her old contacts!

Messina. Messina always thought she was the best cook in her family. One day a local competition judge noticed her skills. Messina won first place. She then was offered the chance to compete in a local cooking competition. Messina took the offer and became a world famous chef.

Match. Gina's friend Mary wanted to see her crush Jamie. Gina wanted to be cool and go with Mary. She had never had her eyes on Jamie before. But she was nervous and went to meet Mary. Gina ended up falling in love with Jamie.

New Appliances. Gina's parents were out shopping. And she didn't have much money. She needed new furniture but didn't have much money. But she was offered a few thousand dollars by her mother. Gina decided to keep it for herself.

Changing routine. I had been getting into shape recently. My routine had been to go to the gym everyday for about an hour. I thought it was all I needed to do to get in shape. Yet, my new running routine left me feeling sick. It turned out to be too much for me to handle.

New Puppy. Cara wanted a puppy for her birthday. Her parents promised they'd get her one for her birthday. But on her birthday, they didn't get her a puppy. Cara was disappointed and angry. She still thought they'd get her one for Christmas, though!

Flooded Street. There was a large rain storm. The streets were flooding. I was driving down the street when it started to rain hard. Traffic was backed up for miles. I decided to stay home and watch television.

Cardiac Arrest. I was watching tv when a man passed away. The news said his heart was racing. I was very worried, but I did not go to the hospital. I felt my chest start to hurt. Then, I realized that my tv monitor was on.
Fishing trip. Bob went fishing. He brought his fishing pole. He went to the lake. He fished all day. He went home.

Late getting home. My wife had to work late today. She got home at eight o'clock. She went to the bathroom and changed her clothes. When she got back in the house, her husband was waiting. He had called her a lazy bum.

The Garden. One day I went out in the garden with some flowers. I didn't know they were poisonous so I didn't tell anyone. A bee was flying around the garden and stung me. The bee stung me really bad and I was in a lot of pain. Now I wear a bee-net when I go outside.
Vegas. Kelli went on a vacation to Vegas. She went on a lot of fun activities. The most fun she had was the pool. She had never been in a pool before. It was relaxing and beautiful.

Sunrise. Today I set out the alarm clock to get up for work. When I hit the snooze button, nothing happened. I realized it was the wrong time. I checked the calendar and saw that it was June, not June Sunrise. I set the alarm clock to get up at 6:00 am.
Basket. Dee was selling baskets. She only had a small shop. She decided to sell baskets to her neighbors. She sold 20 baskets in three days. She made more than enough to pay her bills.
The Poker Game. The boys were bored. They decided to play a game. They decided to bet all their money on a hand of poker. They lost the game. They decided to play video games instead.

Shopping with Bill. Bill had just come home from work and was now looking for some groceries. Bill began to head down to his local grocery store. Bill tried many of the items on sale in his cart. However, he noticed that his credit card was declined! Bill had to go home and call up his credit card company.
Tires. Ned bought new tires. He was nervous but tried them on. His fear turned out to be false. The tires worked perfectly. Ned bought a new set!

Lost ring. Ava lost her favorite ring. She had searched everywhere for it. She finally looked up where she had been sleeping. The ring was missing. Ava realized she had been asleep while it was in her hand!
Looking for a dog. Jill was at the store looking for a puppy. She saw a little black and white dog. Jill approached the dog and petted it. The dog seemed very happy. Jill named the dog Henry.

Older Child. Amy had three older siblings. She was not good at reading and needed help. She decided to ask her mom to help with her reading. Amy's mom gave her books to read and gave her some tips. Amy now reads better than all of her siblings combined.
Cable Issues. Lenny was using his computer. He received an error message. He called the cable company. They told him there was an outage and told him to wait. Lenny waited for the next 30 minutes.
T-Bar. John and I went to the bar. We decided to have a drink. I got a rum and John got a coke. They decided to start dancing together. We were so excited and happy to be having a good time.

Reynolds. Reynolds took a bus to his friend's house. He walked in and told his friend that he was ready to play. The friends put on basketball gear. They went inside the house and began playing. Reynolds and his friend had a lot of fun.

Eddie He crashes hard. Eddie had a huge crush on a girl in his junior high school class. The girl was very sweet, but Eddie could not get the nerve to speak to her. One day while walking to his car he saw her walking with another boy. He pulled over to greet them, and was mortified to see it was his girlfriend! He realized he must have had a really bad imagination!

Sewing a Dress. Lacy really wanted to make a new dress for her sister. She didn't have much money. Her grandmother took her to the thrift store. Lacy found a beautiful red dress and bought it. Now Lacy and her sister have a new dress.
Back pain. Tina had back pain. So she decided to go to the doctor. Her doctor gave her pain pills. So Tina took them. She felt better.

Kristy's First Recital. Kristy is going to have her first recital tonight. She is nervous because she has never performed in a ballet. Kristy's mom teaches her a few tumbling moves and some footwork. Kristy performs wonderfully. Kristy feels confident now that she has her first recital.
The Game. The family had dinner at the table. The oldest son said the game was ready. The youngest son sat down to play. The oldest son scored three points. The youngest son was mad.
Overweight Dog. Tina had a dog. It was really fat. Tina was very overweight herself. So she bought a special diet. Now Tina could lose her dog weight.
New screen protector. Susie got a new phone. But it wasn't that great. It was not protected at all. Susie took it back to get it fixed. It finally came in a new screen protector.

Ballet Class`. I went to ballet class on Tuesday. I walked into class and was surprised at how loud everyone was. Everyone was singing and clapping. After class, we all went home and played on the computer. It was a great experience, I look forward to going back.
A roach. My wife came home from work. She noticed a huge cockroach in the wall. She got out a broom and tried to scoop it up. It hopped away quickly. She called an exterminator.

Facing the Fear. Tim's family was worried about him. They thought he'd fall through the floor. One day he stood up and said he wasn't scared of heights. They were so happy that he didn't fall down. They were so happy that he wasn't scared anymore.

Angry Dog. Tom's dog barked all night. When Tom tried to sleep, the dog got really loud. Tom had to turn on the fan. The dog was really cold and tired by the time he got home. Tom's neighbor heard the noise and came over to comfort him.
First Day of School. It was Tim's first day of school. He was very nervous. The teacher introduced Tim to the kids. Tim became good friends with the kids. The day was very pleasant for Tim.
Ana Eats Cereal. Ana was in the kitchen eating cereal. She couldn't find any milk. Finally she decided to try skim milk. Ana loved how it tasted. She decided to start adding milk.
The Look. The man smiled and winked. A woman noticed the grin and wink. She smiled back at him. The man felt awkward. The woman gave him a hug and left.

Puppies. The Smith family had a dog named Barney. One day Barney escaped from the backyard and ran outside. The Smith family found Barney in the middle of the street. The Smith family brought Barney to the shelter. Barney was adopted by the Smith family.

Gift. Jasmine was getting her birthday gift from her mom. She was upset when her mom said it wasn't possible. Jasmine begged until she felt better. Her mom took her to the store. Then, she brought Jasmine's gift to her house.

Beatles. My mother's dog was named after The Beatles. We went to a garage sale to get her some Beatles records. She jumped on the counter and started to bark. The man at the garage sale bought the record. My mother was very happy about the purchase.

Brockton Rox. The Brockton Rox baseball team always played their home games at midnight. It was midnight when they were last in the championship series. They lost the final game of the series to the New Britain Rock Cats. This time the Rox won the final game in the series. They were the final two teams left in the baseball playoffs.

Death Scare. Gretchen ran out the door to go to the bathroom. She saw someone standing in the hallway. It was her teacher who appeared drunk. Gretchen told her parents about the scary situation. The parents quickly took her out of the school.

First Day. Kelly was nervous about her first day of college. She was unsure if she would make friends or not. She went out into the field in the morning to relax. To her surprise, she was already making friends. She was so happy that she began to see her classmates everyday.

A Good Student. My daughter's high school sweetheart, Jane, is a good student. She studies hard and is very good at sports. The other day, Jane won a game of basketball. Jane won the game by playing her hard. She won the game because Jane worked very hard all year.
Life Changes. Jim was not a very wealthy man. He had been living on the streets. He got into a car accident. It was an accident he blamed on the drink driving. He lost his job.
Allergic Reaction. I got stung by a bee. I immediately called 911. A doctor came and treated me. I was allergic to bees. The bee stung me on the side.

Travel Spanish. I used to do research on a Spanish speaking website. I found many useful phrases. Some of these phrases were in spanish. Some were in english. So far I have learned all of these phrases.

Energized. Tommy was a high school wrestler. His favorite sport was football. Tommy dreamed of playing quarterback. Tommy started playing quarterback at the local high school. He made the varsity team and was recruited to colleges.
Class. She was starting a new class. Her teacher said she would help her learn. They decided to play tennis. She lost horribly. She decided to give up tennis.
Shampoo. I started using a new shampoo. It was new to me. I tried to find the right bottle. Unfortunately I couldn't find one. So I went back to my old shampoo.
Caught. My friend and I were goofing around. We were talking when a teacher noticed us. He saw us talking and yelled at us. I was so embarrassed I had to apologize. We both left after the teacher.

Headphones. Tim was listening to music. His headphones broke. He went to the store and bought a new pair. The new pair was comfortable and kept his music loud. Tim was glad he didn't have to pay for new headphones.

Tough Negotiation. Sara was in the final negotiation of her parole hearing. Her boyfriend was in the room. He tried to talk her into dropping the gun and walking away. Sara was upset but not very violent. Luckily her parole officer let her keep the gun.

Jason Goes to Spain. Jason loves to travel. He has always wanted to travel to Spain. Finally he gets the chance to go on his dream vacation. Jason gets to see many sites. Jason is very happy to be traveling.

Aw Nuts. My dad decided to make breakfast. He looked online to find a recipe. He found some ground almonds. He figured he would just use his favorite cereal. When he got home he decided he had a surprise.
Bulk. Kim was a bodybuilder. She wanted to get bigger. So she went to the gym. At the gym, she worked out a ton. Soon, she was back to her pre-pregnancy size!
Swimming Lessons. Lisa was a swimmer. She decided to take swimming lessons. When she first tried swimming, she fell. Her mom had to help her up. She was able to continue swimming and became the best.

Johnny plays basketball. Johnny was a little boy. Johnny loved to play basketball. Johnny played basketball for his school's team. He was very good at basketball. Johnny played very well on his basketball team.
Making a painting. I wanted to make a painting. I went to a canvas store. I bought many brushes and paints. I then got a bunch of supplies to make my painting. I painted my painting.
The Blanket. Lydia was feeling hot. She laid down in her favorite blanket. It kept her warm. It was the perfect blanket. She was glad she'd purchased it.

Dottie Needs A Bath. Dottie was having a really rough time with her apartment. She decided to take a bath to make it feel better. While she was in the bath she got into an argument with her roommates. After the bath her roommates brought a plate of food. Dottie enjoyed her bath and was ready to make things better.
Hunting. Tom was out hunting one day. He shot a deer in his line of sight. He kept the deer for three days. Tom was able to get a few other deer. The deer he shot was the last one alive.

Health Care. Sandy was a registered nurse. She decided she wanted to open her own practice. Sandy had a hard time getting the nurses to work with her. She decided to start her own practice. Sandy's practice is doing very well!

Work Life. The teacher's name was Ms Smith. The class was having a test and Ms Smith didn't have to go. As a result she stayed home. The test was postponed until the following week. The teacher didn't come to class on time so she was not fired.

Hair. Jane decided to dye her hair. She went to the salon and asked for dark hair. The stylist cut off her long hair. She put the dye in a pail and let it sit for hours. When Jane looked in the mirror she saw a pale brown hair.

Amy's New Child. Amy was pregnant and her belly was growing. She needed to have an abortion to have the baby she wanted. Her husband opposed the abortion. He tried to stop her from going through with the procedure. She felt crushed but was glad she had the choice to abort.

cooking class. Amy had been making fun of her sister for months. Her sister had taken cooking lessons, and Amy decided to join. She hated cooking, but she was curious as to how her sister made it. She got to the cooking class and learned that her sister was amazing. She realized that it was her imagination that was the problem.

Fusion. Nancy and her boyfriend went out on a date. At first Nancy thought her boyfriend looked boring. But as they talked, they got more comfortable. At dinner, she realized she liked him more than she thought. Now she and her boyfriend date regularly!
First Haircut. I had a hair cut yesterday. I had to go to a salon to get my haircut. When I got there the lady cut my hair. She told me I looked terrible. I had a nice haircut and felt much better.

Train Trip. The Smith family wanted to go on a train trip. They would go on this train trip every summer. The family decided to get a small family with one car. The family got to go on this train trip every summer. They would go on this train trip every summer.

The Investigation. The police were looking for the person that had stolen my glasses. The crime scene was full of broken glass. A man was standing in the middle of the crime scene. He was yelling out for someone to call him a liar. They called the man a liar and he was arrested.
Berry gets hurt. Berry is at a baseball game. Berry is up to bat. Berry swings the bat hard. His bat goes flying into the stands. Berry is badly hurt and rushed to the hospital.
Too tired to remember to pay. Allie was out with friends. She was ready to go home. She was exhausted. The girls needed some help paying. They had to leave early.

stray. I came across a stray dog in a parking lot. He was very dirty and smelled horrible. I scooped him up and put him in a kennel. I named him Pugsley. I went home and fed him and gave him a good home.

Land Surprise. Tina loved the beach. She decided she wanted to live on the beach. She bought some land. When she put her beach house up, it was immediately attacked by birds. She realized she had been bad and bought a house in the city instead.
The Trampoline. Sally was swinging from the trampoline. The kids were so proud. She made a lot of noise. They were very upset. She apologized to them.

Best job. Ella was always interested in finance and worked for the same company. She always made it her goal to be a manager. After graduating college she applied for a job as a finance director. She was hired on the spot. She was happy to find herself in a career in finance.
Dishes. Dirty plates and plates. Everyday I would get very dirty. I would use dish soap and water. Then it would stay clean. I like using dish soap because I know it will stay clean.

Cancer. Carmen was in the third grade when she became very sick. She went to the doctor for her diagnosis. The doctor said that Carmen had early signs of cancer. The doctor gave Carmen several medications to take. After several months of treatment, Carmen was cured of cancer.

Fashionista in Training. Tracy was learning to sew. Her grandma was a seamstress and she liked to show her techniques. Her grandma taught Tracy how to thread and sew. Tracy learned the hard way that fabric doesn't always go together. Tracy had a hard time learning how to thread but she did her best.
Cat at the  window. I was at my house, waiting for my cat. I opened the window and saw a cat. I called the cat. The cat came running over to me. We played with each other all day.

The Dented Car. Martha parked her car on a deserted road. A big truck came up next to her car. The truck driver was looking for someone to hitch drive. Martha did not want to walk around in the car any longer. She stood up and walked around in the truck.

Large. The man took the large suitcase out of the garage. He began loading it into the van. His hand slipped, and the suitcase fell. The suitcase shattered. The man was very happy with the large suitcase he just purchased.
A new bike. Joe wanted a new bike. So Joe went to the store to look for one. He was shocked at what he saw. It was only a cheap brand he could buy. Joe felt defeated.
Phone Service. Jim was on the phone. His phone was not working. He decided to call a company to fix it. The phone did not respond. Jim hung up.
Bee. It had been raining all day long. The bee in the house began to buzz. Tina was scared of it. She tried to get away but it kept coming back. Tina had to hide under her bed.
Painting. The man painted a room. The picture was very bad. He took it to the craft store. They gave him a new one. He painted it much better.
Shark Attack. Tom was on vacation in the Caribbean. He decided to go swimming. After swimming for a bit, he noticed something. He had stepped on a shark. Tom had to swim out of the ocean.
Beach. The family took the family vacation. The trip had to be short. They went to the beach. The family had a great time. The family decided they'd do it again.
Life is No Beach. There's a new beach in my neighborhood. It has a volleyball court and a beach. I wanted to go to the beach. I was a little disappointed. I'm not sure I will ever go to the beach.

Loud Neighbors. Tom had to sleep late at night. When he woke up the neighbors were all yelling at him. Tom tried to ignore them, but they didn't stop. Eventually Tom just stood there and listened to them. They finally moved away from Tom.

Found Change. Jane was at the grocery store. She wanted a soda but she had no money. So she walked around the whole store to find change. In the end she found 5 quarters and paid for her soda. She left with a lot of change.

Out to lunch. I went out to lunch with a friend of mine. I went to a buffet place and it was very crowded. I waited until everyone left and went back to my table. My friend then proceeded to order his food. When I looked over the menu, it was too expensive and I left.

Songwriter. Sam was a songwriter. He would sing and write all day in his room. Sam's mother noticed this and made him write more. Sam kept putting out less work and it was unfair. Eventually his mother told him to get a part time job.

Defensive Driving. Tom was driving home from work. His car was behind a slow car in a parking lot. The car in front started to slowly move. Tom decided to pull over to the side of the road. He wasn't hit by the slow car but he was slow to react to it.

Just Order Pizza. Jim really wanted to eat a slice of pizza. He searched online for the best pizza place. He tried to pick one out. Then he found out they were all over the place. So Jim ordered from a small pizza shop.

Rock climbing fear. When I was younger I always wanted to rock climb. I went to a nearby canyon and asked the owner if I could climb. He said that it was not a bad idea. The first time I went I went wrong. I went up the cliff and ended up slipping and falling.

Accidentally. Gina wanted her mother to see her mother's car. The family was visiting at Gina's grandmother's house. But she couldn't go to the car. She told the mother that she was sick and it was time to go. The mother agreed and Gina was allowed to go to see her grandmother.

Robbed. I was at work yesterday. I went outside to grab something from the trashcan. I walked over to a large red trash bag. As I opened it, a man approached me with a knife. He threatened me and took the bag away from me.
Embarrassment at the Mall. Today at the mall, I found a very pretty dress. I tried on it and tried it on again. This time it fit perfectly. However, it was too small. I have to return it.
Bench. A man walked across the street. He sat down on a bench. The bench creaked under his weight. The man dropped his weight and got up. He got up and walked away.
Warm Milk. Bob bought a carton of milk. The milk had a weird smell. Bob tried to heat it up. He had to do it with a microwave. Bob had to drink that milk cold instead.

Ghost. I had a sleepover with my friends for Thanksgiving. We were sitting in a big circle on a futon. Everyone was having a good time talking about scary things. After a while I was really scared and got up to go. Then everyone started laughing and that made me feel a lot better.

New Chromebook Laptop. Sue had always wanted a new Chromebook. She saved up money and got a great deal on one. As soon as she got it she was so excited. However to her dismay, it broke within a month. Sue was too upset to buy another one.
The Good. Tim was always a good worker. He was very well liked at work. Tim decided to buy a car to show his friends. He worked very hard on the car. He drove it well and soon had lots of friends!
Tough burn. The first time I had a hot skillet I burned myself. I tried to put a lid on it. The smoke was unbearable. I grabbed a glass of water. I drank the water so I wouldn't get burned.

Objection. Anna was eating at a Mexican restaurant. She ordered a margarita and a sateillo. She thought her server asked for a drink. He just ordered the margarita and a sateillo. He didn't realize that they were margaritas and a sateillo.
Gym. I've been working out everyday for about an hour. I feel more and more fit and strong. I've begun to feel myself slowing down. But I've gotten over it. I am determined to keep working out.

First Female Football Player. A new football team was established in my school. The first player to try out for the team was a very tall, muscular girl. The team was named the Red Cross. During the first game of the season, the team won. Now the Red Cross is my school's official female football team.

Bird Feeder. Jim's backyard bird feeder wasn't working. He went to his garage and looked for a replacement. There were many around but none he could find was working. Jim got an idea and got a metal bird feeder. Jim's bird feeder worked well and he was happy.
New School. Mary was excited for her first day of middle school. She knew she was scared of people. She wanted to make friends quickly. She was the best in her class. She was happy that day.

Funny Girl. Betsy always wanted to be a writer. Her dream was to be a famous writer, but she was very self-conscious. She always looked at herself in the mirror and felt insecure. She wrote to her mother, who laughed at her. She found comfort in the fact that she didn't need a book to write.

History. I watched a movie about history yesterday. It was about a great war that happened thousands of years ago. I was thinking of my family and friends. I was thinking about the events that they fought for. Then I remembered that I should never forget history.

Angela's Essay. Angela was writing her essay for history class. She took a break from writing to eat dinner. When she returned to her essay, she realized it was not ready. Angela was so upset that she began to cry. Her teacher noticed and took her aside to ask about her essay.

The Phone Fiasco. Marissa's mom was taking her to the store. Marissa got her phone out of her pocket and put it on the table. The store employee took Marissa's phone and looked at it. They asked Marissa where she was getting the phone. Marissa had accidentally dropped it.
Moused. The man hid money. He ran a mouser to try to find it. The man couldn't find the money. The mouser ran off. The man searched for it.
Karen's help. Karen was doing laundry one day. She was having a lot of trouble. She decided to call a local woman. She made a reservation for them to come by. Karen was glad she had called for help.

One Man Circus. The man started a circus. He hired a traveling clown for his show. He was so funny that people were in tears. Everyone clapped when he did a trick. He made a lot of money off of the circus.

economics class. I had to take an economics class for college. I was so unhappy I almost quit. But, luckily, my advisor recommended another class. The other class was in the social sciences. I found the class interesting and actually enjoyed it.

sailing. The Smith family had just got married. They were going sailing this summer. They rented a boat and waited for their first lesson. They sailed all day and had a great time. They had an amazing time sailing and had a great wedding.

Trip to the Vet. When I was a teenager I took a trip with my family to the vet. My mom wanted to take me to the vet so I sat down on the bed. My dad was talking to a woman who appeared to be a vet nurse. When I was a few feet from the bed, my dad had a smile on his face. He said it was a lovely visit and she took me home.

Baking. Samantha was having a family picnic. She wanted to make her grandma a lovely cake. She mixed up all the ingredients and baked it. When it was done, her grandma was amazed at how good it was. Her grandma told Samantha to always make her grandma a nice dessert.

Not Impressed. Eli was on vacation in Spain and working on an online business. He was trying to get a girl to talk to him. Eli sent her a message on Facebook asking if she liked his work. She didn't reply and Eli was very disappointed. The next day he didn't hear from her at all.

James and the Driving Test. James had been nervous for his driving test. He had done a lot of driving since he had been young. The teacher told him to stay calm. James took his time looking at the road. James passed with flying colors and was excited to be driving.

The New Puppy. My parents had just adopted a new puppy. It was a white and orange labrador retriever. It was playful and loving. But one day it escaped its kennel. We never found it, and it has been my best friend ever since.

Birthday Cake. Bob's grandmother had a birthday coming up. Bob was going to have a surprise party. Bob brought out cake for his grandmother. He surprised her by making her cake. Her birthday was perfect!
Rebooting The Network. The cable company tried to bring back cable. It was a slow process. They changed their logo. They hired new employees. They successfully restored the cable network.

Visiting Family. Last week, my brother and I drove to Indiana to visit my family. It was a nice drive from Boston, and we had a great time meeting them. After the visit, we ate dinner and went back to Boston. We went to Fenway Park and had a great time. We are excited to see each other again next year.

Bottom of the sea. It was my second day in the Maldives. I had to go to the bottom of the sea. My guide had us walk a few miles to the small island of Socotra. Once there we went to a small beach where we saw some coral. I have never been so excited in my entire life.
Chef Tasha. Chef Tasha made a delicious pan fried chicken. She was nervous to show it to her new co-workers. They loved it! They told their friends. Tasha was happy she'd learned her lesson.
Hamster. The kids wanted to make a hamster. They gathered all the tools. They started making the hamster. It wasn't working very well. They realized they had to use a different type of hamster.
Allergic. Jeb was eating an egg. It was very spicy. Soon after, he began to run very fast. He was then rushed to the emergency room. Jeb had a food allergy.
Doll. Timmy needed a new doll for his birthday. His mom told him that she would buy him a great one. He decided to surprise her. He found a great one. His mom was very happy and surprised!
Getting Fat. Sam was going out to eat. He ordered two chicken sandwiches. On his way out he dropped one of the food. It spilled all over his pants. He didn't bother to change.
Nature. Tina had never been to nature. She always wanted to. Her friends wanted to surprise her. They took her out to a nice lake. They let her see all kinds of beautiful animals.

The Big Storm. We have been staying in a hotel during a big storm. We have had an intense rain storm with high winds. The power has been knocked out. The power is expected to be out for another two hours. We have decided to head home from the hotel.

Haunted?. I once had a pet cat. He was black and white, but a little spooky. I had a pet cat and a neighbor's cat that was white. One day my neighbor's cat came over and scared my cat. I can't imagine what scared my neighbor's cat.
The Ski Trip. Tom was a professional skier. He was invited to go on a ski trip. Tom was so excited! It was a great trip. Tom could not wait to go again.

Muffler. The muffler on my truck was falling apart. It was almost giving me trouble moving it. I called my friends to come help me. We worked on the muffler for an hour. It was good enough to move the truck.

Class. Jane was in the 9th grade. She didn't like having any classes. But her dad wanted to let her have some fun time. He enrolled her in a dance class at school. Jane had so much fun at the dance class that she dropped out.

Ears Pierced for the First Time. The first time I had ears pierced, I panicked. I was nervous that I would mess up, and get a bad infection. It was actually the most painless part of the process! I went through with the piercing after the first week. Afterwards, I still regret not just getting a straight A.

mermaid. Anna was very disappointed when her dad told her he had a surprise for her. Her daddy was taking her on a ship and she was going to be a mermaid! Anna was so happy that her daddy had finally decided to give her this. The day before she left the ship, Anna took a moment to reflect on her choice. She was so happy and happy when she got to see her new, princessy lifestyle.

Tomboy Ballerina. In high school, Tina was best friends with one of my girl friends. Her name was Tabby and she loved to dance and dance. The two had a love-hate relationship. Tina never wanted to see her friends again because of this. It turned out that they were the reason why she's single now.

Garbage Man. Mike was a garbage man. Every day, Mike would see a dog in the street. He had a problem and decided to take it to the pound. There, Mike met a kind family that accepted him. They became best friends.
Poor artist. Allie had painted a pretty picture. It was not perfect. It needed a touch up. But when she did that it was perfect. Allie was happy she got it done.

Roasting Session. My friend invited me to his house for dinner. He cooked some steaks and I decided to go with him. We were served roasted potatoes and some side dishes. I had a very pleasant time. I decided I would invite him again.

Flat. Tom had been running everyday for a month. After a while he started gaining more and more body fat. After a few weeks of this he wasn't able to run anymore. He realized it was simply too much pressure. Tom decided to cut down on his running and try eating healthier.
His Feet. Tim had his feet in his sandals at the beach. He began to walk back to shore. A giant wave rolled over Tim. Tim was swept into the sea. His feet ended up in the sand.
The last chance. Dawn was working at a fast food place. The manager was mean. She decided to tell him that she was fired. Then she hung up the phone. The manager never spoke to her again.

Horse Races. My dad took me to a horse race. We stood behind the fence to get a better view. A horse pulled up beside us and gave a jockey a push. The jockey gave the horse a jump and ran back to the starting line. My dad and I cheered for the winning horse.
Homework. Today I had to do my homework. I started at 6:30 PM. I worked on it for nearly 3 hours. When it was done I turned it in at 7:30 PM. I ended up with a C.
Fruit salad making. It was Kim's birthday. She wanted a new kind of fruit salad. So she went to the grocery store to buy some. She bought a bunch of oranges. She made her own fruit salad.

Cake. Lucy wanted to eat a birthday cake for her friend. She had never had a cake in her life, but it was time to try one. Her mother was not a good baker, though, and Lucy struggled. Finally she gave in and got the cake she wanted. When Lucy tasted it, she realized how terrible it was.

The Lipstick. Mary's mother brought home a box of lip glosses. Mary didn't know how to use them so she had to practice. After she got used to using them, she loved them! Mary applied all of the lip glosses to her lips. Now she knew how to apply them properly.

Fred. I once had a dog named Fred. My dog lived in the woods with a male and female coyote. In 1993 I saw a coyote while walking around our neighborhood. Fred ran away. I never saw him again, but decided to keep him in a safe place.
Figuring out the story. My sister told me a story that scared me. I was scared it was true. I decided to ask my sister about it. She denied it was true. I was so angry I wouldn't speak to her again.

The Wedding Announcement. A woman called the groom's parents and asked to speak with them. The man had never thought about it before. He picked up the phone and began to speak. The couple listened intently. They both seemed very excited about the news.

Billburg. Billburg was an elderly man who had never been on the water. Bill bought an inflatable raft. Bill rented a sailboat for the trip. Bill saw amazing sights while on the water. Bill was very glad he went on the raft.

A few drinks. I went to a football game. I was excited to see my favorite team play. However, I was surprised by the loud music. It kept me from feeling comfortable. After the game, I went home and went to bed.
Snow Storm. Tim was driving down the highway. It began to snow. Tim didn't notice how far away he was. A large portion of his windshield went flat. Tim had to call to get it replaced.
