Hypnotism. Eddie had never been hypnotized before. He really didn't want to and was scared. He sat in front of the television expecting to die. When the hypnotist started to speak he was shocked. The hypnotist didn't say anything and Eddie freaked out.

Hail Storm. Ava was driving to school one morning. A hailstorm had formed overnight. Ava was forced to pull over. The hail had caused a huge dent in the windshield! Ava had to spend the afternoon replacing her windshield.

New Name. The boy started having trouble with the new name. He begged his parents to change it. Finally, they gave in and let him change it. He was relieved to finally have his name. He liked the new name and didn't mind the old one anymore.
Last Letter. Tim was reading a book. The last page was a dedication. Tim read it over and over again. Eventually he finished it. He wrote it and kept it in his head all the time.

Smash. A girl in the school threw a book at an older student. The book hit him right in the face! The older student slapped the book out of the girl's hand. He ran after her. When the book landed on the ground, she apologized and threw it away.
Moving Out of State. Sam was going to leave for college. He didn't know where to move. Sam called a few family members. Eventually he found a nice apartment. Sam loved his new place.

Torn Shorts. I was out running and twisted my ankle. I felt the pain and it was inflamed. I took it to the emergency room. They said I had torn a section of my ankle. They were able to heal it and it was healed!

Tony Grills a Fish. Tony had always wanted to grill a fish. Tony decided to buy a grill and grill a salmon. Tony worked hard on the salmon. He grated the fish. Tony had a great fish dinner for dinner.

Sam has a fall. Sam was playing soccer. He was trying really hard to score the game winning goal. Suddenly he felt a pain in his leg. Sam couldn't figure out what the pain was. Finally he found out it was his soccer ball.
Alarm. Sam was not getting enough sleep. He set his alarm to get more. Sam woke up in the middle of the night. He remembered to turn it off. He was able to fall back asleep without it.
Food Poisoning. Jill and Tim went to the local Italian restaurant. Tim got really sick. Jill thought it was because he didn't drink enough water. She tried to give him some water. He became sicker.

Bowling Champion. Timmy really wanted to be the champion at bowling. He was never that good, but his parents worked hard every day. His parents trained him every day. He bowled really well. Timmy won the championship!

Quiz. Jack had a quiz tomorrow. He stayed up all night studying for the quiz. When he got to school, he fell asleep. His teacher did not call him to the class. Jack was embarrassed that he slept through his quiz.

Check Again. The dog was barking all day long. I could not find a source of quiet for him. I took my pocket knife to the kitchen. I cut a chunk of cheese off the plate. I tossed the cheese on the floor.

The Cubbies. Barry was a mechanic. He was going to install a new floor in his shop. He got out a large ladder and began to move it. He knocked over a large box of books, shattering them. Barry had to throw away the books, but they didn't matter.

Good enough. Sara was taking her niece to the park. Her niece was looking excited. She started to swing on the swing set. The swing started to wobble and she fell down. Her niece was crying since she couldn't reach the ground.

Laundry Cash. I was sitting on a bench outside a store when a man approached me. He was begging for cash. I handed him twenty dollars and told him not to worry. He ran up to me with his two children in tow. I was confused and thanked him for all his work.
Piano lessons. I was in middle school. We had to take a class for our exams. I hated going to the class. The teacher was kind and I was glad to see her. She was very patient and made me feel better.
Hair Loss. Tim had a long hair. He was getting ready for a sleepover. He went to take a shower. The hair was soaking wet. It ruined Tim's shower.
The Fair. The kids were so excited! They were going to the state fair. The food and rides were all amazing. The kids were so stuffed up! The highlight of the fair was the ice skating!
Out of Deodorant. Kate had tried wearing deodorant. But it was no use. She had no choice but to keep wearing it. Kate figured she would just never use it. But it wasn't as easy as she thought.

Lost and Found. My dog has been missing for a couple of days. I decided to check in with a local animal rescue group. The rescue group said they had a dog named Moose who had been abandoned. My friend said he had a poster for Moose on his wall. I posted the poster for Moose and it has been seen by over 10 people.

Uncertain about Lecture. Hannah had a history exam the next day. She decided to watch some TV. In the middle of the show, Hannah fell asleep. When she woke up, she didn't remember what had happened. She got her next test, but missed her test.

Running in a race. I took up running about a year ago. I started off by running five miles per week. After a year of running I had run over ten miles per week. After three months I had run over twenty miles per week. Now I am running in a marathon and I am very proud.

Riding a Bike. Seth was an avid bicycle rider. One day, Seth got off of his bike and got a flat tire. He didn't have a spare tire on his bike. A man with a spare tire stopped at the side of the road. Seth and the man got their spare tires on and rode away.

Weight Sadness. When I was young I wanted to be thin. I began eating a lot of candy to try to gain weight. I ate too much of it and gained a lot of weight. I was so sad that I never ate it again. After I lost the weight, I got so much more fit.

Norma Cleans the Fish Tank. Norma was sitting in her living room when she smelled something foul. Her fish tank looked empty and it had been overnight. Norma called her mom to clean the fish. Her mom took her to the store and bought her fish cleaner. Norma returned home to take care of the fish.

Manicurist. My friend's daughter went to therapy for a nervous breakdown. She lost her job, her apartment, and her car. She became addicted to manicurists. She tried every available treatment but none helped. Now she walks to therapy and back.

Smoky Barbecuing. One day, a group of friends met up at a barbecuing spot. They grilled burgers and hot dogs. Everyone was getting hungry. Soon the barbecue was almost over. They were all still hungry but they were happy they had the time.
Exam. Anna was studying Japanese. She decided to take a Japanese exam. She was worried she would fail it. But she performed very well! The teacher was very pleased with Anna's hard work.

The Windy Day. It was windy outside. My dad and I went into our backyard to play with our windmills. We were too excited to notice the storm gathering near. We were all surprised when it grew very windy. We were all soaked and miserable from all the wind!
The Lightning. Tim was at his house. It was a cloudy day. He heard a loud sound. He thought it was lightning. It was actually the train coming by.

Building a House. Mark had always dreamed of having his own home. Mark saved up money to move to his hometown. Mark's friend told him about Home Depot. Mark went to the Home Depot. Mark purchased the materials and was finally living in his own house.
She Understands. One day, my best friend invited me to her house. Her parents were outside drinking beer. She got very drunk. She didn't want to leave. I gave her a big hug.
Too Drunk. Tom was at a party. Someone tried to get Tom drunk. Tom kept trying to fight it off. Eventually Tom couldn't take anymore. He left the party.

Molly. Molly was the sweetest girl in school. She had a crush on a boy that she had to write a letter to. Molly wrote him a letter that was short, sweet and to the point. Molly and the boy got along well. The boy replied to Molly and she was happy!
Bear. Tori was hiking in the woods. She was carrying a bear skin bag. Suddenly she heard loud roaring. Tori's bear skin got ripped out. Luckily, no one was hurt.
Cold Morning. It was freezing outside today. We have been trying to get up earlier. Even the heat felt good today. I took a nice hot shower. After that I was not cold anymore.

Cat Poop. Today I had a cat named Sam. I woke up, excited because he wanted to be outside. As I was getting ready to go to work, he pooped on the floor. I got out my cleaning supplies and cleaned up the floor. He is sleeping sound now but will probably throw up again.

Mark Cooks Dinner. Mark's mother told him to cook dinner for his family tonight. Mark called the store and bought chicken, potatoes, and steak. He made his mom's famous spaghetti sauce, but forgot the seasoning! He cooked his family dinner with a small amount of the sauce. When Mark's family got home they were all very happy.

A Fun Trip. One time, Bob went to the zoo alone. He really enjoyed seeing the monkeys and monkeys at the zoo. The zoo closed for the day, so he decided to go back in later. He walked around the zoo all day, and eventually went home. His wife was very upset that she had to clean up the monkeys.

Johnny Runs a Marathon. Johnny was very active and loved running. He decided to train to run a marathon. Johnny trained every day to train for the race. On the day of the race Johnny was nervous but did his best. Johnny finished the marathon and felt he had pushed himself too hard.

The Sore Loser. John and Sam were fighting over the TV remote. Sam got angry and threw the remote at John. The TV was destroyed in the fight. Sam and John never fought again. John's parents grounded him for two weeks.
The Cookies. The kids loved cookies. They were their favorite. They were going to make them every week. When they were done with the batch, they were disappointed. They didn't taste any better.

Helping Out. Mike wanted to help out at a local animal shelter. He went to the door one day and saw a homeless cat. He offered it some food and affection. Mike took the cat home and kept him there for a month. The cat is now part of the shelter.
Baseball Throw. John was a kid who loved to play baseball. The team he was on wanted to win their state championship. John trained hard. He practiced everyday. John's team won the championship.

Hard Work Pays Off for Alexis. Alexis is a very talented and hard worker. Alexis wants to make her dream come true. Alexis works hard at school and in the community. She works very hard to pay for all her school expenses. Alexis is very proud of herself because she has a great education.

Broken. She told him it was her first day on campus. He thought she was kidding and walked away. She followed behind him and told him to be careful. The school security guard heard her voice. He helped her take a bag from his backpack.

Copy. The teacher assigned a copy of the work. I copied it word for word but had a problem. I didn't know if I copied it right or wrong. I asked the teacher if he thought I was trying to cheat. The teacher told me I was copying the wrong word!
Martini. I went to a bar. I ordered a martini. It came out cold. I sent it back and got another one. I felt like I wasted my money, but at least I got something to drink.

Swept by the wind. Gina's sister was trying to sweep the leaves. She wasn't paying attention and lost grip. The wind caught the leaf and swept it away. Gina ran to see what was left of the leaves. She didn't make it back to her room until the wind blew again.

Fred Collects Stamps. Fred is looking through his attic. He sees a box with stamps on it. Fred reads all of the stamps. Finally he finds one that he really likes. He decides to go to the post office and collect stamps.
Canned Peas. Kate was cooking dinner. She had to throw away some canned peas. She bought new ones, but it was too late. The peas were already moldy and mushy. Kate had to throw them out.

The Bad Sitter. Sara was upset that her babysitter was not paying attention. She told her mother and explained the situation. Her mother grounded her for two weeks for not paying attention. Sara's mom decided to find a new babysitter. She called a new babysitter and Sara's mom agreed to let her.

The Wet Paws. Alicia was petting a puppy. Suddenly, the puppy began spraying water everywhere. Alicia was so upset that she decided to clean it all up. Unfortunately, the puppy didn't stop spraying water. Alicia had to spend her afternoon vacuuming the puppy.

Clowns. We always went to the circus with my dad when I was younger. He would take me as far as the clown car. He was dressed up as a clown as he was talking to the kids. The clown car turned on and he waved to all of them. We all laughed and cheered when he told us how funny it was.

Pie Eating Contest. Alicia entered her school's pie eating contest. She was nervous, but thought she could do well. When she got there, she was shocked. There was a girl there eating the exact same pies as her. Alicia was embarrassed but she didn't want to ruin the fun.
A good fit. Susie tried on many dresses. She thought the blue dress was the perfect fit. She put it on and tried it on. It was too short. She did not buy it.

Running into old friends. I run into old friends every other day. I am not a big fan of running into them. But, I always have fun catching up. The only problem is that my family hates it. But, I guess that is what friends are for.

Red Sorghum. Alicia went to her grandmother's house to buy a sorghum. Alicia's grandmother took her to the pet store to buy the sorghum. Alicia walked around the pet store for a while and looked at the animals. Alicia picked out a red sorghum and went to pay for it. Alicia bought the red sorghum and left the pet store.

Don't Give Up. Sheena always had a difficult time believing in herself. So when she met Don, she thought he'd never love her. He was the same man he'd dumped earlier. But instead of being heartbroken, he became very proud of her. Don offered to marry her and promised to help her in any way he could.

beach. Linda wanted to go to the beach. She called her friend and invited her over for the day. After looking over the beach, they made plans. They packed a picnic and headed to the shore. They had the best day on the beach and made plans to visit again.
Wedding. The couple went to the courthouse. The bride walked down the aisle. The groom and groom walked down the aisle. They were married. The couple kissed after they were done.

The Bus Fight. Gabe was walking to school one day. As he was walking, a group of kids began to pick on him. He decided to fight back by throwing a baseball at one of the kids. The kids ran away from the bully. Gabe was relieved that he was able to stand up to them.

Time to cook dinner!. Kerry was tired of cooking dinner for her and her family. She went to the store and bought all the ingredients. She was very excited to cook dinner for her family. She cooked the food and let it cool. Her family loved the food they were served for dinner.

Sarah Flies On An Airplane. Sarah really wanted to fly. She had never flown on an airplane before. Sarah's friend had a job that she could use. Sarah went with her friend to get their jobs done. Sarah took her first flight that day.
New bag. I was shopping at the store today. I was about to get out of the store when I found a bag. The bag was green and purple. It was perfect. I immediately bought it.
Cheap sale. I needed some new pants. I decided to go to the store. I saw some pretty pants that I really liked. I looked them up online. They were much cheaper than at the store.

Sparky. Sparky loved to run with the boys at his school. He ran through the sand on his way to school. Sparky accidentally hit a kid. The kid's parents came to pick him up. They made Sparky promise to stop running with the boys.
Tarts. I tried to make some sugar free tartar sauce. It came out tasting terrible. I decided to buy all the things I could find. I put it all in my mouth. Now I have tarts every single day.

Losing religion. Cara felt her life was increasingly unlit. She was in a bad marriage, and her friends pressured her to go. So she reluctantly joined them. But soon she was back on track. And she felt good about her decision.

The Striker. Bill's coach assigned the kids to work on a team. Bill's team worked hard to beat the other team. On the last play, Bill was the only one on the field. Bill ran for the touchdown and scored! Bill's team won the game.

Browser. Joe had a lot of fun playing games on his computer. His browser was out of date and he needed to update it. Joe looked for an update program. He downloaded the update program. Joe was glad that his browser was updated.

The talk. A new family moved into my house. They had a loud, rowdy kid. We tried to talk to him about how they were a bad family. He didn't like it and tried to fight us. We all realized that we needed to tone it down.

Mommy's Sick For Now. Mommy woke up this morning with a fever and a cough. She spent the night in bed, so she was exhausted. She told us to clean the house before dinner. When we were done, Mommy felt better. We were all worried she would have a big fever and a cough again.

Wresting. I love to watch wrestling with my brother. We had a big competition tonight. I went into the match and tried to attack the champion. I lost control of my upper body. I was unconscious for a few minutes and my brother helped me up.

Julie Gets a Trainer. Julie felt she needed a new workout program to lose weight. She did her research on weightlifting and fitness. She found a trainer that would work with her for free. Julie signed up for two months of workouts. She lost the weight she wanted to, and was excited for her progress.
Arrows. Teddy was shooting arrows at his grandpa. His grandpa was not looking. Teddy's grandpa was in the next room. He shot at Teddy. Teddy laughed at his grandpa for not looking.

Carpet. Kia bought new carpets for her bedroom. She had a friend help her put them together. She had a hard time putting them together correctly. The next day her friend had the carpets installed. Kia felt very pleased with her new look.

Kids trip to the mall. We went to the mall in Brighton today. First we had to go check our accounts. Then we had to get our bags and clothes. After we got to our bags we went to the store. Then we had a quick play around the store.

Bad Landlord. Bob was a tenant in a rental house. Bob rented a room to a woman named Lisa. The next day, Lisa came by with a man's suit. She accused Bob of sexual harassment. Bob had to sue for breach of contract.

Snacks. Rita was working at the store. Suddenly, she noticed a strange smell coming from the back of the store. The smell was coming from the snack machines. Rita was suspicious, so she called in for a look. The owner apologized and said that she was in the wrong store.

Card games. Cara loved playing cards. She loved it so much that she began to collect them. One day, she found a box of cards in her mom's attic. Her mom said she could play with them, but only if she cleaned her room. Cara cleaned her room.

Oscar's Onions. Oscar grew some onions in his garden. He bought a big sack of them. Oscar took them to a friend. His friend offered him two onions for one pound of meat. Oscar gladly accepted his offer.

Kick in the Shin. Ned was playing soccer with his brothers. His older brother kicked Ned in the shin. Ned went home crying. He didn't want to tell his parents. Ned's parents didn't let him kick them in the shin again.
Burnt Pizza. Jim was hungry. So he decided to go out to eat. He ordered a large pizza. But when it came out of the oven, it was burnt. Jim was disgusted.

Comedy Show. Jim was always a stand up comedian. Jim didn't believe in any of the tricks that his friends were trying. When he came to a comedy show he was nervous. Jim did his best to make it funny. At the end of the show Jim was very proud.

Beer for Breakfast. Samantha woke up early one morning. She wanted a cold glass of beer. Samantha put a bowl of cereal into the fridge. After she poured the beer, she poured some milk in it. Samantha went to the fridge to eat her breakfast.
Getting fit. Susie was overweight. She was so unhappy with herself. She decided to get fit. She started jogging. She lost twenty pounds in a month.

Erin and the water bottle. Erin was out in the ocean when he ran out of water. He decided to hold onto a bottle of water. He went further out and tried to find something to eat. Finally, he found a spot with enough water for one day. Erin was happy with his choice and continued on.
Malaysia. I used to live in Malaysia. I went to visit my brother there. He said that I was the best person ever. I was very proud of him. I went back to Malaysia the next day.

Thunder. The thunder was just starting to rumble. Sam went into the barn to find his dad. His dad explained that the storm had already begun. Sam didn't want to hear his dad. He told his dad he didn't care how he felt.
The cool rental. Tim was at the movies. He needed some fast food. He saw a cheap rental place across the street. He got a fast food burrito. It was much better than he thought it would be.

The Stuck Stroller. It was snowing outside and Tom was driving his baby stroller. He was trying to turn when he hit a patch of black ice. He began to slide backwards. He hit the ground hard and heard a thump. Tom's baby had accidentally fallen out of the stroller.

Break Up. We were sitting down to dinner at my girlfriend's house. She ended up calling me and said her boyfriend was coming over. I went over and got the food for us. When he came he asked me out and I said no. She got upset at me and ended the call.

Cabin. I needed to go out on a cruise. I looked on craigslist for a cabin in the woods. The cabin had three bedrooms and a bath. I was going to take the cruise out in it. When the ship left, the cabin was boarded up.
Wedding. My cousin was getting married. She was excited. Then she found out she was pregnant. It was a big day. Everyone was sad.

Rick's Day at the Waterpark. Rick loves waterparks. He decided to take his family to the waterpark. His kids immediately ran to the water slide. They splashed each other in the pool. Rick loved being in the water park with his family.

Vacation Time. Sam went on vacation with his family. Sam was nervous about not having a job for several weeks. However, his family reassured him that he would be employed soon. When the week ended, Sam's work schedule had been made clear. Sam was happy to have a clear direction for his vacation.

Earrings. Kayla was very proud of her pretty earrings. She wore them all the time, even though she didn't wear many. One day, she noticed that they were no longer in place. She checked and realized they had fallen off. Kayla was embarrassed and bought a new pair.

Pills. My doctor prescribed me an adult sized pill for my mood issues. The pill was very painful and left me with a headache. After a few days it stopped hurting so bad. I was very happy about that. I ended up taking it for 5 more days before having another bad headache.

Clarence's Project. Clarence was assigned a difficult project for his senior year. The project involved printing a large number of signatures on campus. Clarence was nervous about the project at first, but began to enjoy it. After several weeks of working on the project, Clarence was proud. He had successfully completed the project and felt very accomplished.

Twin Feud. Sam hated having twin boys. His girlfriend thought they were very cute together. She decided to switch to female to attract Sam to her. It worked for a while. Then they both grew apart and didn't speak to each other.

We're Gonna Need A Bigger... The snow storm turned from mild to heavy overnight. My husband and I made plans to get up and go to work. We were able to go to work on time. However, my husband had a bad case of the sniffles. He was late to work and everyone had to take a break.
Upgrade to first class. The other day I went on a flight. When I got on the plane I was upgraded to first class. I was so happy. My first class flight is so great. I can't wait for the next flight.

Learning to swim. Lance had never been swimming before. He knew that it would be fun for him. He was scared but he did it anyway. He jumped in and out of the water many times. He ended up getting the hang of it.

Hyacinth. Lina wanted to buy a house. She decided to buy a house with a beautiful hyacinth tree in the yard. Her friends told her she needed a large yard to buy the right house. Lina didn't care about the yard and just bought a large house with big trees. Her friends were all jealous and no longer talked to her.

No Swim in the Park. Lilly had never been to the beach and didn't want to be rude. She waited to be called to the sandbar so she could swim. The sun went down and Lilly began to head back to shore. On the way back she bumped into another woman. The woman gave Lilly a big hug and promised to never be so rude.

Pickpocket. Jim went to the convenience store. He grabbed a soda from the soda machine. Jim didn't see a wallet lying on the ground. The owner of the store looked into the store. The owner grabbed Jim's wallet and took it.

New Pajamas. Ava needed new pajamas for the winter. She found a pair of red and black ones. Ava decided to wear them to school. She felt great about it. Ava couldn't wait until school was over so she could wear them.
Magnet. The man put on a metal jacket. It had a magnet on the back. The jacket attracted more magnets than the man. He went to the hardware store. He bought more magnets.

Long-Winded. A little boy named Benji had a very long hair. He didn't like how long it was so he decided to cut it. His mom thought that was too extreme and decided to cut it. After her inspection, Benji decided to not shave his hair. He ended up with a much shorter, straight hair.

Bar Fight. Tom was drunk at a bar. He and a group of friends decided to pick a fight. The cops showed up and made Tom leave. He went home and made up an excuse. Everyone went back to the bar and had a good time.

Buying a suit. I needed a suit for my job interview. I drove to the local tailor and bought a suit. The suit was too small. The tailor gave me a large suit instead. I went to the interview with the large suit.
The Dam. Cheryl was on a trip through the mountains. She was on a hike when she heard a rumble. She saw a dam across the river. Cheryl panicked and got out of her vehicle. She had to swim to safety.

Clashing Color. One time I was playing basketball with my friend. My friend threw the ball in the air. He accidentally landed on a tree. The tree splintered and split my clothes. I had to go to the doctor to get stitches.

Charity. Kia was feeling down. She had just moved to a new state and didn't know anyone. Her dad told her to get in touch with someone in need. She made a poster with information on various charities. Her dad saw it and helped put it up.

Tooth Fairy. Nina didn't believe in the Tooth Fairy. She kept her mouth shut because of that. She woke up one night and found her neighbor's toothpaste. She poured it over her cheek. When her neighbor got home, he gave her a dollar for her good deed.

Christmas. Today is the day for the Holidazzle Santa Claus. The children decorate the house for Christmas. After decorating the house, they eat cake and presents. After eating, they open presents. After opening presents, they play games with their friends.

The Acorn. There was a big storm coming through town. The residents were nervous that it would have an acorn. They waited all day and night to see if one would come. Finally, at 5 o'clock they saw a small acorn on the ground. They were so relieved that it was only acorns.

Old book. I got a new book last week. I was excited about it because it was about my favorite author. I read it in one night. I then read it three more times in one day. I then read it four more times in a week.
Kenny loses the girl. Kenny was at his friends house. He was drinking. His friend wanted to buy him a drink. Kenny went over to ask if he could have a drink. He spilled the drink and lost his friend.

When A Family Visit Isn't. The Jones family lived in a small trailer. When the Jones decided to visit another country, they planned well. They checked into their hotel in town before the trip. When the Jones arrived in the country they paid for a tour. The family had a great time visiting another country.

Open relationship. Tim has been single for a long time. He was wondering if it was possible to have an open relationship. He decided to ask his girlfriend if they could be open. She said yes! Tim now has an open relationship with his girlfriend.

Foggy. Jim was driving in the fog. He didn't pay much attention to it. He hit a car too close. Jim wasn't able to see the other car and crashed into it. Jim sued the other driver and won a lot of money.

Free Drinks. A local bar and grill was having a party. They wanted to give away some free drinks. They had people fill up bottles. The drinks came out too cold. They didn't have enough to make up the lost cost.

A Man and His Dog. My friend told me that he was going to adopt a dog. The dog needed a lot of work, and my friend showed me how. I helped him out a lot, and helped him train his new dog. The new dog was a bit scared, but he has really learned since then. Now he loves his new friend, and I have a new dog.

Disney World. One day Jon decided he would go to Disney World. He looked up the prices of the various activities. He chose a trip to Disney World for his family. He had never been to Disney World before and was so excited. After his trip he was very disappointed that he could not go.

Choices. Toni was a nurse. She cared for a lot of elderly people. Some of the people she cared for were not speaking to Toni. Toni was getting very upset. Toni told the people she worked for to leave.
Bob's Business. Bob decided to start a business. Bob hired a secretary. Bob worked very hard to train his secretary. Bob started to receive regular customer service. Bob's business became a success!

The Tiger and the Goat. A tiger was in the zoo. The goat was on a leash in front of him. The tiger saw the goat and walked towards it. The goat pulled the tiger off of it. The zoo went back to normal.

Planking. When I was younger, I had a lot of trouble with my upper body. I would always roll on the ground during exercises. My dad decided to help me out. He got me a plate of ice cream. After eating it, I rolled very well and felt much better!

New Place. Bob took his dog to a new place. The dog didn't like the new place. The dog barked at all of the other dogs. Bob bought a new place for his dog. Now Bob has the best dog in the neighborhood.

Peas. I decided to make a salad one day. I looked through the kitchen to find the peas. I remembered making peas in a pot in the summer. I grabbed the peas and put them in the pot. The peas cooked and turned into a nice green sauce.

The Yellow Gauntlets. John was very athletic and liked playing sports. His favorite team was the Boston Red Sox. John wore the team's yellow gauntlets to every game. After a while he started to get a little annoyed with the yellow. John threw away his favorite yellow gauntlets and switched to the black ones.

Doggy Love. Amy had a dog named Sophie. One day while at work her dog wandered off. Amy was shocked when she found Sophie in a neighbor's yard. She called the police to report her missing dog. Luckily, the dog was found safe and sound.

Lobster. Anna went to a fancy restaurant. They served her lobster with butter and bacon. Anna was very disappointed! But they promised that it would be fresh and delicious. She still ended up loving the lobster!
Competition. Jill was always in shape. She decided to enter a contest to win a prize. Jill was nervous to compete. She got first place in the contest. Jill won a prize and was happy.

The bike tip. I went for a bike ride one day. I had my training wheels off so I couldn't ride too fast. Suddenly, I noticed a big rock that I must have stepped on. It was a nice bike tip, and I rode it a few more times. Afterwards, I learned that my training wheels should always be off.

Dinner plans. My family wanted to have a nice family dinner. We didn't have anything in mind though. We decided to start with something we had gone to eat before. We decided on hamburgers and hot dogs. It turned out to be the best dinner we had ever had.

Unending Sadness. Tim was feeling down at work. He hadn't seen his best friend in days. He went home and started crying. His best friend was having a hard time dealing with it. Tim felt better with a little bit of help.

Errand. I woke up this morning to find that there is traffic on the highway. I got out of bed and grabbed my stuff. I was trying to make it to work on time. However, it took forever. Finally, I made it to work on time.

Rita passes. Rita was always afraid of clowns. The school Christmas party was coming up. Rita could not find her clown outfit at all. She finally found the clown costume. Rita was so happy she could now go to the Christmas party.

Brad gets revenge. Brad was mean to his friends. He often pushed them and pushed them back. One day his friends decided to get revenge. They hit Brad and broke his nose. Brad cried for the rest of the day.

Brainstorming. Margo was having a lot of free time after moving to her new house. She wanted to do something fun. She decided to create a new game for her tablet. She started to brainstorm ideas for a game. After a few hours she had a complete game for the tablet.

Bored Mike. Mike was really bored. He decided to walk the neighborhood and see if he found anything interesting. He walked around the neighborhood and saw kids playing outside. He decided to join them and play with them as well. He was very bored when he got home.

Coming or Going?. We have been working all night in the car. I think we will take the long way home. We need to decide what to do for dinner tonight. We can eat at home, but can't take the long way home. We will make a decision when we get to our house tonight.

The Investment. Cathy was looking to buy a house. Cathy wanted to invest in a home that had a large yard. Cathy decided to buy a house that had a large yard. Cathy decided to sell her home. Cathy now had money for her mortgage.

Changing the Sheets. Kia's bed sheets were getting old. She was hoping to replace them with new ones. But they didn't last very long. When they were due to be replaced they were gone! Kia had to go to the store and buy new ones.

Free Food. The chef came in to the restaurant. He started to serve food. The customer started to order food. The chef did not know what to give to the customer. The chef gave the customer some free food.

Vikings. One day the Vikings were searching for a new land. The Valkyries attacked them from all sides. The Vikings made a new land by the sea. They settled down and built a mighty city. It was a beautiful place to be!

Beth wins the lottery. Beth was a woman who never had much luck. She was out one afternoon with her friends. One of her friends offered her a $100 dollar lottery ticket. Beth was very tempted to check it out. She checked it out and she wins the money.
Ferrets. Tim had a ferret. He was not sure about it. His friend told him to give it a bath. It did not like the water. Tim gave him another bath.

Honeymoon. Our two year old granddaughter just got married. She is not getting married yet, but is getting married in six months. We planned a huge get together for her wedding anniversary. We had lots of fun with her new husband. I think our granddaughter is going to like being a bridesmaid.
Cheerleading. Kara wanted to be a cheerleader. She practiced and practiced. Finally she tried out for the team. She got the part! Kara was so proud.

Procrastinator. Joey was always procrastinating starting work. He did not have enough time to complete his tasks. His boss always blamed him. Joey became so frustrated that he quit his job. Joey learned a valuable lesson about never procrastinate tasks again.

Wrong Phone. John went to the bank. When he handed over the cashier gave him the wrong amount. John couldn't believe it. John called up the bank to complain. Luckily they had fixed it within the hour.

heavy box. John's work was trying to sell a ton of items. They told him to make a box of heavy boxes. John built one out of some boxes. It was a huge improvement. He ended up selling a lot more in the box!

An Old Sword. Tim was cleaning out his attic. He found an old sword in a box. He was excited to have it, but was scared. He took it to a pawn shop, and it sold for a great price. Tim was able to buy a good sword instead.

Symphony. Jenna is in a choir. The choir was scheduled to perform tonight. Jenna had rehearsed the first part of the routine. The choir went on to perform beautifully. The choir performed beautifully at the recital.

Adopted Friend. Aiden adopted a cat from the pound. He named the cat Tiny. One day Tiny fell from the porch. Aiden and Tiny were in the backyard playing. Aiden picked Tiny up and they are now best friends.

Dolores the Therapist. Dolores is a very mean woman. She doesn't care for anyone. She has been accused of rape by a married man. She denied it but is very afraid to confess. I hope that she is innocent and that she is cured.

Cheesy madness. Susie really liked music and it was her turn to choose. She thought about music she liked for hours. Yet her grandma refused to let her. She kept thinking about it for the rest of the night. Susie never gave in and watched her grandma's face.

Amnesia. I went to the store and bought a bottle of milk. I opened the bottle and poured the milk into the blender. I heard a loud thump and the blender splashed milk everywhere. I checked and realized the lid was loose. I took the lid off and poured the milk into a bowl.
Stuck Paper. Tim was folding his laundry. He was folding more than he was doing. Suddenly his paper slipped. The whole thing broke into many pieces. Tim had to fix it but it took a long time.

Building a treehouse. Joey had never built a treehouse before. He decided to build one for his dad. His dad told him that it would be easy. After watching the video, Joey was able to do it. Joey's dad was happy that his son had built a treehouse.

Curtains. Ivan went to the fabric store to buy some curtains. When he got there, he saw they were sold out of his size. Ivan tried the 40 inch ones first, but they didn't fit. Then he tried the 52 inch ones, and they fit too. Ivan decided to wait to buy the 60 inch ones.

Typing. The teacher asked the class for a few minutes to type something. I typed something pretty dumb. The teacher did not notice the error. She gave me detention for typing the wrong thing. After that day I practiced my typing with a ruler instead.
Bored. A young boy had a bad day at school. He decided to go home to watch tv. He was too busy to cook dinner. He was forced to eat snacks by his mother. The boy didn't want to go back to school.

Where Eggs Come From. Darlene bought eggs for her family. She forgot to feed the chickens. The chickens got sick. The veterinarian told her the chickens were getting worms. She threw out the eggs, and the worms died.
Big Fire. Tommy decided to light a fire. He got out the lighter fluid. Tommy lit the fire with it. The fire grew bigger and bigger. Tommy was unable to stop it from growing.

Laura Does Homework. Laura had to complete her homework before her class started. She tried to finish it on the last day, but it was too late. Laura started over with another book. It turned out to be much harder than the last one. Laura was glad that she completed the homework before school started.

Nursery. Cathy was going to a baby shower. She wanted to pick out a nursery for her baby. She was going to get her baby but there were too many choices! She decided to ask for help from her friends. They helped her pick the perfect crib for her baby.
Navy. Joe wanted to join the navy. He decided to join the navy. But he was too skinny to join the navy. He got in trouble. But he found the navy fun.

The Candy Store. I walked through the candy store. I went right to the candy that was on sale. I picked out a chocolate bar that was 10 dollars. I paid for it and went home. I couldn't wait to buy more.

The Ocean. The family took a vacation to Florida. They visited several famous beaches. The family took many photos of the beach. The family took the pictures to remember the trip. The family returned home in the spring.

A Day at the Beach. I went to the beach today. I got all my friends together to play beach volleyball. We played all day. After playing for an hour, it started to rain. We had to put our umbrellas in the sand.

Train Trip. Tim had always wanted to visit the city of Chicago. His family told him to save up for a trip there someday. He decided to take his girlfriend for a train trip. They took the train from NYC to Chicago. They both had so much fun that they wanted to take another trip.
Unprepared. Sally was a student. She was in a new class. She wasn't sure if she would know how to take the class. She studied hard for the test. When she got the test, she was very prepared.

Quitting smoking. Sam hated his smoking. His parents made him go outside to smoke. His mom took him outside with some gum. Sam took a big drag from the pipe. Sam quit smoking and his mom was proud of him.

The Doctor. The doctor called the patient in for an appointment. She waited at the reception desk for her name to be called. Finally, she was called to an office. The doctor arrived 20 minutes late. The patient was very angry and left the office.
Making a garland. I had a bunch of yarn left over. I decided to make a huge string. I tied it all together. I put the whole thing on a tree and tied it there. The garland was beautiful!

The bad veggies. Cody's mom always made him eat raw vegetables. When he was ten, his mom got sick. Cody's mom went to the hospital. Cody's mom came home after a few days. She had to make him eat her vegetables all the time.

Mixed Mail. I got a package at the post office today. I opened it and started to fold the mail. After folding the mail I started to put it into the box. I saw a stain on the box that wasn't there before. I was very upset that the mailman messed up my gift.

Fish Tank. I went to the store and bought a fish tank. I got a bucket and filled it with water. The fish in the fish tank got to swim in the water. My kids wanted to try their hands at swimming in the fish tank. I told them they'd have to wait a few weeks for a better tank.

The Gem Stick. Lisa was on the fence about a house on the corner. She saw a sign for Gem Stick, a new gem stone brand. It was very affordable and attractive. Lisa tried it out in the yard on her way home. To her surprise, she fell in love with the stone!

Sunny's Pooch. One sunny day it was a little dark outside. My sister went outside and left the door to the house open. Sunny's poodle came running in through the open door. He went to the kitchen and ate some carrots. Sunny's owner yelled at him for eating dirty carrots.

Salesman. I worked at the radio booth. It was the first day of the year and we had some new hires. They told us that they needed a more competent salesperson. I spent all weekend working on their sales. I found them the very best person in the whole store.

Headed to the movies. Alicia was invited to go to the movies with her friends. She didn't know which movie to see. She thought she would ask someone she likes. Alicia finally decided on a horror movie. She was nervous at the movies but enjoyed it.

Steve Visits The Aquarium. Steve realizes that he has never seen the aquarium before. He calls his friend to see if they would like to go see the aquarium. The two men go see the fish tank. Steve has a wonderful time. Steve decides that he would like to see the aquarium more often.

Lopsided House. Bill was looking at houses for rent in his area. His eyes kept getting tired after each house he saw. He was sick of it and wanted to move. After looking at lots of houses he decided on a house he liked. Bill moved in and loved his new home.

Randy and his Grandfather. Randy's grandfather was going to the fair. He had to ask his grandpa to get him tickets. Randy's grandfather drove his car to the fair and went with his son. Randy's grandpa showed up with his son and his grandfather bought tickets. Randy bought his ticket and enjoyed the fair.

Sore throat. Cindy woke up in the middle of the night with a sore throat. She was too sick to eat, so her mom drove her to the ER. There, the doctor found out Cindy was pregnant. He helped Cindy get medicine for her first pregnancy. Now Cindy doesn't have to wake up so sick all the time.

Low Patience. Tom was watching a video on Youtube. He began to get bored and impatient. Tom tried to watch it again but it didn't work. He decided to watch something else. After that Tom was able to watch it again.

The Pets. Holly had a very big pet dog. It was her responsibility to keep it healthy. One day, the dog went missing from the house. Her parents found the dog in the backyard. Holly took the dog to a veterinarian.

Misha's Mirrors. Misha really wanted a new dress for the party. She went to the fabric store and chose a pink dress. The fabric store had a blue fabric, but that was too much blue. The fabric store also had a pink fabric but that was too much pink. Finally, Misha chose a purple fabric.

What to Choose. Kylie's mom wanted her to choose a pet. Kylie could never choose a pet. Kylie's mom felt sorry for her. She finally decided to get a cat for her daughter. Kylie was happy to get a pet for her daughter.

Basketball Match. Gina stood near the hoop as the sun began to set. The ball flew over the goal into the bushes. A small boy ran up to the ball and threw it as hard as he could. Gina and the boy played a game of basketball. The boy beat Gina by 20 points.
Swarming with Flies. Tom went for a walk. He saw a lot of flies in his path. He ran faster and went inside. Tom sprayed bug spray all over the walls. The flies were gone in no time.

Walking and Talking. Jane was taking a walk at night. While walking, her son ran ahead of her. Jane lost her balance and fell on her belly. Jane was crying when a passerby helped her. She had to go to the hospital to get a cast on her belly.

Karen's Misfortune. Karen was poor and lived in an alley. One day, a man knocked on her door and asked for help. The man asked her what she wanted for Christmas. Karen told him that she was having trouble affording it. The man felt bad for Karen and took her money for Christmas.

Game. Kenny likes to play sports. Kenny's school has a lot of sports that he can play. He is hoping to join the school football team this year. His hard work paid off with the coach calling him in for an audition. Kenny took the role and his hard work paid off!
Movie poster. I saw this movie poster at the movie theater. I bought it. After getting home, I took it home and hung it up. Then I put the poster up on my wall. I loved that poster.
Doored. Tom had a car he was fixing up. He got a flat tire while driving it. Tom didn't have insurance. He got the part from his mechanic anyway. Tom had to pay him $250 for the tire and the repairs.

Starry Night. My family likes to go camping in the summer. We try to plan our trips based on the appearance of the sky. Today was a clear sky. We camped out for a long time. My brother and I both had a great time seeing stars!

Andy Learns to Drive. Andy was finally old enough to take his driving test. Andy was nervous about taking his driving test, but he went. Andy had practiced driving all winter and was very confident. Andy took his driving test and passed. Andy's dad was very proud of him.

Dirty House. Tim's parents had an argument. Tim found out they weren't going to dinner. Tim went back to the house. Tim's parents still wouldn't let him go back to the house. Tim didn't speak to them for almost a week.

Little Rascal. In fifth grade, my friend Sam and I liked playing practical jokes on each other. One day, I saw Sam's teacher sitting down with a quarter tucked in her purse. When she saw the quarter, she giggled and pointed it out. After her class ended, Sam thanked her for the funny joke. I never saw Sam again, and was glad that she didn't tell the principal.

Jerry goes to camp. Jerry had recently turned 18. He didn't know what to do with his life so he asked his parents. His parents told him that they couldn't afford the things needed. Jerry decided to join the Navy and join his first mission. Jerry is now serving in the Navy and saving up for a house.

Home plate. I went to my first baseball game with my mom. She was very excited and I was scared. She let me stay in her lap during the game. She sat down and we watched the game on TV. I was glad I went and she was proud of me.

Broken Copier. Tom was in the process of copying documents. He was trying to copy an old paper. Suddenly he realized his copier was broken. Tom had to manually copy the whole thing. He was much more careful after that.
Lost. Tom was out on a hike. He didn't notice a small rock. It caused a big crack in the path. Tom had to go back for a new pair of shoes. The rock was fine but Tom was annoyed.

The Cat. I decided to take my cat for a walk. While walking I felt something on my neck. I realized that the cat had pooped on my shirt. I picked up my cat and made him wash it. My cat now has a clean shirt.

Volleyball game. Sara was on her high school's volleyball team. During practice one day, her team was losing by one point. Her coach asked her how her team could win the game. Sara told her coach that her goal was to hit a goal post. Her coach made her hit the post and her team won the game.

The Pirate Ship. The pirates were looking for a new ship. They had to choose between two options. They both had to have sails that were strong and fast. They chose the stronger sail. They made their new ship the fastest and the best.

Tutor Girl. Jenna loved math and science. She decided to become a math tutor. She worked hard every day after school. Soon she had a great grasp on the material. Her new knowledge helped her a lot in her life.

Bandits. I was at the park with my friends. There was a lot of activity going on. The park was packed with people playing in the park. One person was playing a trumpet. He was surrounded by dozens of men who looked like bandits.

Signed. The man signed the document. He gave the signature to the executor. The executor kept the signature on the document. The executor sent the signed document to the judge. The judge signed the document.

No Show Date. Rita was out of town on a vacation. She went to the casino to gamble on blackjack. Rita was surprised she was losing money on her first hand. She called her husband and told him she couldn't make it. Her husband promised to call her next week so she could get a date.
Amazon. We were vacationing in Seattle. We wanted to check out some shops. We went to the local bookstore in the city. We bought a few different books. We went home and read them.

Like Old Times. Sally thought it was a good idea to go to the movies. She and her husband went back to the theatre and bought snacks. They watched all the recent releases that were in the theatres. They saw a movie that they had all seen before. They couldn't wait until it was time to go home.
Counting Change. Gina wanted to buy some candy. But it only cost $1. She decided to count change instead. When she got paid she counted $4. She made the purchase and went to buy the candy.

Dave's Music Store. Dave has a music store in his basement. Dave loves to play the recorder and record his music. One day, Dave's daughter came by with some books to sell. Dave was so excited that he let the daughter get the books. Now Dave has a new album in his basement!

Having Wine. Tanya decided to get some wine. She drove to the local wineries to see what was on sale. She bought three bottles. When she got home, she took them home to drink them. Tanya was so excited she almost had a panic attack.

Jack Instructs His Barber. Jack was a very skilled barber. He made the cuts very neatly. His barber was happy to help Jack. Jack made a great first impression on his barber. The barber recommended Jack for future work.

The Painter. Nita loved painting. She took lessons every week. She began painting a landscape for her son. He liked it so much, he asked Nita to paint his room. Now he loves his room with its own paintings!
New scarf. Susie got a new scarf yesterday. She loved it. Unfortunately it fell apart. Susie was disappointed. She had to throw it away.
Water. Tom was on vacation. He wanted to enjoy nature. He went for a hike. He fell into a stream. Tom survived.

Hungry. Sophie was very hungry. She didn't want to cook but she knew she had to. She went to the kitchen and opened her fridge. She found all the food she'd been missing. She decided to make a huge meal for herself.

No Party Guests. Sam's birthday was coming up soon. He hadn't seen his parents in months. Sam asked his friends if they could throw him a party. They decided to take him out on a date. Sam was so excited and had a great time.
Chickens. I wanted to become more healthy. I decided to get chickens. I looked online for a good chicken farm. I visited a farm in Nebraska. I purchased five chicken coops and raised chickens.

Melting. The melted chocolate looked amazing on the counter. He put it back in the freezer. He was going to make more tonight. He accidentally spilled chocolate on the stove. Melting was a huge issue.

Sock escapade. My sister in law had a big sock party last weekend. She invited me and I to go, although I am disabled. While there, she gave me a pair of socks to wear. She also gave me some cute socks to put on. I liked the socks and gave her a lot of compliments.

Weight Lifting. I decided to start lifting weights. I went to the gym and bought a new dumbbell. I went to the weightlifting area and lifted ten dumbbells. I then went to the bench press area and worked up my bench press. After my workout, I ate some ice cream.
The Dog. The dog ran away. They called the number on the tag. The owners called the number. The owners came to pick up their dog. The owner was happy to see their dog.

watching tv. I was feeling very bored and decided to try watching tv. I grabbed a remote and went to find a show. After a few minutes of searching, I found a show. I turned on the tv and watched it. It was good and I was no longer bored!

The Horse. I decided to take a hike in the woods today. I began my hike about 10 miles away from home. I heard a rustling in the trees. I turned around and saw a large horse. I ran away and never returned.

Thanksgiving Session Ruined. Amber and Tim were going to have a family dinner. All of a sudden, their dishwasher broke down. They ran out to the store to get one. Amber had the dinner without waiting. She burned the turkey and gravy.

Computer. My friend Bill bought a new computer. He wanted to get it out of storage. The pictures of it were so great, he kept them on his computer. He put it up for sale. The buyer gave him money for his troubles.
escaped. The teacher went to the office. She opened the office door. A girl ran out of the room. The teacher had to take her out. She never went back into the class.

Eric's Brunch Date. Eric was going on a date with a girl named Tami. Eric was very nervous about meeting her. Eric arrived at Tami's house to find her house to be a mess. Eric met with Tami for her brunch. Eric felt relieved when he found out that she was nice!

Amber's Halloween. Amber loves halloween. She gets dressed up for a fun night of fun. She loves eating candy and making costumes. She gets tons of compliments from friends and family. She is having the best halloween yet!

Bob Goes Sledding. Bob loved to go sledding. He would sled down the hill at the park. Bob loved to try out new sled designs. One day, he tried out a new design that was too fast. Bob got out of the sledding park and took a fall.
Cards. Kate had a card collection. She spent most of them on candy. She decided to make a new card set. She got to work on the cards. She made so many she had no room to put them all.
The Vase. The family was cleaning their kitchen. They found an old vase in the kitchen. They cleaned it up. It was full of holes! The vase was ruined.
Math. I loved to study math. When it was time to take a test I did very well. I took it again and scored higher. I was happy but I knew I wasn't going to pass. I never studied the subject again.

Unjust Justice. The officer tried to grab the prisoner's keys. In response, the prisoner grabbed a broom and smashed the officer. The officer was severely injured. A bystander noticed that he was unconscious. He called an ambulance.
Well Done. Tia was eating at a fast food place. She didn't feel well. She decided to order a pizza. She ordered a 12" pizza. She was too tired to finish the pizza.
Too Much to Drink. Tom was at a party. It was too much to drink. Tom wasn't able to make it through it. His friends convinced him to drive home. Tom was too drunk to drive.

Elephants. A group of elephants traveled to a nearby zoo. The elephants explored the large zoo until they reached the elephant barn. The elephants fed the antelope feeders. The group of elephants left the zoo to check out. The elephants returned later to see if the antelope had any milk.
The Writer. The woman was a great writer. She was invited to write for a magazine. She wrote a lot of articles. The writer's articles were very popular. The woman is now a famous writer.

Boat ride. Fred loved going boating. One day, Fred decided to try his new boat. As he was out on his boat, he saw a big storm. Fred had to leave his boat and go home. After that day, Fred never wanted to go boating again.
Ascension. Jim wanted to see the stars. He joined the Navy. He spent four years in the navy. He then became an astronaut. Now Jim is an astronaut.
Carl Corn. A farmer was cutting down his corn. He picked out a large clump. Then, he went to grab a knife. Carl cut into the corn by hand. He made a huge mess and had to clean it all up.

Special B-Day. Cynthia really wanted a promotion. So she had a huge party to get a special badge. All her friends came to the party and got her the badge. Her friends were impressed with Cynthia's party. But Cynthia was disappointed to find out it cost ten thousand dollars.
Bike. A man named Bob bought a new motorcycle. He brought it home and rode it around town. A cop pulled him over one night. The cop saw Bob was speeding. The cop wrote Bob a ticket.

Jack Goes to the Dentist. Jack was very worried about his teeth. He asked his parents for some advice. His parents told him to brush every day. Jack brushed everyday and felt much better. Jack's teeth had become better!

Vacation. Sue and her family planned a vacation to Vegas. The family was ready to leave when the plane took off. They had already missed their flight so they decided to stay in. They were so excited to leave that the thought of flying didn't even occur. Sue and her family spent the whole vacation relaxing at the beach.

Ugly Baby. Gina's brother's baby was eating his own hair. Her parents had to cut it off to keep him safe. She felt like an evil person. She put the baby in her room to think about it. There, she decided that she was better off forgiving him.
The Hike. Tom and his friend went on a hike. The trail went up a lot of mountains. Tom got really tired. He decided to take a break. Tom was fine the rest of the hike.

Honeymoon Rodents. My sister-in-law's son, Tom, lives in NYC. Tom is married to the same woman as his sister in law. Tom's sister in law is very inflexible. She will not let Tom go outside without being accompanied. Tom is going to stay in NYC for awhile longer.

Mama's Bell Tower. Dora's favorite toy was a bell tower. Dora's mom took her to an amusement park. Dora rode the ride and played with the other kids. As the ride reached it's end Dora started to cry. Her mom told her that they were leaving and it was time to go home.

Fire Alarm. We had an air conditioner at our house for a couple of days. It was keeping the house cooler than it otherwise would have been. The other day it went out at one of the windows. It ignited and started a small fire. Luckily the fire department put it out.
dicing chef. Diane went to an Italian restaurant. She ordered an octopus dish. She told the waiter the order. The waiter brought her the octopus. Diane paid for the octopus dish.

Bailey. Bailey had been on a long run. She decided to stop to eat a snack in the park. Bailey stopped and sat down to eat. She was eating chips when she got a stomach ache. Bailey ran back to her car to get a water.
Squirrel!. My daughter went to the park with her family. The park was full of squirrels. They started to run after each other. My daughter laughed. But the squirrels were very loud and annoying!

Missed Flight. Jake was supposed to be flying out of San Francisco on his trip. Jake set his phone to silent while boarding the plane. While trying to make calls, the plane landed in Washington, DC. Jake got off the plane and drove for ten hours. He missed his flight by an hour.

Tummy Ache. I had been sitting down for a few minutes when I felt a sharp pain. I was having a minor tummy ache. I took a stool sample and it was a large pincushion. I had to be rushed to the emergency room. I ended up staying in the ER for several hours.
Poor Toby. Toby was in a bad mood. Toby felt like he deserved everything he was having. He yelled at his friends to fight. Eventually Toby's friend got upset at him. Toby apologized.

Escape From Spanish Camp. Tom was part of a Spanish speaking group at a Spanish camp. Tom was not a Spanish speaker but he enjoyed being around the kids. He started to have doubts about Spanish. One day he had an argument with the kids and they forced him to leave. Tom now only speaks Spanish and only in Spanish.
beautiful. Maddie wanted to go on vacation. She could not decide where to go. She found a resort with amazing beaches. She booked the trip. Maddie had a great time on her trip.

Rufus Rides the Bus. Rufus is riding his city bus home from work. He notices that he hasn't bought his lunch yet. He doesn't have time to go to the store before his bus leaves. He decides to get a sandwich at the nearby deli. Rufus loves the sandwiches on his city bus home.

Time Goes. I met up with this cute guy at the library one day. We walked the aisles together and talked for an hour. Then we decided to hang out that night. We met at my house and spent the night talking and playing board games. I think he is going to move in next week.

Dirty Sheets. I decided to wear my favorite outfit to work. After the meeting, I took my clothes off. After washing them, they were filthy. I took them to the cleaners to get them cleaned. When the cleaners came, the clothes were finally clean.

Apple picking. It was time to pick apples at the farm. I drove to the field and got some bags out of the trunk. I spent the day going through the fields looking for apples. Finally, I came back with enough apples to make a pie. Then, I made the pie and we enjoyed it at home.

Popcorn Problems. My nephew and I went to the movies. We both had trouble with popcorn. We went back to our seats. There was a box of popcorn under the seat. We were able to get it and we did not have to return it.

Peachy. Beth wanted to buy a new wardrobe for prom. She could not find anything she thought would be cute. She ended up asking her friend what she should wear. Beth's friend suggested she wear a dress with a lot of peaches. Beth loved the dress and wore it the next prom.

Missed Trip. Tom was on vacation. He had just arrived and was waiting in line. He was able to get his drink just in time. Once the line got moving he accidentally got trampled. His glasses flew out of his hands and were ruined.

Christmas Vacation. It was the last day of the school year. We were all in a dorm and we all decided to take a walk. All of us were enjoying ourselves when we saw a school bus. The bus was driving to a holiday party for kids. I had to wait for the bus to get to the party.

Carlsbad Caverns. Every year the Carlsbad Caverns have a water festival. They have the annual water festival when the water level drops. It is free to the public and everyone attends. The festival begins at noon and lasts until dark. After dark the water level drops and people go home.
Man from peru. Joe is a great artist. He had some sketching inspiration. He decided to paint a portrait of a man from Peru. Joe was nervous about doing it. It turned out great.

Garbage Day. Linda was tired of seeing the garbage in her room. She made a plan to have a picnic outside. She bought many things for her family to eat. At the picnic she played with the animals for hours. She felt happy that she could spend all day outdoors.

The Trip. The family planned a vacation. They looked up all the activities and activities. They chose to go to the Grand Canyon. They had a great time on their trip to the Grand Canyon. They felt sad that they didn't get to go to the Grand Canyon.

Gingerbread. Mara bought a box of cookies. She decided to make some gingerbread for a party. As she was baking the cookies, she realized something. She was out of butter. She had to find a substitute for the butter.

Stepparent Blues. Dan recently was informed he would have his third child by next week. Dan was upset he would not be able to spend his time with his child. Dan was sad he would miss out on the fun of seeing his child play. Dan knew his only way to fix the problem was to move to Florida. Dan decided he would move to Florida to be closer to his child.
My Best Friend. There was a boy named Jim. He always wanted a best friend. So when he was twelve he asked his mom. She gave him one but he didn't like it. So after six years he was alone and lonely.
Soda. Lina loved soda. Her brother liked to drink it. Lina thought it was gross. One day she threw a huge soda in his face. The next day she made him a new one.
Home is best. Joe was on his way home. He had been at work for a long time. He got home to find his wife. He was very tired. He called her, his wife was at the hospital.

Indirect Attack. I tried to write an essay for a class project. Although I was confident in my abilities, my teacher told me to stop. He told me that my essay was boring. I tried to explain that I was trying to write an actual novel. Although I tried, he still gave my essay a failing grade.

Two More Books. I've been thinking a lot about books. I decided to go out and buy a few more books. I bought a lot more than I thought I would. I brought them home and started reading them. I finished them two more books and started a new series.

Late Mail. Kia was expecting a package by the time she woke up. It never came. When she checked the tracking, it was not there. She had no idea what happened. Finally, she called customer service to complain.

Daily Walk. Every morning I take a short walk around the block. I also take my coffee break at that time. Today I noticed I had stopped for coffee. I ran back home and put on my shoes. Today is my usual walk around the block.
The Big Date. Tim had a crush on his classmate. He decided to ask her out. He asked her to a movie. She agreed. Tim and his date went out for drinks.

Giving up Tinder. I met my boyfriend on Tinder in 2013. We went on a few dates and became fast friends. We talked about our lives a lot and spent lots of time together. He decided to get rid of Tinder and cut off communication. I stopped being friends with him and stopped using it.

Conference call. We got a call from our boss yesterday. She said our new sales team leader would be coming to the office. We all dressed up in our best clothes to go meet him. When we got there, he was very nice and we got on with the conversation. After, we all enjoyed a nice lunch and company.

New Additional. Linda was really nervous about prom night. She was afraid she would not have any friends or be popular. On prom night, Linda made the best of the situation. She went out with a group of friends and met a great girl. Linda had a great night and didn't feel so nervous after prom.

Eggs. Joe's mom had cooked an egg for breakfast. Joe had never seen a real egg. He watched in horror as the yolk fell to the ground. He had never seen that happen before. He was confused as to what kind of egg that was.

Hurricane Gloria. Hurricane Gloria was a strong storm. The storm made landfall in Louisiana on August 12, 2006. The state of Louisiana experienced a few tornados. Many people were killed in the hurricane. Hurricane Gloria was named after a local restaurant in Louisiana.

Train. Dan had a hard time in class. He could not concentrate on his work. Dan's father was a coach at the local school. The coach was angry about Dan not being able to concentrate. Dan ended up skipping his next class.

Bad weather. We are supposed to be going to church today. But it looks like the weather is going to be bad. I am sure my car will not be able to go. I am sure my kids won't be able to go. We will have to cancel the trip.

party all night. I went out to a party with some friends last night. After a while everyone was falling asleep. I started to feel really tired but then woke up. My friend invited me back home. So I went home and rested.
Fallen. It was Christmas morning. And the girls were playing together. But they felt something touch their feet. And they fell to the ground. Their mom had accidentally sprinkled the snow.
Jake buys a car. Jake was feeling depressed. He decided to drive to the store. While at the store he met a man. The man wanted to buy a car. Jake bought the car and now Jake is no longer depressed.
Chile. My friend was in Chile. They were teaching him to cook. He made some interesting recipes. They sold them in stores nearby. He made over $300 from them.

Restaurant. Anna was craving pasta but didn't want to cook. Then her mom suggested that they order pizza. At first Anna was worried - but it was a good idea. She was glad that her mom wouldn't have to cook for her! She even managed to finish her dish and didn't get sick.

Jasper Uses Air Conditioning. Jasper has a very hot house. He realizes that he should air condition his house. Jasper purchases a cool room fan. Jasper adjusts the fan to the right temperature. Now Jasper's house is cooler.

Training for a Race. Tina decided to train for a marathon. She had been training for years. Finally the day of the race arrived. Tina got ready and got on the train. Tina went to the race and did great!

Better with Glasses. I tried my eye first to see how well I was seeing. I needed glasses, because my eyesight was so poor. I got an eyepatch to wear over my glasses. I put the glasses on to see the sky well. I was happy to see that the sky was clear, despite my glasses.
New apartment. Allie needed a new apartment. So she went to the real estate agent. Allie found the perfect place. She found out it was a 5 bedroom apartment. Allie could not wait to move in!

The Unnoticed Costume. Sandy was walking in a store. She was looking at a costume for a Halloween party. A woman wearing a red and blue suit walked up to Sandy. Sandy knew that she didn't like the costume at all. She decided to leave since she didn't like it.

100 lb. weight loss. I went on a diet. I had a lot of sugar in my diet. My doctor told me I needed to lose 100 lbs. I was shocked by the amount of weight I lost. Now I don't have any sugar in my diet.

New Game. Ken's friend Tony had invited him to his house for dinner. Ken was excited to meet Tony. Ken was nervous to go to Tony's house. Ken played his first game with Tony. Ken won the first game and Tony was excited for Ken to have fun.

The Diploma. Hannah was failing two classes. She applied for a diploma. The school said they would give her one if she improved. She was so discouraged, she dropped out. She didn't get the diploma and she never tried again.

The Leftovers. Barry was trying to cook dinner. He was hungry but didn't have anything ready. Barry got a pan and started to cook. Barry realized that he had left some food on the stove. Barry cleaned up the food.

Catsup. My wife had a cat that did not like to travel by air. We tried to convince her to try cat carrier. We had the cat in her carrier for a week. Her carrier broke halfway through the trip. The cat ended up resting in our garage for one week.

Nervous Edna. Edna was a very nervous lady. She wanted to attend the prom but she had not gone yet. Her father was so worried that he would not let her go. One day, Edna invited her best friend, Mary to the prom. Edna's father allowed her to go and she had a great time at the prom!

Bob Gets Contacts. Bob was bored with his glasses. He went to the store to buy some contacts. He bought some lenses from the eye doctor. He put them on his eyes and went to school. Bob was no longer bored with his glasses.

Sleep Over. I woke up this morning to the sound of my alarm. I rolled over to the front door and peeked out. I saw my friend Todd waiting for me at the door. I waved and he waved back. We made plans to sleep over this weekend.

Carl. Carl liked to read and write. He had trouble finding an audience for his books. He felt that he was missing something. One day he posted his last book on Amazon. He was happy to see people were interested in his books!

Deep Cut. A man was shaving his face. He accidentally shaved his face too short. He had trouble adjusting his clothes. He had to go to the store to buy a wig. The wig gave him trouble adjusting his clothes.

produce. I was walking home one day when I saw a man in a field. He was selling fresh produce. I decided to buy some and bring it home. I began to pick apples from the field. I was glad to see the man selling fresh produce.

Cats. Sam always wanted a cat. He always dreamed of having one. When he was ten he begged his parents for one. His parents finally caved in and let him have a cat. Sam became very happy with his new cat.

Hair Cut. Tina went to the barber for a new haircut. She was nervous about the hair cut. After the hairdo was done Tina saw a large, beautiful cat. The cat's fur was so fluffy and soft. Tina was very happy with her new, hair cut cat.

Anaconda. Carson wanted a puppy. His parents thought he was responsible enough. His parents took him to the pound and set him up with some. They got him the cute little puppy he wanted. Now he's part of the family and a great puppy!

The Surprise. Timmy had been asking his mom for a new video game for a long time. She told him if he gets a new game he can get one. Timmy eagerly waited for the next game to come out. When he got home and checked his cabinet his games were missing. His mom had hidden all of them in the basement.

View from the top. I have been working on a novel. I am going to use it to promote my book. I am writing a chapter about a young girl. I am going to use my view of the world to write the chapter. I think it will be fun to share my perspective on life.

A pair of shoes. Dylan was shopping with his mother. They were checking a pair of boots out. His mother told him that she was not sure about the boots. The next day, Dylan got a call from the store. They told him they were dropping the price of the boots!

Video Store. My son's friend Joe is from NH. Joe just came back from New York. He was playing in the video store at the video rental store. He got a new game. Joe said he was very happy with his new game.

food fight. Tom was at a fast food restaurant. He ordered a cheeseburger. As Tom was eating the burger his stomach started growling. He quickly yelled at the waiter. The waiter came back and fixed Tom's food.
A Better Lunch. Sam wanted a better lunch. He started eating healthier foods. He lost 10 pounds. Sam started feeling better. He ate a better lunch.

Counterattack. Two groups were fighting each other. The enemy group suddenly gained a significant advantage. They decided to fight back. They all joined in. The enemy forces were defeated and the peace talks failed.

ADHD. One day, my son had to take an IQ test. He was really nervous about it. I tried to help him relax and calm down, but it didn't work. He had to give me the information. I told him it was not really his fault.

The Inept Football Team. One day, a football team was playing in a game. The game was tied and the score was really close. Everyone kept calling for a touchdown. The quarterback threw the ball and it went over the receiver's head. The ball bounced into the stands and they all cheered for the home team.

Lego Designer. Mattie had a birthday party. His little sister and her friends helped decorate. Mattie asked if he could do the lego. His little sister wanted him to do their clothes. He got to work, and everyone loved his work.

The Dining Set. Tom wanted to get a new dining set. He went shopping for dining sets and found some he liked. He found a great set for a reasonable price. He picked it up and went home. Tom was happy with the new dining set.
New Shoes. Jenna had to go to the mall. She had to buy new shoes. The shoes she wanted were not available. Jenna went to a shoe store. Jenna finally had a pair of shoes she liked.

Wife. My wife is a very religious person. She prayed before eating breakfast this morning. I was confused why she didn't pray before dinner. She said that it was just the way her husband does things. Now she has to stop saying it and start praying.

The New Garden. Riley was a gardener. He was growing lots of flowers in his garden. One day, his garden went missing. A search party found Riley's garden. He was excited and started working on it right away.

Angela 4. Angela decided to stay home with her cat. Angela's cat was not feeling well and was vomiting. Angela visited the veterinarian for help. The veterinarian gave Angela medication. The medication helped Angela's cat.

School Board Victory. The school board was going to meet at the meeting place. They were considering several new rules. They discussed them for half an hour. Finally, the entire board voted for the changes. They felt very good about their decision to make the changes.

Coffee Break. Dan wanted to take a long overdue shower. But it was Sunday and he didn't want to get in the shower. He decided to make some coffee while he waited. When Dan came back from the shower, his coffee was hot. Dan realized he had forgotten to put water in the water reservoir!

Portia Plays Badminton. Portia was bored one day. She decided to go to the park to play badminton. At the park, she met several other people. They played badminton together. Portia found that badminton was fun.

Veronica's Bush. Veronica loved to garden in her yard. She had a large garden, and planted a lot of different flowers. One day, Veronica found her neighbor's bushes were bare. Veronica picked up the big bush and put it in her neighbor's yard. Veronica felt happy, and planted a flower garden in her yard.

Mom and the Car. Mom's car was old and worn out. She had finally had enough of it and started to make repairs. She didn't have much money, so she had to sell some of her things. Unfortunately the car had already been sold to someone else. That meant losing the house she loved, along with all her memories.
