Marty. Marty is a man who was fired from his job. He has a problem and applies for a new job. He gets a call from the new job asking him to come in for an interview. Marty shows up and gives his best shot. The new boss tells Marty he's his man and Marty is promoted.

Traveling. It was time for a change, so Ben decided to travel. He booked a trip to Paris. Ben spent one whole week in Paris and loved every second. He didn't want to leave when his time was up, but he did. Ben learned that he needs to travel in his life.
Better Cardio. The man worked out every day. The cardio didn't improve. He decided to do sprints instead. It improved his cardio. He kept doing sprints.

Metamorphosis. The caterpillar's back was turning dark green. The caterpillar suddenly emerged from its cocoon. The caterpillar started changing shape. It got a huge head and a small body. It turned into a cocoon.

Friends at the Arcade. My friend's son loves to play arcade games. I stopped going to the arcade because I thought he would be sad. When I went back, I asked him if he was happy. He told me he was and he told me he'd never be sad again. I told him that he was right.

New Science. My physics teacher asked us to write a short essay about a new science. I went online and found one I liked. I found it on Amazon and ordered it. It came a few days later and I read the paper in it's entirety. The paper was good but I am glad it's online now so I can be lazy.
Ruined blanket. I woke up to find out my blanket was ruined. I was angry because the blanket was purple. I asked my mom to buy me a new blanket. My mom gave me a new blanket. I love the new blanket.

Grandpa Fish. Dan wanted to buy his grandchildren a fish. He went to the pet store to look for one. While looking, Dan saw an alligator that he didn't like. Dan thought for sure the alligator would not be his choice. However, Dan saw a baby alligator in the store and bought it.
Windy Accident. I went to the park one day. It was incredibly windy. I was walking on the path when it started to blow my hat. I lost my hat. I left the park and had to go home.

A Walk in the Park. John and Sarah were walking around their neighborhood. They found a nice bench by the park. John and Sarah sat on the bench and listened to music. They enjoyed each other's company. They left the bench and went home.

Yacht Story. Jenny went on a yacht with her family for the first time. She was very excited to see the different areas. Jenny tried her best to find the perfect spot. She finally found a spot and the whole family got on. They had so much fun that they were happy to stay.
Curly hair. I've always been really straight. My girlfriend tried to encourage me to straighten it. I did and it looked great. We then became roommates. She said that I look awful with curly hair.

Loud Alarm. Tom's alarm clock didn't go off every night. He went to his nearest store to get a new one. After replacing the battery, it didn't go off anymore. Tom checked and realized his old battery was dead. He replaced it himself and it went off once again.
Online deals. Nina went to the store. She looked for the best deals. She found a few deals. She went home and checked them out. She found some great deals.
Crush. I wanted to date a boy. I asked around. I asked my friends. I asked my crush to hang out. We ended up dating.

Keys Overboard. Kate's cat had stolen her keys. She tried to use them on the sidewalk, but it was too slippery. She put her keys back and looked for her phone. She finally found it in the car. She was able to fix the situation herself.

Chef. Tim was a great chef. He learned to use many different cooking techniques. He was also a great listener. One day, he decided to quit his job to become a chef. He now is a chef for a large corporation.

Don't Try This At Anywhere. I was drunk at the mall. I tried to buy a cell phone on the sidewalk. The salesman refused to sell me a cell phone. He didn't have a word for me. He laughed at me when I said something else to him.
Movie. The man went to the movies. He bought two tickets. He sat in the theater. He had a good time. The tickets were too expensive.
The Shower. I took a shower today. It felt very good. I loved the feeling. My friend told me I looked great. He said I was very handsome!

Salesman. John was the town's only salesman. He would come into people's houses to sell their cars. John got tired of seeing people leave their cars unsold. John made up his mind to quit his job. John now sells cars on Craigslist.

Shoes. I had a pair of beautiful white shoes that I wore every day. They were my favorite shoes and everyone complimented them. One day I went to buy a new pair but the shoes I wanted were sold out. I then asked my best friend who knew about shoes. She recommended a pair of red shoes which fit me perfectly!

Crime. There was a man running through the street. A car sped by and he was shot in the foot. He had no money and no family to call for help. Luckily, a passerby was nearby to lend him a few bucks. He called the police and they shot him.
greedy. The family was eating dinner. They noticed they had too many hot dogs. They decided to share them. They were hungry later that night. They didn't mind sharing the hot dogs.
Camp. Tim was at summer camp. They all pitched in and saved a truck. Tim thought he had a good time. He did not. Tim had to go back home the next day.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own. Daniel was unhappy with his small, one bedroom apartment. Daniel decided that he wanted a bigger house. He moved to a larger house a few blocks away. Daniel loved the small house but he was glad to live on his own. Daniel moved back to his small apartment.
Being sick. I went to the doctor last week. The doctor said that I was going to be sick. He recommended that I take the flu pill. I took the flu pill and slept for a few days. Now I feel much better.
Depew. Neil had to go to Depew. It was on the border of Slovakia. He had to go in the car. It was very scary. He thought it would be like Disneyland.

GENGHIS. There once was a girl named Megan. She loved the music of the Black Keys. Her favorite band was called Gently, My Love. When she moved to Los Angeles, she tried to get tickets to a concert. She was denied, so she wrote a song about the experience.
The Blanket. Tim was going camping. His dad gave him a blanket. It was so warm! Tim slept in the blanket the whole time. He was glad he had that blanket.

Canceled Playdate. John and Jane were having a playdate. Jane ran off before the end of the play. John felt bad and decided to call her parents. They were upset but understood. John let Jane have a weekend free before she returned.

The Paddleboard. Mike was learning how to paddle. His father had bought him a nice paddleboard. He pushed himself out on it in the yard. He felt like a real kid! He swam so much that he almost drowned.

Mark has a bad tooth. Mark's teeth were very bad. So he wanted to see a dentist. He asked his parents to take him to the dentist. His parents took him to the dentist. Mark got a root canal and his teeth were better.
Song. Ida wrote a song for the band. She put it online. The band liked the song. The band played the song at a gig. Ida's song was played for everybody.

The Doctor. Caleb was starting at a new school and couldn't wait. The first day of school he was paired with a boy who was the same age. He went to class with the boy who was the same age. He noticed that Caleb had an unusual amount of energy and height. He thought Caleb would do great and the two became best friends.

Collapse. My building has a large storage area. One day the storage area collapsed. The entire floor was covered in water. All the water drained to the basement. The manager spent a few days cleaning the floor.
Nick's babysitter. Nick was playing at home. His parents were gone. He had to babysit by himself. He tried to help his mom. But he ended up making a mess.

Ellen's Job. Ellen has a job where she is a babysitter. Ellen wants to go back to school. Ellen applies for a college in her town. Ellen is denied entry to college because she has no credits. Ellen now works at a fast food restaurant.

James Takes a Risk. James decides he would like to be more adventurous. He decides to take a vacation. James boards a plane to go to Mexico. During the flight, a strong storm hits. James is soaked during his trip to Mexico.

Ruth wants to play too. Ruth had always wanted to be in the marching band. Ruth's parents told her they would not let her join the band. Ruth practiced very hard to impress her parents. One day she was asked to join the marching band. Ruth was very proud that she had finally become a band member.
The Star. I woke up this morning. I saw the big blue ball. I walked outside and began to look at it. It was a beautiful clear blue. I took a picture and kept it forever.

Cookie Trouble. Gina had a new friend. The girl was not paying attention to the cookies she was eating. Gina walked up to her to talk about it. The girl began to yell at Gina for spilling the cookies. The girl was upset that Gina brought cookies to school.

The Elephant. When I was a kid, I saw an elephant. I loved it so much, that I wanted to be an elephant. The problem was, that elephant was actually a baby elephant. So I decided that I would make an elephant out of clay. The elephant was born and lived until I was an adult.

Uber to the Rescue. Cora didn't know what her cat was doing. He was wandering around in the house. Finally, she decided to call an Uber. The Uber came and took Cora to the vet. They made it clear she had to clean up her mess before she got back.
Big Sale. The carnival was having a big sale. The workers all crowded around. They were selling cotton candy. Suddenly, they all ran out of candy. The carnival workers all had to clean up their mess.

Todd's nap. Todd had a big meeting in the morning. He wanted to go to sleep early. He grabbed some wine and coffee. He set his alarm and went to sleep. When he woke up the sun was shining and the coffee was gone.

Room with a View. Joe's parents wanted him to go to the zoo with them. So Joe's parents took him to the zoo with them. Joe was afraid of the animals at the zoo. Joe's parents got Joe lots of books to help him with his fear. Joe had fun with his family at the zoo.
Too Close. Sam walked around the lake. He went to the side and noticed there were ducks. He tried to swim back. The water was too deep and he almost drowned. Sam had to swim back to the shore.

Cello Practice. Sandy's cello was in terrible shape. She wanted to be a cello player, but was nervous about trying. She bought a few pieces and started taking lessons. She worked hard every single day. Soon, she was a great cello player.

Smoking or no smoking. Eddie was a heavy smoker. He smoked for ten years. Eddie's wife asked him if he wanted to quit. Eddie never had a good answer to her question. Eddie eventually decided to just be honest and tell her.

the fort. Evan was building a fort out of wood. He spent all morning building a wall and towers. He thought he could conquer anyone! But to his surprise no one was standing against him. They were just as eager as he was to see who would go first.

Yin's Chopsticks. Yin had always wanted to learn to play the piano. One day, his family took him to a piano concert. Yin felt that he did not have the right instrument. When they left, he was upset to see that he had bought the piano. However, the performance was the best one he had ever had!
Racer. Ava was on the track team. She was the fastest girl on the team. She challenged a runner with a faster time. They ran the race together. Ava ended up winning the race!

Mommy. Amy was very upset her baby sister was having so much trouble. She felt like she deserved better. One day her mother let her take the day off. The baby cried when her mom left for work. Amy decided to take a day off to help the baby.
Crying Baby. My baby began to cry in class. He kept trying to say stop. I couldn't figure out why he was crying. I asked my teacher. She explained that he was just being babyish.

ironing board. Joe's ironing board was broken. So Joe went to the store to get an iron. Joe bought an iron. Joe put the iron on the broken ironing board. Joe used the iron on his ironing board to fix it.
Cough Drops. John's throat hurt. He kept sneezing. He asked his mom for some cough drops. His mom gave him a couple. His throat felt better within a few minutes.

Tough Allergies. Tim was allergic to his entire class. He was stuck in class for 2 hours. After a long, tiring day, Tim felt very sick. He got the same shot he got at the doctor's office, but it hurt more. It left him in pain for another 3 hours and was a total waste of time.
Looking for Moutai. Logan was hiking in the mountains. He was trying to find a good spot for a campsite. He could not find it anywhere. Finally he decided to go back to the car. He had found Moutai!

gMail Spam Filter. My gMail spam filter was very slow. It was very difficult to understand what was being sent to me. I made a script to allow the spam filter to use more email addresses. My script worked very well. I was pleased with my work.

The Worst Doctor. Bill wanted to take the SAT exam for medicine. He studied for weeks to become a better doctor. On the day of the exam Bill felt ill. He could barely speak and his eyes were closed tightly. Bill was so disappointed that he never took the test again.
The Forest. John was on his way to the woods. He needed to clear his mind. He had to think of something to do. He decided to go inside and think. John was able to clear his mind and stay calm.

Potato Chips. Gina wanted to make potato chips. She looked at all the different varieties of chips. She decided she would use the red potato chips. Gina bought all the ingredients for the red potato chips. When she was done she tasted them.
Raw Dinner. Tom wanted to feed his family. He cooked a nice meal for them. They ate a good portion. Unfortunately he forgot about it. The next day they were sick.
Dog Grooming. I wanted my dog to look like his owner. I bought him a collar and tie. Then I put him in training school. I taught him how to sit and stand. My dog finally looked like his owner!

The Cable Bill. My cable bill is due today! I have to call several companies to cancel my service. I hope they cancel it so I don't have to pay anymore. I will keep watching my favorite show for free! Thanks, Netflix!
Freda gambles her paycheck. Freda lost her job. She was devastated. Freda couldn't find a job. She decided to start gambling her paycheck. Freda was happy when she started winning more money.

Loans. Jane had a large sum of money that she lent to her daughter. Jane had a friend who worked with her daughter's mom. Jane loaned the money to her friend. The woman owed Jane $500 dollars for the money. Jane told her to pay the money back or she'd sue her.

Jelly Bean Jar. Janice has an amazing collection of jelly beans. She has one in particular that has never been opened. She puts it in her bedroom to be safe, but it is not open. When she opens it for the first time, she starts crying. She has to leave that jar alone and never touch it again.

Bird. I woke up in the middle of the night to the sound of a scratching. I walked into the kitchen to find my cat sitting on the counter. I looked around the kitchen for the source of the noise. I saw a tiny bird in the corner of the kitchen. It had flown away while I was sleeping.

County Fair. Joe and his family went to the county fair. They ate cotton candy and cotton candy dipped in lemon juice. But then they went on a horse-drawn hayride. And when they came out of it, they saw all the rides. The cotton candy rode they'd bought for the whole family!

Poor Kelly. Kelly just got a new baby. Kelly had a hard time feeding the baby. She tried a few things but nothing worked. Eventually she gave up. Thankfully she was able to nurse her baby for a while.
Lost Tooth. Natalie was getting her period at work. She didn't notice a black dot on her tooth. She looked down and saw that her tooth was missing. She went to the hospital. She was luckily not hurt.

Poor Little Girl. My sister was going on her first date. She was going to a fancy restaurant. While walking to the restaurant, she saw a homeless kid begging. She felt bad and approached him. He thanked her, and she took him home and his mom gave him food.

Mentality. Briana was a child raised by an alcoholic mother. She had a hard time coping with the abuse. One day, she became sick from not feeding enough. The doctor suggested that she should become a vegetarian. She went through with it, becoming one of the healthiest people around.

Playing a Video Game. My friends and I play video games together in our room. One day we got bored and decided to play Pokemon Go on our own. We walked down the street to the Pokestop. We walked up the stairs and caught a wild pokemon! We walked home and watched the episode over and over again.
Going to the store. Sam was shopping. He saw a new shirt. He really liked it and wanted to buy it. He had to ask for more money. Sam left without buying the shirt.

Rufus Visits His Son. Rufus hasn't seen his son in years. He decides to surprise him with a visit. At first Rufus feels nervous about his visit. However, when he sees his son he feels very happy. Rufus decides he will never forget the sight of his son.

Fresh Baked Cookies. Tina was baking cookies for her neighbors. She had them in the oven when she got distracted. When she came back she realized the cookies were burned. Tina had to get a refund. She didn't want to spend money again.

Driving with no direction. I was in the backseat of a car on a country road. I decided to take the exit off the highway and head north. The car was going so slowly, that I had no time to stop. The person in the front seat tried to accelerate, but was nowhere in sight. We ended up on a deserted road with nothing to do, and nothing to eat.

Rico's Letters. Rico's parents sent him letters every month. Rico got annoyed that his parents never wrote him. He wrote his parents and asked for letters. Rico's parents agreed. Rico was happy to receive his letters!
The Flight. Sarah went on a cruise. She got on the ship. She boarded the ship. They were about to depart. Sarah got separated from the ship.
Sunshine. I was sitting by the pool one day. It was so clear that I forgot to put on sunscreen. I got a little sunburned. I decided to put on sunscreen after that. Now I'm not as burned as I was.

Caramel Apples. Bella and her family were at the apple orchard. They bought two baskets of apples for the week's dinner. After dinner, she helped her mother pick out a basket. She helped her mother open the apples. Bella watched as the family each picked a sweet looking apple.

Rainy Days. Kim and her friends wanted to spend some time with their parents. The weather looked promising. Kim's mom thought it was a good idea to go on the boat to go fishing. They waited until it was dark before the boat took off. Their fishing trip was the best they had in a while.
Car Accident. Barry was taking his test at the DMV. He had been drinking. Barry drank too much. His eyes started watering as he took the test. He missed the whole test.

Egg Donor. Joe wanted to become an egg donor. He went to the donation center. The center said he was too short to donate. Joe was very disappointed. He went home and ate an omelette for breakfast instead.
New rug. I needed a new rug. I found one that fit perfectly in my room. However, it cost too much money. I decided to save the money by baking a cake. When I was done baking, I had a new carpet!

The Show. It was the first day of the school year. All the kids were excited about their school performances. They got on stage and began performing. They sang and danced and did a juggling trick. They had such a great time that night!
Big Fright. Sammy and Tim were walking home. There was a car in front of them. The car drove very quickly. When it was time to turn, the car accelerated. It slammed into the side of Sammy's car.

Pretty Payback. Kim got a call for a date from her ex-boyfriend. She was not sure she wanted to go but knew he wanted to go. He said he had a surprise for her. When she got to the restaurant there was a surprise in the fridge. Her ex-boyfriend had just brought her a brand new dress.
Earning money with music. I love music. I wanted to earn some money. I looked in my bank. I found a few thousand dollars. I used it to buy some records and I am happy.
Gonna Fly Away. Maggie was riding on a train. Someone threw her hairbrush at her. Maggie got up and started yelling at the person. The train broke down. Maggie hopped off and flew away.

Too Much Time Out. I had to write a letter to my dad today. The letter was a long one so I had to read it many times. The teacher asked me to read some of the letters before I started. When I finished the letter she gave me a C on it. I was very frustrated and I could not get the grade back.

Free Book. Alicia went to the library to check out a book. When she looked at the books there was a lot of free books. Alicia checked out two free books and went to return them. The librarian gave her a very small back check. Alicia gave the library a $10 credit for the free books.

Bad Smell. Tom noticed a strange smell in his apartment. It wasn't in the kitchen or living room. Tom asked around to find the source. It turned out to be coming from a busted up window. Tom cleaned it up and hoped his neighbors wouldn't be upset.
Bad Move. I wanted to move into my parents' house. I asked my parents for the key. However, they did not have it. They said that I would have to move in by myself. I reluctantly moved in by myself.
The New Job. Joe just started a new job. Joe's family is very proud. He is only 22 years old and he is the youngest. His job is to take care of people for the day. Joe's family will be very proud.

Overslept. Tim was always late to work. He never understood why. One day his boss fired him because he overslept. Tim asked why and was told it was because of an old computer. Tim never told his boss but it worked like that anyway.
New kitten. I got a new kitten yesterday. He's very sweet. However he chews up my shoes. He can't get to the door. So I'm going to leave him here.

Liz's Passion. Liz had always loved animals since she was young. She decided to become a veterinarian. She learned so much from her students about caring for animals. She decided to work at a wildlife reserve. Liz now is a professional wildlife caretaker at the reserve.
My first time rock climbing. It was the day I learned to rock climb. I was so nervous. I got up there and put my hands on the rock. I tried to climb it. Unfortunately, I slipped and fell.

The Ruined Dress. Sally had just bought a new dress. She was going to a party later that night. Unfortunately, it began to rain during the party. Sally had to go home early. She could not afford the expensive dress.
The cell phone. Carrie got a brand new cell phone. She needed a friend to text with. She walked up to her friend. Her friend had the same phone. Carrie and her friend began to text.
Race Day!. Joe was driving a semi on the highway. A car appeared on the right of Joe. Joe swerved and the car hit the median. Joe was sent flying. Joe was rushed to the hospital with a broken arm.

Dreams. John had many dreams. His wife told him they were just bad dreams. John still had them, though. One morning they woke him up and told him they were bad dreams. John was so surprised and happy!

Creepy Woman. Sue was walking in the woods alone. She came across a really scary woman. She screamed and ran. She never came out of the woods again. She always wore headphones when she walked in the woods now.

Crusty. Kate bought a can of soup from the grocery store. But it was so hard to open that it ripped the seal off. After opening the soup, she poured it into bowls for her family. But she was shocked to see they were covered in tiny little crumbs! She was horrified and never bought soup from that store again.

Sally learned she likes mustard. Sally didn't like mustard. Her mom bought her a big can. She started mixing in mustard all day long. She learned that she liked mustard. Sally's mom bought her a whole can of mustard.

Prom Dress. Caroline was excited for her prom dress. She had been saving for two months. Finally the day came and she was so excited. The dress was the most beautiful she had ever seen. Caroline wore her dress the rest of the night and was happy.

Soda Pop. Lana had never had a soda pop before. She thought it tasted delicious. Unfortunately she didn't like the taste. She realized she would have to try it again. Lana decided to buy a large soda pop to make it better.

Scuba diving. Lance was an eager diver. He was on a diving trip with his friends. While they were underwater Lance suddenly saw a huge fish. He panicked and pulled his dive mask over his face. They quickly surfaced and the fish was gone, Lance was safe!
Plastic Life. Cora worked in a plastic lab for a factory. She loved working with the plastic. One day, Cora decided to quit her job. Instead she took up art. Cora became a professional artist.

Sick Days. Jim had been working very hard lately. However, he was very sick. Jim called his boss and explained his situation. His boss agreed to let him work off the day off. Jim was able to get to work and rest.
Lost tooth. I was at the dentist yesterday. I had to pay a lot of money for a new filling. I was waiting in line. I was so nervous. Finally, I was the first in line.

The String. Drew was fishing with his dad. They were casting their lines. His dad casted one too hard and it broke into pieces. Drew was so sad. They decided to go home and go to the store to buy some string.

Concert ADventures. My friend was going to a concert. He told me that he could not afford the ticket. I told him that I had the tickets. We drove to the venue together. I saw my friend and he was very appreciative.

Weird Assist. Jane was working on an important essay assignment. Her computer shut down unexpectedly. She left the work area and tried to use the restroom. Her computer restarted. Jane went back to the work area.

Dance Myla Dance. I decided to take my family to the dance. We drove two hours to the dance hall. I waited patiently for my sister to lead her class. When we got there, the other dancers began to dance. We all had a great time dancing with my family.

Logic puzzle beat. When I was a child I always made logic puzzles. My mother made me play with a toy train instead. I found out I could make a train out of cardboard and glue. I got really good at making it myself. I beat a logic puzzle by myself.
Playing Hookey. I was always taught to play hookey. I never learned how to do it correctly. My friend Joe taught me the dance. I practiced very hard. I danced with Joe and got a great score.
Lasagna. My girlfriend wanted to make lasagna. I said I would do the shopping. My boyfriend said he wanted to try it. He hated it. We decided to make it ourselves instead.

Too many babies. Lisa was pregnant. She went to the doctor for a checkup. The doctor told her she had several health issues. He said that she would have an extra baby if she kept having. He gave her some birth control pills and that made her feel better.

Disturbed. Seth was sleeping in class when he started yelling out. The teacher immediately jumped up and called his mom. Her mother immediately picked him up and comforted him. Afterwards, Seth apologized to the teacher. Luckily, the teacher wasn't mad and they became friends.
The Lazy Dog. Joey went to the dog park. He was bored. Joey decided to nap on the swings. He fell asleep. His dog ran away.

Forgiveness. My brother threw a football at me. He also knocked my glasses off my face. I felt very embarrassed in front of my family. My brother took me to the hospital. I never touched a football again.

Stolen fragrance. Tim went to a concert. He took some perfume home with him. The next day, someone else was wearing the same perfume. Tim was accused of stealing the smell. Tim was forced to take it back.

Test. Sam had an English test tomorrow. She stayed up all night studying for it. When she got to class, she was nervous. Sam failed her test. Her teacher gave her a warning to be more prepared tomorrow.
Loans. Bill had loans from friends. Bill decided to make the loans into a company. The company started making bad loans. The company went out of business. Bill's friends were furious at Bill.

Don't Bite. When I was little, I liked to play hockey with my cousins. My cousins and I would go to the backyard and play hockey. Once, my cousin punched me in the face. I told my parents. They told my cousin to stop being so mean.

Chocolate. Tom's favorite thing to eat was chocolate. He decided to make his own chocolate bar. Tom worked at making the bar for months. Finally he had perfected the recipe. Tom was proud that he had made his own chocolate bar.

Closet Game. Timmy loves to play videogames. He has been playing for hours. He decides to take on a challenge. He goes to the closet and stacks all of his games. He now has a large collection of games and can't wait to play them!

Alien Toy. Bobby had been looking forward to the new toy for days. The box it came in was smaller than he expected. As he was walking, the toy fell out of the box. It landed on his knee. Bobby was horrified.

Fishing Time. My uncle took us to fish in a new pond. The pond is a few miles away from where we live. When the sun goes down, they can go fishing. I was really excited because they can't wait til it gets dark. When the sun goes down they go home.

Depression. My aunt and uncle had depression when they were young. We went to see them only once a year for a visit. As time went on they became worse. They got very depressed and refused to see us. I told them I would go if they would just get better.

Carl's Computer. Carl bought a new computer. Carl decided to play a computer game on his computer. The game was very difficult. Carl became frustrated and complained to the salesperson. Carl was unable to play the computer game.
Smoking. Tom and his friends were smoking. They were on a weekend trip. Tom had a pack in his pocket. He wanted to smoke but didn't know how. He used the pocket to roll up some paper and smoke in.

Music. Tim wanted to learn a new instrument. He searched online for guitar lessons. Tim found a tutor in his city. He met the tutor, but soon felt unfulfilled. Tim stopped going to the tutoring service.

Camel. Anna was in the desert with her family. Her family took her camel for a ride. At first, Anna was scared! But then her family showed her how to ride the camel. Anna was so glad she'd joined the family!

Cost. I had to write a speech for my class. I had no idea how to write a good speech. I tried to think of sentences but nothing was coming out. I finally decided to write it out in my head. The words came out beautifully and I was happy.

Tag 2. Nancy always wore a black dress. One day, her sister wore a dress that looked much more formal. She didn't recognize her sister. Nancy pointed it out and they laughed. Now, they don't let their sister wear formal clothes.

Game at the Bar. Tom was playing poker with some buddies. The game went really well. The guys decided to head back to Tom's house. Tom didn't realize it at the time. He was too drunk to recognize it was his house.
Rifle. Gina had been walking her dog. She had her rifle out. She aimed carefully. Then she pulled the trigger. The bullet went through her neighbor's window.

Missing the meteor shower. Allie was at a concert. She wanted to see the meteor shower. When she went to see the meteor shower she missed it. Allie was very disappointed. She did not want to go again.

Tim's new love. Tim had been alone his entire life. He had not really had anyone or anything. One day, he met a girl at a club. Tim fell in love with her right away. Now, Tim is a married man with two beautiful women.

The Carrots. Anna was trying to make some tasty chicken. She chopped up some carrots and put them in the pan. Then she fried them until they were crisp. She served the chicken with her homemade sauce. Her chicken was a great success!

The kings defeat. The king and his army were fighting for land. The king had more troops and was counting on his king to win. The king and his army was running out of time. The king was hit by lightning and was killed instantly. The kingdom changed and they became kingless.

String Bikini. Marissa loved to dance. She decided to start taking dance lessons. She decided to learn how to string a bikini. Marissa practiced and practiced. She eventually got very good at stringing a bikini.
Neck. Tom had a big neck. He decided to get a necktie for the event. He was nervous, as he had never tied it before. The shirt didn't really fit him well. He wore the tie for the event anyway.

my computer mouse. My computer mouse broke. I looked on the internet for a new one. After looking for hours, I couldn't find one. Finally, I found a good looking one. I bought the new mouse and it works great.

Fish Story. Diana was going fishing with her uncle. His fishing rod got stuck on a rock. His uncle had to borrow a truck from his sister. After a few minutes, the fishing rod got free. Her uncle was very happy that he had free fish to feed.

Money Does Buy Love. Jena loved shopping with her boyfriend. They often bought presents for each other. One day, she accidentally bought a present for her boyfriend. Her boyfriend told her that he didn't like any presents. Jena's boyfriend dumped her for never buying him anything.
Lost Dog. Tom lost his dog. He looked everywhere for him. He even got a dog tag out of a box. Tom never found his dog. He learned to always put up signs.

Clowns. We went to an amusement park with my friends and I. We went to one of the big carnival rides that we have to ride. I wasn't sure I was going to ride the big roller coaster. The roller coaster had clowns on it. It was a great ride.
Child Visitation. Tom was going through a divorce. His wife wanted a child. He asked for a job. They could not afford the costs. Tom had to have visitation with his child by himself.

Winter Break. Amy and Beth had been at work for almost six hours. Now, it was time for break. They were both exhausted, but they wanted to relax. They decided to go for a short walk. Afterwards, they decided to just relax on the couch.

Free Samples. Tom went to a restaurant. There was a lot of food he had never seen before. They gave him a big plate of food. He didn't know how to eat it all. He left the restaurant with a large stomach ache.

SnapChat Photos. Darlene loved sharing snapchats with her friends. She got so many that she was having trouble finding time. She was able to make some with her friend's, however. Her friend asked her to post some on Snapchat. Darlene happily obliged.

Ticket. Bethany's car got a flat tire on a local road. She didn't know what to do or where to go. Bethany called her friend, who offered to show her how. He drove her to the nearest gas station. The mechanic fixed her flat tire for free.

Swap Meet Sunday. The county fair had a swap meet on Sunday. My family and I went. We picked out some different colored shirts. We were going to give them to one of the vendors. But we all ended up with the same shirt.

Watching a Movie. I have a friend named Tom. Tom really loves watching movies. He asked to watch an R rated movie with me last night. I reluctantly agreed to watch it. It was terrible and I hope I never watch it again.

Work Day. Timmy's job was to clean the bathrooms at the office. He was excited, but also a bit nervous. He would have to clean it all by himself. So, Timmy practiced cleaning in his car with a friend. When he got to work, everyone loved the smell!

After the Fight. Kia went to bed unhappy. She wasn't happy that her boyfriend dumped her. The next day she went to a bar and talked to a lot of guys. She eventually met a guy she liked. They started dating the next week.

Wardrobe Malfunction. Sam was at a baseball game. He went to change into his uniform. After he changed, his arm hit the back pocket of his uniform. Sam couldn't change his arm into his uniform. He had to go home early.

Jason's camping trip. Jason and his friends went camping. They arrived at the campgrounds. Jason got bored and fell asleep in the woods. He woke up in a tent with a cold drink. Jason had stayed at a cabin for the night.

Golden Glow. Tom noticed a weird golden glow in his hair. He tried combing it out. Unfortunately it was a little too dark for his liking. Tom went to the store to get a lighter color. He managed to get it much brighter.
Basement. Mary went into her basement. She had heard stories of ghosts there. She was scared to go in. She turned on her flashlight. Mary heard nothing.
The carnival. Tim was at a carnival. He saw all these pretty people. He decided to try to talk to them. None of them wanted to talk. Tim just watched them.

Bitten by a Squirrel. We lived in an old abandoned house by the river. One night a squirrel ran into the house through the storm door. The squirrel was injured and I got a big bite. The bite was severe and I had to go to the emergency room. Now I'm very careful when I close the storm door.

Samantha Makes Breakfast. Samantha decided to cook breakfast for herself. She made oatmeal, blueberries, and pancakes. Samantha made pancakes that looked amazing. She decided to have breakfast at work one day. Samantha loved eating breakfast.

Ants. I found some floating on my floor. I decided to wash the water off. The next day, I found many more. I realized the ants must have washed up on the floor. I disposed of them by throwing them in the trash can.
Shaving Cut. Tim was shaving. He lost control of the razor. It flew up his chin. Tim was able to pull the razor down to his eye. He washed it off and it didn't hurt at all.
The Campfire. The kids gathered around the fire. They roasted hotdogs. They got s'mores. They roasted it until it was a huge roaring blaze. They had a great time.

Brick. Sam saw a bunch of bricks laying on his deck. He took them out of the ground and threw them away. He planted a tree next to the bricks. Afterwards, Sam picked up the old bricks. He took them to the city dump.

Sparrow. Bob sat down to watch the news. He heard a scary sound coming from his attic. He crept up the stairs to find the source. He came back down after a few minutes. He told the reporter everything was just fine.

Goals. A man walked into a hardware store looking for supplies. He found a can of paint, and took it home. The man painted a sign to express his new hobby. The store owner saw the sign, and was impressed. The store owner offered to buy the painting from the man.

A Fast Ride. Jim was going to go see a baseball game. The team was playing in a huge stadium. Jim and his friend decided to take the stadium's fast car ride. Jim was shocked at how good he had it. He was amazed at how fast it could really go!

Chinese Broccoli. Lily was cooking dinner for her family. She wanted a special Chinese broccoli. She found a recipe online and made it. Everyone thought she was crazy but they said it was great. When her family ate it, they said it was delicious!

Sand Castle. One day, my daughter and I built a sand castle. We put all the rocks from the beach on a beach table. We also threw in several bottles and a few shells. We decided to sell it when we were finished. When we were done, the table was so big and we couldn't see over the beach.
The Dog. A boy had a dog in his yard. The dog would run away. He had heard a dog crying. He went out to see if the dog was crying. The dog was very happy.

In the Dark, all Cats are Black. Tommy was home alone. He was feeling lonely. He looked up and saw his neighbor standing in the dark. Tommy called the police to tell them where he was. The police found him just a block from his house.

Not funny. Ned went out to eat. He ordered a large burger. Ned's server brought him a salad. Ned got angry because the server forgot to put the salad away. Ned threw his food at the server and stormed out of the restaurant.
The Roller Skates. The kids were bored. They decided to rent a roller skates. They got to play in the park. They ran down the slides. It was a great time!

Maya the Writer. Maya was a struggling writer. She had been rejected every publishing agent she had tried. She finally started submitting her short stories to agents. Soon, she was an agent for over twenty clients! Now Maya is a published author!
Skydiving. We were going skydiving. We had to be at the bottom within 30 seconds. I was afraid of falling. Luckily when we were done we were still happy. It was a fun experience.
Innovation. The couple went shopping. The man went to the store. He bought some flowers. He left them for the woman on the counter. The woman picked the flowers.
Angry man on the bus. I went on the bus yesterday. It was full of very angry people. There was a man who was not speaking. He yelled at everyone. I got off at my stop.

Biking with Noah. Neil was biking down a dark, winding road. Suddenly, a dog ran out in front of him. He was frightened, but then he saw it was a tiny puppy! Neil took the puppy to safety as he carried it home. He was so glad he had chosen to ride his bike in the dark!

Paula Plays Harpsichord. Paula wants to learn to play Harpsichord. She learns the notes of Harpsichord. Finally she plays a solo. Paula is proud of herself. She is happy to have learned to play Harpsichord.

Depression. Mary was a hard working woman. She went to the doctor for a yearly check-up. The doctor checked her blood pressure. His test results revealed she had developed a mild form of depression. She was happy to find out she could go home to recover.

Steps. Sara's friend had gotten a lot of attention at school. One day she was invited to walk the halls with her. She didn't want to because she thought other kids would laugh. But her friends convinced her to do so. They all had fun laughing together!
Harp. I wanted to learn how to play the harp. So I got some lessons and practiced. At first it was hard. But I persevered. Soon I was playing beautifully!

A Dog Savior. Jill got a new dog and her brother. The two dogs were running in the street. Jill grabbed her dog and ran after them. The dogs ran far away from Jill. The dog was found and Jill's brother rewarded her with a new video game.

Baseball Injury. When I was young I played with baseball. I played for a few minutes then threw up. I was so sick I could not play for the next several days. My parents told me I would need to rest for a few days. My baseball game was postponed for several days.

Jump Rope. It was a cold winter day. The Smiths went for a walk. They stopped at a park and went down the sidewalk. While down the sidewalk, they were jumped by a jump rope. The Smiths were so cold, they ran back home and slept warm.
Playing Checkers. Jane was bored. She decided to play checkers with her friend. Jane wasn't good at checkers. Her friend offered to help her learn. Jane went to her friend's house to play checkers.

Cats are crazy. My friends and I were talking about cats. My friend told me cats were crazy. I told him they are not crazy. He was angry and said cats are very real. I didn't argue with him and just left.

Bad pie. Tina was having a pie for her birthday. She had all the ingredients except the crust. When it was time to try it, she was nervous. Yet she got all the ingredients together. She ended up not liking the pie.

Dare. Tim hated school and was often teased. His mother was always warning him not to do anything rebellious. One day he made a list of all the homework and supplies needed for school. He waited until school started so he could finish his homework. But he spent all day doing chores and never finished his homework.

Homework. My friend called me over to help him with his homework. I put him in his room and went upstairs to my room. My friend asked me if I could help him. I went to his room and helped him with his homework. My friend was so grateful that I was happy to help!

The Bad Potter. Nate had made some bad Potter's. His mom found them at his grandparents. He hated having to clean them up. When he was finished, he couldn't believe he ruined them. He had to start from the beginning.

Test Drive. I drove my car today. The new car had a great new sound. The car got very quiet during the test drive. My new car is so quiet that it can't be heard at all. I cannot wait to drive the car home.

Cutting School. I was at my first day of college. I had never cut school before. I was nervous because I thought I would never know how to do it. After my first day, I cut all of my classes and tests. My parents were very pleased that I cut school so well.

Found Wallet. Tim lost his wallet at the mall. He looked all around but couldn't find it. After hours of looking he finally found it. He found the ID of the person who had taken his money. He thanked the person and they exchanged phone numbers.
Bad cold. It was raining outside. We didn't know how cold it would be today. When I opened the fridge, the cold air was there. I opened the freezer. I couldn't believe it was so cold.

Mail. Bob was at the post office. And he realized his mail was being delivered late. Bob complained to the postmaster. And he received a formal warning. But Bob felt angry that his complaint didn't get the response he wanted.

To The Bathroom. I wanted to get clean. I had an hour of cleaning to do. I went to the bathroom and got a towel. I folded it and put it in the washing machine. I washed my sheets and towels, leaving no streaks.

New Sandals. Ginger wanted a new pair of sandals. Her mom took her to the mall to get a pair. Ginger looked for a long time to find a pair she liked. After two hours she was so tired she had to go home. Ginger never found a pair she liked after all.
Going to the drive in. We went to the drive in yesterday. We saw a movie about Vikings. The weather was perfect. I can't wait for the next show. It will be great.

Waste of an Hour. I was working on an online application. My entire project was taking forever. I didn't have any more free time. My boss yelled at me and told me to stop working. I told him that I would finish the project and move on.

Beach Trip. Tom and Sue decided to take a family trip to the beach. They got their bags packed and loaded into the car. Tom and Sue got in the car and drove to the beach. Tom and Sue got out of the car and saw it was closed. They had to wait in the parking lot for 2 hours.

First Day Treat. It was Abby's first day of preschool. She was in line to get her cereal. Abby decided to get a peanut butter cookie. Abby was excited when her teacher gave her the cookie. Abby decided she would like to eat peanut butter cookies from now on.

Jasper Makes Linguine. Jasper was cooking linguine for his girlfriend. He was not sure how good it would be. He put in too much lemon, which gave it a bitter taste. Jasper went to the store and bought a substitute. His girlfriend loved the new recipe.

Thanks!. Sam bought a small, black dog on the internet. The dog didn't seem to like him or his food. His friends called him and said that they had brought it. The dog jumped onto the couch. He was grateful to them.

Planting and growing. Rory was bored with his old, dirty house. He didn't have money to buy a new house. Rory wanted to make something with his hands. He decided to plant a vegetable garden. Rory is happy with his new garden.
Good Deed. Tom was walking home. He saw a lady in a wheelchair. He tried to help her but was too late. She fell down and broke her hip. Tom felt terrible and offered to pay for her hospital stay.
Shark Attack. Bob and his family were on vacation. Bob had never seen a shark up close. One afternoon a shark appeared in the water. Bob was scared. Luckily his wife told him it was just a dolphin.

The stealing friend. Jake was out with friends. He heard that his friend was leaving and decided to steal her. When Jake got to her, he couldn't find her. When he tried looking in different places he couldn't find her. Jake had to ask her to go back to him.

Small Town Jean. I remember when I was young I wanted to move to a small town. I decided to take a bus to the small town Jean. There was no jobs there so I was forced to find work. I finally found work in a hardware store and I moved there. I'm not sure I like Jean.
Stray. Tom was walking home from school one day. He saw a stray dog. Tom approached the dog. The dog wagged its tail. Tom took the dog home.

Checking the mail. Today I realized that my mail was getting late. I looked through the mail box, but there was nothing there. I decided to go to the post office to check it out. I walked in and they gave me my mail. After that I went to sleep.
Face paint as costumes. It was Halloween night. Lily decided she would be a witch. She decided to paint her face pink. Lily felt very silly. She never made that mistake again.
Making pizzas. Tara was making pizzas. She bought all the ingredients. Then she realized she had none in her pantry. She had to borrow some. Luckily her neighbors were willing to help her out.

Scholarship. Sam is a senior in high school. He was very good in school and did well in everything. But he did not do well in his studies. A scholarship program for disadvantaged students was opened up. Sam is now a freshman in college.

The Garage Sale. Timmy liked to buy things from garage sales. One day, he bought a car. Timmy decided to sell it on Craigslist. The car was worth more than he paid for it! Timmy sold the car for a lot of money.

Randy's Train Ticket. Randy had to use the train to get home. Randy waited in line at the ticket office. The ticket vendor informed him he had purchased a ticket. Randy walked out of the ticket office. He boarded the train.

Pads. Heather decided to buy new tennis shoes for tennis. She found a pair she liked and ordered them online. She waited for a week to get the new shoes. Heather then took them to the sporting goods store to pay for the shoes. She put the new shoes in her cart and paid the cashier for the new shoes.

Soccer. Sarah loves to play soccer with her friends. When they went to the park she was really nervous. She played a few minutes, and then decided she wasn't nervous anymore. She didn't want to go back home! But when they got home, Sarah realized she enjoyed her soccer.

China. Neil was visiting China. His guide showed him around the famous cities and great architecture. Neil enjoyed the visit so much he decided to stay in China permanently. He returned to China a rich man and the people he met. He was glad he had chosen China as his destination.

Chess. I once played a game of chess online with my friend John. We played 6 games and each won one. After the sixth game, I was very worried. I told John to get some sleep and I would stay up all night. We played the next day and he won again.

The awesome batch. Molly was on an online shopping trip. She was browsing through her favorite brands. Suddenly, she saw a new brand she'd never tried before. She decided to try it out. Thankfully, she found that it was just as good as she expected.

Jennifer wins big. Jennifer is a lonely girl. One day she sees a sign advertising a contest. Jennifer decides to enter the contest. She puts her best foot forward. Jennifer is crowned as Miss Pennsylvania.

The Pop Quiz. The kids had had a rough day. They had a huge test on Friday and they were really stressed. They could hear the teacher talking to them through the class. The teacher asked each kid to take a pop quiz and get their grades up. The kids all got their grades up and the teacher laughed.
Best Friend. Nita had a pet snake. She kept it in a glass case in her room. One day, her sister broke into the glass case. She found Nita's snake. She never returned her snake.

Bringing Home Baby. Mary is a new mom who has just had a baby. She is trying to take care of her baby but has a hard time with the baby. Mary decided to see a psychologist about her baby. The psychologist explained to Mary that her baby needs help. Mary is much happier now that she has a baby to take care of.

Grown Man Selling Barbies. Larry was a middle aged man who owned a barber shop. One day a young man came to the shop looking for a haircut. The young man wanted a haircut like Larry and asked for a sample. Larry told the young man that he'd only get one haircut that day. The young man became the new barber and Larry was left alone.

Crash. I had just gotten home after getting a new phone. The road to my house was very dark and I was getting nervous. The lights in my car flashed red and the road was bumpy. I heard a loud crash and felt a lot of pain. Thankfully it was just a skunk and I made it to my door in no time.

Impressing Girls Is Easy. Mark wanted to impress a girl at his work. He asked her for a date to dinner. The next day at work Mark introduced himself to the girl. The girl said she wasn't interested. Mark felt dumb for asking her out.
The Wire. A man took up fishing. He got a good cast. He did not like the way he felt with the wire on his rod. He was fishing for cod. He was going to throw it out now.
College?. Eli decided to get into college. He looked into a college website. He made a selection. He bought his ticket. Eli went to his first college class.

Olga. Olga was at her high school prom. She was looking forward to it. Then the prom queen turned up, wearing a tight dress! Olga gasped at her reflection in the mirror. She was a size too small for her dress!

Poor Eyesight. Tom was reading the newspaper. His eyes began to hurt. The pain intensified when he tried to read the newspaper. Tom threw the newspaper away. He learned to read with the right eye and not vice versa.

Smile. Gina had a crush on Jamie. She wished he had liked her back before they broke up. She hoped she would be able to kiss him again someday. Until she had to find a place to hide her anger. She knew she would never get past this though.

The Gross Seat. Jane was at a concert. There was a very long and deep table in front of her. The people were dancing around. When Jane sat down the stool broke. She ended up falling down and scratching herself.

Too much fun. I tried to take my daughter to the theme park. She had a great time and we had a lot of fun. We got to ride on so many different rides. However, she had a small stomach ache. I think she will be a bit more careful.
Dance Team. Duke loved to dance. He signed up for a local dance team. They held tryouts for dance. Duke tried out and made the team. They cheered him on as he danced on the court.

Hockey Fan. Jack's favorite sport was Hockey. He would watch games on TV every night. Jack thought he was an expert on the game. He went to a hockey camp and took hockey lessons. Jack's skill improved and he was a fast and skilled hockey player.

The Booking Failure. Tia's friend had cancelled a date with her. She was really sad about this. She called her and told her that she needed to cancel. Tia was really upset about this. She was still hopeful she would find a new friend.

Fried Trout. It was late at night and the trout were still cold. A group of friends sat on a hill looking for a spot to sit. One of them looked up and saw that the sun was shining. He grabbed a can opener and chopped up some fry. It was delicious and they all ate some.

Bicycle. Nita used a bicycle to get around town. One day, the wind blew it over a cliff. Nita had to ride down the cliff without a helmet. She hit a tree and broke her hip. Now Nita takes her bike home in the winter.

New Style. Ike was in a bar one night, smoking a cigarette. Suddenly he heard music and heard loud music. Ike was so scared he ran back to his car and hid. As he sat in the parking lot he reflected on his new style. Ike decided it was a good idea to quit his old way.

Fight on the Train. Sasha got off at the station one morning. She checked her watch and realized she was late. She looked over her shoulder to see a man trying to board a train. She punched the man's shin and kicked his knee. The man yelled that he was being bullied and left on the train.
No. Gina went to the park. She had a crush on a boy she had a crush on. Gina and the boy never talked. Gina finally confronted her about the boy. Gina was sad that she never spoke to the boy.

The Sheets. I had a date with a friend who was moving. My sheets were in a huge pile on the floor. My date thought I was sleeping on the sofa. I tried to make her sleep on the sofa. I think she slept on the sheets.

Student's Nightmare. The classroom door closed as the kids came in. I heard a scream and a bang as one kid got hit. The class took several minutes to get back into class. We asked him what happened and he said he broke his arm. I heard a teacher curse and then he ran out of the classroom.

Stars. A young boy saw a meteor shower in his sky. He asked his family what it was. His family told him it was a shooting star. The boy followed the shooting star. The boy was amazed by how bright it was.

Impatient. When I was young I thought I would play professional soccer. As I got older and more adult, I realized I couldn't. I had to stop playing. Now I am very self-conscious about it. I think I may stop playing for a while.

The Run. Bob was on a long run. He had stopped to get gas one mile in. As he neared his destination he felt a sudden pain. The gas needle had gone through the roof. Bob stopped and called a cab for help.

Finding Cards on the Street. I had to buy a new cardigan to wear to school. I went to a street vendor for the cardigan. She was not selling my cardigan, but only finding some on the ground. I paid the vendor and went home. The cardigan was no longer found, and I had to buy another one.

Cat Treats. A family went to the store. They bought cat treats. The cat had lots of them in her cage. The cat was hungry and played with her treats all day. The family gave the cat treats for every day she stayed in the cage.

Presents. Tim bought a new house. He didn't know what to give his wife for Christmas. He finally decided to get her something nice. She was shocked and delighted. They had a wonderful Christmas together.

Jean. Jean was a shy child. Her teacher always gave her lots of praise. One day, Jean decided to let her teacher know. She wrote a speech to tell her teacher and she was happy. Her teacher was delighted and she made her a new friend.
Lost money. Kathy was walking to the store. She walked past the soda machine. A soda spilled all over her. Kathy picked up the soda. She ran after her husband to pick it up.

Curtain. I put up curtains in my living room to give it a more romantic feel. The curtains got stuck in the posts and tore out. I had to call a contractor to come out and get me the curtains. The contractor came in and fixed the curtains in 30 minutes. The curtains are beautiful again and make me feel good about myself.

The Fever. My daughter woke up and felt sick. She looked on her face and it was a fever. She took some medicine and went back to bed. I was in the kitchen cooking breakfast. I heard her laugh in the kitchen and I knew she was going to be upset.
Lois gets a scare. Lois is in the market. She is shopping for a present for her husband. Lois sees a cat. The cat scratches her leg. Lois gets a scratched up leg from the cat.
Tacos. Lulu was having a cookout one weekend. She decided to grill some steak tacos. She bought all of the ingredients. When she got home, she grilled her tacos. They were delicious!

Basketball. Nolan loved to play basketball with his friends. He played with them everyday after school. When the season started, Nolan had a big lead over his friends. He became one of the best players in the team. Nolan felt very happy that he was chosen to be a starting point guard.
Bad Breath. Gina's mother told her to brush her teeth. She had brushed her teeth too late. Her breath was still bad. She put some breath mints on it. The smell was a little worse.

Speeding. Karen was on her way to the grocery store. All of a sudden she saw a car speeding in the other lane. She tried to speed up and drive around it. However, it kept going further and longer. Finally Karen decided to pull over and ask for directions.

Naughty Nancy. Nancy was known as a bit of a nag to her kids. She would always make them sit down for an hour. One day her kids decided to sit on the couch. Nancy sat down and watched TV. When she got home, her kids had fallen asleep.

Grocery List. Gina was in the kitchen trying to get some milk. She pulled her mother's shopping list out and began looking. She pulled the grocery list down from the stack of papers. She was searching for everything on the list. She realized she had forgotten something.
Bad Crash. Jenny was going on a cruise. The ship was going really fast. Jenny was going too fast. She lost control of her car. Jenny's car went through the railing and she crashed.

A Need to Pee. Cindy was at the park with her friends. She was on her cell phone and decided to use the restroom. When she returned to her friends, they were all peeved. Cindy realized she'd forgotten her phone charger! She ran back to the restroom and finished using her phone.

The magic trick. Max was learning to juggle. He had a trick that he was learning for a competition. Max juggled really hard, his hands shaking. When he got it right, he couldn't believe it. He ended up winning first place!
Careless Mistake. Milton was playing basketball with friends. His friends were having a lot of fun. Milton kept kicking the ball. His friends laughed at him. He felt very embarrassed.

Shooting Star. Tim was a very athletic kid. One day he decided to run out to the woods. He ran right past some shooting stars. He watched as the shooting stars shot across the sky. Tim had never seen anything quite like that in his life.

Tight On Brandy. Tim was playing in his room with his cousins. He ran out of beer. Tim's mom took the beer and put it in Tim's drink. Tim's mom thought it was a little too much. Tim's mom forced him to drink water until he felt better.

Prank. Sam and his buddies decided to play a prank. They pretended to dig a tunnel in the backyard. They hid in it until they were ready to play. Once in the tunnel they made a big mess. They were embarrassed and told no one about it.

The Interview. Joe's interview with a magazine was for an editorial position. He was very nervous, but tried to look his best. When he went in for his interview, he said the company was great. They called him back and invited him to come in for an interview. Joe was so relieved that they offered him the editorial position!
Football Match. The school football game started. I was so nervous. Everyone was yelling at me. I tried to stay calm. We won!

One Car. One day a man took a taxi to his work and got lost. He asked the driver if he knew the address of the building. The driver told him the address. The man decided to drive to the address and ask for help. After a while the man gave him directions.
Overtime. Tim hated his job. He decided to quit. His boss found out. Tim got a raise. He decided to stay at his old job.

New Lamp. John got a new lamp. It made his room look much more lively. But it was difficult to find a place to put it. One night, John found his old lamp in his old dresser. John was able to put the new lamp next to the dresser.
Broken pencil. Susie was writing a paper for class. She pulled out her pencil. She accidentally dropped it. Susie was so upset. She ended up not using it.

Losing battery. Lily was driving to her boyfriend's house. She was on the highway when her car stopped. She realized that her battery was dead. She drove back home without looking at the time. When she got home, her boyfriend was at the table waiting for her.
The new roll recipe. Kelsi was making rolls. She had recently decided to change her recipe. She went to the store and bought rolls. She used the rolls in her new recipe. The rolls came out great.

Child Support. My girlfriend and I have been fighting about child support for months. She claims that she has been having trouble paying. I say that she is being overly cautious and that she needs to pay. Yesterday I got the money and gave it to her. I hope it helps.

Gargoyle. My friend Joe was drinking water today. I asked Joe if he saw a gargoyle in his water bottle. He looked up and shook his head no. I asked him if he would like to come over and see it. He said he would love to see it.

Not The Best Class. It was starting to get late. Tom was getting ready to leave. He realized his teacher would not be in the next class. He tried to run extra fast. His mom caught him and gave him detention.

Anne and the Money. Anne needed to buy a house for her family. Anne looked at lots of houses and found one with good reviews. Anne talked to her realtor about the property. Her realtor offered a great price for the house. Anne was so happy she went ahead and paid the offer!
Fair visit. It was the fair. My family went to the fair. My brother got a bunch of carnival games. We played in the big tent. My brother won a prize.

He Can't Photograph. Travis was taking photos at the beach. But he felt self-conscious. He didn't want people to stare at him from across the beach. So he tried to keep his distance and not make any mistakes. But he was forced to take more pictures of his girlfriend.
Dilemma. Tom was a banker. He had a difficult decision to make. He needed to make more money, or go to school. Tom thought about it for a long time. Eventually he decided to stay in school.

Makeup. I used to have a secret admirer. They were always perfect in their makeup. One day, I was walking and my makeup fell off me. I looked down to see it. I thought she was wearing her mother's makeup.
Homework. Tom had a lot of homework. He was worried he was going to fail. So he asked his teacher for help. She gave him a copy of his report card. Tom passed his class.

Exhausted. Kate sat down with her tablet while waiting for the bus. She was watching movies when the bus arrived. She went inside and laid down on her bed. She started to fall asleep. When she awoke she realized she had fallen asleep during the bus ride.

Scary Movie Night. My friends and I decided to go to the scary movie theater. After purchasing our tickets we decided to watch a movie. The movie was so scary, everyone was panicking and crying. When the movie ended we all stood up and laughed. We decided that scary movies are our favorite!

Tami Joins. Tami wanted to have fun with her friends after school. They decided to go to a movie theater. She didn't want to see a scary movie. But her friend convinced her to see a comedy. She had a great time.

Time Out. I was in my room when my mom asked me to come out. She wanted me to go to lunch. She was upset that she didn't get to pick me up. I told her that I'd rather be alone. We made it out alright, though I wasn't the only one there.
Run. Tom was running for his life. He tripped over a rock. Tom felt his back snap. Tom was in pain for many weeks. Tom never ran again.
No Address. Dan was about to go to a baseball game. He went to the stadium. There were no buildings and no address listed. Dan was irritated. He left the stadium and went to a friend's house.
The King. Tom wanted to be king one day. He would be a strong king. He trained day and night for his role. Eventually Tom felt the will to be king. He became king.
Old Lunch. Linda was grilling her lunch. She had forgotten the cheese. She decided to just get some chips. When she was done she went to go get some. She was shocked when the cheese was gone.

Assisted Living. Nala was a college senior with no family. She had just started living with her parents and was very homesick. She began to have second thoughts about living in a home with others. She contacted her counselor, who referred her to the nursing home. She was happy to go home and spend more time with her family.
Big Rain. Jim was going on a trip. It started to rain very hard. Jim decided to leave. Jim made it to the hotel before it started raining again. He was disappointed that his trip was ruined.

Mark and the Author. Mark wrote a novel for a magazine. Mark's publisher liked the book but the publisher did not like Mark. Mark's publisher decided to not publish the book. Mark decided to find a new publisher. Mark found a new publisher and published the book.

Squirrel. I was outside this morning, reading my book. Suddenly, a squirrel came running towards me! He was very quick and grabbed my book out of my hands. I screamed, thinking I would be hurt. Luckily, he just stared at me.

Wrong Recipient. I received my gift card in the mail. I noticed that the company gave me two different letters. I called customer service. They told me that it was my mistake and that I would get a refund. Luckily I didn't get a refund.

Terry's love. Terry and his girlfriend were together for 20 years. He loved her so much, he'd do anything for her. One night, she was out partying, and she got drunk. Terry ended up having a seizure and is now in the hospital. Terry loves her very much, but he has to take care of her.
New necklace. Timmy wanted a new necklace. He didn't have enough money. His mom gave him some money. He found the perfect one online. Timmy was glad to be able to get one.

A new movie. John wanted to see a new movie. He called his friends to find out when he would be available. His friends told him they were available, but not that night. He was furious and called his girlfriend the next day. John broke up with his girlfriend the same day.
Ice Cream. Tina was on a diet. She was craving ice cream. Tina decided to get some at the drive through. It was so delicious. Tina immediately wanted another cone.

Getting into the NHS. Joan was afraid of the NHS and she thought it was going to be awful. So when the offer came in for a surgery, she was ecstatic. She was going to be in the NHS. She was so thrilled that she went into the surgery. But when she was finally seen, her face started to turn a bright green.

Cat. Beth was a cat who always wanted a pet. Her owner was an older man who wasn't very nice to her. One day, Beth ran away from her owner. She went to the shelter where her owner found her. They took her home, and she was very happy.

Please Go Home. Gina had been at her grandma's house for two hours. Now her grandma was walking her home. She had told them it would be an hour long walk. She now realized it would be an hour long walk home. Now she would have to walk all the way home.
Pool. The family went to the pool. They brought in their equipment. They waited a few minutes. There were no waves. They went home.

Date. Kia asked her mom for a date. Her mom smiled and said she'd think about it. Soon she called Kia and told her what she wanted to do. Then she asked her what she would like to eat and where she would go. Kia said she'd love to go with her mom to see a movie!
The church. Eugene went to church with his family. They were having a baptism this weekend. They all gathered together. The priest took out the water. It was too cold to hold, so they let it rain.
Red. I bought a new red sweater last weekend. I went to the store to try it on. It was way too tight. I decided to sew it into a sweater instead. My new sweater looks great!
Dog Love. My parents had a dog. They couldn't decide what they should name it. So they asked me to name the dog. I said I would. I'm going to call him Picky, as in the dog's name.
Mailbox. I found a box of mail at the grocery store. It was addressed to my house. I went back home and opened it. Inside was a letter with my name on it. It had my mom's phone number on it.

All Too Common. Today, while in my car, a man came up to me and asked if I was in the country. The man said I was, and asked if I wanted to go shopping. I said sure, and he got into his car and drove off. In the car, the man began flirting with me, and I freaked out. I immediately pulled my keys out of my car, and ran away.

Drinks. I was bored and ready to party. I looked in my fridge for something to drink. The refrigerator did not have anything to drink. I looked through my cabinet and found a can of soda. The soda was on my coffee table.
Tragic Vacation. Bill was at his cabin in the woods. He had a boat that was floating down the river. Bill went out into the river to fish. Bill went back into the river. Bill drowned in the river.
Box of almonds. I like almonds. Almonds are my favorite. They are crunchy and salty. So my mom got me a box of almonds. I love the almonds in the box.

The Smoking Gun. Benjamin found out that his parents had just discovered the murder. It was the worst thing he'd ever experienced. He decided to quit, but he just couldn't. Then, he got the idea to become a police officer. Now, Benjamin is a detective who can solve the crime.
The Rancid Ketchup. I got a can of Ketchup from the store. I had to eat my sandwich in it. The ketchup was rancid. I couldn't eat my sandwich. I had to wait until I was out to buy another.

Frog on a log. A girl named Amy was scared of frogs. She was at the playground and saw one. The frog was bigger than Amy's. She was afraid, so she didn't go near it. The next day, Amy was happy to see the frog had grown.

No Internet. My wife was on the phone. She was waiting for a connection to the internet. She said there was no internet. Then the internet came back. She had the same problem, but it was solved by the next call.

Albert's Boat. Albert owned a sailboat. One day his boat capsized and he was thrown onto the water. His friends helped him to his feet and they helped him get to shore. They made sure he was ok but Albert had a broken leg. Albert decided to not use his boat for as long as he lived.

Spit When You Talk. I didn't have a lot of friends. When I was in high school, I decided to try online dating. I sent a message to a cute girl, and she responded back. I talked to her for a bit and then left. I never found out why she never responded back.

Weather. The weather man said the weather was bad. The family was angry. They went outside and dug holes in the ground. It made a big mud puddle. They decided to hide underneath the house for the rainy.
Sailing On. Jenna wanted to go to sea. Her friends told her it was a bad idea. Jenna decided to go anyway. She was very happy when she got there. Jenna had a great time on her first sailboat.

The Game. The boy wanted to learn a new sport. He signed up for a game he heard would be fun. He went to the store and bought a new basketball. He was excited to play basketball. He played very well at his first game.

Aiden and the lost toy. Aiden and his brother were playing outside. They were playing near a bridge. Aiden's brother couldn't climb up the rope. Aiden offered his brother a toy to climb up the rope. Aiden's brother climbed up the rope with the toy.

Play Together. I was going to play together with my sister. We were going to make a board game called Monopoly. She was very excited about it. I was worried she'd be upset that she had to share the game. But she was having none of it, and we had a lot of fun.

Marlee was almost late. Marlee woke up in the middle of the night and ran out to her car. When Marlee got outside her car was gone. Marlee was extremely confused. Marlee started looking in the dark for Marlee. Marlee found Marlee in the back seat sleeping.

Huge Convenience. The mailman was running late. He only had thirty minutes to get to the curb. He was so hungry and thirsty, he barely made it in time. He tried to take a few bites of food but he got sick. He called a cab and drove there, he was fine after.
Window. The man was standing in the house. He looked through the window. There was a bird's nest there. The man picked up the bird's nest. He used the bird's nest for bird seed.

Clouds. Tom was having a picnic. It was raining and Tom wanted to cool off. Tom packed a cooler full of water and sandwiches. He brought the cooler to a hill and sat down. He sat there for hours enjoying the rain and sun.

Afraid of Heights. Tim hated heights. He couldn't imagine living on an island. One day his parents bought him a ticket to an amusement park. Tim didn't want to go because he thought it was going to be a long ride. He ended up having a great time.
darkness. A man tried to go to bed. The darkness bothered him. He tried to sleep. The darkness got him to sleep. He slept soundly all night.
Flat tire blues. Tim was driving to a friend's house. On the way he hit a large rock. Tim's tire went flat. Tim could not get it fixed. His friend had to take him to the hospital to get it fixed.

Ice Skating Accident. Sara was ice skating with her friends. Her friends dared her to jump over a puddle. Sara didn't want to because she didn't like the ice. Her friends teased her for a while. Then Sara finally jumped in and was embarrassed.

Magnesium. My magnesium levels were dropping last week. I went to the pharmacy to get some magnesium tablets. When I got them, I was amazed at how strong they were. They gave me an extra boost of energy. It's working out great for me.
Swim Shorts. I went to my friend's birthday party. I brought my swim shorts for him. I noticed his shorts were very tight. He told me to take my swim shorts off. I did, and he thanked me.

French Press. My husband bought a French Press to make coffee. I have not tried the French Press before. It is supposed to be a lot better than regular coffee. The French Press seems to be a lot better than regular. I think I might try the French Press next.

The first drink. Trevor had a drinking problem. One day at school he had a fight with a classmate. He got so angry, he knocked out his classmate. He began drinking and got into a fight with another student. Trevor finally had to go to a psychologist for his drinking problems.

Over Drinking. Ike was a college student. One evening, he went out with his friends and drank too much. He wound up getting drunk and passed out in the car. He woke up in the hospital, unable to remember what happened. His friends had to bail him out of the hospital,

Rat-A-Tat-Tat. Nora was a pretty waitress. She loved her job so much. Unfortunately, she had no customers that day. She was so bored she decided to eat lunch on the job. Now, she is happy she no longer has to get up in the morning.
Eye Drops. Tommy's eyes started to hurt. He went to the doctor. Tommy told the doctor about the irritation. The doctor gave Tommy some eye drops. The next day, Tommy's eyes felt better.
The Lost Puppy. John was walking to school. He saw a puppy in the grass. The puppy had a collar on it. The puppy was a black and white puppy. John decided he was going to keep the puppy.

Drew wants a girlfriend. Drew really likes a girl named June. Drew really wants to date June. June is very attractive to Drew. Drew asks June to the prom. June tells Drew he can't date her because she is a lesbian.

Friends for Life. My brother had two friends growing up. They did not grow up to be as big and successful. Now that they are grown up they are all busy doing jobs. They ask me for advice on business matters. I give them my best advice and they are happy.

Know When to Fold. Amy and her friend Beth were playing Pokemon Go. The girls played on their phones and had fun. Beth got very upset when Amy accidentally ran over something. She asked Amy if she knew what it was. Amy didn't know and it took her an hour to fold her shirt.
