Bad dye job. Kelsi wanted to change up her hair. She decided to dye it. It was a horrible color. Kelsi didn't like it. She ended up not liking it.

Dog Attack. I was driving to work this morning and came across a group of dogs. There was a red puppy lying on the road. I stopped my car and walked over to him. I lifted the puppy up and he immediately started barking at me. I continued walking until he stopped barking and continued with my work.

Training. Tia had been working hard all month. She finally made it to the track. Tia's teacher handed out the first set of track shoes. Tia put on her shoes and started out on the track. Tia ran all around the track and scored 3rd place.
The SUV. I was on my way home from work. My car died on me. I had to call Triple A for help. I finally made it home. I still have that perfect SUV.

Foreclosure. Our condo complex had a foreclosure. I was working as a real estate agent. I called several of my contacts for help. I went in to find a house, but it was on the market. I sold it to a buyer later that day.
The Truck. Nathan had to haul wood for his apartment. He had a new truck. It was big and cumbersome. Nathan hired a trucking company. Now he can finally get a house done.

Started a garden. Sally wanted to start her own garden. She got some seeds and soil. Then, she started to plant her seeds. After awhile, Sally had a garden full of vegetables. After Sally had a few months of the garden, she had enough food.
Basketball Season. Tim wanted to try out for the basketball team. He practiced at home every day. The tryouts were soon upon him. Tim did his very best. The coach told Tim he made the team!

The Windy Day. It had been a hot summer day. Tim couldn't figure out why the weather was so windy. It must have been because of the wind. He decided to wear more shoes. After that he was able to keep cool.

Horatio's Fencing Trip. Horatio's family had gone to the fencing tournament. Horatio was a novice fencer. He was practicing his defense when he fell. He was able to stand back up and get back on his feet. His family laughed at him and he was back to practicing.

A New Cat. Bobby decided to get a new cat. He went to the shelter to adopt one. He adopted a nice black and white cat. Bobby took the cat home and gave it lots of toys. Bobby's new cat was a great addition to his family!

Mud volleyball. Samantha and John were playing on the playground. Samantha hit a ball high into the air. The ball flew in the air for many yards before landing in a mud puddle. John and Samantha were covered in mud. John and Samantha ran home to clean up.

Kylie gets famous. Kylie is on vacation in Italy. She is very jealous that her sisters are going to the beach. She gets an idea to get her sisters tickets. Kylie buys all of the girls tickets to the beach. She takes all of her sisters to the beach.

Toner. Amber went to the store to buy a new light bulb. She found a cheap one that was bulb with a wide diameter. She bought it with the intention to replace the old bulb. But she ended up dropping it and breaking the bulb. Amber felt disappointed and bought the bulb with a clear bulb.

Bidet. Tia needed a good way to keep cool in the summer. Her husband's expensive air conditioner wasn't helping. So Tia's husband went to the hardware store. He bought a fancy, metal bidet. Tia loved her new air conditioner.
Online Store. Sue liked to make jewelry. She decided to sell it online. Sue started a shop. She sold a lot of her jewelry. She made a lot of money.

Mary Had a Little Lamb. Mary went to a grocery store to get ingredients for a stew. She was so excited when she saw the selection of lamb. Mary mixed all the ingredients in a large pot of water. Mary let the mixture simmer for several hours. After the soup was done, Mary ate the lamb in front of her family.

Getting Annoyed. My brother played a game of tag at my house. He decided to take off his headphones to talk. I yelled at him to put the headphones back on. He refused and said he was just getting annoyed. I told him to stop messing with me.
The Lesbian. Jane loved being a lesbian. She decided to take a trip to Paris. She saw many beautiful women. She got to meet them all. They all agreed to meet next week.

Ant Friends. Ivan had ants on his walls and in his bed. He was having trouble getting rid of them. His friend, a friend of Ivan's, was very helpful. They came together and worked very hard. Ivan was able to get rid of all the ants.
Unhealthy Salad. Janice wanted to be healthy. So she decided to change her diet. She ate only salad. But she soon developed an unhealthy appetite. And she had to eat more salads.

The Borrowed Car. Ken's parents were having a financial dispute. They were trying to come up with a solution. Eventually they realized the car they were considering was too expensive. Ken was forced to keep it. They finally made it work with a payment plan.
Amnesia. My wife and I were taking a walk. Suddenly, she slipped and fell. She had no idea how to get up. I had to drive her home. Luckily, her husband came home to help.
Kate. Kate wanted to play soccer. She asked her dad for permission to join the team. Her dad said yes. He signed her up and she started training. When she got to play she scored a goal!

Statistics. Marlene had a hard time reading Statistics. Her teacher gave her a flash card for help. Marlene got a good grade on the card. Her teacher gave her the credit card to buy the book. Now Marlene can read Statistics and she is very happy.

Serial Killer. Ike was obsessed with serial killers. He visited their homes and collected memorabilia. He was even invited to sit in on their lectures. One day, his house was robbed and he was stabbed to death. Ike wasn't a serial killer anymore but he still had a fascination.
A Very Tired Happening. Janet was always tired. Her family was at the mall. The whole family sat at a table to eat lunch. Janet fell asleep because she was so tired. When she woke up she felt great.
Walk the Dog. John wanted to go for a walk. He went to the park. John played in the grass. John saw a dog. John walked the dog.

Coin collection. Bobby liked playing with old coins. He collected dozens of them over the years. His mother bought him some old books on coin collecting. He read all the books and made up a few of his own coin stories. Bobby now had a large coin collection.

The Tea Cups. Martha was in class when her friend gave her a tea cup. Martha knew this cup was going to be really old. Martha went to ask her friend if she could buy one. Her friend laughed and said she couldn't afford to buy one. Martha took the tea cup home and started drinking it.

Satin robe. Lucy's grandma always made her her favorite robe. She always put a bow in it. One day she forgot it was there and the robe fell apart. She was sad but not for long. Luckily her grandpa found her the robe she wanted.
Salespad. I sold books on Amazon using Salespad. I had never used the site before. I sold about ten books in two days. My sales increased a lot after that. I am glad I used this site.
Hidden Box. One day I was digging in my backyard. I found an old box. The box had a lot of old pictures inside. I took the pictures to a local college. The pictures are on display there now.

Workflow. Jim went into work. He sat down in his office and turned on his computer. His computer was not working. Jim looked online and learned he needed to upgrade his computer. Jim went to the store and bought a new computer.

Big Brother. My sister in law's son is a college freshman. He was arrested for a DUI. He was sentenced to a rehab center for drug abuse. After two weeks there he graduated with honors. His mother called the rehab center and told them she is proud.

Felix Lights Candles. Felix loves to light candles. He lights one in his bedroom every night. Tonight, Felix decided to have a small fire. He started a small fire in his kitchen. Felix was very happy to see the candles light up.

Riley gets an A. Riley was getting ready for work. She took her makeup off and put it on. The day of her test comes around and she has a good grade. She had worked hard to get her test back and this is it. She received an A and celebrated with a nice glass of wine.
Silver Fox. Tom was a farm animal. He was kept in a wire and was very small. One day his wire broke. It fell apart leaving Tom alone. He was so sad but he found another animal to keep him company.

The Scary Hike. Tim went for a hike in the woods. The weather was cold and it started to snow. Tim froze the whole time. By the end Tim was exhausted. He decided he would never go for a hike in the woods again.

record player. John bought a record player from the store. He played records for hours everyday. John started losing his records. He tried to sell them on eBay. However, he found out it was too much for him.

Jury Duty. Tim was working at a courthouse. He had been there for years as a clerk. He had recently been chosen to be a juror. He had never been a jury member. He was excited and eager to have his vote count.

Happy Lifetime. My friends and I used to take a trip to New Jersey every summer. We loved seeing the beautiful beaches and playing in the pool. I had a lot of fun on our trips, and always looked forward to them. One summer, the trip was cancelled due to the heat. Instead, I got to stay at home and play video games all summer.

Dry Dry Dry. I had to get some help from my brother. He was helping me paint the house. After we painted, I tried to dry it off. I ended up messing up and having to redo the entire thing. My brother still wanted me to finish painting the house.

Like Mommy. Riley was a baby who was very rude to her mother. Riley's mother was mad with Riley's mother's attitude. Riley was sent to live with her aunt in her aunt's house. She started to become more polite to her mother. She also began to like her aunt's house a lot.

Rose and Juliet. Bertram was an 18 year old boy who wanted to take Juliet to prom. He was afraid her father wouldn't allow him to go. His father didn't like Bertram at all and his mother insisted. Bertram went with his mother despite his father's protests. He still had a great time and was proud of his father.

Classical and Modern. A musician heard about a local orchestra performing in his town. He went to visit the venue to see if he could join them. The conductor asked him to perform his favorite song. After a short while, the conductor announced that he'd forgotten the lyrics. The musician felt embarrassed but grateful to be involved.

Pottery. Ana had always wanted to learn how to make pottery. At first she was terrible. Then she practiced and practiced. Soon she was making wonderful bowls and cups! Ana was so happy that she had decided to learn how to pottery.

Senior Year. Today I have to take a senior year history class. I have studied hard and I have made some friends. This morning I met a man who was on my team in high school. I am looking forward to the senior year. We are all hoping that we can accomplish the goals.

Big Sister. Anna's mom was a stay at home mom. One day Anna was left with a big sister. She hated her little sister. But she was afraid she would be lonely. Finally, after many months, Anna and her big sister were friends.

Boyfriend. Kate's boyfriend didn't want a second girlfriend. Kate made him apologize to her for being so mean. She went to the grocery store to buy some flowers. She left flowers in his car. Kate was disappointed but knew he felt remorse.
Stew. I made some stew. My friend asked for some. I gave it to her. She said it tasted fine. I thanked her.

Poker Game. The guys got together at a bar to play poker. They had never played before. They started randomly flipping over cards. They kept flipping until they started playing a game. The guys had a great night playing poker.
Hungry. The woman woke up hungry. She called for help. The neighbor came over to help her. The woman was happy to have someone to eat with. They ate their food together and felt better about life.

Stomach Virus. My stomach started to hurt really bad when I went to the beach. I didn't have the appetite to go home. I ended up throwing up in the sand at the beach. I went to the doctor to get some food. The doctor told me to eat healthy and not to get sick.

Miseducation. The professor called on everyone to finish their work. While I was on my phone, someone came to take my work. I tried to run away from them. However, he caught me. Since I didn't do my work, I had to give a big lecture.

Weather's Always Wrong. I was reading the weather for the next day. The weather forecast indicated there would be a lot of rainy today. I had to make a big trip to the store to buy some rain gear. After driving to the store, I was sweating like a pig. When I arrived home, the rain had already stopped and the temperature had risen.

Sick of meat. Fred is a vegetarian. He has never really liked meat. He started to really get into it last night. Then Fred realized he was getting sick. Fred threw up and vowed to never eat meat again.

A win for Bob. Bob really liked his blue and yellow truck. He would take it off road and show his friends. One day it was stolen from his front porch. He did not get it back until a year later. He was very sad that he lost his blue and yellow truck.
Linda's doughnuts. Linda was a good baker. She wanted to start selling her doughnuts. She started a small business. She baked a dozen of doughnuts. She sold the doughnuts at the market.

Special Delivery. I was going to deliver some groceries to my parents house. My friend was coming over and asked if I wanted to join him. He thought I would be bored with no one else around. I realized he was right and decided to stay and help him out. We ended up having a great time.

A Night Out. John is tired of working all day. He wants to spend some time with his friends. He heads over to the bar and goes to relax. His friends tell him that it's going to be a bad night. John lays in bed all day and feels more relaxed.

Future Cat Lady. Sue thought she was a great cat lady. She had always been good to her cats, even if only for company. She never cared for them the way her friends did. She let her friends know that she cared but didn't care for them. She never saw them again.

Grandma's Cookies. I always remember my grandpa having to bring cookies to school. Every time I got there he would always make them. He made chocolate chip cookies that everyone loved. One time I could not find any of his cookies, he never made them. I ended up staying up all night to make all the cookies he never made.

Card Game. Dan loves playing card games with his friends. Dan has a favorite card game of which is checkers. Last night, Dan's friends played cards and laughed. However, the next day, they decided to play checkers. This reminded Dan of his childhood memories of card games.

New neighbors. Our new neighbors moved in two weeks ago. They have one cat and one dog. They spend all day playing together in their yard. My wife and I like to walk around and feed them. We hope to see them over a few more days.

20 years and still in love. Alicia and Tim went out for dinner. They both wanted to eat at a fancy restaurant. Alicia tried the shrimp cocktail. Unfortunately, the shrimp was overcooked and it was disgusting. Tim was very disappointed.

Sick from a taco. Lisa and Jake went to Taco Bell together. They ate at a taco place. Lisa told Jake she was feeling sick. Jake knew he had to stop eating so soon. He went home and rested for the next day.

Fear of Water. My husband and I have been having a lot of water problems lately. I know what water looks like in the bathtub, but my husband doesn't. He says I shouldn't worry because he loves to swim. One time he splashed in the bathtub as he got into a fight. I don't know what he's capable of when it comes to water.

Dodge This. I tried out for the dodge ball team as a small child. I was so good, I didn't have to try out for the team anymore. As a teenager I tried out for dodge ball again. I was so good, I made the team as a substitute for my missed tryout. The coach didn't let me play that year.

The Poor Student. I sat down with a group of students today. The teacher gave a quick lesson on how to put pen to paper. I tried to put a pencil on my desk, but it went all over the place. I picked the pencil up off the floor and took it with me. I went back home and had a nice cup of coffee with the pen.

Baby Aubrey. Aubrey had a baby on Christmas Day. She told her parents she was allergic to the new food they were trying to feed her. Her parents were worried, but still believed she was getting a healthy baby. On Christmas morning, Aubrey was in so much pain and crying. Aubrey had had a new baby boy!
Big Fish. James went fishing with his father. He had never caught a fish before. His father taught him how to cast the line. James cast the line and pulled hard. He reeled in his first fish!
Ray. Ray was an older brother. He loved his brother very much. His brother had gone missing. Ray searched the entire neighborhood for him. Ray found him dead in the woods.

Singer. My sister in law's husband is very dramatic. He sings a lot and he is angry at other singers. On Monday he came in my sister in law's apartment and screamed. My sister in law called the police. He was yelling and cursing, he left.
Speed Walking. I was feeling pretty tired. I decided to walk around town. I looked for my favorite restaurant. I wasn't able to find it. I eventually found it.

Snow day. There was a big snowstorm near Mike's house. He got out of bed and went to play in the snow. When Mike came home he noticed a big puddle in his driveway. He went to go check the damage and it was covered in snow. Mike was sad to have to shovel the driveway but happy to have fun.

Trip to animal kingdom. It was a busy Saturday and Kelly was on her way to animal kingdom. She needed to get to the park but had no plans. To her delight, she spotted an ice cream stand that was open. She got her ice cream and headed to the park. To her surprise, the park was closed.

She Can't Wait To Stuff It. Briana was craving cookies. She decided to bake them herself. She tried her best, but the dough was not perfect. She gave up and ordered some fast food. The cookies came out great and she couldn't wait to eat them.

The Long Hike. A couple hiked up a mountain. They began their hike at noon. By noon, they had already hiked ten miles. They had a wonderful lunch and rest at the peak of the mountain. The couple decided to hike a few more miles to reach the summit.

Weight. Lydia was unhappy with her weight. She did not know how to change it. One day she went to a weight loss class. She did not have to try to eat healthier. Lydia was happy she had a way to start a new life.

Building a Sand Castle. Linda liked making things with sand. She decided to make a sand castle. She gathered a bunch of sand and threw it in the ocean. As she waited she was distracted by her kids playing. When she realized what she'd done she was upset.
Missed Bus. Tim was late for work. He called his boss to let him know. His boss didn't hear him. Tim missed his bus. He went to work late.

Not as Real as it Seems. My mother was talking to me today. She was telling me a lot of nonsense. I asked her what was wrong. She said that I wasn't real. I then told her that I thought I was being chased.

Brave Ben. Ben had a hard time controlling his temper. He constantly screamed at his mom and threw things. One day, his mother had enough of his violence and ben was punished. After that Ben learned his lesson. He never hurt a single person again.

Aging Parent. Kelley is a middle aged woman with two children. She has trouble with her oldest, 21 year old Mark. One day he was drinking and smoking pot and called her. He was going to be a father but couldn't take care of himself. Kelley ended up divorcing him a year later.
Rocks. It was dark outside. I decided to search for a campfire. I found a nice campfire. I started to light the campfire. It started a fire that lasted all night.

The Fraud. Tom bought a car with a big fake title. He tried to hide the title by putting the fake title on the back window. When the cops got there they had the real title and it was fake. The cops told Tom to give the fake title back to the dealership. Tom didn't bother and kept driving with the fake title.

Antwan's story. Antwan was a poor black kid growing up in Chicago. One day a rich white kid robbed his home and stole his money. He tried to run away but his mom caught him. She sent him to prison but he managed to escape. Now Antwan is an accountant in Atlanta and is free.

Simon. Simon wanted to be more than a football player. He spent his summers after school working on his skills. Simon eventually earned his football skills. Simon played in college and pro games. He was successful and became a pro football player.
